1a1(phal chen): la she lalo//
2a1(phal chen): / sangs rgyas pal po che zhes bya ba
2a2(phal chen): las/ bam po brgyad cu gya brgyad pa'o// /
2b1(phal chen): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems de dag
2b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi shing de 'dzin seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes
2b3(phal chen): bya ba la bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang
3a1(phal chen): chub sems dpa' de dag sangs rgyas kyi ting
3a2(phal chen): sa sernam par bgyings pa gad pa/ dang nga
3a3(phal chen): dgongs par mdzad pa'i don du/ srin 'tshams kyi mdzod slal
3b1(phal chen): nang nas chos kyi dbyings sgo'i kun nas rnam par dmigs pas/ dus gsum
3b2(phal chen): snang ba ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer chen po// 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor/ sangs
3b3(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing brjod du medapa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa bkye ste/ phyog
3b4(phal chen): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byam
4a1(phal chen): klas pa/ thams cad snang bar mdzad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa
4a2(phal chen): mdzerta'i tshal du tshogs de dag gis/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du/ rtogs pa'i
4a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing / na mkha'i dbyings kyis mthas klas pa thams cad dang / sangs
4a4(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'i khongs su chud pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tham
4b1(phal chen): cad kyis rdul shin tu phra ba dag la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gis ming du bya ba kha dog sna tshogs dang /
4b2(phal chen): rnam pa sna tshogasu rnam par dag pa dang / gzhi sna tshogs dang / dbyibs sna tshogs dang pa'i
4b3(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag na/ byang chub sems dpa'i snying po byang chub tu phyin te/ seng ge'i khri
4b4(phal chen): la 'dug pa/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyis shin tu mchod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i
4b5(phal chen): tshogs kyis kun nas bskor ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
5a1(phal chen): 'tshang rgya ba mthong ste/ la la ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa tsam du/ shin tu yang ba'i
5a2(phal chen): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na/ chos kyi dbyings rgyas par khyab pa'i dbyangs kyi/ dkyil 'khor gyi chos kyi
5a3(phal chen): 'khor lo bskor bar mthong ngo // la la na ni lha'i gnas na 'dug/ la lan ni klu'i gnas su 'dug
5a4(phal chen): la la na ni gnod sbyin gyi gnas na 'dug/ la la na ni lha ma yin gyi gnas na 'dug/ la la na ni nam mkha'
5a5(phal chen): lIng gi gnas na 'dug/ la la na ni mi 'am ci'i gnas na 'dug/ la la na ni lto 'phye chen po'i gnas na 'das
5a6(phal chen): le la na ni mi'i dbang po'i gnas na 'dug/ la la na ni mi'i 'jig rten gyi grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong
5b1(phal chen): rdal dang / ljongs dang / khams dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag na/ rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs dang / spyod lam sna tshogs dang /
5b2(phal chen): lus sna tshogs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnam par dmigs pa sna tshogs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi mngon par shes pa sna tshogs dang / rigs
5b3(phal chen): dang rgyud sna tshogasu byung ba dang / kha dog rnam par dmigs pa sna tshogs dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs dang / 'od zer gyi dra ba bkye ba
5b4(phal chen): sna tshogs dang / dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs dang / gtam gyi skyes bu'i gzhi sna tshogs dang / bstan pa'i gzhi sna tshogs dang / tshig dang /
5b5(phal chen): yi ge dang / nges pa'i tshig sna tshogs kyi/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs na/ chos ston pa mthong bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed kyi
5b6(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyi klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa/ phyogs bcu na rnam par gnas pa phyogs kyi rgyud mtha' yas par 'du
5b7(phal chen): pa/ phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du rtogs pa/ chos thams cad tshogs kyis sgo dang ldan pa/ phyogs kyi ming du bya ba sna tshogasu rtogs pa/ phyogs sna tshogs
5b8(phal chen): kun du gzhol ba/ phyogs cha rnam pa tha dad par rtogs pa/ phyogs sna tshogs kyi rjes su song ba/ phyogs rgya mtsho sna tshogasu gtogs pa 'di lta ste/
6a1(phal chen): shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / shar gyi phyogs 'tshams dang / shar dang /
6a2(phal chen): lho'i phyogs 'tshams dang / lho dang / nub kyi phyogs 'tshams dang / nub dang / byang phyogs 'tshams dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi zhing
6a3(phal chen): gi lhun gyi phyogs dang / sems can gyi lus kyi phyogs dang / sems can gyi ming du bya ba'i phyogs dang / sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa'i phyogs
6a4(phal chen): dang / phyogs dang / phyogs bcu'i da ltar byung ba'i phyogs dang / nam mkha'i mkhong thams cad du/ skra'i rtse mo shin tu phra ba dgod pas dmig
6a5(phal chen): pa'i phyogs dang / zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa'i phyogs la 'jug pa khong du chud par bya ba'i phyogs kyi las
6a6(phal chen): kyi 'du byed sna tshogs kyis yongasu grub pa'i phyogs dang / skra'i rtse mo gcig na mtha' dang dbus med pa'i na mkha'i dbyings kyis ming du bya bar
6a7(phal chen): rtogs kyi khongs su chud pa'i dus gsum gyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid du gzhol bas/ kun tu rtogs pa'i 'gro ba thams cad tha mi dad pas/ sos
6a8(phal chen): can thams cad kyi 'du shes kyi rnam pa la/ mnyam pa'i sgra dbyangasu gyur pa'i 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems la/ gzugs brnyan du snang bar gyur
6b1(phal chen): ba'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa/ sems can thams cad kyi lus la mngon par lta ba/ dmigs par bya bas/
6b2(phal chen): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du/ 'gro ba'i tshul dang ldan pa/ skal pa thams cad la ye shes tha mi dad pa dang / zhing thams cad du kun du snyoms pas/
6b3(phal chen): sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du gzugs mngon sum du bstan pa/ rnam par dmigs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa/ sangs rgyas
6b4(phal chen): kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bstan pas/ sems can thams cad 'dul ba rgyun mi 'chad pa'i mthong bar 'gyur/ de dag thams cad ni sngon bcom ldan 'ad/
6b5(phal chen): rnam par snang mdzad kyis dge ba'i spyod pa bskal pa mnyam pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis yongasu bsdus pa mthong ba dang / mnyan pa dang / rjes su dran
6b6(phal chen): pa dang / snyen bskur bas yongasu smin par byas pa dag go/ sngon bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du btsud pa dag go// de bzhin
6b7(phal chen): gshegs pa de dang de dag gis drung du gshegs pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu sdus pa dag ste/ de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba bskal pa mnyam pas/ thams cad
6b8(phal chen): mkhyen pa nyid du yongasu smin par 'gyur ba'i thabs kyis/ shin tu gzung ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chos kyi dbyings
7a1(phal chen): phalaltar yangs shing / nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' gtugs par gyur pa dag kyang mthong zhing / khong du chud par gyur pa yin te/ la la/
7a2(phal chen): ni chos kyi sku la 'jug go// la la ni sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i yongasu bsgrub pa 'jug go// la la ni pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par 'jug go//
7a3(phal chen): la ni spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yong su dag pa'i rgyan la 'jug go// la la ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug go// la la ni mngon par byang chub
7a4(phal chen): pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug go// la la ni sangs rgyas rnam par spyod pa ting nge 'dzin tha mi dad pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug go// la la ni de bzhin gsheg
7a5(phal chen): pa'i stobs dang / mi snyed pa la 'jug go// la la ni sangs rgyas kyi tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa rgya mtsho la 'jug go/ de dag la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi
7a6(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la 'jug ste/ mos pa sna tshogs dang / lam sna tshogs dang
7a7(phal chen): sgo sna tshogs dang / 'jug pa sna tshogs dang / 'bab pa sna tshogs dang / tshul sna tshogs dang / rjesu 'brang ba sna tshogs dang / phyogs sna tshogs dang / snod
7a8(phal chen): sna tshogs dang / yul sna tshogs dang / 'jig rten sna tshogs dang / khong du chud pa sna tshogs dang / tshogs sna tshogs dang / rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs dang /
7b1(phal chen): thabs sna tshogs dang / ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs kyis sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho de dag la 'jug go// ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs kyis 'jug pa 'di
7b2(phal chen): lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kun nas brgyan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dus gsum thams cad la thogs pa
7b3(phal chen): med par yul snang bar byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi tha mi dad pa'i ye shes snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge
7b4(phal chen): 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul gyi dbyings la 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin nam mkha'i dbyingasu snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
7b5(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu thob pas rnam par 'dzed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi snyed pa mi mnga' ba'i brgyan
7b6(phal chen): gyi rnam par gnon cing rnam par spring ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul thams cad kyi klong gi snying po dang / byang chub sems
7b7(phal chen): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings thams cad du thogs pa med par sgra sgrogs pas rgyas par 'gengs pa'i zla ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos
7b8(phal chen): kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyis rgyan pa'i 'od kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya ma
8a1(phal chen): pha la/ de dag la rab tu 'jug go/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi rgyal po'i thabs chags pa med pa'i rgyal mtshan dang /
8a2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmigs pa thams cad la sangs rgyas rgya mtsho rnam par lta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten gyi rgyud
8a3(phal chen): thams cad du/ tha mi dad pa'i lus snang ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tha mi dad pa'i yul la 'jug
8a4(phal chen): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten thams cad kyi rgyud kyi rjes su 'jug pa snying rje'i snying po can dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
8a5(phal chen): chos thams cad kyi gnas la rten pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu zhi la rab tu zhi bas kun tu snang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / byang
8a6(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sprul pa bzang po dmigasu med pas kun tu 'phrul gzugs rten dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin zhing thams cad yongs
8a7(phal chen): 'du ba'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin zhing thams cad du mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
8a8(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad du dbang po'i kha dog gis rnam par spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad du khyad par du 'phags pa'i
8b1(phal chen): dkyil 'khor chags pa med pas rnam par spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyed pa las 'byung ba'i byin gyi rlugs
8b2(phal chen): dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad la nan tan gyis 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmigs pa ma lus
8b3(phal chen): pa thams cad du/ rnam par sprul pa mngon par sgrub sa phyi ma'i mthar byin gyi rlobs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams
8b4(phal chen): cad sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho la 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phyi ma'i mthar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs yang dag par 'dzin pa'i
8b5(phal chen): byin gyi brlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phyogs bcu'i rgya mtsho da ltar byung ba yongs su dag par mos pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sos
8b6(phal chen): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cig cig la sangs rgyas thams cad dang / rnam par stod cing 'gog pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmigs pa thams
8b7(phal chen): cad la chags pa med pa'i mthar 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing cig tu byin gyi rlobs pa dang / byang chub
8b8(phal chen): sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi skur 'phrul pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dbang po'i rgya mtsho rdo rje dbang po lta/
9a1(phal chen): la@thams cad khong du chud pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sku cig pa'i snying po'i byin gyi rlabs dang /
9a2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cig gcig gi cha la chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul thams cad khong du chud pas khoms par gnas pa dang / byang chub sems
9a3(phal chen): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings thams cad du/ zhing 'byam klas pa bsgrub pa yongasu spyon pa'i byin gyis rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi
9a4(phal chen): bo'i tshugasu bzhi la rnam par spyod pa'i byin gyis brlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sos can gyi lus mthar mi dad pa
9a5(phal chen): byin gyis rlob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ye shes kyi klong thams cad la mngon gsum du yang dag par bzhol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting
9a6(phal chen): nge 'dzin chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang / mtshan nyid yongasu shes pas rab tu 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dus su sems kyi skad cig
9a7(phal chen): gcig tha mi dad pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cig thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul gyi rang bzhin dam pa dang / byung
9a8(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ rigs kyi rjesu 'brang ba'i ye shes kyi rnam par gnon pa'i seng ge dang / byang chub sem
9b1(phal chen): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmigs pa thams cad/ chos kyi dbyings su shes pa'i mig gi dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin stobs bcu'i rtsal
9b2(phal chen): gyis gnon pas yang dag par brtson pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmigs pa thams cad kun nas mthong ba'i mig gi dkyil 'khor/ byang chub
9b3(phal chen): sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin kha dog thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyis 'gro bar shin tu mdzes par mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzi
9b4(phal chen): gling mi g.yo ba'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos cig la/ chos thams cad yongasu 'dra bar ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge
9b5(phal chen): 'dzin chos cig gi tshig lam la nges pa'i/ ngag gi tshig rab tu 'byed pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ sangs rgyas
9b6(phal chen): kyis rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho de dag la rab tu 'jug go/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ rgyal mtshan gyi byin
9b7(phal chen): gyi rlabs kyis chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dus gsum gyi mu la mthar thugs pa med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bskal
9b8(phal chen): pa thams cad khong du chud pas/ tha mi dad pa'i ye shes dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin tshul shin tu phra bas stobs bcu khongasu chud pa dang / byang chub
10a1(phal chen): lasems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ma 'phrogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin spyod pa/ skal ba thams cad du mngon par bsgrub
10a2(phal chen): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phyogs thams cad kun tu shugs kyis mngon du mthor ba'i sprin dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par 'chang
10a3(phal chen): rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnam par sgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin tshor ba thams cad kyis/ reg pa med pas bde ba'i rgyal mtshan dang /
10a4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgyan thams cad du nam mkha'i rgyan mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin skad cig du 'gro ba ji snyed
10a5(phal chen): pa'i/ sprul pa'i gzugs rnyed kyi sprin mngon par sgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od na mkha' ltar rdul dang bral
10a6(phal chen): ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nam mkha' ltar byin gyis rlob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin/ chos
10a7(phal chen): thams cad la dbang po'i rgyan rab tu snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad don rnam par 'byed pa'i smon ma dang / byang chub sems
10a8(phal chen): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin stobs bcu'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dpal gyi mtshan dang / byang chub
10b1(phal chen): sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad gcig tu 'dres pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin skad cig skad cig la/ brtsam pa thams
10b2(phal chen): cad mthar phyin par byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bsod nams kyi mi zad pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas
10b3(phal chen): mtha' yas pa mtho ba'i yul rab tu snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad la/ seng ge'i ltar rab tu gnas pa dang / byang chub sems
10b4(phal chen): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa/ thams cad kyi sprul pas yongasu bstan pas kun tu rnam par dmigs pa/ mngon par sgrub pa dang / byang chub sems
10b5(phal chen): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gnan pa'i nyi ma gnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dus gsum gcig tu spyod pa dang /
10b6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rab tu zhi bar sgra dbyangs kun tu sgrogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin/
10b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad ma thob pa'i sa 'tshams 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings/ ma lus pa thams cad kyis gnas kyi pad mo'o
10b8(phal chen): tshal rab tu rgyas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gnas med pa'i chos kyi nam mkha' la rnam par lta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin//
11a1(phal chen): pa2phyogs cig tu phyogs bcu'i rgya mtsho yongasu bsdud pa'i 'ga' dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin/ chos kyi dbyings kyi bzhi
11a2(phal chen): thams cad kyi sgor 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos rgya mtsho thams cad dang ldan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems can
11a3(phal chen): thams cad la 'od rab tu 'gyed pas/ rab tu zhi ba'i lus su 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cig cig la mngon par shes
11a4(phal chen): pa dang / smon lam thams cad mngon par sgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rtag par thams cad du kun nas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
11a5(phal chen): ba'i byin gyis rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings thams cad brgyan cig tu khong du chud par 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems
11a6(phal chen): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad dran pa'i rang bzhin du rab tu snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad du khyad par chen po dang
11a7(phal chen): ldan pa'i/ ye shes mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cig gis chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul mtha' yas pa rang gi
11a8(phal chen): lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings tshul gyis/ chos thams cad tshul cig par rnam par dgod pa'i 'od dang //
11b1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyis 'khor la gzi brjid kyi byin gyis rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge//
11b2(phal chen): 'dzin sems can gyi khams mig 'phrul lta bu yongasu bsdu ba'i smon lam dang / spyod pa byin gyis rlobs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi
11b3(phal chen): dbyings kyi bzhi thams cad tha mi dad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin pad mo'i byin rnam par 'phrul pas kun tu rnam par gnon pa dang / byang chub sems
11b4(phal chen): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi rgyud khong du chud pas mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin/ lus sems can thams cad
11b5(phal chen): la/ mngon du byin gyis rlobs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems can thams cad dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtshor 'gro ba thams cad kyi skad yongasu
11b6(phal chen): 'byed pa'i tshul mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin/ 'gro ba'i bzhi tha dad pa thams cad khong du chud pas mngon par shes pa dang /
11b7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin snying rje chen po'i tha mi dad pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad/ de bzhin nyid du
11b8(phal chen): rtogs pa'i mtha' la 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ rnam par thar pa'i pho brang la rnam par lta bas/
12a1(phal chen): bal/ seng ge rnam par sgyings pa dang / de dag la stsogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis lam la 'jug pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
12a2(phal chen): brjod du med pa'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' de dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnab par snang mdzad kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho
12a3(phal chen): de dag la rab tu 'jug go/ sems kyi skad cig re la/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs par 'jug pa'i tshul gyis sngon pa sngon bskal pa mnyam
12a4(phal chen): par spyad pa yang rjes su dran no// de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i de dag 'dze ta'i tshal du phyin cing / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod pa'i seng ge'i khri rin po che
12a5(phal chen): sna tshogs kyi pad mo'i snying po dang / 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mnyam par yang ba la 'khod pa'i ye shes dang mngon par
12a6(phal chen): shes pa chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pas/ byung ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la mngon du gyur pa/ ye shes kyi mig rab rib med pa dang ldan pa/ sems can
12a7(phal chen): kha lo sgyur ba'i rang bzhin thob pa/ sangs rgyas dzad dang mnyam pa nyid rjes su song ba/ rtag tu rnam par rtogs pa med par chos spyod pa/ chos kyi mig thams cad rang
12a8(phal chen): tu rtogs pa/ chos tha~Md rang bzhin gyi zhi bar gnas par dmigs pa/ 'jig rten thaMd shin du zhi bas gnas tha dad pa med pa la rab tu bzhol la/ 'jig rten tha dad pa
12b1(phal chen): thams cad du zhugs pa/ gnas med par zhing thams cad du 'dong ba/ chos kyi gnas thams cad la rten pa med par/ chos thams cad blang du med pa'i bzhal med kha
12b2(phal chen): du phyin pa/ 'gro ba thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba la bzhugs pa/ sems can tha~Md la bde ba'i lam ston pa/ ye shes dang rnam par thar pa shin
12b3(phal chen): tu 'phags pa'i gnas kyi spyod yul can/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar phyin pa'i ye shes kyi yul dang ldan pa/ srid pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad las gyen du
12b4(phal chen): 'phags pa/ 'gro ba thams cad la yang dag pa'i mtha' rnam par ston pa/ chos rgya mtsho'i shes rab snang ba'i dkyil 'khor can/ ting nge 'dzin gang can mtsho
12b5(phal chen): dang ldan pa'i dbyings la shin du mnyam par bzhag cing / snying rje chen po rab tu sems dpa'/ chos kyi tshul sgyu ma'i rnam par lta bur rab tu rtogs pa/ 'jig
12b6(phal chen): rten gyi khams thams cad la rmi lam lta bur zhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba thams cad/ mig yor lta bur khong du chud pa/ sgra skad dang dbyangs
12b7(phal chen): thams cad sgra brnyen lta bur rnam par rig pa/ chos thams cad mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes/ sprul pa lta bur rab tu rtogs pa/ khyad par du 'phags pa'i
12b8(phal chen): smon lam shin du rtsegs pa/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor kun nas rnam par dag pa'i mkhas pa dang ldan pa/ sems shin tu zhi zhing rab tu zhi ba dang //
13a1(phal chen): ldan pa/ gzungs kyi rgyud thams cad kyi yul dang ldan pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis dog pa med par kun nas rab tu gnon
13a2(phal chen): pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis gnas kyi mthar phyin pa'i mig dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad la dmigs pa med par rnam par spyod pa rab tu thob pa/ shes
13a3(phal chen): rab rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa rnam par spyod pa/ ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol tu song ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs dang / shugs tho
13a4(phal chen): pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi pha rol tu phyin pas/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ dbang du gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa
13a5(phal chen): thams cad kyis don mkhas pa la phyin ci log med pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ chos kyi mdzod dbye ba'i cho ga la mkhas pa/ nges pa'i tshigs shes pa la mngon par
13a6(phal chen): mkhas pa/ spong ba'i stobs dang / chos kyi sprin zad mi shes pa dang ldan pa/ mi 'jigs pas khyu mchog dang / seng ge'i nga ro 'byin pa/ gnas med pa'i chos kyi
13a7(phal chen): dga' ba la dga' bas mos pa/ chos thams cad la rab rib med pa'i mig gis lta ba/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi 'byung ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa zla bar gyur pa/
13a8(phal chen): shes rab dkyil 'khor gyi bden pa'i tshul thams cad la rnam par spyod pa'i 'od zer can/ ye shes kyi rdo rje bsod nams kyi 'khor yug tu gyur pa/ dper bya ba thams cad
13b1(phal chen): las shin tu 'das pa/ chos thams cad la dbang po dang ye shes kyi myu gu rab tu skyes pa/ dpa'o rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa/ bdud thams cad kyis rgyal mtshan rab
13b2(phal chen): tu snyol ba la dpa' ba/ ye shes mtha' yas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzi brjid can/ 'gro ba thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i lus dang ldan pa/
13b3(phal chen): chos thams cad la ye shes sgrib pa med pa zad pa dang / mi zad pa'i mtha'i ye shes kyis rnam par sangs rgyas pa/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i kun gyi thar phyin pa la gnas
13b4(phal chen): ba/ mtshan ma med pa la rnam par lta ba'i ye shes kyi mig gi mngon sum can/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad mngon par sgrub pa'i rgyu la mkhas pa/
13b5(phal chen): mi gnyis pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad la/ rnam par lta ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyud gnas med pa thams cad
13b6(phal chen): du gzugs brnyen snang bar gyur pa/ chos thams cad la mun pa dang rnam par bral ba/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor mun pa med pa la rab tu zhugs pa/ phyogs
13b7(phal chen): kun tu chos kyi snang ba rab tu skye ba/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing mchog tu gyu ba/ thos pa dang / mthong ba dang / smon lam ngon
13b8(phal chen): yod pa'i zla ba/ bsod nams kyi ri rab la 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa/ phas kyi rgol ba'i tshogs thams cad tshar bcad pa shin tu
14a1(phal chen): phal chenadapa' ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du sgra skad dang / dbyangs kyi nga ro 'byin pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku mthong bas
14a2(phal chen): mi ngom pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan gyi dbang sgyur ba dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba gdul ba dang 'thun pa'i lus su byin gyis rlob pa/ zhing 'jam klas pa thams
14a3(phal chen): cad du/ lus cig gi rgyas par 'gengs pa/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa/ thogs pa med pa'i 'gro ba'i ye shes chen
14a4(phal chen): po theg pa'i gru dang ldan pa/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi chos kyi dbyings/ thams cad du lus su rab tu snang ba/ ye shes kyi nyi ma 'gro ba thams cad du shar ba/ 'gro
14a5(phal chen): ba thams cad bsam pa ji lta ba/ shin tu dga' ba'i kha dog dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / dbang po rab tu rtogs pa'i ye shes can/ chos
14a6(phal chen): thams cad sgrib pa med pa'i yul du khong du chud pa/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin skye ba med pa/ rnam par rigs pa phra ba dang / yangs pa phan tshun du yongasasu ba
14a7(phal chen): ba la dbang bsgyur ba/ sangs rgyas kyis zab mo'i tshul nges par rtogs pa/ don zab mo la tshig dang / yi ge'i tha snyad la mkhas pa/ tshig dang / yi ge dang / don mi
14a8(phal chen): zad pa'i rab tu brjod pa/ mdo sde rgya mtsho thams cad/ tshig gcig tu chud pa rab tu ston pa/ gzungs dang ye shes kyi lus rgya chen po byin gyis rlobs pa/ bskal pa
14b1(phal chen): mtha' yas par yongasu 'dzin pa'i gzungs dang ldan pa'i byin gyis rlabs can/ sems kyi skad cig cig gis bskal pa brjod du med par gnas pa/ rab tu rtogs
14b2(phal chen): pa'i ye shes can/ sems kyi skad cig cig gi dus gsum shes pas/ 'jig rten thams cad mngon par shes pa/ chos kyi gzugs kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya mtsho
14b3(phal chen): mtha' yas pa/ dran zhing spobs pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyis shes par 'gyur ba'i thabs kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba las phyir mi ldog pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul
14b4(phal chen): la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob pa/ gya nom par snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa/ chags pa med pa'i mtha'i chos thams cad rab tu dbye ba'i
14b5(phal chen): ye shes la mngon par mkhas pa/ chos thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i/ rnam par 'phrul pa'i yul la ye shes kyis rnam par rtse ba/ dmigs pa thams cad
14b6(phal chen): rgyan bzang por byin gyis rlob pa/ chos kyi dbyings phyogs med pa la phyogs kyi rjes su 'brang bas rab tu zhugs pa/ phyogs thams cad rnam par dbye bas chos kyi
14b7(phal chen): dbyings la yang dag par bzhol ba/ shin tu phra ba ste/ yangs pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba la byang chub tu rnam par 'tshang rgya ba/ rang bzhin kha dog thams cad yongasu ston
14b8(phal chen): pa/ phyogs gcig la yang dag par bzhol ba/ de lta bu'i yon tan dang ye shes mtha' yas pas/ yang dag par bskyed de/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi snying po
15a1(phal chen): la chenadang ldan par 'gyur ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stong pa/ bsngags pa/ bkur ba/ tshig dang / yi ge mi zad pas yon tan dang / leg
15a2(phal chen): par brjod du med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'dze ta'i tshal du 'dus te/ 'khod pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la 'jug pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
15a3(phal chen): 'od zer gyis/ rab tu snang bar gyur pa de dag gis lus thams cad dang / khang partsegs pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i longs spyod de dag dang / byang chub
15a4(phal chen): sems dpa'i bstan pa de dag dang / 'dze ta'i tshal thams cad nas kyang dga' ba chen po'i shugs rab tu thob pa'i chos nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos snang
15a5(phal chen): ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rab tu thob pas/ dga' ba'i shugs las 'byung ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po'i rgyan mngon par thon nas/ chos kyi dbyings thams
15a6(phal chen): cad rgyas par khyab par gyur to// 'di lta ste/ sems kyi skad cig re re la 'od zer gyi dra ba'i sprin shin tu yangs pa/ 'gro ba thams cad tshim par byed pa/ mngon
15a7(phal chen): par 'thon te/ phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to// rin po che sna tshogs kyi dril bu'i sprin mngon par 'thon te/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
15a8(phal chen): kyi yon tan dang / legs pa rab tu brjod pa'i sprin gyi nga ro rjesu spags pas/ daphyogs bcur rgyas par khyab par gyur to// dmigs pa thams cad las 'gro ba
15b1(phal chen): thams cad rol mo'i sprin mngon par 'thon te/ sems can thams cad kyi las dang / rnam par smin pa rol mo'i sgra snyan par blangs pas rjesu sgrog cing / phyogs/
15b2(phal chen): bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sngon lam dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sna tshogs yang dag par ston pa'i tshul gyi sprin
15b3(phal chen): mang po 'am mngon par 'thon nas/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis smon lam gyis sgra dbyangs rab tu sgrogs pas phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to// de
15b4(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprul pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi dbyangs rjesu
15b5(phal chen): brjod cing / phyogs bcu rgyas par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i lus mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa'i sprin mang por 'thon nas/ zhing thams cad du/
15b6(phal chen): byung ba'i sangs rgyas skye ba cig nas gcig tu brjod cing phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to// dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa'i
15b7(phal chen): snying po byang chub kyi sprin mang po mngon par mthon nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyan byung ba yongasu ston cing / phyogs bcu rgyas par
15b8(phal chen): khyab par gyur to// dmigs pa thams cad las dbang po'i lus kyi sprin mngon par mthon nas/ spos sna tshogs kyis char rab tu 'bebs shing / phyogs bcu rgyas
16a1(phal chen): pal chenapar khyab par gyur to// 'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang po'i lus dang 'dra ba'i sprin mang po mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ byang chub/
16a2(phal chen): sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa yongs su brjod pa byed cing / phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to// zhing yongs su dag pa rin po che thams cad rang
16a3(phal chen): bzhin yongs kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mngon par ston cing / phyogs
16a4(phal chen): bcu'i rgyas par khyab par gyur to// de dag la stsogs pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi byin gyi rlabs dang / chos kyi snang ba rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pa/
16a5(phal chen): rab tu thob pa'i chos nyid kyis brgyan chen po rnam par 'phrul pa'i sprin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung bar gyur to// de nas byang
16a6(phal chen): chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis/ sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis/ rnam par 'phrul pa de dag yongs su ston pa byed cing / phyogs bcur rnam par
16a7(phal chen): ltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// 'dze ta'i tshal du sangs rgyas byin gyis rlabs/ mtha' yas rgya chen po yongs su byung la ltos//
16a8(phal chen): dmigs pa kun las lus kyi sprin chen rnams/ mngon par mthon cing phyogs rnams tu khyab/ bde gshegs sras po rnams kyi sna tshogs brgyan/ kha dog
16b1(phal chen): mtha' yas rgya chen rnam dag pa// bstan dang dmigs pa yongs su bcad pa la// de dag thams cad gzugs brnyan byung bar snang // rgyan rnams sna tshogs
16b2(phal chen): rin chen 'od 'phro'i sprin/ bde gshegs sras po rnams kyi spu rtse las// sangs rgyas gsungs rnams rab tu sgrogs byed cing // zhing rnams kun gyi dpying
16b3(phal chen): su khyab par 'gro/ tshangs pa'i dbang po'i gzugs 'dra lus rnams dang // spyod lam rab tu zhi ba'i dag pa'i gzugs// zhing gi me tog kun las mngon mthun
16b4(phal chen): te// bsam gtan yan lag brjod cing shin tu 'dod// kun tu bzang po 'dra ba'i rgyal ba'i sras// mtshan rab dpe byad bzang pos rgyan pa'i lus/
16b5(phal chen): grangs med bsam yas bde gshegs pa spu las// sprul pa de 'dra thogs pa med pa 'byung // bde gshegs sras po dus gsum byung ba rnams// yon
16b6(phal chen): tan rgya mtsho legs par brjod pa dag/ rgya mtsho tshe mnyam rgyan sprin de dag kun// 'dze ta'i tshal na gnas shing rab tu brjod// phyogs rnams kun gyi sas
16b7(phal chen): can yongs kyi las// rgya mtsho chen po sna tshogs ma lus pa// 'dze ta'i tshal gyi shing gzugs rnams kyi// bse ba nas byung bar gyur pa kun tu grags/
16b8(phal chen): dus gsum byung ba'i rgyal ba thams cad kyi// zhing rnams kun gyi ma lus rnam 'phrul pa// zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i rdul rnyed dag kyang // so so dmigs
17a1(phal chen): bal chen#kyis dmigs par gyur pa snang // sangs rgyas phyogs kyi zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i sprin// sku rtse re re sna tshogs rnam phye ba'i/
17a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas gnas rnams skad cig re re ra snang // de dag las nga sangs rgyas sprin mang bzhugs// 'gro dang mnyam par phyogs rnams kun bkang zhing / sems
17a3(phal chen): can thabs kyis yongs su smin par byed// de dag 'od las spos kyi 'od 'phro dang // me tog phal cher rgya mtsho'i sprin kyang 'byung // mkha' ltar tshad med
17a4(phal chen): rin chen gzhal med khang // ma lus rgyan rab kun gyi rnam mdzes pa// de dag thams cad phyogs rnams kun khyad byed// zhing dang snying po byang chub de
17a5(phal chen): bzhin no// dus gsum byung ba'i sras rnams kyis// kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i rnam tshul du// zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnam par dag byas pa'i// rgyan
17a6(phal chen): rab sna tshogs 'gro ltar tshad med pa// phyogs rnams dus gsum kun tu gang byung rnams// bskal pa rgya mtsho chen por rnam sbyangs pa// de dag kun kyang la
17a7(phal chen): ta'i nag tshal gyi// bar snang mkha' la gzugs brnyan tshul du snang // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyud shin tu snang bar
17a8(phal chen): byas pa de dag las// byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang // snying rje chen po'i sgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du bzhugs pa
17b1(phal chen): gyur nas// de dag de bas kyang 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang // yongs su bsdu ba'i don du zhugs par gyur te/ de ltar mnyam par gzhag pa de dag
17b2(phal chen): gi ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang / 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par 'thon par gyur to// 'od zer de dag gi sgo re re
17b3(phal chen): nas kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i sprin/ 'jig rten dbang po thams cad 'dra ba'i lus dang / 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya
17b4(phal chen): ba dang / 'phrong pa'i lus dang ldan pa mngon par 'thon te/ mngon par mthon nas kyang tshogs thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings rgyas par bkang nas sems
17b5(phal chen): can thams cad yang dag par bskul zhing yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba byed do// lha'i gnas nas shi 'pho ba yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / 'jig
17b6(phal chen): rten gyi khams thams cad du/ skye ba yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su snyan pa'i sgo dang / rmi lam
17b7(phal chen): yongs su snyan pa'i sgo/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi/ sems can yongs su bkul bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa'
17b8(phal chen): thams cad kyi smon lam gyis 'byung ba'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su spyong pa'i sgo dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su bstan
18a1(phal chen): pa lenapa'i sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan la nan tan du bya ba dang / rab tu bsgrub pa'i sgo dang / yan lag
18a2(phal chen): dang nying lag gcod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ston pa'i sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen pos// brtson 'grus kyi
18a3(phal chen): pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa
18a4(phal chen): thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi lam gyi dkyil 'khor snang bar rab tu brjod pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su brtsal ba'i
18a5(phal chen): phyir/ chos kyi tshig dang / yi ge re re'i phyir lus grangs med pa yongs su gtong ba yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du
18a6(phal chen): 'gro zhing / chos thams cad kyi yongs su dri ba'i sgo dang / dus la ji lta ba 'bab pa dang bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba'i drung du 'gro zhing / thams cad
18a7(phal chen): mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su smin par 'gyur ba/ thob par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho snang ba rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams
18a8(phal chen): dang / ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad bdud dang / phas kyi rgol bas mi tshugs pa'i stobs kyi rgyal mtshan yongs su bstan pa'i rgo dang / bzo thams cad shes
18b1(phal chen): shing mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i shes pa'i sa yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / 'gro ba thams cad las khyad par du 'phags par shes shing / mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i
18b2(phal chen): ye shes kyi yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa'i khyad par shes shing / mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su bstan
18b3(phal chen): pa'i sgo dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po la 'jug pa'i thabs kyis nyon mongs pa dang / bag chags sna tshogs yang dag par gzhom pa la shes shing
18b4(phal chen): mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yongasu bsten pa'i sgo dang / de dag la stsogs pa sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i thabs
18b5(phal chen): dang / bsdu ba'i sgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag sems can thams cad kyi gnas su phyin par
18b6(phal chen): snang ste/ la la ni lha'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo // la la ni klu'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo // la la ni gnod sbyin gyi gnas su byin par snang ngo // la la ni dri za'i
18b7(phal chen): gnas su phyin par snang ngo // la la ni lha ma yin gyi gnas su phyin par snang ngo // la la ni na mkha' lding gi gnas su phyin par snang ngo // la la ni mi 'am ci
18b8(phal chen): gnas su phyin par snang ngo // la la ni lto 'phye chen po'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo // la la ni tshangs pa'i dbang po'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo // la la ni
19a1(phal chen): pa lenami'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo // la la ni gshin rje'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo // la la ni yi dgas kyi gnas su phyin par snang
19a2(phal chen): ngo // la la ni sems can dmyal ba'i 'jig rten thams cad du phyin par snang ngo // la la ni yi dgas kyi skye gnas kyi rgyud thams cad du phyin par snang te/
19a3(phal chen): mthong bas 'dul ba'i sems can dang / thos pas 'dul ba dang / rjes su dran pas 'dul ba dang / dbyangs kyis dkyil 'khor gyi 'dul ba dang /
19a4(phal chen): ming gi chu klung gis smras 'dul ba dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis 'dul ba dang / 'od zer gyi dra bas rab tu dkye bas 'dul ba dang / sems can rnam
19a5(phal chen): kyi bsam pa'i tshul ji ltar bzhin du yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i phyir snying rje chen po tha mi dad pa dang / smon lam tha mi dad pa dang / ye shes
19a6(phal chen): tha mi dad pa dang / sems can yongs su bsdu ba tha min pa'i tshul du byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'dze ta'i tshal nas rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan rnam pa sna
19a7(phal chen): tshogs gyis/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'jam klas pa/ thams cad dang / sems can gyi khams 'jam klas pa thams cad du rgyas par 'geng ba byed pa
19a8(phal chen): snang yang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung nas mi g.yo ste/ la la ni rang gi gnas dang / khang partsegs pa dang / bstan dang 'khor du bcas pas//
19b1(phal chen): phyogs bcu rgyas par byed par snang yang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung nas mi g.yo'o// la la ni sprul pa'i sprin rang 'gyed par snang / la la ni sems can
19b2(phal chen): yongs su smin par bya ba'i don du/ cig pu gnyis su med par 'gro bar snang yang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor nas mi g.yo'o//
19b3(phal chen): la la ni dge sbyong gi gzugs/ la la ni chonges pa'i gzugs/ la la ni rtul shugs thams cad kyi cha byad dang / cho ga dang / chu zheng gi gzugs/
19b4(phal chen): la la ni sman pa'i gzugs/ la la ni nyan pas 'tsho ba'i gzugs/ la la ni gar mkhan gyi gzugs/ la la ni lha khyer ba'i gzugs/ la la ni bza
19b5(phal chen): thams cad dang ldan pa'i gzugasu/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / khams dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du phyin par snang
19b6(phal chen): ste/ dus kyi dbang gis dus kyi rjes su 'brang zhing / ming dang / gzugs dang / lus mngon par bsgrub pa tha dad pa dang / lus kyi kha dog dang / dbyib
19b7(phal chen): tshul dang 'dra ba dang / dbyangs rnams pa tha dad pa dang / skad rnam pa tha dad pa dang / spyod lam rnam pa tha dad pa dang / gnas rnam pa tha dad pa dang / byu
19b8(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'gro ba thams cad mig 'phrul lta bur shes pa dang / bzo'i 'khor thams cad rab tu brjod pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi shes
20a1(phal chen): phal chenapa brjod pas snang ba'i sgron ma dang / bde ba thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis brgyan pa dang / las thams cad sna
20a2(phal chen): bar byed pa'i 'od dang ldan pa dang / phyogs thams cad theg pa la gnas pas rab tu sbyong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa chos thams cad kyi dkyil
20a3(phal chen): 'khor rab tu snang ba la spyod cing / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i don du grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / kham
20a4(phal chen): dang / rgyal po'i gnas dag tu phyin par snang ngo // de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gnas med pa'i khang pa rtsegs pa na/ 'dug 'dug pa las/ bskul
20a5(phal chen): pa 'thun pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i lag na rdo rje dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi nyams brta ba la brtson zhing //
20a6(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams can bsnyen bkur bar smon pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i lus kyis rigs su rtogs pa'i lha dang / sngon gyi smon lam gyis rjes su 'brang ba'i
20a7(phal chen): rkang gis/ 'gro ba'i rigs su rtogs pa'i lha dag dang / snying rje chen po la brtson pa'i lu ma dag dang / mtsho dang / mtshe'u dang / rdzing bu dang / khron pa
20a8(phal chen): dang / chu klung gi lha dag dang / shes rab kyi 'od snang rab tu gsal ba'i me'i lha dang / rin po che'i cod pan thogs pa'i rlung gi lha dag dang / chos kyi phyogs
20b1(phal chen): snang bar khong du chud pa'i phyogs kyi lha dag dang / ma rig pa'i mun pa sel ba la brtson pa'i mtshan mo'i lha dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma mngon par bsgrub/
20b2(phal chen): pa la brtson pa'i nyi ma'i lha dag dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi nam mkha' brgyan pa la brtson pa'i nam mkha'i lha dag dang / 'gro thams cad srid pa'i rgya ma
20b3(phal chen): las sprul bar brtson pa'i gang can mtsho'i lha dag dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du tshogs yang dag par bsags pa la brtson zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'phags
20b4(phal chen): pa la sems dang ldan pa'i ri'i lha dag dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi lus brgyan par brtson par sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kha dog dang byin gyi brlabs la smon cing brtson
20b5(phal chen): pa'i chu klung gi lha dag dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems kyi grong rdal yongs su sbyang bar brtson pa'i grong gi lha dag dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos kyi grong khyer
20b6(phal chen): du smon cing mos pa'i klu'i dbang po dag dang / sems can thams cad yongs su srungs pa la zhugs pa'i gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dag dang / sems can thams cad kyi
20b7(phal chen): dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel ba la brtson pa'i dri za'i dbang po dag dang / yi dgas kyi rgyud thams cad rnam par zlog pa la brtson pa'i grul bum gyi dbang po dag
20b8(phal chen): sems can thams cad srid pa'i rgya mtsho nas gdon pa'i smon lam gyis zhugs pa'i nam mkha' lding gi dbang po dag dang / 'jig rten thams cad las 'phags pa'i
21a1(phal chen): phal chen/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / stobs yongs su bsgrub par smon lam yongs su bskyed pa'i lha ma yin gyi dbang po dag dang / de bzhin
21a2(phal chen): gshegs pa mthong bas dga' bar gyur cing lus rab tu 'dud pa'i lto byed chen po'i dbang po dag dang / 'khor ba las skyo ba'i yid dang ldan zhing ngor lta ba'i lha'i
21a3(phal chen): dbang po dag dang / rim gro chen po rab tu byed cing lus rab tu 'dud pa'i tshangs pa'i dbang po dag dang / lhan cig tu de dag gis rim gro chen pos mngon par
21a4(phal chen): bstod de/ mchod cing de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gnon pa'i rgyan phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par ragri gnas nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das la
21a5(phal chen): g.yas phyogs su bskor ba lan brgya phrag du ma zhig byas nas/ mchod pa rnams du mas mchod de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas phyir byung ste/ lho phyogs su
21a6(phal chen): yul rgyu zhing dong ngo // / 'phags pa 'dus pa chen po sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/
21a7(phal chen): bam po brgya cu gya dgu pa'o// // de nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/
21a8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan phun sum tshogs pa de 'dra bas/ 'dze ta'i tshal nas byung ste/ lho phyogs su 'gro ba thong nas de 'di snyam du gyur te/
21b1(phal chen): bdag kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / lhan cig tu yul rgyu zhing / 'gro'o snyam nas/ de dge slong drug cu tsam gyis bskor cing 'dun du byas te/ rang gnas
21b2(phal chen): nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ba dang /
21b3(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan mnga' nas/ phyir byung ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der/ dge slong
21b4(phal chen): lhan cig tu byung nas/ ring po ma lon pa gsar du bzhugs pa sha stag ste/ 'di ltar dge slong rgya mtsho'i blo dang / legs par byin pa chen po dang / bsod nams kyi 'od
21b5(phal chen): dang / bu chen po dang / kun khyab sbyin pa dang / rnam dag spyod pa dang / lha'i dpal dang / dbang po'i blo gros dang / tshangs pa'i dam pa dang / dge slong zhi ba'i blo gros
21b6(phal chen): dang / de dag la sogs pa dge slong drug cu tsam kun kyang sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ mos pa zab mor gyur pa/ dad pa'i mig yongs
21b7(phal chen): su dag pa/ sems rgya chen pos yongs su spyod pa/ sangs rgyas kyi phyogs rnam par lta bu la mthu yod pa/ chos kyi ngo bo nyid dang rang bzhin nges par rtogs pa'i seMs
21b8(phal chen): dang ldan pa/ gzhan la phan par gyur pa'i blo can/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan la mngon par mos pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i chos bstan pas
22a1(phal chen): phal chen/ 'dul ba sha stag dang / 'grogs shing 'dun du byas te sngon du bdar nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong ngo // de
22a2(phal chen): nas tshe dang ldan pa sha rI dus/ de ltar dpal lam du zhugs te 'dong ba'i tshe/ dge slong de dag kun la ltas nas/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i blo gros la spras pa/ rgya mtsho zla
22a3(phal chen): gros byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyi lus mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos rnam par rgyan cing yongs su dag pa lha dang mir bcas pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
22a4(phal chen): 'od kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag cing sems can tshad med pa'i dga' ba yongs su skyed pa dang / 'od zer gyi dra ba'i rgyan sems can dpag tu med pa'i sdug bsngal rab tu
22a5(phal chen): zhi bar byed pa dang / 'khor phun sum tshogs pas sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su bzung ba dang / lam gyi rgyan 'gro na lam mig mang ris su gnas pa dang / lam
22a6(phal chen): rnam par gnon pa'i rgyan phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par lta bar gnas pa dang / bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyan g.yas g.yon nas gter chen po
22a7(phal chen): mngon par 'thon pa dang / sngon gyi sangs rgyas la rim gror byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang rgyu mthun pas/ shing gi gseb thams cad nas rgyan mang pos 'byung ba dang / 'jig
22a8(phal chen): rten gyi dbang po thams cad mchod pa'i srin gyi char mngan par 'bebs shing gtung de phyag 'tshal ba dang / phyogs bcu nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'od zer
22b1(phal chen): gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor mang ba bkye ba/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu sgrog cing / spyi bos char ba la ltos shig/ ces de dag la sogs pa tshe dang ldam
22b2(phal chen): pa sha rI dus/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa lam du zhugs pa'i yon tan gyi rgyan tshad med pa dag/ dge slong de dag la yongs su bstan to// brjod do// bshad
22b3(phal chen): do// smos so// bkrol lo// rab tu brjod do// rnam par phye'o// gsal bar byas so// de ltar gnas brtan sha ri'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i
22b4(phal chen): yon tan ji tsam ji tsam du brjod pa de tsam de tsam du dge slong de dag gis sems rnam par dag par gyur to// rab tu dang bar gyur to// dga' ba'i shugs rnam par
22b5(phal chen): 'phel bar gyur to// mos pa skyes par gyur to// de dag gi sems kyi rgyud las su rung bar gyur to// sangs rgyas lta ba la mngon par mos par gyur to// sangs
22b6(phal chen): rgyas kyi chos la sems rab tu gzhol bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po yongs su dag par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa'i shugs skyes par
22b7(phal chen): gyur to// snying rje chen po 'byung byar to// pha rol tu phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor gnon par gyur to// snying rje chen po yongs su skye bar gyur to// phyogs bcu'i sangs
22b8(phal chen): rgyas rgya mtsho'i yongs su snang bar gyur to// de ltar de dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mos pa'i shugs thob par gyur nas/ 'di skad 'dzer to// mkhan po bdag
23a1(phal chen): phal po nacag kyang skyes bu dam pa de'i drung du phyin par mdzad du gsol zhes nas/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu dge slong de dag dang / 'grogs
23a2(phal chen): te 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der song nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal dge slong 'di dag ni khyod la lta bar 'dod pa dag go/ de nas 'jam
23a3(phal chen): dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ de dge slong de dag dang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i phyogs de tsam dang bcas par glang po che'i lta stangs kyis gzi dang ldan par khyab par
23a4(phal chen): ltas pa dang / de'i rjes la dge slong de dag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so//
23a5(phal chen): skyes bu dam pa khyod mthong ba dang / khyod la phyag 'tshal ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dang / bdag cag dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan khyod kyis mkhyen pa dang / mkhan pos thugs
23a6(phal chen): su chud pa dang / gang yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas mngon du gzigs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des khyod ci 'dra bar gyur te/ rnam pa 'di
23a7(phal chen): 'dra ba'i lus thob par shog shig/ rnam pa 'di 'dra ba'i dbyangs dang / rnam pa 'di 'dra ba'i mtshan dang / 'di lta bu'i rnam par 'phrul pa dag kyang khyod ji lta ba
23a8(phal chen): bzhin du thob par shog shig/ ces dge slong de dag gis 'di skad ces smras pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces smras so//
23b1(phal chen): dge slong dag yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa bcu dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la zhugs pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i
23b2(phal chen): sa lta smos kyang ci dgos kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa yang gnon par 'gyur ro// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad lta
23b3(phal chen): ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rtsegs pa las phyir mi
23b4(phal chen): ldog cing / yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / chos thams cad brtsal ba la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i pha
23b5(phal chen): rol tu phyin pa thams cad sbyor ba la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad yongs su bsgrub pa la yongasu
23b6(phal chen): mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / dus gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa thams cad du 'jug pa la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs
23b7(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho rgyas par gang zhing yongs su dag par bya ba la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su smon
23b8(phal chen): par bya ba dang / 'dul ba la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / zhing dang bskal pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la/ mngon par bsgrub/
24a1(phal chen): bal po che/ pa la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis pha rol tu phyin pa/
24a2(phal chen): sbyar bas/ sems can gcig yongs su smin par bya ba'i tshul du sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs cig yongasu
24a3(phal chen): bsgrub pa la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa'o// dge slong dag yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa bcu po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/
24a4(phal chen): rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la yongs su grub par 'gyur ro// 'khor ba'i rgyud thams cad las phyir ldog par 'gyur ro//
24a5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad las gyen du 'phags par 'gyur ro// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa thams cad las yongs su 'da' bar 'gyur ro//
24a6(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs dang / rgyud du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam la yang dag par 'grub par
24a7(phal chen): 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yon tan gyis nan tan la rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la yongs
24a8(phal chen): dag par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs la yang dag par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad rab tu 'dul/
24b1(phal chen): bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su gnon par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa dang shin tu nye bar 'gyur ro// de nas dge slong de dag
24b2(phal chen): gis/ chos kyi tshul 'di thos nas sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par mthong ba la chags pa med pa'i mig gis yul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to//
24b3(phal chen): de'i mthus phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mthong bar gyur to//
24b4(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gis 'gro ba'i rgyud du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma lus par mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi sems can
24b5(phal chen): rnams kyang ma lus par mthong bar gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag kyang rnam par phye ba sna tshogs su mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na
24b6(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed yod pa de dag kyang bgrang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu shes par gyur to// sems can de dag gi rin po che'i gnas dang / longs spyod de dag
24b7(phal chen): kyang mthong bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho yang thob par gyur to// chos bstan pa de dag kyang tshig dang yi ge dang /
24b8(phal chen): nges pa'i tshig dang / skad dang / ming dang / brdas yongs su shes par gyur to// sems can de dag gi sems dang / dbang po dang / bsam pa la yang rnam par
25a1(phal chen): pha lenalta bar gyur to// sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha'i tshe rab bcu yang rjes su dran par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi
25a2(phal chen): chos kyi 'khor lo bcu'i nges pa'i tshig mngon par bsgrub pa la rab tu zhugs par gyur to// rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa mngon par bsgrub pa bcu la yang rab tu
25a3(phal chen): zhugs par gyur to// bstan pa'i tshul mngon par bsgrub pa bcu la yang zhugs par gyur to// rjes su bstan pa'i tshogs mngon par bsgrub pa bcu la yang rab tu
25a4(phal chen): zhugs par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi tha dad pa yang dag pa mkhyen pa'i tshul mngon par bsgrub pa bcu la yang dag par zhugs par gyur to// ting
25a5(phal chen): 'dzin de thos ma thag tu byang chub kyi sems kyi yan lag stong phrag bcu yang yongs su rdzogs par gyur to// ting nge 'dzin stong phrag bcu yang yongs su gnon par gyur
25a6(phal chen): to// pha rol tu phyin pa'i yan lag stong phrag bcu yang rnam par dag par gyur te/ snang ba chen po rab tu thob cing / shes rab chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyis
25a7(phal chen): snang bar gyur pa de dag gi byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa bcu rab tu thob par gyur to// de ltar mngon par shes pa'i myu gu gzhon zhing shin tu phra ba thong
25a8(phal chen): ste/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa brtan pa la gnas pa de dag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la yang dag
25b1(phal chen): par bkul nas rab tu bkong ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la rab tu gnas pa de dag smon lam chen po rgya mtsho la zhugs shing mngon
25b2(phal chen): par bsgrub par gyur to// de ltar smon lam chen po rgya mtshos mngon par bsgrub pa'i sems rnam par dag pas lus yongs su dag pa rab tu thob par gyur to//
25b3(phal chen): lus rnam par dag pas lus yang ba rab tu thob par gyur to// de ltar lus rnam par dag pa dang / lus yang bas mngon par shes pa'i sgo de dag shin tu yang
25b4(phal chen): par byed pas/ mi nyams shing rjes su 'brang ba'i mngon par shes pa rab tu thob par gyur to// mngon par shes pa de thob pas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i
25b5(phal chen): rkang pa'i drung nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir/ phyogs bcur yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i
25b6(phal chen): 'phrin las kyi sprin mngon par sgrub par gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ dge slong de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
25b7(phal chen): bkod nas mthar gyis yul rgyu zhing / lho phyogs logs su skyid pa'i 'byung gnas shes bya ba'i grong rdal chen po gang na ba de logs su song ste/ phyin nas grong rdal
25b8(phal chen): chen pa skying ba'i 'byung gnas kyi shar phyogs logs na/ nags tshol chen po sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan gyi brgyan pa ces bya ba/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas bzhugs bzhugs
26a1(phal chen): bsen@#pa'i mchod rten sems can smon par mdzad pa'i don du/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa/ zhing mtha' yas par ming gi sgra
26a2(phal chen): rjes su bsgrags pa sngan bcang / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mdzad pa'i tshe/ yongs su btang bar dka' ba du ma yongs su btang ste/ sa'i phyogs den/
26a3(phal chen): lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha dang / snga ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams
26a4(phal chen): rtag tu rgyun mi 'chang bar mchod pa la brtson pa'i gnas yod pa der/ 'khor dang bcas pa byin nas/ der 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ mdo sde chos kyi dbyings kyi
26a5(phal chen): tshul rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba/ mdo sde bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag bcu 'byung ba ston to// de bstan pa'i tshe/ rgya mtsho chen pos klu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma
26a6(phal chen): lpags te/ de dag gis chos kyi tshul de dag thos nas klu'i rgyud la rnam par smod cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan la mos par gyur nas/ klu'i rgyud rnam par bzlog
26a7(phal chen): ste lnga dang / mir skye ba yongs su 'dzin par gyur nas/ der klu stong phrag bcu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// chos de bstan
26a8(phal chen): pa'i tshe/ sems can gyi khams mtha' dang dbus med pa theg pa gsum gyi dus gzhan du rnam par 'dul bar gyur to// de nas skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi mi rnams kyis
26b1(phal chen): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi grong rdal phyin nas/ tshal sna tshogs kyi brgyan gyi mchod rten gyi gzhi 'di nyid rnam par spyod do// zhes thos
26b2(phal chen): nas/ dge snyen tshangs dpon shes rab chen po la sogs pa/ dge snyen pa dang / dge snyen ma dang / khye'u dang / bu mo mang po dag so so nas 'khor lnga brgya dang /
26b3(phal chen): bcas te/ skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyis grong rdal nas byung nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong ngo // de la dge snyen shes rab chen po ni/ dge/
26b4(phal chen): bsnyen bzang pos byin dang / lhas byin dang / bsod nams 'od dang / grags pa'i lha dang / zla ba'i dpal dang / zla ba dga'o dang / blo gros bzang po dang /
26b5(phal chen): blo gros chen po dang / bsgra bzang po dang / dge snyen bzang po'i dpal dang / de dag la sogs pa dge snyen lnga brgyas bskor cing mdun du bya ste/ 'jam
26b6(phal chen): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la
26b7(phal chen): lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs cig tu 'khod do// de la dge snyen ma shes rab chen po ni/ dge snyen ma 'od bzang mo dang / lus bzang mo dang / dge ba
26b8(phal chen): yod pa dang / dge ba'i dpal dang / zla ba'i 'od dang / dpal gyi 'od dang / dpal 'od bzang mo dang / dge snyen ma mig bzang mo dang / de dag la sogs pa
27a1(phal chen): phal chen/ dge snyen ma lnga brgyas bskor cing 'dun du byas te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nu
27a2(phal chen): gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi zos phyag 'tshal te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs cig tu 'khod do// de la tshong dpon
27a3(phal chen): gyi bu nor bzang ni/ tshong dpon gyi bu brtul shugs bzang po dang / tshul khrims bzang po dang / ngang tshul bzang po dang / rnam par gnon pa bzang po dang / bsam
27a4(phal chen): pa bzang po dang / blo gros bzang po dang / blo bzang po dang / mig bzang po dang / lag pa bzang po dang / tshong dpon gyi bu 'od bzang po dang / de la sogs pa
27a5(phal chen): tshong dpon gyi bu lnga brgyas bskor cing 'dun du byas te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur pa gyur pa gang na ba der dong nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis
27a6(phal chen): la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs cig tu 'khod do// de la khyim bdag shes rab chen po'i bu
27a7(phal chen): mo dge ba bzang mo ni/ bu mo bzang mo dang / yid du 'ong ba'i bzhin dang / brten pa'i blo gros dang / dpal bzang mo dang / tshangs pas byin dang / dpal gyi
27a8(phal chen): 'od dang / bu mo 'od bzang mo la sogs pa/ bu mo lnga brgyas bskor cing 'dun du byas te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur pa gang na ba der dong nas/ 'jam dpal
27b1(phal chen): gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs cig tu 'khod do//
27b2(phal chen): de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi grong rdal nas skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo de dag 'dug ste/ 'khod par
27b3(phal chen): shes nas/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa'i byin gyi zil gyis mnan te/ byams pa chen po'i byin gyis tshim par byas nas/ snying rje chen po'i byin gyis
27b4(phal chen): chos bstan pa mngon par bsgrub ste/ ye shes kyi byin gyis sems dang bsam pa rnam par phye nas/ tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa chen pos chos bstan par dga' ste/
27b5(phal chen): tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang lo lta so// tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang zhes bya ba ci'i phyir na/ nor bzang zhes bya zhe na/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang zhes bya ba de thog ma
27b6(phal chen): ma'i mngal du zhugs ma thag tu/ khyim de'i 'khor kun nas rnam par phye ba'i/ rin po che sna bdun gyi sdong po 'thon par gyur to// rin po che'i sdong po de dag dag
27b7(phal chen): gi 'og tu/ nor bu rin po che'i gter bdun yod de/ gser dang / dngul dang / bai dur+ya dang / shel dang / mu tig dmar po dang / a s+tha gar ba dang / mu sa la
27b8(phal chen): gar pa dang / rin po che de bdun gyi rin po che'i sdong po de dag kyang gter de dag las skyes te/ sa gzhi rtol nas mngon par gyur to// de'i yan lag dang / nying lag
28a1(phal chen): phal chen/ thams cad yongs su rdzogs te/ zla ba bcu lon nas btsas pa dang / de'i tshe gter chen po bdun de dag kyang chu zheng
28a2(phal chen): dang / rngams su khru bdun tsam du sa'i steng nas mngon par 'phags te/ snang bar gyur nas rnam par snang bar gyur to// khyim der rin po che sna
28a3(phal chen): tshogs kyi snod lnga brgya yang byung bar gyur te/ 'di ltar mar gyi snod dang / til mar gyi snod dang / sbrang rtsi'i snod dang / mar gsar gyi snod dang /
28a4(phal chen): gzhan dag kyang so so nas yo byad sna tshogs thams cad kyis yongs su gang ba dag ste/ 'di ltar rdo rje'i snod spos sna tshogs kyi yongs su gang ba dang /
28a5(phal chen): spos kyi snod gos sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba dang / man shel gyi snod kha zas dang / spyan gzigs sna tshogs ro mchog tu zhim pas yongasu gang
28a6(phal chen): ba dang / nor bu'i snod rin po che sna tshogs kyi yongs su gang ba dang / gser gyi snod dngul sil mas yongs su gang ba dang / dngul gyi snod gser
28a7(phal chen): phyes yongs su gang ba dang / 'phra men gyi snod nor bu rin po che bai dUr+yas yongs su gang ba dang / shel gyi snod mu sa la gar pas yongs su gang ba dang /
28a8(phal chen): mu sa la gar ba'i snod rin po che shel gyis yongs su gang ba dang / a spu gar ba'i snod mu tig dmar pos yongs su gang ba dang / mu tig dmar
28b1(phal chen): po'i snod a s+tha gar bas yongs su gang ba dang / nor bu rin po che skar ma'i rgyal mtshan gyi sdod nor bu rin po che chu 'dang gis yongs su gang ba/
28b2(phal chen): dang / nor bu rin po che chu 'dangs kyi snod nor bu rin po che skar ma'i rgyal mtshan gyi yongs su gang ba dang / de dag la sogs pa rin po che'i
28b3(phal chen): snod brgya 'thon par gyur to// tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang de btsas ma thag tu khyim dang / bang ba dang / mdzod thams cad du nor dang / 'bru
28b4(phal chen): dang / dbyig dang / gser dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyis char mngon par bab par gyur to// de la bram ze ltas pa dang / pa dang / ma dang /
28b5(phal chen): gnyen gyi tshogs kyis 'di btsas ma thag tu/ nor mang po phun sum tshogs pa byung bar gyur pas na/ nor bzang nor bzang shes te de ltar ming
28b6(phal chen): btags te/ tshong dpon gyi nor bzang de ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o// mos pa rgya chen po dang ldan pa'o//
28b7(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba shes gnyen gyi rjes su 'brang ba'i bsam pa can no// lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi spyod pa kha na ma tho ba med pa'o// byang chub
28b8(phal chen): sems dpa'i lam yongs su sbyang ba la rab tu brtson pa'o// thams cad mkhyen pa la mngon par mos pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi snod du
29a1(phal chen): ma gyur pa'o// bsam pa'i na mkha' yongs su dag pa'o// byang chub sems chags pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o// de nas/
29a2(phal chen): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la ltas te/ dga' ba'i gtam byas nas/ de la 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
29a3(phal chen): cad yang dag par brdzus shing thob pa bya ba las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad cig nas cig tu rgyud pa las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas cig nas
29a4(phal chen): cig tu rgyud pa thams cad shes pa las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dga' las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos
29a5(phal chen): kyi 'khor lo dang / sprul pa'i rgyan las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzugs kyi sku'i mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po rnam par dag pa las
29a6(phal chen): kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos sku yongs su grub pa las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung rnam par phye ba las kyang brtsams//
29a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi brgyan par dag pa las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid las kyang brtsams/ sangs
29a8(phal chen): rgyas kyi chos kyang bstan par gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang dang / skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag chos dang mthun
29b1(phal chen): pa'i gtam gyis bstan te/ yang dag par bskul nas spro ba bskyed do// dga' bar byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du/
29b2(phal chen): btsud de/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su dran par byas nas/ skyid pa'i 'byung nas de'i grong rdal de'i sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos
29b3(phal chen): bstan pas/ byin gyis brlabs te/ bde bar byas nas de nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa las/
29b4(phal chen): rnam pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang che ba nyid thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mos shing brtson pas phyi bzhin 'brang ste/ 'jam
29b5(phal chen): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la tshigs su bcad de mngon par bstod do// blo gros chen pos mtha' yas spyod yul can/ khyod kyi mthus ni sems can smad du/ bdag
29b6(phal chen): kyang byang chub mchog tu zhugs par 'gyur// de'i nges pa gang mchis bdag la ston/ dga' ba'i chus bkang 'ob kyis kun nas bskor// nga rgyal grags pa'i
29b7(phal chen): ra ba mtho bar rtsegs/ sems can lam rgyud sgo rnams gtsud cing ga dang / de 'dra'i khyim ni srid gsum ming ldan che/ de ni gti mug ma rig gzings pas khebs/
29b8(phal chen): 'dod chags zhe sdang me lces rab tu gdungs/ rtag par bdud kyi dbang po'i dbang du 'gyur/ de la byis pa ma rig stan kyang 'cha'/ srid pa'i sgrogs dang zhags pas
30a1(phal chen): phal cher/ shin tu grags/ g.yo dang rgyu'i skyon gyis mtho 'tshams shing // the tshom yid gnyis dag gis mig ldong ba/ log pa'i phyin
30a2(phal chen): phyogs lam la rab tu zhugs/ phra dog ser sna'i thag pas btags shing bcing // yi dgas byol song sems dmyal mi khom rgyu// rga shi'i nang dang skye bas
30a3(phal chen): rab tu mnar// mgo rmongs lam rgyud 'khor lo kun tu 'khor// de la khyod ni thugs rje rnam dag pa'i// dkyil 'khor ye shes 'od zer snang ba mdzad/
30a4(phal chen): nyon mongs rgya mtsho skam par shar te 'phags// nyi ma 'dra bas bdag la snang bar mdzod// byams pa sgom pas dkyil 'khor rdzogs shing nya// bsod rnam
30a5(phal chen): zla 'od bde ba'i zer 'gyed pa// sems can kun gyi gnas su shar gyur gyis// zla ba nya ba lta bus bdag snang mdzod// dga' mthu thams cad yongs
30a6(phal chen): brtsags bkor mnga' zhing // chos dbyings mkha' la chags pa mi mnga' ba// chos kyi 'khor lo rin chen sngon 'dren pas// rgyal por gyur pas
30a7(phal chen): bdag la gtan du gsol// byang chub theg pa'i smon lam mthu mnga' ste// bsod nams ye shes shin tu yangs brtsegs shing // sems can kun
30a8(phal chen): la phan pa'i don bzhugs pa'i// ded dpon chen pos bdag kyang bskyang du gsol/ bzod pa brtan zhing sra ba'i go bsnams te// ye shes spyan mnga'
30b1(phal chen): thugs rje'i phyag rings pas// 'dud kyi dmag dpung tshogs mngon gyur par/ dpa' bo chen pos bdag gi sel yang mdzod// chos kyi ri rab
30b2(phal chen): tho la brtan bzhugs shing // ting 'dzin mchog gi lha mos kun nas bskor// nyon mongs sgra gcan lha min 'dul bar mdzad// brgya byin gyur pas bdag
30b3(phal chen): kyang gzigs su gsol// byis pa'i gnas gyur khams gsum khang pa// nyon mongs las rnams rnam par gsal ba mkhyen// rgyu'i sa dang lam
30b4(phal chen): rgyud 'khor rmongs pa// me mar 'dra bas bdag kyang shul bstan gsol// ngan 'gro'i lam rnams rnam par zlog mdzad cing // bde bar 'gro ba'i
30b5(phal chen): lam rnams rnam sbyong ba// 'jig rten kun gyi lam gyis rgyud las 'das// bdag la'ang thar pa'i sgo ni bstan du gsol// rtag tu bdag dang bde bar
30b6(phal chen): 'du shes ldan// log 'dzin sgo re'i skyabs kyis bcangad gyur gyis// bde ba'i ye shes spyan rno mchog mnga' bas// thar sgo bdag la'ang myur du dbye bar
30b7(phal chen): gsol// yang dag log pa'i lam la mkhas gyur cing // lam gyi rgyud dang tshul la snyed mi mnga'// lam rnams kun gyi 'dul ba thugs chung ba/
30b8(phal chen): bdag la byang chub shugs ni bstan du gsol// yang dag lta ba'i sa'i thar la zhugs// sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan chab kyi bkrus// sangs rgyas chos legs
31a1(phal chen): la chen/ me tog char 'beb pa// byang chub shul ni bdag la bstan du gsol// rgyal ba gang 'das ma byon gang rnams dang // da ltar
31a2(phal chen): byung ba'i rgyal ba snang mdzad pa// sems can gtso bo legs par gshegs pa'i phyogs// de yang lam ston mdzad pas bdag bstan gsol// lam gyi
31a3(phal chen): 'khrul 'khor tshul la mi snyed pa// chos theg shing rta'i 'khrul 'khor mkhyen gyur cig/ ye shes theg pa'i tshul la rnam nges pa// byang chub theg pa bdag
31a4(phal chen): la bshad du gsol// mos shing smon pa'i 'khor lo'i mu khyud can// bzod pa rdo rje snying rje srog shing sten// dad pa'i gnya' shing rin chen la sbas pa'i/
31a5(phal chen): byang chub theg la bdag kyang skyon du gsol// gzugs rnams kun gyi rnam dag dkyil 'khor can// byam pa rtseg pa'i dra bas rab brgyan pa// tha dad yang
31a6(phal chen): dag shes pa'i dril 'phreng can// theg mchog bzang pos bdag la bstan du gsol// tshangs pa'i spyod pa lam gyis mngon par brgyan// ting 'dzin bud med khrag
31a7(phal chen): khrig kun nas rgyu// chos kyi rnga'i dbyangs chen rab sgrags pa// theg pa'i dam pas bdag la bstan du gsol// bsdu ba bzhi'i mi zad mdzod ldan pa// ye shes
31a8(phal chen): rin chen yon tan 'phreng gis brgyan// khrel yong dul ba'i 'phreng bas mchog bsdams pa'i// theg pa'i dam pa bdag la bstan du gsol// sbyin pa'i 'od zer
31b1(phal chen): dkyil 'khor bzang po can// tshul khrims tsan dan snying rje byung ldan zhing // bzod pa'i gzer gyi mtshan rnams dam sbyar ba'i// theg pa'i mchog la myur du
31b2(phal chen): bdag gzhag gsol// sems can thams cad 'dul las mi ldog pa// bsam gtan ting 'dzin kha khyer mthor smon cing // shes rab thabs gnyis 'byor
31b3(phal chen): 'thun 'gro rgyu ba'i// chos kyi theg pa'i mchog la bdag gzhag gsol// smon lam 'khor los lam gyis 'khor sbyong ba// chos kyi gzugs dam mthu rtan che
31b4(phal chen): ldan zhing // ye shes 'khrul 'khor legs byas pa'i// chos kyi theg pa de la bdag skyon gsol// kun tu bzang po'i spyod pas rab sbyangs shing // sems can
31b5(phal chen): lta bas rgyu la thogs med pa// kun tu bzang po'i spyod pas gnon gyur pas// ye shes theg pas bdag la stan du gsol// de ni brtan pas rdo rje bzhin gnas pa/
31b6(phal chen): ye shes rgyu mas legs sbyangs legs gnas shing // sgri ba dang chags pa thams cad gcod pa'i zhing // bzang po'i theg la bdag kyang skyon par gsol// 'gro mnyam
31b7(phal chen): dri med shin tu yang gyur pa// sems can thams cad skyob pas bde bsgrub cing // chos dbyangs shin tu rgya che rnam snang ba'i// byang chub theg pa bdag kyang skyon du
31b8(phal chen): gsol// sdug bsngal phung po rab tu gcod byed pa// nyon mongs las kyi sbrul mang sbyong sel cing // bdud dang bas kyi rgol ba kun 'jom pa'i// chos kyi theg
32a1(phal chen): pal chen/ #la bdag kyang skyon du gsol// phyogs rnams kun tu ye shes rab snang ba// chos dbyings nam mkha'i rnam par grub byed cing // sems can/
32a2(phal chen): kun gyi bsam pa rdzogs byed pa'i// chos kyi theg la bdag kyang skyon du gsol// rnam dag na mkha ltar tshad med mi zad pa/ sred dang ma rig lta ba'i skyon med cing /
32a3(phal chen): sems can kun la phan par rab gnas pa'i// chos kyi theg la bdag kyang skyon du gsol// rlung chen langs pa'i shugs kyi shugs ldan pas// smon lam mthu'i 'jig
32a4(phal chen): rten kun 'dzin cing // zhi ba'i gnas rab kun sar skyel byed pa'i// chos kyi theg la bdag kyang skyon du gsol// sa chen bzhi'i stobs kyi stobs ldan pa// snying
32a5(phal chen): rje'i mthu dang shugs kyi khur khyer zhing // ye shes lo tog 'gro la nye 'tsho ba'i// theg pa'i mchog la bdag kyang skyon du gsol// nyi ma lta bur 'gro ba nye 'a
32a6(phal chen): zhing // sdu ba rab yang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor can// gzungs kyi stobs mchog dam pa'i 'od bzang ba'i// ye shes nye ba bdag la stan du gsol// bskal pa
32a7(phal chen): mang po du mar rab bslabs pas// rgyu'i tshul dang sa kun mkhas gyur pa// gang gi 'dus byas grong khyer gzhom gyur pa'i// shes rten rdo rje 'phags pas bdag
32a8(phal chen): la stsal du gsol// sangs rgyas legs kun srab pa phun sum gyi// ye shes rgya mtsho yangs pa gang zhig la// tshad med rgya mtsho'i sra mang srab gyur pa// de leg
32b1(phal chen): ci 'dra 'phags pas bka' stsal gsol// gang na yang dag spyan mnga' khyod bzhugs shing // ye shes rgyal po'i cod pan legs brgyan te// chos kyi dbu thod
32b2(phal chen): dam pas dbu bcings pa'i// chos kyi rgyal po'i pho brang bdag kyang ston// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nu rabs glang po'i ltas bstad gyis lngas te/ tshong dpon
32b3(phal chen): gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ dge ba'i bshes
32b4(phal chen): gnyen gyi rjes su 'brang zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i lam yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod de/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dri bar bsam
32b5(phal chen): pa/ legaso legaso// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsnyen bkur cing ston pa dang / rims gro bya ba 'di thams cad mkhyen pa
32b6(phal chen): nyid yongs su grub par gyur pa'i gzhi yin te/ 'di ni mthun pa'i rgyu yin gyis/ rigs kyi bu de bas na/ khyod kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen bskur skyed pa de
32b7(phal chen): lta bu'i sems can yang rab tu dkon te/ de bas kyang gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ byang chub sems dang
32b8(phal chen): spyod pa yongs su tshol ba de lta bu'i sems can ni ches bkod ni/ rigs kyi bu de bas na byang chub sems dpa'/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par
33a1(phal chen): bal / @# da / bya ba'i phyir/ yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen las gdon mi za bar rtogs pa/ thob par gyis shig/ dge ba'i bshes
33a2(phal chen): gnyen yongs su skyo ba'i yid med par gyis shig/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen lta ba la ngom pa med par bgyis shig/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi bstan pa la
33a3(phal chen): mthun par 'dzin par gyis shig/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa la khong khro ba med par gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di
33a4(phal chen): nyid na/ yul mi mo gya nom mchog bya ba yod de/ de na 'gul legs pa zhes bya ba'i ri zhig yod pa de la/ dge slong sprin gyi dpal zhes bya ba 'dug gis/
33a5(phal chen): de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la slab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems
33a6(phal chen): dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa brtsam par bya ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la spyad par bya ba dang / ji ltar
33a7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yong su rdzogs par bya ba dang / ji ltar yongs su dag par bya ba dang / ji ltar 'jug par bya ba dang / ji ltar mngon par
33a8(phal chen): bsgrub par bya ba dang / ji ltar lhag par dmigs par bya ba dang / ji ltar rgyas par bya ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa
33b1(phal chen): dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bar dris shig/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen des khyod la kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor ston to// de/
33b2(phal chen): nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang dga' rangs te/ mgu zhing nyams bde la/ tshims shing yid bde ba skyes nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i
33b3(phal chen): rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ lan brgya stong
