33b4(phal chen): du mar phyir ltas te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen yid du 'ong ba'i sems dang ldan pas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen mi mthong mi bzod de/ gdong mchi mas gang
33b5(phal chen): bar ngu zhing / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang mthar gyis yul mi mo nom pa mchog ces bya ba der song
33b6(phal chen): ste phyin nas/ yul mi mo gya nom mchog nas rnam par rgyus te/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas byung zhing / las rgya chen pos byin gyis brlabs pa'i longs spyod
33b7(phal chen): yid du 'ong ba la yongs su spyod cing / ri mgul legs pa gang na ba der phyin nas/ mgu la legs pa'i ri la mdzegs te/ dge sbyong sbyin gyi dpal la
33b8(phal chen): chos tshol zhing shar phyogs logs su byung ngo // de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams
34a1(phal chen): phal chenadang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams su yang byung ste/ blo 'og tu yang lta zhing dge slong srin gyi/
34a2(phal chen): dpal de tshol tshol ba las/ des zhag bdun lon pa dang / dge slong sprin gyi dpal ri'i rtse cig cig gi sman lcong na 'chag cing 'dug pa mthong nas/ de dge
34a3(phal chen): slong spos kyi sprin gyi dpal gang na ba der song ste/ dge slong sprin gyi dpal gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ dge slong sprin gyi dpal la g.yas phyon
34a4(phal chen): su bskor ba byas te/ 'dun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pas thugs su chud par mdzad du gsol/ bdag gi bla na med
34a5(phal chen): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar
34a6(phal chen): nan tan du bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa brtsams pa dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la spyad par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang
34a7(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar yongs su dag par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar 'jug par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar rjes su 'brang
34a8(phal chen): bar bgyi ba dang / ji ltar mngon par bsgrub par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar lhags par dmigs par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar rgyas par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar bya
34b1(phal chen): chub sems dpas kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bar ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa khyed ni byang chub sems dpa' rnam/
34b2(phal chen): la gdam ngag dang / rjes su ston par mdzad/ ces thos nas/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
34b3(phal chen): tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba bdag la bstan du gsol// de skad ces smras pa dang / dge slong sprin gyi dpal gyi tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so//
34b4(phal chen): rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su 'dri ba legs so//
34b5(phal chen): legs so// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su bstsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul yongs su btsal ba dang /
34b6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung ba rnam par dag pa yongs su btsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa brgya chen po rnam par dag pa yongs su btsal ba dang /
34b7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa sgrub pa rnam par dag pa yongs su btsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa yongs su bstan pa dang /
34b8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje'i rgyud yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'gro ba'i bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub
35a1(phal chen): phal chenasems dpas 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'dus byas dang / 'dus
35a2(phal chen): ma byas kyi ston dang / 'jigs pas mi gos pa'i rgyud yongs su btsal ba 'di ni dka'o// shin tu dka'o// rigs kyi bu kho bos ni mos pa'i stobs kyi dbang gi
35a3(phal chen): mig gi blo gros dang / dad pa'i yid rnam par dag pas kun tu mngon par lta ba'i ye shes kyi 'od snang ba phyin phyogs med pa dang / yul kun la thogs pa med cing
35a4(phal chen): sgrib pa thams cad dang bral ba'i lcags mthong la mkhas pa dang / mig gi yul kun las yongs su dag pa'i lus rnam par dag pa dang / phyogs kyi rgyud
35a5(phal chen): 'jam klas pa thams cad du mngon par 'dud pa'i lus kyi 'dud pa la mkhas pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis chos kyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa'i gzungs kyi
35a6(phal chen): stobs kyi phyogs kyi rgyud thams cad nas sngon du gzigs pa'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong ste/ 'di ltar shar phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa gcig
35a7(phal chen): kyang mthong ngo // sangs rgyas gnyis dang bcu dang / sangs rgyas brgya dang / sangs rgyas stongs dang / sangs rgyas brgya phrag stong dang / sangs rgyas bye ba dang /
35a8(phal chen): sangs rgyas bye ba stong dang / sangs rgyas bye ba brgya phrag stong dang / sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med pa/ dpag
35b1(phal chen): tu med pa/ grangs med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ kun tu mtha' las pa/ sa mtshams med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ brjo
35b2(phal chen): med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam bu gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba nyid kyang mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i gling
35b3(phal chen): bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong dang / stong gnyis pa dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin
35b4(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya'i rdul phra
35b5(phal chen): ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas zhing brgya phrag stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba'i rdul
35b6(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag brgya'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba stong gi rdul phra ba snyed dang / sangs
35b7(phal chen): kyi zhing bye ba brgya phrag stong gi rdul phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du
35b8(phal chen): med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag kyang mthong ngo // shar phyogs logs su ji lta ba bzhin du/ lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi
36a1(phal chen): phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang
36a2(phal chen): phel chen
36a3(phal chen): bla'i phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa cig kyang mthong ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba
36a4(phal chen): stengade dag kyang mthong ba'i bar du ste/ phyogs re rer rnam par ltas kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa kha dog sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / dbyings sna tshogs mnga' ba dang /
36a5(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / khyu mchog gi mthu dang / rnam par rol pa sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / 'khor gyi rgyan sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / 'od zer
36a6(phal chen): gyi dra ba snang ba kha dog du ma can dang / kha dog mtha' yas pa rab tu 'gyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa dang / pho brang dang / rgyan sna tshogs mnga'
36a7(phal chen): ba dang / sku tshe'i tshad rnam par dag pa rnam pa sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / 'gro ba'i bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs par bya ba dang / mngon par 'tshang
36a8(phal chen): rgya ba rnam par dag pa'i sgos/ rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs mnga' ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog dang / seng ge'i nga ro rnam par sgrogs pa mnga' ba mthong
36a9(phal chen): ngo // de ltar rigs kyi bu kho bos ni sgo kun nas/ dmigs pa thams cad rnam par rig pa la/ yang dag par gzhol ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa 'di thos par/
36b1(phal chen): zad na/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa gang gi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang /
36b2(phal chen): pho brang rnam par dag pa'i rgyan mngon par mthong bas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo kun nas snang ba'i dkyil 'khor rab tu thob pa dang / bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin
36b3(phal chen): du rnam par dmigs par/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas rnam par dag pas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo 'gro ba thams cad du/ sgro rtags pa rab tu thob pa dang /
36b4(phal chen): gang gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu tshad med pa'i rjes su 'brang bas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo stobs kyi sgro rtags pa thob pa dang / gang gi chos nyan
36b5(phal chen): pa'i rnam pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i sprin la lta bas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo chos kyi sgo rtags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis phyogs
36b6(phal chen): rgya mtsho thams cad kyi sangs rgyas rgya mtsho tha dad pa la 'jug pas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo phyogs rnam par snang ba'i snying po rab tu thob pa dang / gang gi de bzhin
36b7(phal chen): gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba la rab tu phra bar dmigs shing 'jug pas/ sangs rgyas kyi rjes su dran pa'i sgo phyogs thams ca
36b8(phal chen): du 'jug pa rab tu thob pa dang / bskal pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa mthong zhing rnam par dmigs pa dang / mi bral bas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo
37a1(phal chen): b.len/ bskal par sgro rtag par rab tu thob pa dang / gang gi dus thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa mthong zhing 'grogs pa dang / mi bral bas
37a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i dus su sgro rtag pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du mngon par 'phags shing zil gyi mi non pa'i sangs rgyas
37a3(phal chen): kyi sku yongs su mthong zhing rnam par rigs pas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo zhing du sgro rtags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gi dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i
37a4(phal chen): dkyil 'khor rang gi sems dang / bsam par yang dag par bzhol bas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo dus gsum du sgro rtags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gi dmig
37a5(phal chen): pa thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa cig nas cig tu rgyud pa yang dag par rdzogs pa mthong zhing dmigs pas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo dmigs par rab tu
37a6(phal chen): thob pa dang / gang gi skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar dmigs pas/
37a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo zhi bas sgro rtogs pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis nyin gcig tu gnas thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gshegs par
37a8(phal chen): dmigs pas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo bral bas sgo rtags pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs pas
37b1(phal chen): kyang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rgyas par khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku rnam par dmigs pas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo shin tu yang bas sgro rtags
37b2(phal chen): pa rab tu thob pa dang / gang gi skra'i rtse mo cig la sangs rgyas brjod du med pa byung ba mnyes par bya ba la 'jug pas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgro shin tu phra
37b3(phal chen): bas sgro brtags pa rab tu thob pa dang / skad cig cig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du/ mngon par 'tshang rgya zhing rnam par 'phrul pa ston pa rnam
37b4(phal chen): bar dmigs pas/ gang gi sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo brgyan du sgro rtags pa rab tu thob pa dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo/
37b5(phal chen): dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang / ye shes snang ba rab tu thob pa dang / gang gi sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo dgos par sgro brtags pa rab tu thob pa dang /
37b6(phal chen): rang gi sems dang / bsam pa la ltas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rab tu snang bas thob pas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pas sgo sems kyis sgro rtags
37b7(phal chen): pa rab tu thob pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi lam rnam par ji lta bu gsags pa'i gzugs brnyan yongs su ston pas/ gang gi sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i
37b8(phal chen): sgo las kyi sgro rtags pa rab tu thob pa dang / chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad pad mo'i tshal gyi rgyas par sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa rgya chen po ston /
38a1(phal chen): phal chenaphyogs thams cad du mngon sum du dmigs pas/ gang gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su dran pa'i rnam par 'phrul pas/ sgo rtags
38a2(phal chen): pa rab tu thob pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gzugs brnyan gyi sprin dbyangs sgrogs pas/ chos kyi dbyings dang nam mkha' kun tu snang bas/ gang gi
38a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo nam mkha' sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus pa re skan/ song rigs kyi
38a4(phal chen): bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ phyogs kyi ljongs rgya mtsho'i sgo zhes bya ba yod pa de na/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin ces bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar
38a5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la slob par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig dang / rigs kyi bu dge ba'i bshes gnyen de khyod
38a6(phal chen): la dge ba'i rtsa ba tshogs dang rgyu yongs su ston par 'gyur ro// tshogs kyi rgya chen po yang khong du chud par byed do// dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs dang / shugs rgya chen
38a7(phal chen): po yang yongasu bskyed par byed do// byang chub kyi sems kyi tshogs dang / rgyu rgya chen po yang yongs su brjod par 'gyur ro// theg pa chen po rab tu thob pa dang /
38a8(phal chen): snang bar 'gyur ba'i rgyu rgya chen po yang bskyed par byed do// pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshogs kyi stobs rgya chen po yang rab tu ston par byed do// spyod pa rgya mtsho la 'jug
38b1(phal chen): pa'i tshul rgya chen po yang rab tu ston par 'gyur ro// smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor rgya chen po yang yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ro// sgo kun nas 'byung ba'i rgyan rgya chen
38b2(phal chen): po yang yongs su rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po'i stobs rgya chen po yang yongs su 'phel bar byed do// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi
38b3(phal chen): dge slong sprin gyi dpal gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge slong sprin gyi dpal la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su skor ba byas te/ lan
38b4(phal chen): brgya stong du mar phyir ltas nas/ dge slong sprin gyi dpal gyi drung nas song so// // 'phags pa 'dus pa chen po sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las//
38b5(phal chen): / bam po dgu bcu tham pa'o// // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang
38b6(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdam ngag de bzhin rjes su bsam pa dang / ye shes snang ba de rjes su dran par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa de
38b7(phal chen): rnam par byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul de rjes su sbyang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi tshul de lta ba dang / sangs
38b8(phal chen): rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor de la mngon par mos par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas blta ba'i phyogs de la mngon par spro bar bya ba dang / sangs rgya mtsho de la rjes su bsam
39a1(phal chen): palapa dang / sangs rgyas cig nas cig tu rgyud du de rjes su dran par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul rtogs par bya ba de khong du chud bar
39a2(phal chen): bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyis nam mkha' de la rjes su lta bar byed cing / mthar gyi phyogs kyi rgya mtsho'i sgo gang na ba dang / dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin gang na ba
39a3(phal chen): der phyin nas/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin la lan stong du mar g.yas su bskor ba byas nas/
39a4(phal chen): dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi 'dun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// bdag pa bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
39a5(phal chen): tu mngon par bzhugs te/ bla na med pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho la 'jug par 'tshal nas/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jig rten gyi rgyud las phyir
39a6(phal chen): ldog cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las rgal zhing / thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgya mtshor 'jug
39a7(phal chen): bar 'gyur ba dang / byis pa so so'i skye bo'i sa las gyen du 'phags par 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / 'khor
39a8(phal chen): ba'i rgyud las ldog par 'gyur zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyud du 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i rgyud kyi 'khor lo las byin
39b1(phal chen): ldog cing byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / smon lam gyi 'khor lor 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu 'jom zhing //
39b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung ba thams cad rab tu ston pa dang / srid pa'i rgya mtsho yongs su skems shing snying rje chen po'i rgya mtsho'i rnam par 'phel
39b3(phal chen): bar byed pa dang / mi khom pa dang / ngan song dang / ngan 'gro dang / log par ltung ba thams cad kyi sgo gcod cing / mtho ris dang / mya ngan las 'das
39b4(phal chen): pa'i sgo 'byed pa dang / khams gsum gyi grong khyer gyi sgo rnam par gcod cing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi pho brang gi sgo rnam par 'byed pa dang / so byang
39b5(phal chen): thams cad kyi sred pa rnam par spong zhing / 'gro ba thams cad sdu ba'i smon lam yongs su bskyed pa ma 'tshal to// de skad ces smras pa dang / dge
39b6(phal chen): slong rgya mtsho'i sprin gyis tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyi de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
39b7(phal chen): tu sems bskyed pa legaso legs so// rigs kyi bu dge ba'i rtsa ba ma skyed pa'i sems can rnams ni byang chub sems kyang mi skye'i/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i'o/
39b8(phal chen): sgo kun tu snang ba rab tu thob pa dang / thabs kyi snying po dang ldan pa'i lam gyi ting nge 'dzin ye shes snang bas rab tu snang bar gyur pa dang / bsod nams
40a1(phal chen): ba lenadang rgya mtsho'i rgya chen po bsags pa dang / dkar po'i tshogs thams cad kyi rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams
40a2(phal chen): cad bkur bas yongs su skyo ba med pa dang / lus dang / srog la phangs par mi rtsi ba dang / dngos por 'dzin pa thams cad brang ba dang / tho sman med pa'i
40a3(phal chen): sa ltar sems snyam pa dang / rang bzhin gyi snying rje zhing byams par sems dang ldan pa dang / srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad du gnas par 'dun pa dang /
40a4(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la mngon par mos pa'i sems can rnams byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad yongs su skyab pa'i
40a5(phal chen): phyir/ snying rje chen po'i sems dang / 'gro ba thams cad la snyoms par nan tan du bya ba'i phyir byams pa chen po'i sems dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdug
40a6(phal chen): bsngal gyi phung po zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ bde ba'i sems dang / mi dge ba'i chos thams cad las ldog pa'i phyir phan pa'i sems dang / 'jigs pa thams
40a7(phal chen): las yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir snying brtse ba'i sems dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir chags pa med pa'i sems dang / chos kyi dbying
40a8(phal chen): thams cad rgyas par gang ba'i phyir rgya chen po'i sems dang / nam mkha'i dbyings kun tu gzhol zhing kun tu 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir mtha' yas pa'i sems
40b1(phal chen): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong zhing rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i phyir/ dri ma med pa'i sems dang / dus gsum gyi dmigs pa ma lus
40b2(phal chen): par ye shes kyi rgyas par bkang ba'i phyir/ rnam par dag pa'i sems dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ ye
40b3(phal chen): shes kyi sems kyang skye bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu kho bos ni phyogs kyi ljongs rgya mtsho'i sgo 'dir lo bcu gnyis su rgya mtsho 'di la dmigs te mngon du
40b4(phal chen): byas nas/ 'di ltar rgya mtsho che zhing tshad med pa la rjes su bsam pa dang / dri ma med cing dang ba dang / zab cing ting dpag dga' ba dang / bags kyis
40b5(phal chen): gzhol zhing legs par gnas pa dang / rin po che'i 'byung gnas du mas rnam par brgyan pa dang / chu'i phung po tshad med pa dang / kha dog rnam pa tha dad pa
40b6(phal chen): mang zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'byung po mtha' yas pa'i gnas su gyur pa dang / srog chags mang po sna tshogs kyi rten du gyur pa dang / srin chen po/
40b7(phal chen): char yongs su 'dzin pa dang / gang zhig 'bri bar 'gyur ba med pa la rjes su sems par byed cing gnas te/ rigs kyi bu de la kho bos 'di snyam du bsams so//
40b8(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rgya mtsho chen po 'di bas kyang 'phags par rgya che la 'di bas kyang yangs shing / 'di bas kyang tshad med la/ 'di bas kyang ngo mtsha
41a1(phal chen): ba lenadang ldan pa la la zhig yod dam snyam ste/ de ltar kho bos tshul bzhin du bsam pa yid l-i la brtson par gnas pa'i tshe/ rgya mtsho chen po'i
41a2(phal chen): 'og gi gzhi las pad mo nor bu rin po che in dra ni la thub pa med cing rdo rje lta bur sra ba'i mchu can/ nor bu rin po che bai DUr+ya dam pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa/ 'dzam bu'i chu klung
41a3(phal chen): gi gser ltar dri ma med pa'i lo ma rgya chen po can/ dus dang 'thun pa/ tsan dan gyi snying po'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i rin po che a s+tha gar ba'i ze ba can/ rgya mtsho tsam du
41a4(phal chen): yangs shing rgya che ba/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus sdong po'i lhun nas gzung ba/ rin po che sna tshogs brgya phrag stong gi dra bas kun nas yogs pa klu'i rgyal
41a5(phal chen): po brgya stong phrag bcu'i spos chu mngon par phab pa/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus/ dar dang rin po che'i lnga lding dang / sen mo da mang po chus bzung
41a6(phal chen): zhing rab tu sbyang ba/ mi 'am ci'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus phan pa'i sems kyis kun nas lta ba/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'i brgya stong phrag bcus 'khor mngon
41a7(phal chen): par 'dud po/ srin po'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus lus btud cing / mngon par mchod pa/ dri za'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus rol mo dang / glu sna tshogs
41a8(phal chen): bstan pas bstod cing mchod pa/ lha'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / bdug spos dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang /
41b1(phal chen): gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan gyi sprin gyi char mngon par phab pa/ tshangs pa'i dbang po brgya phrag bcus spyi bos gdugs te/ phyag 'tshal
41b2(phal chen): zhing mchod pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lha brgya stong phrag bcus thal mo sbyar cing phyag bya ba/ mi'i dbang po 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i brgya stong phrag bcus
41b3(phal chen): rin po che bdun gyi sku zhing mngon par mchod pa/ rgya mtsho'i lnga brgya stong phrag bcus mngon par mthon cing phyag bya ba/ nor bu rin po che sbrang ma'i ngang brgya stong phrag
41b4(phal chen): bcu'i 'od zer gyi rgyan gyi rab tu snang bar byas pa/ nor bu rin po che bsod nams kyi dag pa brgya stong phrag bcus mkhas su pheb par bral bas rab tu brgyan pa/
41b5(phal chen): nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba brgya stong phrag bcus/ snying po rab tu gsal ba byas pa/ nor bu rin po che dpal gyi snying po brgya stong phrag bcus chen pos shin tu
41b6(phal chen): 'bar bar 'gyur pa/ nor bu rin po che'i mdzod sna tshogs brgya stong phrag bcus mtha' yas par snang bar byas/ nor bu rin po che 'dzam bu'i chu klung brgya stong
41b7(phal chen): phrag bcus yongs su ston par gnas pas rab tu rgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che rdo rje seng ge brgya stong phrag bcus thub par med par brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che nyi
41b8(phal chen): ma'i snying po brgya stong phrag bcus rgya stong ches gsal bar sgrub pa/ rob rin po che 'bar ba brgya stong phrag bcus kha dog sna tshogs su brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che/
42a1(phal chen): nayid bzhin gyi rgyal po brgya stong phrag bcus mi zad pa'i rgyun dang / 'od 'bar bar byas pa 'byung ste/ pad mo chen po de ni de bzhin gshes
42a2(phal chen): pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las 'byung ba'o// byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pas yongs su bstan par// phyogs thams cad du mdo
42a3(phal chen): par dmigs su yod pa'o// sgyu ma'i rnam pa'i chos kyi 'byung ba'o// rjen pa'i dri med pa'i las kyi 'byung ba'o// nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos kyi tshul gyis brgyan
42a4(phal chen): pa'o// rmi lam lta bu'i chos nyid kyi yongs su byung ba'o// mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i chos kyi tshul gyi rgyas btab pa'o// chags pa med pa'i chos kyi tshul
42a5(phal chen): dang ldan pa'o// phyogs kyi khams kun tu chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa'o// sangs rgyas kyis yul brjod pa dang / mthun pa ste/ de ni rnam pa dang /
42a6(phal chen): yon tan dang / dbyibs dang / kha dog dang rgyan gyi mthar phyin pa ni/ bskal pa brgya stong grangs med par yang khong du chud par mi nus te/ pad mo chen po de yang
42a7(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku skyil mo klungs du bzhugs pas khyab cing yongs su rgyas par mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de yang 'di nas bzung nas srid pa'i
42a8(phal chen): rtse mo'i bar gyi mthas klas par mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa de'i bdun gyi mi khyab pa yang mthong ngo // 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan bsam gyi mi khyab pa dang /
42b1(phal chen): 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan bsam gyi mi khyab pa dang / mtshan phun sum tshogs pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa dang / dpe byad bzang po sna tshogs bsam gyi mi khyab
42b2(phal chen): pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mdog rnam par
42b3(phal chen): dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / spyi gtsug ltar mi mthong ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / ljags yang ba bsam gyi mi khyab pa yang mthong ngo // sangs rgyas
42b4(phal chen): kyi gsungs gi rgyan bsam gyi mi khyab pa dang / dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor bsam gyi mi khyab pa yang thos so// stobs tshad med pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa dang /
42b5(phal chen): mi snyed pa'i rgyan rnam par dag pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa dang / tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa'i stobs mngon par bsgrub pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa yang rjes su
42b6(phal chen): shes so// sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang dag par bsgrub pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa yang rjes su dran no// mngon par rdzogs pa byang chub pa'i
42b7(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa yang mthong ngo // chos kyi sprin gyi 'brug sgra mngon par sgrogs pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa dang / yongs su bstan pa rnam
42b8(phal chen): par dmigs pa'i gnas/ brgyan bsam gyi mi khyab pa yang thos so// g.yas g.yon gyi sku'i rnam pa tshad med pa/ bsam gyi mi khyab pa dang / sems can
43a1(phal chen): @kyi don don dang / dgos pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i// yongs su grub par 'gyur yang mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa nges
43a2(phal chen): kyang / phyag g.yas pa brkyang zhing kho bo'i mgo la byugs nas/ chos kyi rnam grangs kun nas mig ces bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul/
43a3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rab tu brjod pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi dang / rnam pa thams cad rab tu snang ba/ chos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor la
43a4(phal chen): yang dag par gzhol zhing / snang bar byed pa zhing gi dkyil 'khor dang / rnam pa thams cad rnam par dag pas yongs su snang ba/ phas kyi rgol ba'i dkyil
43a5(phal chen): 'khor thams cad rnam par 'thor ba/ bdud kyi dkrugs ma'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu 'jom pa/ sems can gyi khams thams cad shin tu tshim par
43a6(phal chen): byed pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi thibs po rab tu snang bar byed pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmig/
43a7(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi dbang po'i 'khor lo'i rgyud dang / mthu snang bar byed par yang dag par bstan te/ kho bos kyang kun nas mig gi chos kyi rnam
43a8(phal chen): grangs de spangs so// gzung ngo // spel lo// bsams so// de ltar bzung ba de la 'ang brin ni snag tsha rgya mtsho chen po'i chu'i phung po tsam dang / smyug gu'i
43b1(phal chen): phung po ri rab ri'i rgyal po tsam zad par gyur pas kyang / chos kyi rnam grangs de las le'u re re dang / sgo re re dang / chos kyi tshul re re dang / chos kyi tshig/
43b2(phal chen): rnam par bye ba re re las kyang zad pa'am/ 'grib pa 'am/ 'byung ba 'am/ mthar thug pa 'am/ mtha' zad par 'gyur ba dmigs par mi rung ngo //
43b3(phal chen): rigs kyi bu de ltar bdag gi lo bcu gnyis tshangs par/ chos kyi rnam grangs kun nas/ mig ces bya ba 'di la nyi ma cig ci yang thos pa 'dzin pa'i gzungs
43b4(phal chen): kyi 'od snang bas/ le'u grangs med pa zhig khong du chud do// zhi ba'i sgo'i gzung gi 'od snang bas/ le'u grangs med pa zhig la zhugs so// gle mtha' yas
43b5(phal chen): pa'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas/ le'u grangs med pa zhig la yang dag par 'jug go/ sa la rnam par spyod cing rjes su rtogs par byed pa'i gzungs kyi 'od
43b6(phal chen): snang bas/ le'u grangs med pa zhig rnam par sgom ste/ rnam par bye bar byas so// gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas/ le'u grangs med
43b7(phal chen): pa zhig yongs su blangs so// pad mo'i rgyan gyi gzungs kyi 'od snang bas/ le'u grangs med pa zhig mngon par bsgrubs so// dbyangs kyi tshul gyi gzungs kyi
43b8(phal chen): snang bas/ le'u grangs med pa zhig rab tu phye'o// skar ma skyegs pa'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas/ le'u grangs med pa zhig shin tu rgyas par byas so//
44a1(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i snying ba'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas/ le'u grangs med pa zhig yongs su bkad na// kho bo'i drung du shar phyogs lon
44a2(phal chen): nas lha dang / lha'i dbang po dang / klu dang klu'i dbang po 'am/ gnod sbyin dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po 'am/ dri za dang / dri za'i dbang po 'am/ lha
44a3(phal chen): ma yin dang / lA ma yin gyi dbang po 'am/ nam mkha' lding dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po 'am/ mi 'am ci dang / mi 'am ci'i dbang po'o//
44a4(phal chen): lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po 'am/ mi dang / mi'i dbang po'am/ tshangs pa dang / tshangs pa'i dbang po'am/ sems can gang su 'od kyang rung ste/
44a5(phal chen): de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa snang ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs/ kun nas mig ces bya ba 'di nyid la rab
44a6(phal chen): tu bkod cing btsud de/ de dag kun nas mig gi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid la mos par byas so// rtog tu btsud du/ yongs su bstan to// yang dag
44a7(phal chen): bar brjod do// yongs su gsal bar byas so// rnam par 'phye'o// rgyas par byas so// mngon par bstan te/ rnam par bkrol lo// rab
44a8(phal chen): tu phye'o// shin tu snang bar byas so// de ltar shar phyogs ji lta ba bzhin du/ lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi
44b1(phal chen): phyogs 'tshams dang / shar n+do'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs 'tshams dang / 'og dang / bla'i phyogs
44b2(phal chen): nas sems can gang su 'ong kyang rung ste/ kun la yang snga ma bzhin no// rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bo ni chos kyi rnam grangs cig gcig zad par shes
44b3(phal chen): nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang / bskal pa thams cad du gnam pa rgyun mi chad pa'i phyir/ smon lam rgya
44b4(phal chen): mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang / bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su 'breng bar bya ba'i phyir/ sems can rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang /
44b5(phal chen): stobs bcu ye shes chags pa med pa'i snang ba yongs su bskyed pa'i phyir/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho la zhugs pa dang / yongs su smin/
44b6(phal chen): par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i dus las mi mda' bar bya ba'i sems can gyi dbang po rgya mtsho la zhugs pa dang / zhing thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i
44b7(phal chen): smon lam sngon du bsgrub pas zhing rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod cing / rim gro byed pa'i stobs kyis/ sangs
44b8(phal chen): rgyas rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang / ye shes rnam par rigs pas chos rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang / nan tan dang ldan pas/ yon
45a1(phal chen): natan rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang / brjod pa thams cad du/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba/ mngon par bsgrub pa'i
45a2(phal chen): phyir/ 'gro ba'i skad rgya mtsho la zhugs pa rnams la spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu 'di nas dpag tshad
45a3(phal chen): drug bcu 'das pa'i lho phyogs kyi gnas 'di nyid na/ lang ka'i gnas rgya mtsho'i dog shes bya ba yod de/ de na dge slong shin tu bstan pa zhes bya ba 'dug
45a4(phal chen): ge/ de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su sbyang bar bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/
45a5(phal chen): dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs nas bskor ba byas
45a6(phal chen): nas/ yang dang yang du bltas te/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdam dag
45a7(phal chen): dang / kun nas mig gi chos kyi rnam grangs des rjes su dran par byed cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de yang rjes su bsam pa dang /
45a8(phal chen): chos kyi tshig dang / yi ge'i sprin de dag kyang yongs su bzung ba dang / chos kyi sgo rgya mtsho'i tshul de dag las yang dag par 'jug par bya ba dang / chos kyi tshul
45b1(phal chen): de la yang rjes su rnam par lta ba dang / chos kyi le'u dang / klong gi tshul de dag la 'jug par bya ba dang / chos kyi nam mkha' de las yang dag par gzhol bar
45b2(phal chen): bya ba dang / chos kyi dkyil 'khor de yang rjes su sbyang bar bya ba dang / chos rin po che'i gling de yang rjes su sems shing / mthar gyis lang ka'i gnas rgya
45b3(phal chen): mtsho'i ngog shes bya ba gang na ba der byin nas/ dge slong shin tu brtan par mthong bar dga' zhing / shar phyogs su ltas so// de bzhin du lho phyogs dang /
45b4(phal chen): nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs 'tshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshams dang / nub byang
45b5(phal chen): gau phyogs mtshams dang / bla dang 'og tu yang dge slong shin tu brtan pa mthong bar dga' ste/ kun tu ltas pa dang / des dge slong shin tu brtan pa/ nam
45b6(phal chen): mkha'i dbyings la lha brgya stong grangs med pas yongs su bskor cing / phan tshun 'chags pa mthong ngo // nam mkha'i dbyings de yang lha'i dbang po rnams
45b7(phal chen): kyi dge slong shin tu brtan pa la mchod pa'i lha rdzas kyi me tog sil ma'i sprin gyi g.yogs pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rol mo'i sprin gyi sgra dang / dar gyi ba dan grangs med
45b8(phal chen): pa'i rgyan par mthong ngo // klu'i dbang po na mkha' la/ a ka ru nag po'i spos/ mngon par mthul ba'i sprin shin tu mtho ba las/ 'brug sgra bsam gyi
46a1(phal chen): phal chen/ mi khyab pa/ 'byung ba byas pa mthong ngo // mi 'am ci'i dbang po rnams kyi mamakha'i de la ngag snyan pa'i rgyud kyi bstod pa'i
46a2(phal chen): rol mo'i gdung ba dang / dkrol ba dang / glur blang ba'i dbyangs thams cad sbyar shing spang ba thos par gyur te// lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po rnams kyi nam
46a3(phal chen): mkha' de la/ gos shin tu phra zhing / mdog bzang ba'i sprin bsam gyi mi khyab pa dag/ yid dga' bas skye ste/ dge slong shin tu rten pa la dad cing mos
46a4(phal chen): gzugs su phyung ba mthong ngo // lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams kyi kyang / nam mkha' de la nor bu rin po che'i sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa byin rlabs te/ yon ta/
46a5(phal chen): bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i rgyan snang ba dang ldan par byis pa mthong ngo // nam mkha' lding gi dbang po yang mi'i gzugs dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs su 'khor/
46a6(phal chen): cing / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i bu mos kun nas skor te/ bsod pa med pa la dga' zhing thal mo sbyar te/ gnas pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa mthong ngo //
46a7(phal chen): gnod sbyin gyi dbang po brgya stong 'khor dang bcas pa/ bsam gyi mi khyab pa dag kyang / nam mkha' de la shin tu sdug pa'i gzugs su dge slong shin tu
46a8(phal chen): brtan pa la byams pa'i mthu dang ldan par 'khod par mthong ngo // srin po'i dbang po brgya stong 'khor dang bcas pas/ bsam gyi mi khyab pa dag kyang nam
46b1(phal chen): mkha' de la/ dge slong shin tu brtan pa la yongs su bsrung bar byed cing / kun tu rgyu ba mthong ngo // tshangs pa'i dbang po brgya stong bsam gyi mi khyab dag
46b2(phal chen): kyang / nam mkha' de la thal mo sbyar cing dga' ba dang / yid du 'ong ba'i tshig gi stong pa rab tu brjod pa mthong ngo // gnas gtsang ma'i lha brgya stong bsam
46b3(phal chen): gyi mi khyab pa dag kyang / nam mkha' de la dge slong shin tu brtan pa la/ mchod pa'i lus su bya ba'i phyir/ thal mo sbyar cing / gzhal med khang na gnas
46b4(phal chen): pa mthong ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi/ dge slong shin tu brtan pa de ltar/ nam mkha'i dbyings la 'chag cing 'dug pa mthong nas/
46b5(phal chen): dga' zhing rang ste/ mgu zhing nyams bde ba/ tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ dge slong shin tu brtan pa la thal mo sbyar te/ phyag 'tshal te/ 'di ska/
46b6(phal chen): ces smras so// 'phags pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos
46b7(phal chen): btsal bar bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bsgrub par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/
46b8(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bsdu bar bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bstan par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar
47a1(phal chen): phal chenabyang chub sems dpas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos sgom par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi
47a2(phal chen): rjes su 'brang bar bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su brtul bar bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/
47a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi chos snyoms par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/
47a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su sbyang bar bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos khong du chud par bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa
47a5(phal chen): ni byang chub sems dpa' gdam ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do// zhes bdag gi thos nas/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ sangs rgyas kyi
47a6(phal chen): chos la nan tan du bgyis na/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin dang / skol bar mi 'gyur ba'i slad du/ sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / byang chub
47a7(phal chen): sems dpa' thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / tshul cig tu 'gyur ba'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba dang mi bral ba dang / ye shes rtogs
47a8(phal chen): par 'gyur ba'i slad du/ sangs rgyas kyi chos dang mi 'bral ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi don yong su thob par bgyi ba'i slad du/ byang
47b1(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i smon lam thams cad dang mi 'bral ba dang / bskal pa thams cad du gnas pas/ yongs su mi skyo bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ byang chub sems
47b2(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su dag par bgyi ba'i slad du/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par gang ba
47b3(phal chen): dang / mi 'bral ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad rnam par dmigs par bgyi ba'i slad du/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam
47b4(phal chen): par 'phrul pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sprul pa lta bus/ srid pa'i rgyud thams cad/ skye zhing shi 'pho ba'i skye mched
47b5(phal chen): rang gi lus kyi nyams su myong bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ 'dus byas kyi gnas tha dang mi 'bral ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ chos kyi sprin yod
47b6(phal chen): su gzung ba'i slad du/ chos mnyan pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / dus gsum gyi ye shes khong du chud cing / rjes su 'brang bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ ye shes
47b7(phal chen): snang ba dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ba de/ bdag la bstan du gsol/ de skad ces smras pa dang / dge slong shin tu brtan pas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor ba
47b8(phal chen): la 'di skad ces smras so// de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / thams
48a1(phal chen): 'alenacad mkhyen pa'i chos dang / rang 'byung gi chos 'dri ba legs so// legs so// rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i
48a2(phal chen): rnam par thar pa thogs pa med pa'i sgo thob ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa/ thogs pa med pa'i sgo kho bos blangs te/ yongs su
48a3(phal chen): bzung nas/ rjes su 'brang zhing rnam par phye ba dang / rnam par spyad pa dang / rnam par rtags pa dang / snang bar byas pas/ thogs pa med pa'i mtha'
48a4(phal chen): zhes bya ba'i ye shes snang ba thob bo// de thob pas kho bo ni sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do// sems
48a5(phal chen): can thams cad kyi skye ba dang / shi 'pho yongs su shes par bya ba thogs pa med do// sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran par bya ba'i sgor 'jug pa la thogs pa med
48a6(phal chen): do// phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par 'gro ba thams cad dang / 'grogs par bya ba thogs pa med do// da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi/ 'gro ba thams cad rigs
48a7(phal chen): bar thog pa med do// sems can thams cad kyi sgra skad dang / kun rdzob yongs su shes par bya ba la thog pa med do// sems can thams cad kyi the
48a8(phal chen): chom spyod par bya ba la thog pa med do// sems can thams cad kyi dbang po tha dad pa khong du chud bar bya ba la thog pa med do// sems can thams cad
48b1(phal chen): yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i dus su 'gro bar bya ba la thogs pa med do// nyin mtshan dang / skad cig dang / yud tsam dang / thang cig dang /
48b2(phal chen): dus kyi ming du bya ba khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do// dus gsum rgya mtsho'i rgyud du 'jug par bya ba la thogs pa med do// phyogs bcu'i sangs
48b3(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing rang gi lus kyi rgyas par dgang bar bya ba la thogs pa med do// de la de ltar dngos po med pa la gnas shing mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul
48b4(phal chen): thob pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu dngos po med pa la gnas shing mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul de'i byin gyis/ kho bo nam mkha'i dbyings 'di la/
48b5(phal chen): phan tshun du 'gro zhing 'dug pa dang / skyes pa dang / spyod lam sna tshogs su spyod do// mi gnang bar byed do// snang bar 'byung ngo // du ba 'thul bar
48b6(phal chen): byed do// me lce 'bar bar byed do// gcig tu byas shing mang por sbyar ro// mang por byas shing gcig tu sbyar ro// snang ba dang mi snang ba yang nyams su
48b7(phal chen): myong bar byed do// rtsig pa la'ang thags thog med pa dang / ra ba la yang thags thog med par 'gro ste/ dper na nam mkha' la bya bzhin no// nam
48b8(phal chen): mkha' la'ang skyil mo krung gi 'gro ste/ dper na 'dab chags bya bzhin no// sa la'ang byi'u zul dang / steng du 'byung bar byed de/ dper na chu la bya
49a1(phal chen): @do// tshul byu ba yang / dbye ngasas bya na// dub 'phrul ba dang / skye 'ab ba cing
49a2(phal chen): dper na mo'i phung po chen po bzhin no// sa yang yongs su g.yo bar byed do// nyi ma dang zla ba 'di gnyis rdzu 'phrul che zhing / de ltar mthu che la/ de ltar
49a3(phal chen): gzi brjid che yang / lag pas kun nas yongs su nyug go/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar dag tu'ang lus kyi bsgyur ro// 'jig rten spos kyi bdud
49a4(phal chen): pa na bun du chags pa'i sprin gyi kun nas khyab par byas shing / rab tu 'bar bar byed do// rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi dra bas 'jig rten kun nas khyab
49a5(phal chen): bar byas shing / 'gro ba thams cad dang 'dra ba'i skul ba'i sprin rab tu 'gyed do// kha dog mtha' yas pa'i 'od kyi dra ba'i srin rab tu skye zhing / phyogs sum
49a6(phal chen): yang 'gro ste/ 'di ltar phyogs su 'gro'o// lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs
49a7(phal chen): mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs dang / 'og gi phyogs dang / bla'i phyogs su'ang 'gro/ sems kyi skad cig re
49a8(phal chen): zhing yang shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams cig kyang 'da'o// 'jig rten gyi khams gnyis dang / bcu yang 'da'o// 'jig rten gyi khams
49b1(phal chen): brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya phrag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
49b2(phal chen): bye ba phrag brgya stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu
49b3(phal chen): med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyi khyab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams mtshungs pa med pa dang /
49b4(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal du med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu mtha' yas pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams mu med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
49b5(phal chen): 'tshams med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang 'da' bar byed do// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sangs
49b6(phal chen): rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong la/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'jam klas pa de
49b7(phal chen): dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgyud de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'du ba
49b8(phal chen): de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung ba de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams su bya ba de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sgo
50a1(phal chen): de lenadang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bskal par bya ba de dang de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams su 'jug pa de dang de
50a2(phal chen): dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi snying po byang chub rnam par bkod pa de dag de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dkyil 'khor de dag na/ sangs rgyas
50a3(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag las/ de bzhin gshegs pa re re zhing yang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas
50a4(phal chen): pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba nyid kyi lus sna tshogs dang / lus re ri zhing yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa'i rdul/ shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mchod pa'i sprin gyi char
50a5(phal chen): 'bab shing spyan sngar 'gro'o// de dag tu phyin nas kyang me tog thams cad dang / spos thams cad dang / 'phreng ba thams cad dang / phye ma thams cad dang /
50a6(phal chen): byug pa thams cad dang / na bza' thams cad dang / rgyal mtshan thams cad dang / lha'i ba dan thams cad dang / bla re thams cad dang / gzugs thams
50a7(phal chen): cad kyi mchod pa rgyun ma chad par byed do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi gang ji snyed du gsungs pa dang / bstan pa dang / brjod pa dang / yang dag par
50a8(phal chen): bshad pa dang / yang dag par smos pa dang / yongs su brjod pa dang / man ngag tu gsungs pa dang / shin tu bstan pa dang / rab tu brjod pa de dag thams cad
50b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang rjes su dran no// shar phyogs ji lta ba bzhin du/ lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs
50b2(phal chen): dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs 'tshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs su yang 'jig rten gyi
50b3(phal chen): khams cig kyang 'da'o// 'jig rten gyi khams gnyis dang / bcu yang 'da'o// 'jig rten gyi khams brgya nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing
50b4(phal chen): brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag kyang 'da'o// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig bzhug
50b5(phal chen): shing 'tsho skyong la/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dang de dag na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag pa de dang de dag na/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor gyi
50b6(phal chen): dkyil 'khor de dang de dag dang / chos bstan pa de dag kun kyang mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa de la'ang me tog thams cad nas gzugs thams cad kyis/
50b7(phal chen): mchod par byed do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/ gang ji snyed du gsung ba nas/ rab tu brjod pa'i bar de dag thams cad kyang yongs su shes
50b8(phal chen): shing 'dzin to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa gang ji snyed pa/ de dag thams cad kyang rjes su dran no//
51a1(phal chen): 'phen/ sems can gang gi kho bo mthong bar gyur pa de dag kun kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyuraro//
51a2(phal chen): sems can phra mo dang / rags pa dang / ngan pa 'am/ bzang ba 'am/ bde ba'am/ mi bde ba gang ji snyed cig kho bos mthong bar gyur pa/ de dag kun la
51a3(phal chen): yang yongs su smin par bya ba dang / 'dul ba'i dus las mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir kho bo de dag gis lus kyi tshad dang mnyam par lus byin gyi rlob bo// sems
51a4(phal chen): can ji snyed cig kho bo'i drung du 'ong ba de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa kun tu 'gro ba 'di dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par
51a5(phal chen): thar pa rnam par gnon pa don yod pa la/ rab tu bzhog go/ rigs kyi bu kho bos ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa thogs pa med pa'i sgo kun tu 'gro ba/
51a6(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa dang / rim gro rab tu sbyong ba sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / mthun pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho bo byang chub
51a7(phal chen): sems dpa'i snying rje chen po'i ngang tshul can/ theg pa chen po'i ngang tshul can/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang mi 'bral ba'i ngang tshul can/ thogs pa med/
51a8(phal chen): ba'i ngang tshul can/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa'i snying po chung mi gson pa'i ngang tshul can/ byang chub kyi sems yongs su mi gtong ba'i ngang tshul can/
51b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi chos la lhag par dmigs pa'i ngang tshul can/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba dang mi bral ba'i ngang tshul can dang / nam mkha' dang mnyam/
51b2(phal chen): ba'i ngang tshul can/ 'jig rten thams cad na mi gnas pa'i ngang tshul can/ chung ma bzon pa'i ngang tshul can/ mnyam pa'i ngang tshul can/ ma god pa'i
51b3(phal chen): ngang tshul can/ mkha' glag med pa'i ngang tshul can/ ma 'dras pa'i ngang tshul can/ rnyog pa med pa'i ngang tshul can/ 'gyod pa med pa'i ngang tshul can/ rnam
51b4(phal chen): par dag pa'i ngang tshul can/ byang chub sems dpa' rdul dang bral ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho
51b5(phal chen): phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ dra bi la'i grong rdal rdo rje'i grong khyer zhes bya ba yod do/ de na dra bi la sbyin zhes bya ba 'dug gi/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub
51b6(phal chen): sems dpas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la slab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi/ dge
51b7(phal chen): slong rab tu brtan pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs nas bskor ba byas te/ yang dang yang ltas nas dge
51b8(phal chen): slong shin tu brtan pa'i drung nas song ngo // de nas chongs dpon gyi bu nor bzang chos kyi dad pa'i shugs dang / byin gyi non pa/ sangs rgyas yid la bya ba'i 'du shes
52a1(phal chen): pa 9/ @dang ldan pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung ma chad pa la rab tu brtson pa/ dus gsum snang bas sems snang bar gyur pa/ smon lam/
52a2(phal chen): chen po yid la byed pa dang ldan pa/ sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su skyab pa'i thabs la zhugs pa/ 'dus byas kyi dga' ba thams cad la mi gnas
52a3(phal chen): pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nges par rtogs par bya ba la brtson pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i smon lam
52a4(phal chen): las mi g.yo ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na gnas pa med par gnas pa/ chos kyi snang ba de rjes su dran par bya ba dang / dge ba'i
52a5(phal chen): bshes gnyen rjes su dran par bya ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rigs yongs su brjod pa byed cing / mthar gyi dra bi la'i grong rdal chen por rdo rje'i
52a6(phal chen): grong khyer du phyin nas/ dra bi la'i sprin yongs su tshol ba las/ grong khyer gyi khyams shig na/ chos ston pa'i don du/ seng ge'i khri la 'dug cing / srog
52a7(phal chen): chags stong phrag bcu tsam zhig la chos kyi rnam grangs yi ge'i 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi rgyan ces bya ba/ yongs su ston cing 'dug pa mthong ngo // de nas tshong dpon
52a8(phal chen): gyi bu nor bzangs kyi dra bi la'i sprin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi zos phyag 'tshal te/ dra bi la'i sprin la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas
52b1(phal chen): 'dun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na ji/
52b2(phal chen): ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi
52b3(phal chen): sems srid pa'i lam rgyud thams cad du chab mi 'tshal ba dang / ji ltar yongs su skyo ba ma mchis shing / bsam pa brtan par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar thub pa ma
52b4(phal chen): mchis shing lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar yongs su skyo ba ma mchis shing snying rje chen po'i stobs yang dag par skye bar 'gyur ba dang /
52b5(phal chen): ji ltar sgo kun nas rnam par dag cing gzungs kyi stobs gnon par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar ma rig pa'i rab rib dang / sgrib pa rnam par 'thor zhing shes rab kyi
52b6(phal chen): 'od chos thams cad la rab rib ma mchis pa'i snang ba skye bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar don dang / chos dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / spobs pa la mkhas pa'i
52b7(phal chen): dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs shing / tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa'i stobs gnon par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor
52b8(phal chen): lo tha mi dad pa yang dag par 'dzin cing dran pa'i stobs yongs su gnon par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar chos thams cad kyi phyogs rigs pa'i snang ba rjes su rtogs
53a1(phal chen): lenashing / rig pa'i stobs rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang / nga ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs chos thams/
53a2(phal chen): cad kyi don rnam par gdon mi za bar rab tu dbye ba la brtson pas 'grub par 'gyur ba ma 'tshal to// de nas dra bi la'i sprin gyi byang chub sems dpa' la
53a3(phal chen): rim gro bya ba'i phyir seng ge'i khri de dag las langs te babs nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la lus thams cad kyi phyag byas nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor
53a4(phal chen): bzangs la gser gyi me tog gi phung pos mngon par gtor to// nor bu rin po rin thang med pa mang po dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma dam pas kyang mngon par gtor to//
53a5(phal chen): gos tshon sna tshogs mngon par dad pas kha dog bsgyur ba brgya stong phrag du mar kyang mngon par bkab po// spos kyi me tog kha dog rnams pa tha dad cing yid du
53a6(phal chen): 'ong ba ltas na sdug pa/ mang pos kyang mngon par gtor nas/ mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs gzhan dag gi kyang mchod pa dang / rim gro dang / bkur sti dang /
53a7(phal chen): sti stang cher byas te/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyi de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
53a8(phal chen): tu sems bskyed pa legs legs so// rigs kyi bu gang gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de ni/ sangs rgyas thams/
53b1(phal chen): cad kyi gdung mi gcod pa'i zhugs pa yin/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rigs yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par rig par bya ba la brtson pa yin//
53b2(phal chen): zhing gi rgyud thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba la zhugs pa yin/ sems can gyi rigs thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / 'dul ba la rta gon du
53b3(phal chen): gnas pa yin/ chos kyi rigs thams cad yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rtag pa la brtson pa yin/ las kyi rigs thams cad dang mi 'gal bar gnas pa
53b4(phal chen): yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i rigs thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la rab tu brtson pa yin/ smon lam gyi rigs thams cad rgyun mi gcod pa'i
53b5(phal chen): phyir/ yang dag par zhugs pa yin/ dus gsum gyi rgyud thams cad ye shes kyi khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa yin/ mos pa'i rigs shin tu
53b6(phal chen): brtan par bya ba'i brtson pa yin te/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mang po thams cad kyi byin brlab pa yin/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang dag par
53b7(phal chen): dgengs pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa yin/ 'phags pa thams cad kyi rjes su dgyes par bya ba yin/
53b8(phal chen): tshangs pa'i dbang po thams cad kyi mngon par dga' bar byas pa yin/ lha'i dbang po thams cad kyi yang dag par mchod pa yin/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang
54a1(phal chen): ba lenapo thams cad kyi yongs su bsrung ba yin/ dbang po thams cad kyi rims gro byas pa yin/ klu'i dbang po thams cad kyi
54a2(phal chen): gsu ba yin/ mi 'am ci'i dbang po thams cad kyi mngon par bstod pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi yang dag par sngags pa yin/
54a3(phal chen): des ni sems can gyi khams thams cad kyang ngan song gi rgyud gsum po yongs su bcad pa dang / mi khoms pa dang / ngan 'gro'i lam thams cad zlog
54a4(phal chen): pa dang / dbul ba'i lam thams cad las yang dag par bzla ba dang / lha dang mi'i lus phun sum tshogs pa thob par bya ba dang / dge ba'i bshes
54a5(phal chen): gnyen mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po gnyen pa dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi yan lag
54a6(phal chen): yongs su dag par bya ba dang / byang chub kyi sems 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su sgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam snang ba thob par bya ba dang /
54a7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes khong du chud par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas par bya bas dbugs byin par byas pa yin/ rigs
54a8(phal chen): kyi bu de la bdag 'di snyam du sems to// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dga' bya byed pa ste/ 'byung bar dka' zhing mthong bar dka'o// byang
54b1(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can rnams la bag dro bar byed pas/ pha dang ma lta bu'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig
54b2(phal chen): rten gyi brgyan du gyur pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can rnams sdug bsngal gyi mnar ba rnams la skyabs su gyur pa'o// byang chub sems
54b3(phal chen): dpa' rnams ni 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir gnas su gyur pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'jigs pa sna tshogs kyi rtses pa rnams la
54b4(phal chen): dpung gnyen du gyur pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'gro ba thams cad ngan song gsum du ltung ba las yongs su ston pa'i phyir/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor lta bu'o//
54b5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pas sa lta bu'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bsod nams rin po
54b6(phal chen): che'i mdzod mi zad pa'i gter dang ldan pas/ rgya mtsho lta bu'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ye shes kyi 'od kyi snang bar byed pa'i phyir/ nyi ma lta bu'o//
54b7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu mtho bas ri rab lta bu'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni snying po byang chub tu ye shes kyi zla ba 'char
54b8(phal chen): bar 'gyur ba'i phyir zla ba lta bu'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdud kyi sde thams cad rab tu 'joms pas dpa' bor gyur pa'o// byang chub sems
55a1(phal chen): pa lenadapa' rnams ni rang 'byung gi chos kyi grong khyer du phyin pas brtul bod pa lta bu'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can thams
55a2(phal chen): cad kyi bdag byams pa'i rlan yongs su skyems pas me lta bu'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni chos kyi rgya mtsho'i char chen po mngon par 'pheb pas sprin lta
55a3(phal chen): bu'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni snyems can gyi dbang po dad pa la sogs pa'i myu gu rnam par 'phel bar byed pas/ char lta bu'o// byang chub sems
55a4(phal chen): dpa' rnams ni chos kyi rgya mtsho'i 'gram su ston pas mnyan pa lta bu'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las yang
55a5(phal chen): dag par sgrol ba'i phyir zam pa lta bu'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can thams cad mngon par skrod par bya ba'i phyir steg lta bu'o// de ltar dra bi
55a6(phal chen): la sprin gyi tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi 'dun du 'dug ste/ tshig gi rgyud de dag gis byang chub dpa' rnams yongs su sngags pa byas nas/ tshong dpon gyi
55a7(phal chen): bu nor bzangs la legs so legs so zhes sngags so// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par dga' ba'i tshig brjod pa'i tshe/ kha'i sgo nas
55a8(phal chen): 'od 'phro ba'i phung po rnam pa 'di lta bu 'byung ste/ 'od 'phro ba'i phung po des stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par bkang bar gyur nas lha dang /
55b1(phal chen): rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/ klu dang klu rdzu 'phrul chen po'am/ gnod sbyin dang / gnod sbyin rdzu 'phrul chen po'am/ dri za dang / dri za'i rdzu 'phrul chen po'am/
55b2(phal chen): lha ma yin dang / lha ma yin rdzu 'phrul chen po'am/ nam mkha' lding dang / nam mkha' lding gi rdzu 'phrul chen po'am/ mi 'am ci dang / mi 'am ci
55b3(phal chen): rdzu 'phrul chen po'am/ lto 'phye chen po dang / lto 'phye chen po rdzu 'phrul chen po'am/ mi dang mi rdzu 'phrul chen po'am/ mi ma yin pa rdzu 'phrul chen
55b4(phal chen): pa'am/ tshangs pa dang / tshangs pa rdzu 'phrul chen po'am/ sems can gang sus mthong kyang rung ste/ snang ba des yongs su snang bar byas pa de
55b5(phal chen): dag dra bi la sprin gyi drung du 'ongs so// de nas de ltar dra bi la sprin gyi byin brlabs shing / thal mo sbyar te gnas la lus dang sems sim par gyur pa/
55b6(phal chen): dga' ba chen po skyes pa/ srid zhu chen po la gnas pa/ nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan bcom pa/ g.yo rgyu dang bral ba/ dbang po rnam par dang bar gyur pa de dag
55b7(phal chen): la/ dra bi la chos kyi rnam grangs yi ge'i 'khor lo rgyud kyi rgyan ces bya ba de snyed rgya chen po yang dag par bsten de/ khong du chud pa dang / rtog pa dang / shes
55b8(phal chen): pa dang / rigs par byas so// de thos nas kyang de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// de de'i
56a1(phal chen): pha lenaphyir chos kyi bstan la 'dug nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni dbyangs dang ldan
56a2(phal chen): pa'i gzung thob pa ste/ de'i mthus kho bo stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i lha rnams kyis lha'i skad kyang shes so// de bzhin du klu dang /
56a3(phal chen): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dang / tshangs pa rnas
56a4(phal chen): kyi tshangs pa'i skad kyang shes so// lha rnams kyi skad sna tshogs kyang shes so// de bzhin du klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam
56a5(phal chen): mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dang / tshangs pa rnams kyi tshangs pa'i skad sna tshogs kyang shes so//
56a6(phal chen): rnams kyi lha'i skad cig pa yang shes so// de bzhin sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang /
56a7(phal chen): mi dang mi ma yin pa dang / tshangs pa rnams kyi tshangs pa'i skad yang shes so// lha rnams kyi lha'i skad tha dad pa yang shes so// de bzhin du klung dang /
56a8(phal chen): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dang / tshangs pa rnams kyi tshangs pa
56a9(phal chen): mi 'am ci dang /
56b1(phal chen): skad tha dad pa yang shes so// byol song gi skye gnas su skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi brda dang / skad dang ming thams cad kyang shes so// sems can/
56b2(phal chen): dmyal ba'i sems can rnams kyi skad dang / ming rnams kyang shes so// gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa rnams kyi skad dang / ming rnams kyang shes so// 'phags
56b3(phal chen): pa ma yin pa'i skad dang / ming rnams kyang shes so// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshig dang brda' dang / nges pa'i ngag sems can gyi bsam pa
56b4(phal chen): bzhin du 'byung ba yang shes so// sems kyi skad cig re re la yang dus gsum du gshegs pa rnams kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag dang / gsung rgya mtsho sems
56b5(phal chen): can thams cad kyi ming dang gtam gyi sgra dang / tshig tu ldan pa yang rtogs shing khong du chud do// ji ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di
56b6(phal chen): la sems can rnams kyi brda' dang / nges pa'i tshigs dang / skad dang / mi'i rgya mtsho la 'jug cing shes par bya ba bzhin du/ shar gyi 'jig rten gyi
56b7(phal chen): khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ kun tu mtha' yas pa/ mu med pa/ sa mtsha
56b8(phal chen): med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dang / de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar
57a1(phal chen): phalen/ gyi phyogs 'tshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs 'tshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs 'tshams
57a2(phal chen): dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa nas brjod du med pa'i bar gyi sems can rnams kyi brdal dang
57a3(phal chen): nges pa'i tshig dang / skad dang / ming rgya mtsho thams cad la'ang 'jug cing shes te/ 'di ltar lha rnams kyi lha rnams kyi skad kyang shes so// tshangs pa rnam
57a4(phal chen): kyi tshungs pa'i skad kyi bar du'ang shes so// rigs kyi bu kho zas ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs snang ba dbyangs dang ldan pa'i shes par zad na//
57a5(phal chen): kho bos byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba sna tshogs kyi brda'i rnam pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / 'gro ba sna tshogs kyi skad dang / ming rgya mtsho la zhugs
57a6(phal chen): pa de dag dang / 'gro ba sna tshogs kyi ming shin tu bstan pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / 'gro ba sna tshogs kyi brjod pa rab tu bkod pa dang / rnam par
57a7(phal chen): spyod pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / tshig thams cad kyi 'tshams sbyar ba rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / tshig thams cad kyi 'tshams sbyar ba
57a8(phal chen): rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / tshigs lhur thang ste bstan pa rgya mchil zhugs pa de dag dang / dus gsum gyi dmigs pa thams cad dmigs pa/
57b1(phal chen): cig tu rnam par spyod pa rgya mtsho gang chen mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / tshig gi rtsegs de rten la rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / tshig gnyis nas/
57b2(phal chen): rtsegs te/ bstan pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / tshig rab tu phye bstan pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / tshig thams cad rab tu 'phye bas
57b3(phal chen): 'dul ba'i tshul bstan pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi skad rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang / dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam
57b4(phal chen): par dag pa'i rgyan thams cad la zhugs pa de dag dang / yi ge'i 'khor mthar phyin par bya bas rab tu dbye ba las byung ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon
57b5(phal chen): tan brjod pa nas re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs su rgyud 'di nyid na/ yul nags tshal na gnas pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na tshong dpon gyi bu gtang brjod ces
57b6(phal chen): bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gnas su song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la brtson par bya ba dang / ji ltar 'byung bar bya ba dang /
57b7(phal chen): ji ltar sems nges par bzhag pa la dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi dra bi la sprin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos kyi rim
57b8(phal chen): gro byas nas/ dad pa'i mtshan nyid rtsa ba brtsugs pa la rab tu rtags pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen las 'ong ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa yang dag par lta zhing /
58a1(phal chen): b.lenagadong mchi mas gang bar ngus te/ dra bi la sprin la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs nas bskor ba byas/ yang dang yang ltas te/
58a2(phal chen): phyag 'tshal zhing dra bi la sprin gyi drung nas song ngo // // 'phags pa 'dus pa chen po sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las//
58a3(phal chen): / bam po dgu bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs snang ba dbyangs dang ldan pa'i
58a4(phal chen): rgyan de nyid la rjes su bsam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i skad kyi tshul rgya mtsho de nyid la 'jug par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshul phra mos 'jug
58a5(phal chen): pa de nyid rjes su 'jug par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dag pa de nyid kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i
58a6(phal chen): bag chags rngu zhing sgrub pa mngon par sgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' yongs su smin par bya ba'i sgo de nyid rnam par sbyang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'
58a7(phal chen): rnams kyi sems can brngu ba'i ye shes de nyid shin tu byang bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i stobs rnam par dag par bya ba 'di nyid rten par bya ba dang /
58a8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs de nyid nye bar bstan par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mos pa'i rgyud de nyid yongs su sbyang ba dang /
58b1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i sems de nyid gdon mi za bar dge bar bsam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yid chen po de nyid thar phyin par byed cing / tshong dpon
58b2(phal chen): gyi bu nor bzangs yid dam la bstan zhing / smon lam gyi sems kyi yongs su skyo ba med pa'i rgyud kyi rgyan dang ldan pa'i phyir mi ldog pas rnam par gnon pa'i
58b3(phal chen): brtson 'grus can/ yid kyi rtul ba las mi ldog pa/ dad pa yi phyogs pa'i stobs dang ldan pa/ rdo rje mthu'o ches mi byed pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ dge
58b4(phal chen): nga'i bshes gnyen thams cad kyi gdam ngag mthun par len pa/ shes rab kha ma bab pa'i yul dang ldan pa/ sgo kun nas rnam par dag pa la mngon du
58b5(phal chen): gyur pa/ ye shes rnam par dag pa'i spyod yul thogs pa med pa/ kun tu lta ba'i ye shes kyi tshul snang ba dang ldan pa/ sa'i gzugs kun nas snang ba rab tu
58b6(phal chen): thob po// chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi'i bye brag la mngon sum du gyur pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ bzhi kun la rten pa'i rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin rnam par
58b7(phal chen): dmigs pa gnas med pa dang / bdag gi med pa dang / gnyis su med pa'i spyod yul la rab tu brtson pa/ 'du shes thams cad las 'da' bar byed pa'i
58b8(phal chen): ye shes kyi sgo rnam par dag pa/ chos kyi phyogs dang gzhi tha dad pa'i phyogs la so sor rtog pa med pa/ 'jig rten gyi gzhi dang phyogs kyi bye brag las phyir/
59a1(phal chen): bayinami ldog pa/ chos kyi gzhi dang phyogs kyi bye brag las phyir mi ldog pa/ sangs rgyas kyi phyogs dang bzhi tha dad pa mthong ba dang //
59a2(phal chen): rnam par dmigs par lags pa la gzhol ba/ dus kyi phyogs dang / bzhi'i bye brag khong du chud pa'i ye shes can/ chos kyi 'khor lo yid du 'ong ba
59a3(phal chen): yang dag par sgrub pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ ye shes kun nas snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par snang bas sems shin tu gsal bar byas/ yid kyi lus yul
59a4(phal chen): kun dang ldan pa'i sa la zhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes snang bas rgyud shin tu snang bar byas pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dad pa dang rba rlabs
59a5(phal chen): kyi shugs kyi rab tu rlob pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la mos pa'i shugs dang bral ba med pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi byin gyi rlab pa/
59a6(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad rang gi sems kyi rgyud khong du chud pa'i snang bar gyur pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dra ba thams cad rang gi lus kyi rgyas par dgang
59a7(phal chen): ba'i smon lam dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad rang gi lus su yang dag par brngu ba dang / mngon par bsgrub pa la brtson pa de mthar gyi song song ba ste/
59a8(phal chen): lo bcu gnyis nas yul nags tshal na gnas par phyin nas/ des tshong dpon gtang brjod de btsal te/ mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang lus thams cad
59b1(phal chen): kyi phab ste phyag 'tshal nas 'dun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag de ring dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang mjal
59b2(phal chen): bar gyur pa ni bdag gi thob par bgyi ba legs par thob po// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni mthong bar dka'o// 'byung bar dka
59b3(phal chen): ba'o// 'jal bar dga' ba'o// bgrod par dka' ba'o// snyen bkur bgyi bar dka' ba'o// mnyes par bgyi bar dka' ba'o// 'grogs par
59b4(phal chen): dka' ba'o// rims gro bgyi bar dka' ba'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni rjes su 'brang bar dka' ba lags na/ de lta bu'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen
59b5(phal chen): dang 'grog pa de ring bdag gi thob par gyur to// 'phags pa bdag gis 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad la snyen bkur ba dang / sangs rgyas thams
59b6(phal chen): cad la rims gro bya ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhal lta ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par dmigs par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams
59b7(phal chen): cad mnyam pa nyid thob par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam khong du chud par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam yongs su
59b8(phal chen): rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang dag par bsgrub pa'i ye shes sdang bar bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad rang gi lus su
60a1(phal chen): pa lenamangon par bsgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang dag par bsgrub pa/ rang gi spyod pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi
60a2(phal chen): ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mngon sum du rtog par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stobs dang / mi sbrengs pa
60a3(phal chen): yongs su dag par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa mnyan pas/ mi ngom par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos bstan
60a4(phal chen): pas/ mnyan cing blang bar bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos ston pa/ yang dag par gzung bar bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams
60a5(phal chen): cad kyi chos ston pa rnam par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa yongs su gzung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang //
60a6(phal chen): tshul cig tu gyur par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang bskal par mnyam par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi
60a7(phal chen): spyod pa yongs su dag par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems
60a8(phal chen): dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam mngon par sgrub pa rnam par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs
60b1(phal chen): kyis/ mdzod rab tu thob par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi chos kyi gter dang / mdzod mi zad pa'i ye shes snang bas thob/
60b2(phal chen): par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi gter dang / mdzod khong du chud par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems
60b3(phal chen): dpa' thams cad kyi mdzod tshad med pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying rje chen po'i gter dang / mdzod sems
60b4(phal chen): can 'dul ba'i mthar phyin par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i gter dang / mdzod rnam par dmigs par bgyi
60b5(phal chen): ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gter mdzod rang gi sems kyi dbang du bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par dag
60b6(phal chen): pa'i gter dang / mdzod rnam pa thams cad du brgyan par bgyi ba'i slad du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ 'phag
60b7(phal chen): pa de lta bu'i sems kyi bdag 'dir skyes so// bsam pa de lta bu dang / yid la smon pa de lta bu dang / mngon par dga' ba de lta bu dang / sems pa
60b8(phal chen): de lta bu dang / gdon mi tshal bar bsgrub par bsam pa de lta bu dang / spyod yul mngon sum bgyi ba de lta bu dang / tshul khong du chud par bgyi ba la
61a1(phal chen): ba len/ mos pa de lta bu dang / rnam par dag pa la gzhol ba de lta bu dang / rnam par spyad pa'i bsam pa de lta bu dang / rab tu gzhol
61a2(phal chen): ba'i sems de lta bu dang / mngon du gyur pa'i dbang po de lta bus bdag 'dir mchis te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdam dag
61a3(phal chen): dang / rjes su ston pa mdzad cing / tshul ni nye bar ston par mdzad/ rtog par bgyi ba ni snang bar mdzad/ lam ni bstan par mdzad/ mu stegs
61a4(phal chen): la ni 'jog par mdzad do// chos kyi sgo ni rnam par 'byed par mdzad/ the tshom ni yongs su bcad par mdzad/ nem nur ni sel bar mdzad/ yid gnyis
61a5(phal chen): kyi zug rngu ni 'byin par mdzad/ dog pa'i dri ma ni sbyong bar mdzad/ sems kyi thib po ni snang bar mdzad/ sems kyi dri ma ni yongs su sel bar mdzad/
61a6(phal chen): sems kyi rgyu ni rab tu dang bar mdzad/ sems kyi g.yo rgyu ni yongs su sel bar mdzad/ sems kyi gdung ba ni rab tu sim par mdzad//
61a7(phal chen): 'khor ba las ni sems rnam par zlog par mdzad do// sems can dmyal ba las ni ldog par mdzad/ gnas dang ni bral bar mdzad/ mngon
61a8(phal chen): par zhan pa las ni gyen du spyod par mdzad/ chags pa thams cad las ni yongs su 'grel pa mdzad/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ni bsgrub par
61b1(phal chen): mdzad/ chos kyi grong khyer du 'jug par bgyi ba'i slad du ni/ mngon du gyur par mdzad/ snying rje chen po la ni rab tu bsgrub par mdzad/
61b2(phal chen): byams pa chen po la ni rab tu bzhog par mdzad/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la ni rab tu sbyong bar mdzad/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sgom pa la ni
61b3(phal chen): 'dzud par mdzad/ rtogs par gyur pa'i sgo ni gnas par mdzad/ rang bzhin nges par rtog pa ni bzhog par mdzad/ stobs dang ldan pas ni
61b4(phal chen): khyab par mdzad/ 'gro ba thams cad mnyam pa nyid du ni sems rnam par dbye bar mdzad do// zhes thos na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems
61b5(phal chen): dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la brtson par bgyi/ ji ltar sbyar bar bgyi/ ji ltar brtson par bgyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa'i dkyil
61b6(phal chen): 'khor rnam par dag par 'gyur ba bdag la stan du gsol/ de nas tshong dpon btang brjod kyi de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sangs rgyas
61b7(phal chen): kyi zhing thams cad yang dag 'du ba zhes bya ba gzungs kyi sgo grongs mtha' yas pa sngon du 'gro ba la sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs dang / de bzhin gshegs
61b8(phal chen): pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yang dag bsam shing / ye shes snang ba nye bar bsgrub pas sgom par bzhugaso// tshong dpon
62a1(phal chen): ba len/ btang brjod de ltar snyoms par bzhugs ma thag tu/ gzungs kyi lus yongs su dag pa rnam pa 'di lta bu gnas par gyur te/
62a2(phal chen): lus yongs su dag pa de'i mthus phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su
62a3(phal chen): dag pa dang bcas kyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas/ 'od rnam par dag pa dang bcas/ sngon gyi spyod pa la zhugs pa dang bcas/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa
62a4(phal chen): dang bcas/ smon lam gyi tshogs dang bcas/ spyod pa dang 'byung ba'i rgyan rnam par dag pa dang bcas/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang yongs su ston pa
62a5(phal chen): dang bcas/ chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu ston pa dang bcas/ sems can yongs su smon par mdzad pa dang bcas/ chos kyi mu'i mthar thugs pa dang bcas pa kun
62a6(phal chen): kyang lus kyi khong du chud cing 'dus par snang / de dag kyang phan tshun ma 'dres pa dang / phan tshun mchod pa dang / phan tshun shin tu rnam par phye ba dang / phan tshun/
62a7(phal chen): shin tu rnam par phye bar gnas pa dang / tshul sna tshogasu bzhugs pa dang / yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyan
62a8(phal chen): sna tshogs can mnga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sna tshogs kyi brgyan pa dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa
62b1(phal chen): sna tshogs yongs su ston par snang ngo // theg pa sna tshogs rnam par dgod par mdzad pa dang / smon lam gyi sna tshogs yongs su brjod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi
62b2(phal chen): khams la lan dga' ldan gyi pho brang du skyes shing sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad par rnam par snang ngo // la la na ni dga' ldan gyi pho brang nas 'pho
62b3(phal chen): ba dang / la la na ni yum gyi sku bzhugs shing rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs su yongs su ston pa dang / la la na ni skye ba dang / la la na ni byis pa'i rtsed mo ste/
62b4(phal chen): ba mdzad pa dang / la la na ni btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na zhugs pa dang / la la na ni mngon par 'byung ba dang / la la na ni snying po byang chub snying por gshegs
62b5(phal chen): te/ rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan chen pos bdud kyi sde 'jam par mdzad pa dang / la la na ni lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri zas yongs su bskor cing /
62b6(phal chen): tshangs pa'i dbang pos chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba btang ba dang / la la na ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mdzad pa dang / la la na ni sems
62b7(phal chen): thams cad kyi gnas na bzhugs pa dang / la la na ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar snang ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams la la na ni de bzhin gshegs pa mya
62b8(phal chen): ngan las 'das pa rnams kyi ring srel rnam par dgod par snang ngo // sangs rgyas kyi zhing la la na ni lha dang mi rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la rgyan
63a1(phal chen): pa len/ gyis grub par byed par snang ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis sems can gyi rigs rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems
