63a2(phal chen): can gyi 'jig rten rnam pa tha dad pa/ sems can gyi lam rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi dge ba'i
63a3(phal chen): rtsa ba'i rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi lam gyi rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi bsam pa'i rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can
63a4(phal chen): gyi mos pa'i rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi dbang po'i rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang / dus kyi rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi las
63a5(phal chen): mi mthun pa'i rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi 'jig rten rnam par dbye ba rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi tshul lam dang / spyod pa rnam pa thar
63a6(phal chen): pa la rnam par spyod pa dang / sems can rgya mtsho bsam pa dang / sbyor ba'i rnam pa tha dad pa dang / dbang po mi mthun pa sna tshogs rnam par dag pa dang /
63a7(phal chen): nyon mongs pa dang / bag chags sna tshogs dag la nyal bar gyur pa'i sems can 'jam klas pa rnams la sangs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs
63a8(phal chen): yongs su bstan pa dang / yul sna tshogs kyi nges pa'i tshig dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag dang / gsung rnam pa sde tshogs su bsgrub pa dang / mdze sde
63b1(phal chen): sna tshogs kyi tshul rab tu brjod pa dang / gzung gi sgo rnam pa tha dad pa'i rgyud dang / tha dad pa dang / yang dag par mkhyen pa'i tshul gyi gzhung sna tshogs dang /
63b2(phal chen): 'phags pa'i bden pa'i ming rgya mtsho'i rgyud rnam pa sna tshogs dang / sangs kyi khyu mchog dang / seng ge'i nga ro rab tu bsgrags pa dang / sems can gyi
63b3(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs bstan pa'i cho 'phrul yongs su bstan pa dang / dran pa sgo sna tshogs can shin tu brtan pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byang chub
63b4(phal chen): sems dpa' lung bstan pa'i seng ge'i nga ro sna tshogs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'khor lo'i mthu phyung ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyi 'khor gyi dkyil
63b5(phal chen): 'khor mtha' dang dbus med par mtha' yas par rnam pa tha dad pa phan tshun mchod pa dang / rnam par dag pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs yang
63b6(phal chen): pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor shin tu phra bar 'dus pa dang / dpag tshad gcig gi tshad tsam dang / dpag tshad bcu'i tshad tsam dang / dpag tshad
63b7(phal chen): brgya'i tshad tsam nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa
63b8(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi tshad tsam du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung dbyangs kyi yan lag dang / sgra skad
64a1(phal chen): lenathams cad kyi rjes su 'gro bas chos ji snyed du bstan pa de dag thams cad kyang / tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi thos so// blangs
64a2(phal chen): so// yang dag par bzung ngo // bsams so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par 'phrul pa de dag kyang mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi
64a3(phal chen): khyu mchog gi thu phyung ba de dag kyang mthong ngo // de nas tshong dpon btang brjod dran bzhin du shes bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas tshong dpon gyi bu
64a4(phal chen): nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par thar pa thogs pa med pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yongs su blangs
64a5(phal chen): shing 'dzin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bo sa bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par thar pa thogs pa med pa'i rgyan de la rtog cing dpyod pa'i tshe/ shar phyogs
64a6(phal chen): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dzam bu chu klung gi mdog dang ldan pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skar ma'i dbang phyug
64a7(phal chen): rgyal po zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba'i snying po la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang /
64a8(phal chen): thabs cig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam du snang ngo // lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams stobs thams cad kyi shugs dang ldan pa na/ de bzhin gshegs
64b1(phal chen): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spobs pa kun tu rnam par yang ba zhes bya ba na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa'i rgyal po la
64b2(phal chen): sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / thabs cig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam du snang ngo // nub phyogs kyi
64b3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams spos thams cad kyi 'od dang ldan pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab mar me'i
64b4(phal chen): rgyal po zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu zhugs pa yang mig lam du snang ngo // byang phyogs
64b5(phal chen): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ngur mig gi rgyal mtshan na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje rab tu 'dul
64b6(phal chen): ba zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i gom pas/ rnam par gnon pa la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang /
64b7(phal chen): thabs cig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam du snang ngo // byang shar gyi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che thams cad rab tu bar ba na/
64b8(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi dmigs pa'i spyan rnam par dmigs pa zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems
65a1(phal chen): pa len/ dpa' dmigs pa med par shin tu sprul pa la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang /
65a2(phal chen): thabs cig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam du snang ngo // shar mo'i phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od zer rab tu snang ba na/ de bzhin
65a3(phal chen): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos kyi mar me zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi tha dad
65a4(phal chen): pa'i dpal gyi rgyal po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / thabs cig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam du sna //
65a5(phal chen): lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams nyi ma'i 'od zer ltar snang ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'o sangs
65a6(phal chen): rgyas sgo kun nas ye shes snang ba'i dbyangs shes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' me tog me tog gi 'od kun nas 'phro bar gtsug phud rab tu 'phyang ba la
65a7(phal chen): sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam du snang ngo // nub byang gi phyog
65a8(phal chen): 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi brgyan yid du 'ong ba dge ba'i snying po na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
65b1(phal chen): pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan rgya mtsho tshad med pa'i 'od ces bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' lus kyi 'od zer thogs pa med pa'i gzi brjid rgyal po blo gros
65b2(phal chen): la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / thabs cig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam du snang ngo // 'og gi phyogs
65b3(phal chen): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i seng ge'i snang ba 'char ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer chos
65b4(phal chen): kyi dbyings su snang ba zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings 'od 'phro zhing / rnam par snang bar 'byung ba'i blo gros la sogs pa/ byang chub
65b5(phal chen): sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / thabs cig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam du snang ngo // steng gi phyogs 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan
65b6(phal chen): gyi 'od rnam par snang ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ yon tan grags pa thogs pa med pa'i rnam
65b7(phal chen): par thar pa'i 'od kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' stobs dang / brtson 'grus thogs pa med pa'i blo gros la sogs pa/ byang chub
65b8(phal chen): sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / thabs cig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam du snang ngo // rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
66a1(phal chen): pa lenal sogs pa/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i
66a2(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba nyid mthong yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag 'dir mi byon/ kho bo yang der 'gro ba med de/ nam 'dod pa na de na bde ba yod pa'i
66a3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang ba mtha' yas bzhugs pa 'ang mthong ngo // tsan dan yod pa'i 'jig rten khams na/ de bzhin
66a4(phal chen): gshegs pa 'od snang rdo rje bzhugs pa yang mthong ngo // spos kyi dri yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang rin chen bzhugs
66a5(phal chen): pa yang mthong ngo // pad+mo yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang rin chen pad mo bzhugs pa yang mthong ngo // gser yod
66a6(phal chen): pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang zhi ba bzhugs pa yang mthong ngo // mngon par dga' ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/
66a7(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa mi skul ba bzhugs pa yang mthong ngo // shin tu rten pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge bzhugs pa
66a8(phal chen): yang mthong ngo // me long gi dkyil 'khor ltar snang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros zla ba bzhugs pa yang mthong ngo //
66b1(phal chen): rin chen dpal gyi ngang pas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang ba bzhugs pa yang mthong ngo // rigs kyi
66b2(phal chen): bu de ltar kho bos ni phyogs gang dang gang / 'jig rten gyi khams gang dang gang gi de bzhin gshegs pa gang dang gang mthong bar 'dod pa'i de bzhi
66b3(phal chen): gshegs pa de dang de dag mthong ngo // dus gang dang gang du dmigs pa gang dang gang la sngon gyi spyod pa gang dang gang gi de bzhin gshegs pa
66b4(phal chen): mthong bar 'dod pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa gang dang gang gi don dang / sems can 'dul ba gang dang gang gi don du/ de bzhin gshegs pa
66b5(phal chen): gang dang gang mthong bar 'dod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dang de dag kyang mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang 'dir gshegs pa ma
66b6(phal chen): yin/ bdag kyang der phyin pa ma yin no// rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ga las kyang byon pa med pa shes la/ rang gi
66b7(phal chen): lus kyang gar yang 'gro ba med pa shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rnam par dmigs pa yang rmi lam lta bur shes pa/ rang gi sem
66b8(phal chen): rnam par dmigs pa yang rmi lam dang 'dra bar rgyu bar shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa yang rnam par dmigs pa yang gzugs brnyan lta
67a1(phal chen): pha len/ bur shes la/ rang gi sems rnam par dmigs pa yang chu'i sdong gsal ba lta bur shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
67a2(phal chen): pa rnams rnam par dmigs yang sgyu mas byas pa'i gzugs lta bur shes la/ rang gi sems rnam par dmigs pa yang sgyu ma lta bur shes pa dang / de
67a3(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung yang sgra brnyan ri'i brag cha lta bur brjod par shes la/ rang gi sems rnam par dmigs pa yang sgra brnyan lta bu shes nas/ byang
67a4(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs las byung ngo zhes bya bar rjes su rtogs shing khong du chud do//
67a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa thams cad kyang rang gi sems kyi byin gyis brlabs so// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs
67a6(phal chen): so// sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / 'dul ba yang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so// byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam mngon
67a7(phal chen): par bsgrub pa yang rang gi sems kyi byin gyis brlabs so// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer du phyin par bya ba yang rang gi sems kyi byin gyis brlabs
67a8(phal chen): so// rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas rnam par rtse ba rang gi sems kyi byin gyis brlabs so// sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
67b1(phal chen): 'tshang rgya ba yang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi brlabs// chos kyi dbyings kun nas 'dus par khyu mchog gi mthus 'byung zhing / rnam par 'phrul pa yang rang gi/
67b2(phal chen): sems kyi byin gyis rlabs so// bskal pa thams cad shin tu phra bar sdu ba'i ye shes kyang rang gi sems kyi byin gyis brlabs so// zhes bya bar khong du chud
67b3(phal chen): cing rjes su rtogs so// rigs kyi bu de la kho bo 'di snyam du sems te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi ni rang gi sems nyid nye bar bstan par bya'o// chos kyi
67b4(phal chen): sprin gyi ni rang gi sems nyid yongasu rlan par bya'o// sgribs pa'i chos rnams las ni rang gi sems nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o// brtson 'grus kyis ni rang
67b5(phal chen): gi sems nyid brtan par bya'o// bzod pa yi ni rang gi sems nyid mnyam par bya'o// ye shes khong du chud par bya ba la ni rang gi sems nyid bzhol bar bya'o//
67b6(phal chen): shes rab kyi ni rang gi sems nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o// dbang rnams la ni rang gi sems nyid mngon par sgrub par bya'o// sangs rgyas dang mnyam pa nyid
67b7(phal chen): la ni rang gi sems nyid rgyas par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus ni rang gi sems nyid snang bar bya'o snyam mo// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni de bzhin/
67b8(phal chen): gshegs pa'i rnam par thar pa thogs pa med pa'i rgyan shes te/ blangs shing yongs su 'dzin par zad na kho bos byang chub sems dpa' chags pa med pa'i
68a1(phal chen): pa len/ sems dang ldan pa/ chags pa med par spyod pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pa/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad mngon sum du
68a2(phal chen): bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa mya ngan las 'da' ba med pa'i mtha' la gnas pa'i rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sgo'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa/ dus
68a3(phal chen): gsum mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa/ bzhi kun byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi tshul shes pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du lus rnam par bkram
68a4(phal chen): pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul tha mi dad pa la rnam par spyod pa/ phyogs thams cad du mngon par phyogs pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pa/ phyogs med pa'i ye shes
68a5(phal chen): kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par lta ba/ de dag gi lus la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'jig cing 'du bar snang yang / de dag la bdag dang 'jig rten
68a6(phal chen): gyi khams su gnyis kyi 'du shes med pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjed pa nus re skan/ songs rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi
68a7(phal chen): 'dzam bu gling gi mgo 'gebs pas rgyas 'gengs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ des na dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'dug gi de'i gan du song la/ ji
68a8(phal chen): ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa las slab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs
68b1(phal chen): kyi tshong dpon gtang brjod kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ tshong dpon btang brjod la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/
68b2(phal chen): yang dang yang ltas te/ tshong dpon btang brjod kyi yon tan grangs med pa la snyan par brjod de/ rtag pa dang / mos par bya ba dang / mi gtang bar bya bar
68b3(phal chen): sems shing du ste/ smre sngags ston nas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen sdug par sems shing dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / dge
68b4(phal chen): ba'i bshes gnyen bkur bar mos pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi bskor ba dang mi 'gal bar byed pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dge ba'i bshe
68b5(phal chen): gnyen la rag lus par rjes su lta ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rjes su bsam pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la g.yo rgyu med par spyod pa dang /
68b6(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi sems kyi dbang du 'gro bar bya ba dang ldan pas/ dge ba'i gnyen rnams gnod thams cad yongasu spong bar byed pas ma tsam
68b7(phal chen): du sems/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su skyed pas pa tsam du sems shing tshong dpon btang brjod kyi drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu
68b8(phal chen): nor bzang tshong dpon btang brjod kyi bstan pa de la rjes su sems shing tshong dpon btang brjod kyi dam ngag la nan tan bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
69a1(phal chen): pa len/ rnam par thar pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes snang ba bsam gyi khyab pa
69a2(phal chen): rjes su dran par bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings la 'jug cing bsam pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa khong du chud par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
69a3(phal chen): yongs su 'du bar bya ba'i tshul bsam gyi mi khyab pa la 'jug par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i bsam gyi mi khyab pa rjes su
69a4(phal chen): lta bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'du bar bya ba'i tshul bsam gyi mi khyab pa la mos par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyi rgyan
69a5(phal chen): rjes su sbyang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dang rnam par thar pa'i rnam par dgod pa dang / khyu mchog gi madz+ra byung ba bsapa kyi mi khyab
69a6(phal chen): yongs su rtag pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad tha dad pa la sgrib pa med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i las la
69a7(phal chen): bsam pa shin tu rten pa de la nan tan du bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i las dang / smon lam gyi rgyun bsam gyi mi khyab pa de'i rjes su spyod cing mthar
69a8(phal chen): gyi 'dzam bu'i gling gi mgo 'gobs pas rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba gang na ba der phyin nas/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan tshol tshol po las 'chags
69b1(phal chen): pa'i gnas shig gi chags pa'i mthar 'dug ste/ ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs nas dbugs phyi ngan du rgyu ba med cing / mi g.yo la byed pa med
69b2(phal chen): cing lus drang por srang ste dran pa mngon du byas nas ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas rnam par 'phrul zhing g.yas g.yon dang /
69b3(phal chen): steng logs su lus mtha' yas la tshad med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ spyi gtsug ltar mi mthong ba/ kha dog du ma'i lus dang ldan pa/ sems kyi
69b4(phal chen): skad cig re re la kha dog rnam pa tha dad pa tshad med pa yongs su ston pa de ltar mnyam par gzhag cing zab la zhi ste/ g.yo med cing dmigs pa med pa la//
69b5(phal chen): dga' bas lus mthong bar gyur pa/ de'i spu'i sgo thams cad nas byang chub sems dpa'i rgyam par thar pas/ rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyi mi khyab
69b6(phal chen): pa rab tu 'gyed pa byed cing 'dug pa mthong ngo // rnam par thar pas rnam par 'phrul pa de'i mthus sems kyi skad cig re re la sems can thams cad
69b7(phal chen): yongs su smin par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa sbyang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yong su dag par bya ba dang /
69b8(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po rnam par zlog par bya ba dang / ngan song gi lam thams cad yongs su bcad pa dang / sems can
70a1(phal chen): 9/ thams cad kyi bde ba'i lam gyi sgo dbye ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba'i rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /
70a2(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi mi shes pa'i sgrib pa rnam par gtor ba dang / sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod pa'i phyir rnam par
70a3(phal chen): 'phrul pa'i bye brag rnams sna tshogs mtha' yas pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs shing de rkang pa'i 'thil gnyis nas/ tshong dpon gyi
70a4(phal chen): tshogs bkur sti dang rim gro sna tshogs byed pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rtogs pa'i tshong dpon dang / 'dra ba'i gzugs dang ldan pa/ lhag
70a5(phal chen): pa'i yul la spyod pa/ rgyan sna tshogs kyi lus shin tu grub pa/ thor tshugs dang gtsug gi rin po che dang / cod pan sna tshogs thogs pa/ sangs rgyas
70a6(phal chen): kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byis pa bye ba phyes pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa 'byung ba mthong ngo // bram ze dang / khyim bdag mang po bza' btung
70a7(phal chen): rnam pa mang po dang / ro'i yan lag sna tshog su sbyar ba thams cad dang / rgyan thams cad dang / gos thams cad dang / me tog thams cad dang / phreng ba
70a8(phal chen): thams cad dang / spos thams cad dang / byug pa thams cad dang / 'dod pa'i yo byad thams cad dang / rin po che thams cad dang / gnas thams cad dang/
70b1(phal chen): snod rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad dang / yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad kyi sems can dbul po rnams yongs su bsdud cing / 'gro ba sdug bsngal ba
70b2(phal chen): rnams dbugs dbyung ba dang / sems can gyi sems tshims par bya ba dang / sems can gyi bsam pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang / sems can rnams byang
70b3(phal chen): chub tu yongs su smin par byed cing phyogs bcu bkang ste/ 'dod pa mthong ngo // pus mo'i lha nga gnyis nas rgyal rigs mkhas pa'i gzugs dang / bram
70b4(phal chen): ze mkhas pa'i gzugs dang / 'jig rten na mkhas pa'i gzugs dang / bzo sna tshogs la mkhas pa'i gzugs dang / mi'i 'gro ba'i rgyud na mkhas pa'i
70b5(phal chen): gzugs dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las kyi tshul dang / rgyus la gsal zhing mkhas pa'i gzugs dang / 'jig rten gyi slob
70b6(phal chen): dpon du bya bar mkhas pa'i gzugs cha byed rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa/ dbyibs dang / rgyan rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa/ yid du 'ong ba'i tshig mang po brjod pas
70b7(phal chen): yid mi bde ba'i sems can rab tu dga' bar byed cing / chos kyi nor gyi dbul ba'i sems can rnams la phan gdags pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i sems can
70b8(phal chen): rnams bde bar bya ba dang / log par ltung ba'i sems can rnams mngon par gnon pa dang / theg pa'i gru la nyam nyes su gyur pa'i sems can rnams dbugs
71a1(phal chen): ba len/ dbyung ba dang / 'jigs pa'i sems can rnams yongs su skyabs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sgra kun tu grags par bya ba dang /
71a2(phal chen): sdig pa las zlog pa'i gru yongs su bsgrags pa dang / dge ba'i chos yang dag par blang ba la sems can gzud pa dang / don spyad pa la sems can dgod pa
71a3(phal chen): dga' ba'i shugs yongs su bskyed pa dang / bstan par smra ba'i bsdu ba'i dngos po yongs su brjod pa dang / 'jig rten la don mthun par bsgrub pa ston pa
71a4(phal chen): byed cing / phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste 'dong bar mthong ngo // lte ba'i 'khor nas drang srong mang po 'gro ba thams cad kyi dbyibs su 'khod pa/ lpags
71a5(phal chen): pa dang shun pa'i gos gyon pa ril ba thogs pa gzugs dang / cha byad dang dbyibs sna tshogs can/ spyod lam rab tu zhi ba dag byung nas/ steng gi bar snang
71a6(phal chen): las sangs rgyas kyi yon tan brjod par byed cing chos kyi sgra yongs su bsgrags pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra brjod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun
71a7(phal chen): yongs su bstan pa dang / tshangs pa'i spyod pa la yongs su brjod pa dang / dbang po dben pa la sems can dgod pa dang / rang bzhin med pa'i don rab tu
71a8(phal chen): brtag pa dang / ye shes kyi don du 'jig rten rab tu dgod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi gtsug lag gi rnam pa yongs su brjod pa dang / thams cad mkhyen ba/
71b1(phal chen): ye shes kyi 'byung ba'i lam gyi yul rab tu bstan pa dang / mthar gyi bya ba'i las la sems can rab tu dgod par byed cing / phyogs bcu bkang ste 'dong pa/
71b2(phal chen): mthong ngo // rtsib logs gnyis nas klu'i bu mo 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi grangs dang mnyam pa/ lus kyi dbyibs bsam gyis mi khyab pa du ma dang ldan
71b3(phal chen): pa byung ste/ klu'i rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa yongs su bstan pa dang ldan/ spos kyi sprin gyi rgyan bsam gyi mi khyab pa nam mkha'i dbyings la byin
71b4(phal chen): gyi brlabs pa dang / me tog gi sprin gyi rgyan bsam gyi mi khyab pas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad brgyan pa dang / 'phreng ba'i sprin bsam gyi khyab pa'i rgyan
71b5(phal chen): gyi nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad rnam par grub pa/ rin po che'i gdugs kyi sprin bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i rgyan gyi dbyings thams cad yongs su khyab par bya ba
71b6(phal chen): dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan gyi sprin bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i brgyan dang / rin po che'i lha'i ba dan gyi sprin bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / rin po che'i byang
71b7(phal chen): phrul sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / char bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / nor bu rin po che dam pa'i sprin gyi char 'bab pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / rin po
71b8(phal chen): che'i se mo do sna tshogs dang / me tog gi sprin gyi char bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / rin po che'i khri la skyil mo krung du 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
72a1(phal chen): b.len/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sprin gyi char bsam gyi mi khyab pa 'bebs pa'i brgyan dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i sna tshogs dang ldan/
72a2(phal chen): ba'i lha'i bu mang po chos kyi glu snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs kyi sprin gyi char 'bebs pa bsam gyi mi khyad pa dang / rin po che'i pad ma ze ba mtho ba mu tig gi dra ba
72a3(phal chen): brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi 'bru'i sprin gyi char rnam par mthor ba bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / rin po che'i cod pan gyi sprin nor
72a4(phal chen): rin po che thams cad kyi rab tu brgyan pa/ 'od zer gyi sprin mtha' yas pa'i char 'bebs pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / lha'i lus kyi sprin gyi me tog
72a5(phal chen): dang / 'phreng ba dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / lha'i bu mo mang po lus kyi sprin thal mo sbyar te/
72a6(phal chen): gser gyi me tog snyim pas mthor ba de bzhin gshegs pa la yon tan dang / legs pa thams cad du stong pa'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra 'byin cing char 'bab pa
72a7(phal chen): bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i rgyan nam mkha'i dbyings la byin gyi rlob cing spos kyi phung po'i sprin rin po che'i thams cad kyi kha dog tu 'dug pa dang / gdug spos
72a8(phal chen): na 'un dang / sprin shin tu rgya che bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mngon par khebs par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams/
72b1(phal chen): 'jam klas pa thams cad rab tu brgyan pa dang / sems can thams cad rab tu dga' bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pas skad cig cig
72b2(phal chen): tu chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi mthong ngo // thong ka'i dpal gyi be'u nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po sang
72b3(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdal shin tu phra ba snyed byang ste/ lha ma gyi rgyas rnam par 'phral pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa rab tu ston cing / chu 'dzin chen po
72b4(phal chen): yongs su skyem pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brgya stong du rab tu bskyed pa dang / ri'i rgyal po chen po thams cad 'thab par bya ba dang / lha'i gnas tham
72b5(phal chen): cad yongs su skyod pa dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad zil gyi gnon pa dang / bdud kyi sde thams cad rab tu gdul ba dang / nga rgyal dang / rlom
72b6(phal chen): sems dang / dregs pa thams cad rab tu bzhom pa dang / gnod par sems dpa'i sems zlog cing dga' bar bya ba dang / 'tho tsham pa'i sems phyir
72b7(phal chen): zlog par bya ba dang / sems can rnams kyi mi dge ba'i chos rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i ri rnam par gtong ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i thabs
72b8(phal chen): mo shin tu zhi bar bya ba dang / lha ma yin gyi sgyus rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rnam par rtse ba sna tshogs sems can rnams skyob par byed pa dang / sdig pa las
73a1(phal chen): ba len/ gyen du spyod pa dang / 'khor bas 'jig par bya ba dang / srid pa'i rgyud thams cad nas gyen du skyon de/ gnas med pa la rab
73a2(phal chen): tu gnas par bya ba dang / byang chub kyi sems la sems can rnams rab tu dgod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
73a3(phal chen): pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu dgod par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa la rab tu
73a4(phal chen): gzud pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshul snang ba yongs su bskyed pa dang / chos kyi tshul rnam par dgod pa sna tshogs
73a5(phal chen): kyi sems kyi skad cig re re zhing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa med pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi mthong ngo // rgyab kyi gzhung nas nyan thos
73a6(phal chen): dang / rang sangs rgyas mang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi 'dul ba'i sems can
73a7(phal chen): ba dag tu mngon par zhen pa rnams la bdag med pa dang / sems can med pa yongs su brjod par byed cing / rtag par mngon par zhen pa rnams la 'ang
73a8(phal chen): byed thams cad mi rtag par yongs su bstan pa dang / 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can rnams la mi bdug pa dang / zhe sdang gi spyod pa can rnams la byams
73b1(phal chen): ba dang / gti mug gi spyod pa can rnams la rkyen las byung ba'i rten cing 'bral bar 'byung ba brjod pa dang / cha mnyam pa'i spyod pa can rnams la ye shes
73b2(phal chen): kyi yul dang ldan pa'i chos kyi tshul mngon par bstan pa dang / yul la mngon par dga' ba rnams la gnas med pa rab tu brjod pa dang / zhi ba la gnas
73b3(phal chen): su sems can rnams la smon lam gyi khyad kyi spro ba skyed pa dang / phyogs kyi rgyud dang / sgo thams cad du chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i rgyud dang / sgo thams cad
73b4(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi don du brjod par byed cing chos kyi dbyings rgyas 'gengs pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi mthong ngo // phrag pa'i lhun gnyis las
73b5(phal chen): gnod sbyin dang / srin po dbang po dbyibs sna tshogs dang ldan zhing lus mi sdug pa kha dog dang / chu zheng sna tshogs can spyod lam gyi rnam pa sna tshogs dang
73b6(phal chen): ldan pa/ bzhon pa sna tshogs la zhon pa/ 'khor sna tshogs kyi yongs su bskor ba/ sems can gyi khams yongs su sbyang ba la brtson pa/ 'od sna tshogs
73b7(phal chen): kyi snang bar bya ba la brtson pa/ dbyangs sna tshogs rab tu sgrogs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/ thabs mngon
73b8(phal chen): par sgrub pa sna tshogs ma 'dres pas phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kun gyi nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs shing dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad yongs su
74a1(phal chen): ba lenabasrungs pa dang / 'phags pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su bsrung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
74a2(phal chen): yongs su gzungs pa dang / lag na rdo rje'i las kyi yang dag par zhugs pa thams cad yongs su bsrung ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa
74a3(phal chen): dang rim gro bya ba dang / sems can log par ltung ba rnams kyi ngan song gi lam gyi rgyud thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi
74a4(phal chen): nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar bya ba'i don la brtson pa/ sems can gyi don bya bas 'jig rten yongs su sbyang ba la brtson
74a5(phal chen): pa rnams dang / ye shes kyi 'khor lo yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / phas kyi rgol ba'i 'khor
74a6(phal chen): tshar gcod pa byed cing chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa byed pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi mthong ngo // mdun gyi lto nas mi
74a7(phal chen): 'am ci'i dbang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mi 'am ci'i dbang po'i bu mo 'khor brgya stong grangs med pa can dang / dri
74a8(phal chen): za'i dbang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed/ dri za'i dbang po'i bu mo'i 'khor brgya stong grangs med pa can dag byung nas/
74b1(phal chen): lha'i rol mo brgya stong grangs med pa'i sgra snyan pa dang / glu dbyangs kyi chos kyi rang bzhin dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ston pa brjod par byed cing / byang chub
74b2(phal chen): kyi sems yongs su sngags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su brjod pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i sgo thams cad ma/
74b3(phal chen): par brjod pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo sgo thams cad du 'jug pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo thams cad la mngon par spro bar bya ba dang / yongasu
74b4(phal chen): mya ngan las 'da' ba'i sgo thams cad yongs su brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas bstan pa'i sgo yongs su gzung ba dang / sems can gyi sgo thams cad rab
74b5(phal chen): tu dga' bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sgo thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba dang / chos kyi sgo thams cad mngon par bstan par bya ba dang /
74b6(phal chen): sgrib pa'i sgo thams cad rnam par zlog par bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sgo thams cad yongs su bskyed par byed cing / chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'ge/
74b7(phal chen): pa tshongs dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi mthong ngo // kha'i sgo nas 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che bdun dang ldan zhing stobs kyi yan lag bzhi'i tshog
74b8(phal chen): kyi 'khor dang ldan pa byung nas/ sbyin pa chen po'i 'od zer rgyan rab tu 'gyed cing / rin po che'i 'byung gnas thams cad yongs su gtang ba dang /
75a1(phal chen): nga lenanor bu rin po che'i tshogs thams cad sbyin pa dang / dbul rnams nor dang ldan par bya ba dang / srog gcod pa las 'jig
75a2(phal chen): rten rnam par zlog par dang byam pa'i sems la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / ma byin pa len pa dang / rab tu bral ba dang / rgyan gyi shin du
75a3(phal chen): brgyan pa'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yongs su gtung ba dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa las zlog pa dang / tshangs pa'i spyod pa la rab
75a4(phal chen): tu dgod pa dang / rdzun du smra ba las rnam par bzlog pa dang / slu ba med pa la bzhol bar rab tu dgod pa dang / phra ma'i tshig las rnam par zlog pa
75a5(phal chen): dang / gzhan 'dum par brtson pa'i tshig rab tu brjod pa dang / zhe gcod pa'i tshigs las 'jig rten rnam par bzlog pa dang / 'jam zhing yid du
75a6(phal chen): 'ong ba'i tshigs rab tu brjod pa dang / gnod pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i byung rgyal du smra ba las sems can rnam par bzlog pa dang / don zab mo'i tshig
75a7(phal chen): rab tu dbye ba gdon mi za ba la yang dag par dgod pa dang / ngag gi nyes pa thams cad las 'jig rten rnam par bzlog pa dang / snying rje dang ldan
75a8(phal chen): ba'i tshig rab tu brjod par bya ba dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi snying gi dri ma yongs su sel cing 'dod pa chung ba dang / chog shes pa la brtson par
75b1(phal chen): sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / chags sems las 'jig rten rnam par bzlog pa dang / gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud dga' bar byed pa la rab tu
75b2(phal chen): dgod pa dang / lta ba'i dra ba thams cad las 'jig rten rab tu dgod pa dang / yid gnyis kyi re ba thams cad rnam par gtor ba dang / the tshom
75b3(phal chen): gyi sgo thams cad rab tu bzhom pa dang / nem nur dang som nyi'i rab rib yongs su gsal ba dang / chos rnam par phye ba'i 'jig rten du rab tu dbye ba dang /
75b4(phal chen): rkyen las byung ba rab tu brjod pa dang / rang bzhin gyi bden pa'i tshul la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par zlog pa dang /
75b5(phal chen): sgrib pa med pa'i tshul la gzud pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi don gyi tshul sna tshogs brjod par byed cing / phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs
75b6(phal chen): par tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi mthong ngo // mig gnyis nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor brgya stong sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
75b7(phal chen): byung ste/ sems can dmyal ba chen po thams cad yongs su snang bar byed cing / 'jig rten gyi mun pa chen po sel ba dang / sems can rnams kyi gti mug
75b8(phal chen): gi rab rib sel ba dang / grangs pa'i sems can dmyal ba na khong pa'i sems can rnams kyi grangs pa'i sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / sa'i rang bzhin
76a1(phal chen): / kyinang rnams su 'od 'dag dkar ba can pa 'gyed pa dang / gser gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'ad 'i na r+ya'i 'dug sa/
76a2(phal chen): rab tu 'gyed pa dang / bai DUr+ya'i rang bzhin gyi gzhi rnams su 'od gser gyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / dngul gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od gse
76a3(phal chen): gyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / gser gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od shes gyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / gser gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing
76a4(phal chen): rnams su 'od mu tig dmar po'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / a ma gar pa'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnam su 'od gser gyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang /
76a5(phal chen): gser gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od a ma gar ba'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / in dra ni la'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnamasu 'od rin po che'i rgyal
76a6(phal chen): po nyi ma'i snying po kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / rin po che'i rgyal po nyi ma'i snying po'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od rin po che'i rgyal po in dra ni la yi/
76a7(phal chen): dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / mu tig dmar po'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od rin po che'i rgyal po'i zla ba'i 'od gser gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi
76a8(phal chen): snying po'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / rin po che'i rgyal po zla ba'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su
76b1(phal chen): 'od mu tig dmar po'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / rin po che cig gi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnam su 'od rin po che sna tshogs kyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang /
76b2(phal chen): rin po che sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od rin po che cig kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
76b3(phal chen): thams can du sems can gyi don tshad med pa la brtson zhing chos dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi mthong ngo // smin mtshams kyi
76b4(phal chen): mdzod pu nas zla ba mang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/ lha'i dbang po thams cad zil gyi gnon cing / 'jig rten tham
76b5(phal chen): cad kyi 'dod pa'i dga' ba rnam par zlog pa dang / sangs rgyas lta bar dga' ba la rjes su sngags par byed cing / sems can tshad med pa 'dul ba la ba
76b6(phal chen): par phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi mthong ngo // dpral ba nas tshangs pa chen po spyod lam rab tu zhi ba
76b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/ tshongs pa'i dbyangs su brjed de/ sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba btab pa dang /
76b8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rab tu dga' bar bya ba byed cing / sems can gyi don tshad med pa la brtson par phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par
77a1(phal chen): / 'gengs 'dong dpan myi thun babangs yang / mag nas byung chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi dang grangs med pa'i
77a2(phal chen): shin tu phra ba phreng byung nas/ 'dog dang dbyibs sna tshogs kyi brgyan pa'i lus yongs su byen cing / dpe byed pa'angs pas rnam pa 'bris pa'i skas ra
77a3(phal chen): bstan pa dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor smin mtha' dang dbus med pa rab tu brtse ba dang / baspu'i bu ga thams cad nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sngon gyi
77a4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa nas gzung ste gtong ba dang / len pa dang / dajam pa yongs su gtang ba'i rnam pa'i sprin mang po rab tu brtse ba dang / pa ra
77a5(phal chen): tu phyin pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyar ba rgya mtsho yongs su ldan pa dang / sbyin baspyod pa 'jig rten du yongs su brjod pa dang / ser sna'i drim
77a6(phal chen): rnam par zlog pa dang / chags pa thams cad spangs pa la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / 'jig rten rin po che sna tshogs kyi thams cad rgyan gyi
77a7(phal chen): brtan par byin gyi rung ba dang / smin pa'i 'a rol tu sbyin pa la sems can rab tu dbang ba dang / mtshan thams cad kyi yin tan yang dga'ar brjed bang /
77a8(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi mtshan 'byung ba'i rgyu ston pa byed pa mthong ngo // yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
77b1(phal chen): byung nas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol
77b2(phal chen): tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho yongs su bstan pa dang / sems can thams cad lam gyi rgyud dang / yul las phyir phyogs par bya ste/
77b3(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa yul la mngon du phyogs par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi 'dod pa la rnam par smad pa dang / 'jig rten gyi phyin ci log gi ling
77b4(phal chen): rtog rnam par gsal ba dang / log pa'i rnam par rtog pa rab tu zhi bar byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims yang dag par dgod pa dang /
77b5(phal chen): snying rje chen po'i tshul khrims rab tu brjod cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi lam nan tan bya ba'i
77b6(phal chen): tshul khrims la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud rmi lam lta bur sems can rnams la rab tu brjod cing / rmi lam gyi tshul dang
77b7(phal chen): mnyam par yongs su bzhol bar bya ba'i phyir yul yongs su 'dzin pa dang / nyon mongs pa la dbang sgyur ba'i sems can rnam rab tu dgod par byed pa/
77b8(phal chen): mthong ngo // yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/ 'jig rten rnams la mdog gser gyi
78a1(phal chen): lakha dog lta bu mngon par ston cing / khro ba med pa dang / 'khrug pa med pa dang / shar gnyer ba med pa dang / zhe sdang ba med
78a2(phal chen): pa dang / chung son pa med pa dang / khong khro ba med pa'i sems la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad
78a3(phal chen): yongs su bcad pa'i phyir/ ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba'i sprin rab tu
78a4(phal chen): 'gyed cing / bzod pa'i stobs la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / chos la dbang sgyur ba la sems can rab tu snang bar byed pa mthong ngo // yang byang chub
78a5(phal chen): sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi stobs mtha' yas pa shin tu
78a6(phal chen): ston cing thams cad pa nyid du rtsams pa las phyir mi ldog pa'i stobs kyis thos pa rgya mtsho yongs su btsal bas mi skyo bar bya ba yongs su brjod pa dang /
78a7(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod cing rim gro bye ba la sems can rab tu gzung ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad rnam par zlog pa'i
78a8(phal chen): brtson 'grus chen po la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin lus thams
78b1(phal chen): cad las rab tu 'gyed cing / byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su bstan pa dang / sems can rnams kyi
78b2(phal chen): le lo'i rnam par gtor ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / las la dbang sgyur ba la 'jig rten rab tu
78b3(phal chen): gzung ba dang / rgyun mi chad pa brtson par byed pa mthong ngo // yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
78b4(phal chen): byung nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rjes su dran pa'i lam la sems can thams cad rab tu dgod cing / sgrib pa dang / rab tu gcod pa dang /
78b5(phal chen): rab rib thams cad rnam par gsal ba dang / slob pa dang / bag med pa thams cad las sems can rnam par zlog pa dang / bag yod pa'i chos la
78b6(phal chen): rab tu dgod pa dang / kheng pa dang / 'gying ba dang / nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan rab tu gzhom pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bsam gtan gyi yan lag rgya mtsho
78b7(phal chen): brjod pa dang / 'jig rten rnams la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sngags pa dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas bsam gtan gyi pa
78b8(phal chen): rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi tshul mang po'i sprin rab tu 'gyed pa dang / sems la dbang sgyur ba la sems can rab tu dgod pa byed cing / skad
79a1(phal chen): la/ cig re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gyengs pa mthong ngo // yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i
79a2(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su tshol ba dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin rab bgyi ba
79a3(phal chen): dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho'i skad thams cad kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra sgrogs pa dang / yang dag par lta ba'i klog pa
79a4(phal chen): rab tu 'gyed pa dang / chos kyi rang bzhin gyi sgra dbyangs rab tu sgrogs pa dang / sems can gyi bdag tu lta ba'i ri'i lhun po rab tu bzhig pa dang / lta ba
79a5(phal chen): thams cad kyi zug rngu 'byung ba dang / the tsom dang yid gnyis dang / nem nur gyi rab rib rnam par gsal ba dang / ye shes kyi dbang yang dag par sngags
79a6(phal chen): bar byed cing / sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gangs par mthong ngo // yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs
79a7(phal chen): med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thabs mkhas pa'i tshul gyi dkyil 'khor rab tu brjod cing / ba spu'i bu ga thams
79a8(phal chen): cad nas thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin rab tu 'gyed pa dang / 'jig rten rnams la thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa rab tu brjod
79b1(phal chen): pa dang / theg pa chen po'i spyod pa rab tu brjod pa dang / theg pa chen po'i 'byung ba mngon par bstan pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor
79b2(phal chen): yang dag par sngags pa dang / 'khor dang mya ngan las 'das pa tha mi dad pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub
79b3(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / 'jig rten rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i dbang
79b4(phal chen): gi dkyil 'khor rab tu bstan pa byed cing / sems bskyed pa re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'grengs pa mthong ngo // yang byang chub sems dpa'
79b5(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan rgya mtsho'i
79b6(phal chen): sprin gyi 'brug sgra sgrog cing ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam gyi pha rol tu byin pa yongs su dag pa dang /
79b7(phal chen): ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin rab tu bgye ba dang / smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su yang dag par sngags pa dang / byang chub sems
79b8(phal chen): dpa'i dbang thams cad la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / smon lam chen po'i shing rta'i 'khor phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par 'dril bar chos thams
80a1(phal chen): pa lacad kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par zlog pa/ mi shes pa'i ri rnam par 'thor ba 'jig rten du/
80a2(phal chen): rab tu brjod pa byed cing / smon lam sna tshogs kyi rnam par 'phrul pas sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'geng pa mthong ngo // yang
80a3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i stobs rab tu snang bar bya ba dang / byang chub
80a4(phal chen): sems dpa'i stobs yongs su bsgrub pa'i sgra rab tu 'byung ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub cing 'byin pa'i sngon
80a5(phal chen): gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin rab tu bgyi ba dang / bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyi mi thub pa'i stobs yongs su bstan pa dang / 'khor yug dang rdo rje
80a6(phal chen): ri thams cad lus kyi steng du rdib kyang mi nyams pa'i stobs rab tu brjod pa dang / bskal pas tshigs pa thams cad kyi me'i rgya mtsho'i nang na gnas kyang lus
80a7(phal chen): la gnod pa med pa'i stobs yongs su bstan pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad lag pa'i thil gyi nam mkha'i dbyingasu gton pa'i
80a8(phal chen): stobs yongs su ston pa byed cing / sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings su 'gengs pas rgyun mi gcod pa mthong ngo // yang byang chub sems
80b1(phal chen): dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/ sems can rnams la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor ston cing / ba spu'i bu ga
80b2(phal chen): thams cad nas ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin rab tu 'gye ba dang / 'jig rten rnams la sangs rgyas
80b3(phal chen): thams cad kyi yon tan dang / ye shes mthong bar shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis rab tu brjed pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan mngon par shes
80b4(phal chen): pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi sa mngon par bstan pa dang / smon lam thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi
80b5(phal chen): sa yongs su brjod pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su sdu ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes
80b6(phal chen): kyis shin tu yang par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad bdag med pa'i rang bzhin la gzud pa mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par bstan
80b7(phal chen): pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho rnam par lta ba mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi sa rab tu brjod pa dang / sems can thams
80b8(phal chen): cad kyi dbang po rnam par dbye ba'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi sa rab tu dbye ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / mos
81a1(phal chen): pa la/ pa rnam par lta ba'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi sa yang dag par brjod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi
81a2(phal chen): las rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi sa rnam par grol ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i
81a3(phal chen): ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi sa rnam par grol ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i ye shes mngon par shes
81a4(phal chen): pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi sa yongs su bstan byed cing / sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi
81a5(phal chen): mthong ngo // spyi bo'i gtsug tor gyi gseb nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mtshan dam pa dang / dpe
81a6(phal chen): byad bzang po pa rnam par dag pas brgyan pa dang / 'dzam bu'i chu klung gi gser gyi ri bo shin tu 'bar ba ltar snang ba/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor phyogs bcur sngar
81a7(phal chen): zhing tshad med par 'bar ba dang / chos dbyings tshul gyi rgyas par 'gengs pa'i dbyangs mnga' ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' dang dbus med
81a8(phal chen): pa yongs su ston pa/ 'gro ba thams cad la tha mi dad pa'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'beb pa ste/ 'di ltar snying po byang chub mchog tu phyin pa'i byang chub
81b1(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams la chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi'i bye brag mngon sum du shes pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems
81b2(phal chen): dpa' dbang bkur ba thob pa rnams la bzhi kun tu rten pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos chen po rgyas
81b3(phal chen): tshab tu dbang bkur ba rnams la sgo kun nas 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gzhon nur gyur pa rnam
81b4(phal chen): la kun nas brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i phyir mi ldog pa rnams la snying rje chen po'i tshogs
81b5(phal chen): shin tu bstan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dag pa rnams la chos thams cad
81b6(phal chen): kyi rang bzhin gyi bye brag shes pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba dang ldan pa rnams
81b7(phal chen): 'gro ba yongs su sdud par kun nas rgyan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' cher skyes pa rnams la dus
81b8(phal chen): gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon sum du dmigs pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub
82a1(phal chen): 2sems dpa' rnal 'byor la spyod pa rnams la chos thams cad rang bzhin dang bzhi kun tu sprugs pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi cha
82a2(phal chen): mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa rnams la snying rje chen po'i tshul dang / thabs kyi snying po'i sprin kun tu 'byung ba zhes bya/
82a3(phal chen): ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa rnams la dga' bar bya ba'i mdzod shin tu gsags
82a4(phal chen): pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' yang ba la mos pa rnams la rnam par thar pa mi zad pa dang /
82a5(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i smon lam gyi dga' bar byed pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / gzugs la spyod pa'i sems
82a6(phal chen): can rnams la bzhi kun tu mi zad pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / tshangs pa'i rigs kyi lha rnams la tshul rgya mtsho
82a7(phal chen): tshad med pa'i 'brug smra'i dbyangs shes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbang ba dang / dbang sgyur gyi lha rnams la stobs 'byung ba'i chos kyi yo
82a8(phal chen): byad mi zad pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / 'dud kyi rigs kyi lha rnams la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs rgyal
82b1(phal chen): mtshan sna tshogs can yang dag par sgrub pa'i dbyangs shes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / 'phrul dga'i lha rnams la ye shes rin po
82b2(phal chen): che sna tshogs la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / dga' ldan gyi lha rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam rin pa
82b3(phal chen): sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / tshe ma'i lha rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su dran pa'i
82b4(phal chen): mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas dga' ba'i shugs
82b5(phal chen): 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / gnod sbyin dbang po'i gnas su chos kyi dbyings kyi na mkha' la de bzhin gshegs
82b6(phal chen): pa'i rnam par 'phrul pas rgyas 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / dri za'i dbang po'i gnas su de bzhin gshegs
82b7(phal chen): pa thams cad kyi yang dag par grol ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbang ba dang / lha ma yin gyi gnas su ye shes kyi tshul rdo rje'i dkyil
82b8(phal chen): 'khor ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'byung ba'i thab
83a1(phal chen): phalakyi sprin ces bya ba'i chos kyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / mi'am ci'i dbang po'i gnas su chos kyi sprin yang dag par 'gro
83a2(phal chen): ba thams cad dang dbyangs shes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin char mngon par dbab pa dang / klu'i dbang po'i gnas su byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa
83a3(phal chen): sgrog cing srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud las skyo ba skyed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po gnas su dga'
83a4(phal chen): ba rgya mtsho rnam par 'phel bar byed pa'i shugs shes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / mi'i gnas su 'gro ba thams cad las khyad par
83a5(phal chen): du 'phags pa'i ye shes rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / sems can dmyal ba'i 'jig rten du 'khor ba'i
83a6(phal chen): sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi ba'i dbyangs dang / 'phags pa'i lam gyi tshig gi rgyud kyi rgyan zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang //
83a7(phal chen): byol song gi skye gnas su las kyi lam kha na ma tho ba med pa la nan tan du bya ba'i dbyangs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su dran pa'i sprin gyi dkyil 'a'on
83a8(phal chen): gyi lhun ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrags
83b1(phal chen): pas/ sems can thams cad kyi stong pa'i sems 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / sems can log par ltung ba rnams
83b2(phal chen): la sdug bsngal thams cad zhi ba rab tu thob pas dbugs dbyangs kyi nga ro zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa mdzad cing chos kyi dbyings
83b3(phal chen): rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi mthong ngo // ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'kho
83b4(phal chen): kha dog dang gzugs kyi glong dang / rgyan grangs med pa can dgongs pa sna tshogs grangs med pa la rta gon du gnas la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i
83b5(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/ phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ste/ 'di ltar ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil
83b6(phal chen): 'khor la la las sbyin pa'i spyod pa skyon med pas bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtor bar rnam par 'phrul par mthong ngo // ba spu'i sgo'i dra ba dang dkyil
83b7(phal chen): 'khor la la las dus gsum byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang / brtul shugs dang / yid dam dang / tshul gyi dkyil 'khor du
83b8(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ngo // ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor la la las ni byang chub sems dpa'i thams cad bzod pa'i spyod pa'i rnam
84a1(phal chen): pha la/ pa'i dus gsum du byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams rkang lag dang yan lag gi dam pa bcad kyang nyam su bzod pa byed pa'i/
84a2(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa dang / khu tshur dang dbyug pas bsnun te/ mtshon gyi lus la btab kyang nyam su gzod par byed pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / lus thams
84a3(phal chen): cad bshags pa snying dang mig phyung yang nyam su gzod par byed pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' dus gsum du 'byung ba rnam par
84a4(phal chen): brtag pa'i lus dang ldan pa gzhan dag gi thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos nyid yongs su brtsal ba'i chad du lus dang sems la gnod pa thams cad dang / yan
84a5(phal chen): yan lag dang nying lag bcad la thams cad snying rje chen pos dbang du byas pa'i phyir nyams su gzod par byas pa dang / bag la zha bar byas pa dang / btang
84a6(phal chen): snyoms su bzhag par byang chub sems dpa'i bzod spyod pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi gzugs de lta bu dag kyang mthong ngo // ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer
84a7(phal chen): gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor la la las ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi brtson 'grus kyi spyod pa rnam pa tha dad pa rnam par bye ba'i gzugs dang / byang
84a8(phal chen): chub sems dpa' 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i brtson 'grus kyi rnam par 'phrul pa 'jig rten yongs su skyong ba dang / rgya mtsho yongasu
84b1(phal chen): bskam pa dang / sems can yongs su skyo bar bya ba dang / mu stegs thams cad yongs su char bcad pa dang / bdud thams cad sra bkong ba dang / chos kyi phyog
84b2(phal chen): thams cad snang bar bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen por rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ngo // baM spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor la la las
84b3(phal chen): ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa rnam par rgyu ba'i rnam grangs ji snyed pa dang / lus nye bar len pa ji snyed pa dang / rigs kyi bu skye ba yongasu
84b4(phal chen): gzung ba ji snyed pa dang / gzugs kyi lus yongs su grub pa ji snyed pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rjes su brtan pa yongs su gzung ba ji snyed pa
84b5(phal chen): dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi man ngag la nan tan du bya ba'i gnas ji snyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan gyi yan lag yongs su bsgrub
84b6(phal chen): pa dang mthun pa gtsug lag khang dang / gnas dang gzhal med khang dang / yul dang ri'i sul ji snyed pa dang / bsam gtan gyi yan lag de dag sus yongs
84b7(phal chen): su bsgrub pa'i drang srong gi lus ji snyed pa dang / rgyal po'i thabs ji snyed pa dang / 'byung ba la mngon par mos pa ji snyed pa dang / rtul zhugs dang /
84b8(phal chen): yid dam dang tshul dang spyod lam ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gi mthong ngo // ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor
85a1(phal chen): la la las ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa la rnam par spyod cing / chos thams cad yongasasu tshol ba dang / ldan pa'i
85a2(phal chen): lus yongs su gzung ba 'thong ste/ lus gang gi chos kyi tshig cig gi don du yang bdog pa thams cad yongs su btang ste/ sems can thams cad las
85a3(phal chen): yongasu brtsal ba dang / rim gro dang / bkur sti thams cad kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad las yongasu stsal ba dang / dad pa dang srid zhus lus
85a4(phal chen): rab tu btud de/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las yongs su btsal ba dang / chos kyi tshig gcig la ji lta ba bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
85a5(phal chen): ldan pa'i chos kyi tshig thams cad la yang de bzhin du/ 'gro ba thams cad du gzugs brnyan byung ba'i lus thams cad kyi btsal ba de dag thams cad kyang
85a6(phal chen): chongs dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi ba spu'i sgo gcig gi 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor mthong ngo // ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor
85a7(phal chen): la la las ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i thabs 'gro ba'i rgyud rgya mtsho mam cad 'byam klas pa'i sems
85a8(phal chen): can thams cad yongs su sdu ba'i sbyor ba mthong ngo // sems can re re la yang lus dang spyod pa'i tshul gyi sgo sngon gyi lus nye bar blang ba/ thabs mkhas pa'i
85b1(phal chen): spyod pa la nye bar brtson pa/ sems can thams cad kyi lus dang 'dra bas yongasu bsdud pa yang ba spu'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor gcig las mthong ngo //
85b2(phal chen): ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor la la las ni/ sngon bcom ldan 'das kyi bskal pa thams cad du smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa'i spyod pa dang / sems can
85b3(phal chen): thams cad yongs su smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa'i spyod pa dang / zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par sgrub par mdzad pa ji snyed pa
85b4(phal chen): dang / smon lam thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor ji snyed cig de bzhin gshegs pa de dang de dag gi zhabs drung du 'khor ba'i skyo so so re re'i gnyen
85b5(phal chen): por mngon par sgrub pa mdzad pa de dag thams cad kyang tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi ba spu'i ske'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor cig las mthong ngo // ba
85b6(phal chen): sku'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dkyil 'khor la la las ni stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mtsho mthong ngo // ba spu'i
85b7(phal chen): sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la la las ni ye shes spyod pa rnam par rgyu ba thams cad dang ldan pa mi shes pa'i nyid kyi log pa'i sems can sad par byed
85b8(phal chen): pa'i rang bzhin dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho mthong bar gyur to// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan de ltar mnyam par
86a1(phal chen): pa lenagazhag la sems shing rtog pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor de rjes su dran par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i/
86a2(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin gyi khyu mchog mthu phyung ba de la rjes su rnam par bsam pa dang / sems can gyi tshul rgya mtsho de la rjes su 'jug par bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya
86a3(phal chen): ba'i sgo rgyud kun la mngon du gnas pa'i rgyan de'i rjes su 'brang zhing khong du chud par bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyingasu rgyan par dag pa'i ye shes kyi sgo de la 'jug par
86a4(phal chen): bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs yang dag par nod pa'i ye shes de la rab tu rtag pa dang / byang chub sems pa'i dbang gi stobs de yongasu bskyed pa dang /
86a5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi stobs de brtan par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i stobs de shin tu rgyas par bya ba byed cing dge slong rgya
86a6(phal chen): mtsho'i rgyal mtshan gyi 'dun du nyin zhag cig kyang lon no// nyin zhag gnyis dang bdun yang lon no// zla ba phyed dang / zla ba cig dang / zla ba gnyis dang /
86a7(phal chen): zla ba drug gi bar dang / nyin zhag kyang drug tu dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan gyi 'dun du lon te/ de ltar zla ba drug dang / nyin zhag drug 'das nas
86a8(phal chen): dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan ting nge 'dzin de las langs so// de nas nor bzangs kyi sbas pa/ 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin 'di de ltar za ba la/ de ltar
86b1(phal chen): de ltar rgya che zhing de ltar tshad ma mchis pa'i yul dang ldan pa dang / de ltar bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa dang / de ltar snang ba mtshungs pa ma mchis
86b2(phal chen): pa dang / de ltar grangs ma mchis pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa dang / de ltar mi 'phrogs pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pa/ de ltar ma 'dres pa'i yul dang ldan pa de dang
86b3(phal chen): dang ltar phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba dang / ting nge 'dzin 'di de ltar sems can gyi don tshad ma mchis pa rab tu sgrub par gyur pa ni/ ngo mtshar te/ de ni
86b4(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po tshad ma mchis par rnam par zhi bar bgyi ba sta gon du gnas pa ste/ 'di ltar dbul ba'i sdug bsngal zhi
86b5(phal chen): ba bgyid pa la sta gon du gnas so// sems can dmyal ba'i lam gyi rgyud rgyun bcod pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud las yongasu skyabs pa dang /
86b6(phal chen): mi khom pa'i lam gyi rgyud kyi sgo thams cad gcad pa dang / tho ris kyi lam gyi rgyud du phyin par bgyi ba dang / lha dang mi'i dga' ba dang / bde ba 'byung bar bgyi ba
86b7(phal chen): dang / bsam gtan gyi yul gyi gnas nyam su myong bar bgyi ba dang / 'dus byas la spyod pa'i bde ba yongasu 'phel bar bgyi ba dang / khams gsum pa las
86b8(phal chen): 'byung ba'i sgo yongasu brtan pa la sta gon du gnas pa'o// byang chub kyi sems yang dag par skye ba'i rgyu yongasu brjod pa la sta gon du gnas pa'o// bsod nams dang
87a1(phal chen): pa lenaye shes kyi tshogs yang dag par skye ba'i rnam par 'phel bar bgyi ba dang / snying rje chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho chen po rnam par 'phel bar
87a2(phal chen): bgyi ba dang / sngon lam chen po'i stobs yongs su skye bar bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam snang ba rab tu 'thob par bgyi ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa la
87a3(phal chen): chen po'i theg pa rnam par dgod pa dang / theg pa chen po'i khyad par la 'jug pa mthong bar sgrub pa dang / kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa shes shing snang bar bgyi ba dang /
87a4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sa shes shing snang ba thob par bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam dang / spyod pa dang 'byung ba'i rgyurgyan rnam par dag pa
87a5(phal chen): yongasu bsgrub pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa gnan pa la thogs pa med par bgyi ba la sta gon du gnas pa'o// 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin de'i ming ci zhig bgyi
87a6(phal chen): smras pa/ rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun nas lta ba'i btang snyoms yongs su thob pa zhes bya ba yod de/ ting nge 'dzin de ni 'di'i snang ba ste/ sgo kun
87a7(phal chen): nas rnam par dag pa'i rgyan ces bya'o// rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun nas lta ba'i btang snyoms rab tu thob pa'i snang ba las skyes pa'i ting nge 'dzin/
87a8(phal chen): sgo kun nas rnam par dag pa'i rgyan ces bya ba 'di shin du sgom na/ sgo kun nas rnam par dag pa'i rgyan la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin rgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu tshangs
87b1(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su sbyong ba la thogs pa med do//
87b2(phal chen): ba yongasu 'grub par 'gyur ro// smras pa/ 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin 'di'i yul der sems dpas smras pa/ rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin 'di la snyoms par zhugs pa/
87b3(phal chen): la ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dmigs pa la thogs pa med do// 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par gnon pa la thogs pa med do// 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su
87b4(phal chen): brgyan pa la thogs pa med do// 'jig rten gyi khams yongasu dag par bya ba la thogs pa med do// sangs rgyas lta zhing rnam par dmigs par bya ba la thogs pa med do//
87b5(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba rtag pa la thogs pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su shes par bya ba la thogs pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi stong
87b6(phal chen): la 'jug cing khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya mtshor 'jug pa la thogs pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi yon tan sprin gyi char yo
87b7(phal chen): su gzungs pa la thogs pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la ma 'dres pa shes shing khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do// sangs rgyas
87b8(phal chen): kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho la 'jug cing khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do// phyogs bcur 'jug cing rjes su bgrang bar bya ba la thogs pa
87b9(phal chen): med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan pa rje su rtag par bya ba la thogs pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi phyogs rje su brtag par bya ba la thogs pa med do// snying
88a1(phal chen): lenarje chen po'i phyogs rnam par mi spang bar bya ba la thogs pa med do// byams pas phyogs rgyas par dgang ba la thogs pa med do//
88a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas lta ba'i phyogs la 'jug pas mi ngoms par bya ba la thogs pa med do// sengs can rgya mtsho thams cad du 'jug cing khong du chud par bya ba la thogs
88a3(phal chen): ba med do// sems can gyi dbang po rgya mtsho thams cad shes shing khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do// sems can gyi dbang po tha dad pa thams cad shes
88a4(phal chen): par bya ba la thogs pa med do// rigs kyi bu kho bos ni sems shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa 'di shesu zad nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
88a5(phal chen): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi yul blo gros rnam par dag pa/ chos thams cad la rigs pa rjes
88a6(phal chen): su 'brang ba'i ye shes can/ blo shin tu yangs pas tshad med pa'i yul rnam par 'gong ba/ gzungs chen po snang ba dbang sgyur ba/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil
88a7(phal chen): 'khor snang ba thams cad shin tu dag pa/ mngon par shes pas mngon par 'phrul pa dang / khyu mchog gi mthu 'byin pa la shin tu byung ba tha dad pa yang dag par
88a8(phal chen): shes pa mi zad pa'i rgya mtsho la zhugs pa/ ngag snyan pas sa'i snying po dang ldan par brjod pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi bstan du gyur pa rnams kyi spyod pa shes
88b1(phal chen): pa'am/ yon tan brjod pa 'am/ spyod yul snyan pa'am/ yul rab tu brjod pa 'am/ sngon lam chen po'i stobs yang dag par sngags pa dang / 'byung ba'i/
88b2(phal chen): sgo yongasu snang bar bya ba'am/ yang dag par bsgrub pa mngon par brjod pa'am/ lam yongasu snyan pa'am/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyun gyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba
88b3(phal chen): 'am/ sems kyi yul shes par bya ba'am/ ye shes mnyam pa nyid khong du chud par bya ba la nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ phyogs
88b4(phal chen): kyi gnas rgya mtsho rnam par rlom pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na bza' shing ra ba kun nas brgyan pa zhes bya ba zhig grong khyer 'od chen po zhes bya ba'i shar phyogs log na
88b5(phal chen): yod de/ de na shed las skyes pa'i rgyal po 'od bzang shes bya ba'i chung ma dge snyen ma yid bzhin zhes bya ba yod kyis/ de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub
88b6(phal chen): sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dga' rangs te
88b7(phal chen): 'gu zhing nyams bde la/ tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan las snying po yongasu spangs te/ chos kyi nye bar 'tsho ba byas pa//
88b8(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin gyi yul zhugs pa/ snang ba thob pa/ ye shes kyi snang bar gyur pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi snang ba rab tu thob pa/ mod pa rnam par dag pas khong
89a1(phal chen): ladu chud pa/ sems can chos kyi tshul gyi snang ba'i rjes su song ba/ rnam par dag pa'i sgos snang ba dang ldan par gyur pa/ phyogs
89a2(phal chen): su ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu bdal ba/ des dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogasu
89a3(phal chen): bskor ba byas nas/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan la gtud de phyag 'tshal nas/ yang dang yang blta zhing yang dang yang mngon par lta ba dang / phyag bya
89a4(phal chen): ba dang / rab tu bdud pa dang / gus par bya ba dang / rim gror bya ba dang / yid la bya ba dang / bsam pa dang / sgom pa dang / yongs su sgom pa dang /
89a5(phal chen): legs par brjod pa dang / ngo mtshar du bya ba dang / yon tan mngon du bya ba dang / rjes su sngags pa dang / rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / rjes su dran par
89a6(phal chen): bya ba dang / brtan par bya ba dang / mi rten pa dang / yid la bsam pa dang / rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / smon lam gyi rjes su 'jug par bya ba dang /
89a7(phal chen): mthong bar dga' ba dang / dbyangs kyi mtshan ma bzung ba dang / ming yongs su gzung ba'i rjes su song ba'i sems dang ldan par bya ba dang / kha dog dang /
89a8(phal chen): dbyibs rjes su dran par bya ba dang / ye shes kyi yul rjesu bsam pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi yul rjes su 'jug par bya ba dang / smon lam gyi yul la rjes su
89b1(phal chen): 'brang bar bya ba dang / spyod yul gyi yul spyad par bya ba dang / ye shes kyi snang ba yongasu gzung bar byed cing / dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan gyi drung
89b2(phal chen): nas song ngo // 'phags pa 'dus pa chen po sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las//
89b3(phal chen): / bam po dgu bcu gnyis pa'o// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi yon gyi ni
89b4(phal chen): mgu/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi ni yang dag sngags te btang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong ba'i byin gyi ni byin du rlabs/ dge ba'i gshes gnyen gyi
89b5(phal chen): gdam ngag la ni nan tan du bya/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen yid du 'ong ba'i rjes su sems/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'byung gnas
89b6(phal chen): tsam du lta/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ston pa yin par yin pa yang dag par lta/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni thams cad mkhyen pa ma/
89b7(phal chen): pa nyid kyi chos kyi rjes su lta/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni sangs rgyas nam mkha' lta ba la mig tsam du lta zhing / mthar gyi phyogs kyi gnas rgya mtsho rnam par
89b8(phal chen): rlom pa'i bza' shing gi ra ba kun nas rnam par brgyan pa gang na ba der phyin nas/ nges mthong ba bza' shing gi ra ba kun nas rnam par brgyan pa/ rin po
90a1(phal chen): banathams cad kyi rabs kun nas 'askor ba/ rin po che'i shing gi 'phreng ba spel legs pas yongs su brgyan pas/ rin po che
90a2(phal chen): thams cad kyi shing gi 'phreng ba'i me tog srang bu yid du 'ong ba'i sprin rab tu 'phrul pa'i bzhi rgyas rin po che thams cad kyi shing gi yang dag brgyan/ shing thams
90a3(phal chen): cad kyi me tog rgyas pa sna tshogs yongs su gang ba/ spos sna tshogs kyi shing gi 'phreng ba las phyogs kun du spos kyi ngang zhim pa/ rin po che 'phreng ba'i shing
90a4(phal chen): sna tshogs kyi lhun las rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'phreng ba 'phyang ba rab tu 'byung zhing char ltar mngon par 'bab pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyi shing
90a5(phal chen): dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi mdzes shing sba la rgya cher brgyan pa'i gzhi can/ yid bzhin gyi gos kyi shing thams cad las kha dog sna tshogs kyi gos 'byung bas
90a6(phal chen): gam yo khebs shing mdzes par byas pa/ sil snyan gyi zhing thams cad las lha rdzas las kyang 'phags pa'i sil snyan rlung gi spyod cing / sgra 'byin pa'i
90a7(phal chen): dbyangs snyan par 'byung ba/ sa gzhi'i dman med pa gnas pa/ rgyan gyi shing sna tshogs kyi bseb nas/ rgyan sna tshogs rnams tha dad pa/ rgyun du 'byung
90a8(phal chen): zhing phyang bas rab tu brgyan pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa mthong ste/ bza' shing gi ra ba chen po kun nas rnam par brgyan pa/ de'i nang na khang pa bye ba brgya stong phrag
90b1(phal chen): bcu kun kyang nor bu rin po che dam pa sna tshogs kyi ba gam gyi rnam par brgyan pa dang / khang pa brgya stong phrag bcu 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser las brtsegs pa'i
90b2(phal chen): bad dang ldan pa dang / gzhal med khang brgya stong phrag bcu ka gdung rin po che rnam par snang ba las bris pa dang / rdzing bu brgya stong phrag bcu rin po che thams
90b3(phal chen): cad las gzhi blangs te/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi pha gus mu khyud du byas/ rin po che thams cad kyi them sgras btags pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi stegs
90b4(phal chen): bus skor ba/ lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi dri dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba dang / gser gyi bye mas kun tu bkram pa/ gzhi nor bu rin po che chu 'dang kun tu bkram
90b5(phal chen): pas/ phyogs bzhi nas them skas rnam par bres pa/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu sa gang ba dang / ngang dur dang / rma bya dang / khu byug dang / khrung
90b6(phal chen): khrung dang / ka la ping ka dang / ku na la'i sgra snyan pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa rin po che'i tA la'i 'phreng bas kun nas brgyan pa/ gser gyi dril bu'i dra bas
90b7(phal chen): kun nas yogs pa/ rlung gi bskyod pa'i sgra yid du 'ong ba byung ba/ steng nas rin po che'i bla re bres pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing gi ra bas yongasu
90b8(phal chen): bskor ba/ rin po che'i dra bas brgyan pa'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan legs par bsgreng ba dang / lu ma brgya stong phrag bcus dus dang mthun pa'i tsam
91a1(phal chen): dan gyi 'das gyi mtha' 'khor ba/ rin po che'i sna tshogs kyi kha dog du 'dug pa'i bac+doMs yongasu khyab pa/ rin po che
91a2(phal chen): pad+mo'i 'od chen pos snang bar gyur pa'i chu dri ma med pa ldan pa yod de/ bza' shing gi ra ba de'i dbus bu gzhal med khang chen po rgyal mtshan sna tshog
91a3(phal chen): shes bya ba'i sa'i gzhi rin po che rgya mtsho'i snying po las blang ba/ nor bu rin po che'i ka ba bkye ba/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi lhun mngon par 'phas
91a4(phal chen): ba/ nor bu rin po che 'gro ba rnam par snang ba'i spang leb bkye bas brgyan pa/ gzhi nor bu rin po che 'bar ba grangs med pa'i dra bas bres pa/ rin
91a5(phal chen): po che'i rgyal po mi pham pa'i spos kyi dris gam yo kun nas gdugs pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po sgra snyan pa 'byin pa'i dri'i ngad kun du ldang ba/ rin po
91a6(phal chen): che'i rgyal po dri rnam par gsal bar byed pas dbang po rno ba'i bag chag rnam par bsgrub pa dang ldan zhing / gzhal med khang chen po rgyal mtshan sna tshogs
91a7(phal chen): dang / stan grangs med cing tshad med pa gting bar gyur pa 'di lta ste/ pad+mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che phyogs snang bar byed pa'i pad+mo'i snying po can
91a8(phal chen): dang / nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che bgye ba yid du 'ong ba'i pad mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po
91b1(phal chen): mdzod sna tshogs kyi pad+mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che seng ge'i shing rtag gi pad+mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che dri ma med pa'i pad+mo'i snying po can dang / nor
91b2(phal chen): bu rin po ches brgyan pa pad mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che sgo kun nas brgyan pa'i pad mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che 'od kyi brgyan gyi pad+mo
91b3(phal chen): snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho'i gnas rnam par dag pa'i rin po che'i rnam par brgyan pa'i 'od zer kun tu 'byung ba'i pad mo'i snying po can
91b4(phal chen): dang / nor bu rin po che rdo rje'i seng ge'i gnon pa'i pad mo'i snying po can dgra bshams shing gting ba ste/ gzhal med khang chen po rgyal mtshan sna
91b5(phal chen): tshogs de'i ba gam mang po yang rin po bsam gyi mi khyab pa las byas pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi rnam par brgyan pa/ kha dog bsam gyi mi khyab par mdzes
91b6(phal chen): shing gzugs yid du 'ong ba dag go/ bza' shing gi ra ba kun nas rgyan pa steng nas bla re chen po brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas khyab pa ste/ 'di ltar gos kyi
91b7(phal chen): bla re dang / 'khri shing gi bla re dang / me tog gi bla re dang / phreng ba'i bla re dang / spos kyi bla re dang / nor bu rin po che'i bla re dang / gser gyi bla re dang /
91b8(phal chen): rgyan gyi bla re dang / rin po che rdo rje snang ba'i bla re dang / glang po che'i shugs dang ldan pa'i sprul pa'i lha mo'i bla re dang / nor bu rin po che brgya byin mngon par dga'
92a1(phal chen): byaleba'i bla re dang / de dag la sogs pa bla re brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas khebs par byas so// rin po che'i dra ba brgya stong phrag bcus
92a2(phal chen): kun nas yogs pa ste/ 'di ltar rin po che'i dam pa'i dril bu'i dra ba dang / rin po che'i dbug dra ba dang / rin po che'i 'bru'i dra ba dang / mu tig rgya mtsho'i snyi
92a3(phal chen): po'i dra ba dang / nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya sngon po'i dra ba dang / seng ge'i khri shing gi dra ba dang / nor bu rin po che chu shel gyi dra ba dang / spos kyi gzugs kyi
92a4(phal chen): dra ba dang / rin po che'i cod pan dang / rin po che'i 'phreng ba'i dra ba dang / de dag la sogs pa rin po che'i dra ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas yogs pa'o//
92a5(phal chen): snang ba chen po brgya stong phrag bcus kyang kun nis yogs pa ste/ 'di ltar nor bu rin po che skar ma'i 'od zer snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che nyi ma'i snying po'i snang
92a6(phal chen): ba dang / nor bu rin po che zla ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che spos kyi dud 'od 'phro ba'i snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che dpal gyi snying po
92a7(phal chen): snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che pad ma'i snying po'i snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che skar ma'i rgyal mtshan gyi snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che sgron ma chen po'i sdang
92a8(phal chen): ba dang / nor bu rin po che phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba'i snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che spos kyi sprin chen po dang / klog gi 'phreng ba 'byung ba'i snang ba dang /
