92b1(phal chen): de dag la sogs pa nor bu rin po che'i snang ba chen po brgya stong phrag bcus rtag tu snang bar byas pa'o// daza' shing gi ra ba de ni chen po'i sprin brgya stong phrag bcu'i/
92b2(phal chen): char 'bab pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa ste/ dus dang mthun pa'i tsan dan gyi sprin brgya stong phrag bcus 'brug sgra rab tu 'byung ba lha rdzas las 'das pa'i 'phreng ba dang /
92b3(phal chen): lnga ldi'i sprin chen pos kun tu mchad pas rab tu brgyan pa/ lha rdzas las 'das pa'i gos mtshon sna tshogs dang / ldan pa'i sprin brgya stong phrag bcu'i sprin mngon par
92b4(phal chen): 'bab pa/ lha rdzas las 'das pa'i brgyan gyi sprin brgya stong phrag bcus rnam par klub pa/ lha'i bu brgya phrag bcu mthor bar dga' ste/ 'og tu lta zhing rab
92b5(phal chen): tu 'dud pa'i phyag char bzhin du 'bab pa/ lha mo'i sprin brgya stong phrag bcu'i sngon gyi spyod pa bskal pa mnyam pas rang rang gi lus 'bul ba'i char mngon
92b6(phal chen): bar 'bab pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sprin brgya stong phrag bcu'i chos nyan pas skom zhing 'ong ba'i char mngon par 'bab pa ste/ de na dge snyen ma yid bzhin
92b7(phal chen): gser gyi snying po'i khri chen po la 'dug cing / mu tig gi rgya mtsho'i dra bas brgyan pa'i cod pan thogs pa/ lag pa la lha rdzas las 'das pa'i gser gyi
92b8(phal chen): dpung rgyan dang / gdu bu thogs pa/ lag pa nor bu rin po che dpal gyi rang bzhin gyi 'od zer gyi rnam par mdzes par gyur pa/ rna cha rin po che mthon mthing
93a1(phal chen): dri ma med pa rab tu 'phyang ba/ mgo nor bu rin po che'i dra bas brgyan pa'i nor bu rin po che seng ge'i gdong gi rna ba'i gong rgyan thogs
93a2(phal chen): ba/ nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i mgul 'khor thogs pa/ lus rin po che thams cad kyi dra bas g.yog cing 'od rab tu 'bar ba/ srog chags
93a3(phal chen): bye ba khrag khrig lus rab tu btud de/ phyag bya ba zhig 'dug ste/ dge snyan ma yid bzhin de'i drung du/ shar phyogs nas tshangs pa chen po'am/ tshang lha nye bar
93a4(phal chen): nam/ tshang rigs su rtogs pa'am/ dbang byed dam/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi ris su rtogs pa'am/ rab 'phrul dga' ma/ 'phrul dga'i ris su
93a5(phal chen): gtogs pa'am/ rab dga' ldan nam/ dga' ldan gyi rigasu rtogs pa'am/ rab tshe ma'am/ tshe ma'i rigasu rtogs pa'am/ lha'i dbang po'am/ sum cu rtsa
93a6(phal chen): gsum gyi lha'i rig su rtogs pa'am/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ dri za'i dbang po'am/ dri za'am/ grul bum gyi dbang po'am/ grul
93a7(phal chen): bum 'am/ klu'i dbang po'am/ klu'am/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po'am/ lha ma yin nam/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'am/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ mi 'am
93a8(phal chen): ci'i dbang po'am/ mi 'am ci'am/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po 'am/ gshin rje'am/ gshin rje'i bu mo 'am/ yi dgas rdzu 'phrul chen po'am/ yi dgas
93b1(phal chen): sam/ mi'i dbang po'am/ mi yang rung ste/ sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag 'ong ba dang / de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs
93b2(phal chen): dang / byang shar gyi phyogs 'tshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs 'tshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs 'tshams dang / steng
93b3(phal chen): gi phyogs 'tshams dang / tshangs pa chen po'am/ tshangs lha nye phan nam/ tshangs pa'i ris su gtogs pa'am/ dbang byed dang / dbang byed kyi ris su
93b4(phal chen): gtogs pa'am/ mi'i dbang po 'am/ mi'i bar gyi sems can mang po 'ong ba de dag nad sna tshogs shig gi btab bam/ nyon mongs pa sna tshogs kyi
93b5(phal chen): kun 'khor tam/ lta ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs la mngon par zhen tam/ las kyi sgribs pas sgrib pa zhig yod na'ang de dag gis/ dge snyen ma yid bzhin
93b6(phal chen): ma de mthong ma thag tu/ nad thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ sems kyi nyon mongs pa'i dri ma dang yang bral bar 'gyur// lta ba'i gsal shing
93b7(phal chen): yang byin par 'gyur/ sgrib pa'i ri thams cad kyang rnam par zhig par 'gyur/ rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor sgrib pa med pa yang khong du chud par 'gyur/
93b8(phal chen): te/ rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor de yod pas ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rab tu sbyang bar 'gyur/ dbang po'i mig gu thams cad kyang
94a1(phal chen): palarnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshul rgya mtsho la'ang yang dag par bzhol bar 'gyur/ gzungs
94a2(phal chen): kyi sgo rgya mtsho'i thams cad la'ang 'jug par 'gyur/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang tshul rgya mtsho thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur/ smon lam gyi sgo thams cad
94a3(phal chen): kyang yang dag par skye bar 'gyur/ spyod pa'i sgo thams cad kyang rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ yon tan mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgo thams cad kyang rnam par
94a4(phal chen): dag par 'gyur/ sems rgya chen po yang mngon par shes pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i tshul tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ lus thogs pa med pas kyang thams cad
94a5(phal chen): du rjes su 'gro bar 'gyur/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs bza' shing gi ra ba kun nas rnam par brgyan pa'i nang du phyin te/ ltas na dge bsnyen ma
94a6(phal chen): yid bzhin khri bzang po la 'dug pa mthong nas/ dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ dge bsnyen ma yin bzhin gyi rkang pa gnyis
94a7(phal chen): la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin la lan brgya steng du mar g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags ma
94a8(phal chen): bdag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa la srab par
94b1(phal chen): bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags ma ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdam ngag dang / rjes su bstan pa mdzad do//
94b2(phal chen): zhes thos nas/ 'phags ma ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la slab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la
94b3(phal chen): bshad du gsol// des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa mya ngan med pa bde ba'i rgyal mtshan thob pa ste/ rigs kyi
94b4(phal chen): bu kho mo ni de'i mthus mthong na don yod pa/ mnyan na don yod pa'o// rim gro byas pa don yod pa'o// gnas gcig na 'grogs pa don yod pa'o// rjes
94b5(phal chen): su dran par byas pa/ don yod pa'o// rigs kyi bu kho mo ni sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma skyes pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi yongs su ma zin pa/ yang dag par
94b6(phal chen): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ma dgonges pa rnams kyis mthong zhing rnam par dmigs lam du 'ong bar mi 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu kho mos mthong ba tsam kyi ni//
94b7(phal chen): sems can rnams kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu kho mo'i drung du shar phyogs nas de
94b8(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa dag byon cing gdan rin po che khri 'di la bzhugs nas chos ston to// shar phyogs nas ji ltar ba bzhin du phyogs nas kyang de bzhin te/ rigs kyi/
95a1(phal chen): 52bu de lta bas na/ kho mo ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba'o// chos nyan pa dang mi 'bral ba'o// byang chub
95a2(phal chen): sems dpa' 'grogs pa dang mi 'bral ba'o// rigs kyi bu kho mo dang mi 'bral ba'i bskal pa mnyam pa'i srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag ba
95a3(phal chen): cu rtsa bzhi po// bza' shing gi ra ba kun rnam par brgyan pa 'di na/ gnas pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
95a4(phal chen): phyir mi ldog pa sha stag go/ rigs kyi bu sems can gzhan dag 'di na gnas pa de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi
95a5(phal chen): ldog pa'i dge 'dun du rtogs pa sha stag ste/ kho bo spyod pa'i bskal pa mnyam pa dag go/ smras pa/ 'phags ma khyod kyi bla na med pa yang dag par
95a6(phal chen): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yun ji srid cig nas thugs bskyed smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho bos ni sngon gyi gnas rjesu dran te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bco
95a7(phal chen): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad ces bya ba byung / de bzhin gshegs pa de'i drung du kho bos tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad do// de bzhin gsheg
95a8(phal chen): ba de kho mos mchod do// de bzhin gshegs pa de las chos bstan pa kho mos yongs su bzung ngo // de'i snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa zhes
95b1(phal chen): bya ba byung ste/ de'i bstan pa yang kho mo rab tu byung / chos kyi 'khor lo yang kho mos rab tu gzung ngo // de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa dpal zhes bya
95b2(phal chen): ba byung ste/ de yang kho bos snyen bkur to// de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa dri rab dpal zhes bya ba byung ngo // de'i snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa ba/
95b3(phal chen): me'i snying po zhes bya ba byung ngo // de'i snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba byung ngo // de'i snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa kun du
95b4(phal chen): gzigs pa zhes bya ba byung ngo // de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa dag pa zhes bya ba byung ngo // de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i gtsug ces
95b5(phal chen): bya ba byung ngo // de'i snga rol na de bzhin gshegs pa chu'i lha zhes bya ba byung ste/ rigs kyi bu bzhung de ltar tshe cig nas cig tu rgyud pa'i sangs rgyas gcig nas cig
95b6(phal chen): tu rgyud pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshams 'dab chags pa bsam ste dran par byas nas/ gang kho mos rim gro byas te/ bstan bkur ba dang / mchod pa dang
95b7(phal chen): sti stang du byas pa dang / gang gi spyan sngar kho mos chos thos par gyur pa dang / gang gi bstan pa la kho mos tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i
95b8(phal chen): chu klung gang gsum cu rtsa drug gi bye ma snyed rjes su dran te/ rigs kyi bu de phan chad du kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig bsnyen bkur ba ni/ de bzhin
96a1(phal chen): phal/ gshegs pa rnams kyi mkhyen to// rigs kyi bu sems dang po bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pas/ byang chub
96a2(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o// rigs kyi bu snying rje chen po'i khong du 'gro ba thams cad chud pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o//
96a3(phal chen): rigs kyi bu smon lam chen pos phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings kyi bzhi zad zang du 'gro bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams tshad med pa'o// rigs kyi bu byams pa
96a4(phal chen): chen pos 'gro ba thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas zhing tham
96a5(phal chen): cad du bskal pa thams cad yongs su bsdud pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o// rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyi byang chub sems
96a6(phal chen): dpa'i lam las phyir mi ldog pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzungs kyi stobs kyi 'gro ba thams cad yongs su 'dzin
96a7(phal chen): pa'i gzungs kyi tshul khong du chud par byed pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o// rigs kyi bu ye shes kyi snang ba'i stobs kyi dus gsum
96a8(phal chen): gyi tshul khong du chud par byed cing / yang dag par 'dzin pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o// rigs kyi bu mngon par shes pa'i stobs kyi zhing
96b1(phal chen): thams cad du sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'od kyi dra ba'i 'khor lo mngon par bsgrub pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni
96b2(phal chen): tshad med pa'o// rigs kyi bu tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa'i stobs kyi tshig cig brjod kyang 'gro ba thams cad shin tu tshim par byang chub sems dpa' rnams
96b3(phal chen): ni tshad med pa'o// rigs kyi bu lus rnam par dag pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rang gi lus rgyas par 'gengs pas byang chub sems dpa' tshad med
96b4(phal chen): pa'o// nor bzangs kyi smras pa/ 'phags ma khyod ji srid cig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ smras/
96b5(phal chen): pa rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ sems can cig la dmigs shing 'dul bar bya ba'i phyir// smin par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems
96b6(phal chen): byang chub tu bskyed pa ma yin te/ sems can brgya'i phyir ma yin/ sems can stong gi phyir ma yin/ sems can brgya stong gi phyir ma yin/ sems can
96b7(phal chen): bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ sems can bye ba brgya'i phyir ma yin/ sems can bye ba stong gi phyir ma yin/ sems can bye ba brgya phrag stong gi phyir ma yin//
96b8(phal chen): sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi don du/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu bskyed pa ma yin no// sems can thams cad kyi
97a1(phal chen): phyir ma yin/ sems can khrag khrig gi phyir ma yin/ sems can gang sa pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can ban bun gyi phyir/
97a2(phal chen): ma yin/ sems can byar byur gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can byang bying gi phyir ma yin/ sems can nyer 'jal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can byal phyol
97a3(phal chen): gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can yal yol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can ldang ljongs kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phyod zin gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can
97a4(phal chen): byang phyed kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can ldam ldem gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can ya gang gi phyir ma yin/ sems can cho mo'i phyir ma yin/ sems
97a5(phal chen): can nab nub kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can rgyud yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can gtang yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bkra yar gyi phyir ma
97a6(phal chen): yin/ sems can bza' yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'jam rtag gi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'tshungs med kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lam
97a7(phal chen): lum gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can rab rib kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can thab thib kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'khrig yol gyi phyir ma yin/
97a8(phal chen): sems can then byo'i phyir ma yin/ sems can bsam spyod kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'dra mnyam gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can brang breng gi phyir
97b1(phal chen): ma yin/ sems can bgrod yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can rgyas 'debs kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can snga yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can zang //
97b2(phal chen): yag gi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'phyo 'gye'i phyir ma yin/ sems can yongs zin gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'brug yos kyi phyir ma yin/ sems
97b3(phal chen): can sang yal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can thing yug gi phyir ma yin/ sems can snang yal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can nad pa'i phyir ma yin/
97b4(phal chen): sems can yid phye ba'i phyir ma yin/ sems can na ba neb kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can khrig thams kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can yal yal gyi phyir
97b5(phal chen): ma yin/ sems can grangs yas kyi phyir dang / sems can thugs yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can yang yud kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'phya
97b6(phal chen): ldog gi phyir ma yin/ sems can brda' yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lhun pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can thag thug gi phyir ma yin/ sems can
97b7(phal chen): khrig ge'i phyir ma yin/ sems can rigs yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can snyed med kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mchog 'phreng gi phyir ma yin//
97b8(phal chen): sems can nyag 'byung gi phyir ma yin/ sems can spu 'phos kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'bru 'brel gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can brjod 'od
98a1(phal chen): ngalakyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lhong yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can brjod phul gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can zhi snyed
98a2(phal chen): kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can zhi snyed kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can dag zil gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phyed 'gyur gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can nyar nyer gyi
98a3(phal chen): phyir ma yin/ sems can phyag phyig gi phyir ma yin/ sems can zal zul gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can sa la sal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can g.yo ldeg
98a4(phal chen): gi phyir ma yin/ sems can phan phun gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can snang ya'i phyir ma yin/ sems can rim 'grol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can rdzi dang
98a5(phal chen): kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can rdzi rdul gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phun yol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can rol rol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can dang
98a6(phal chen): dad kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrang rdzi'i phyir ma yin/ sems can bzab bgrang gi phyir ma yin/ sems can grangs mtha'i phyir ma yin/ sems
98a7(phal chen): can 'ol khyod kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can gdab yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can btsal yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrangs yas kyi phyir
98a8(phal chen): ma yin/ sems can byin 'byo'i phyir ma yin/ sems can ya me'i phyir ma yin/ sems can bstan yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lta ba ldab
98a9(phal chen): mas can spyod yang gi phyir mi yin/
98b1(phal chen): phyir ma yin/ sems can 'ban can gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can pang pung gi phyir ma yin/ sems can mtha' rdul gyi phyir ma yin no// sems
98b2(phal chen): can rgyud ljib kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can yul 'gyangs kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mkha' yal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bun lob kyi
98b3(phal chen): phyir ma yin/ sems can lam lom gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can snyad yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lang ling gi phyir ma yin/ sems
98b4(phal chen): can lnga pa ldings kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mi rtsal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'phya ma yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can nga bgrang gi phyir ma
98b5(phal chen): yin/ sems can smos yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bkra bcal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lo rgyas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'brel brjing/
98b6(phal chen): kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can la lo'i phyir ma yin/ sems can phya ma phyam gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrang chos kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can
98b7(phal chen): bgrang byos las bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can dpag yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can dpag yas las skyes pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can
98b8(phal chen): yal 'byong gi phyir ma yin/ sems can yal 'phyongs las bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can mu yal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mu yal
99a1(phal chen): na ma'ings rgya rgya / mas pa dag ga gi phyi
99a2(phal chen): 8las skyes pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrang yol gyi phyir ma yin// sems can bgrang yol las bsgres pa'i phyir ma
99a3(phal chen): yin/ sems can mi 'jal las bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can bsam byed kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'as 'acod las sbreb 'i phyir ma yin/ sems
99a4(phal chen): can mtha' 'jam gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mtha' 'jam las skyes pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can dpag thag las skyes pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems
99a5(phal chen): can brjod du med pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu rtogs pa rnams kyi phyir ma yin pa nas brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du pal
99a6(phal chen): med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khamasu rtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin/ gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi kham
99a7(phal chen): su rtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi/ 'jig rten gyi khams su rtogs pa'i sems
99a8(phal chen): can rnams kyi phyir ma yin/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su rtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma
99a9(phal chen): yin/ stong gsum gyi stong chen pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi khams su rtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin pa nas/ stong
99a10(phal chen): sems can brjod du med pa las skyes pa'i phyir/
99b1(phal chen): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu rtogs pa'i sems can rnams
99b2(phal chen): kyi don du 'di lta ste/ yong su smin par bya ba dang / 'dul ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin gyi 'di lta ste/
99b3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa lhag ma med pa mtha' dag thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du yongs su smin par bya ba dang / 'dul
99b4(phal chen): ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye'o// 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas gcig la bsnyen bkur ba dang / mnyes par bya ba
99b5(phal chen): dang / mchod cing rim gro bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye 'o ma yin pa dang / sangs rgyas bcu la bsnyen bkur zhing
99b6(phal chen): mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gro bya ba'i phyir ma yin pa nas brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi
99b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur zhing mnyam par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gro bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma
99b8(phal chen): yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu rtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rgyud bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gro bya ba'i phyir ma yin
100a1(phal chen): phalapa nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs
100a2(phal chen): pa'i rgyud snyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ sangs rgyas
100a3(phal chen): kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i rdul
100a4(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs
100a5(phal chen): pa cig gi bstan pa yongasu gzung ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i
100a6(phal chen): yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa yongasu gzung ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub
100a7(phal chen): tu skye ba ma yin/ sangs rgyas gcig rab tu zhugs pa'i smon lam rnam pa tha dad la 'jug pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub
100a8(phal chen): tu skye ba ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas rab tu bzhugs pa'i smon lam rnam pa
100b1(phal chen): tha dad pa la 'jug pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu sems skye ba ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi sangs rgyas
100b2(phal chen): kyi zhing gi rgyan la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i
100b3(phal chen): yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
100b4(phal chen): kyi sems byang chub tu sems skye ba ma yin/ sangs rgyas cig gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dbye ba la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
100b5(phal chen): rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyi dkyil
100b6(phal chen): 'khor rnam par phye ba la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi chos
100b7(phal chen): kyi 'khor lo yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i
100b8(phal chen): yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo yongasu gzung ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
101a1(phal chen): pa le/ kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ sems can gyi sems rgya batsho gcig gi khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems
101a2(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sems can
101a3(phal chen): kyi sems rgya mtsho khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ sems can cig gi dbang po'i 'a'od
101a4(phal chen): lo yongasu shes par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang
101a5(phal chen): brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sems can gyi dbang po'i 'khor lo yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang
101a6(phal chen): chub tu skye ba ma yin/ sems can cig gi dbang po rgya mtsho khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma
101a7(phal chen): yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sems can gyi dbang po khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/
101a8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig gi bskal pa gcig tu rgyud pa la 'jug par bya ba'i/
101b1(phal chen): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul
101b2(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bskal pa gcig nas cig tu rgyud pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems
101b3(phal chen): byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba la 'jug
101b4(phal chen): bar bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med
101b5(phal chen): pa'i rdul shin du phra bo snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi kham su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i bag chags kyi tshams sbyor ba 'jug pa'i phyir/
101b6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams cig tu rtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi nyon
101b7(phal chen): mongs pa rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi
101b8(phal chen): zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjed du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi kham su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rgya
102a1(phal chen): lamatsho thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ 'jig
102a2(phal chen): rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
102a3(phal chen): kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba steng du 'jig rten gyi khams
102a4(phal chen): su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub
102a5(phal chen): tu skye ba ma yin na/ 'jig rten gyi khams cig na rtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/
102a6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skyed pa ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin
102a7(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu rtogs pa'o sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sem
102a8(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin gyi/ sems can gyi khams ma lus la lhag ma med pa'i mtha' thams cad yongs su smin par bya/
102b1(phal chen): ba dang / gdul ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye'o// sangs rgyas ma lus pa thams cad snyen bkur zhing mnya
102b2(phal chen): par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gro bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye'o// 'jig rten gyi kha ma lus pa thams
102b3(phal chen): cad du gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rgyud spen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing ma gro bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
102b4(phal chen): kyi sems kyi smon lam mngon par mos pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
102b5(phal chen): rnams kyi bsam pa gtan par 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ma lus pa thams cad yongasu gzung ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
102b6(phal chen): rnams kyi sbyor ba 'byung ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu bzhugs pa'i smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa ma lus pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang
102b7(phal chen): bar bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems kyi shugs drag po skyes pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi
102b8(phal chen): yon tan gyi rgyan ma lus pa thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yid dam brtan par skye ba yin/ de bzhin
103a1(phal chen): gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho ma lus pa thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
103a2(phal chen): rnams kyi mngon par mos pa 'byung ba yin/ 'gro ba'i sems rgya mtsho ma lus pa thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa
103a3(phal chen): rnams kyi smon lam yongasasu skye ba yin/ sems can gyi dbang po'i 'khor ma lus pa thams cad yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems
103a4(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi mngon par 'dod pa skye ba yin/ sems can gyi dbang po rgya mtsho ma lus pa thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub
103a5(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams kyi spro ba skye ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kyi bskal pa gcig tu rgyud pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/
103a6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mos pa skye ba yin/ sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi tshams sbyor ba yongasu
103a7(phal chen): bcad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus yongasu skye ba yin/ sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi las dong nyon
103a8(phal chen): pa'i rgya mtsho bskam pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes chen po'i nyi ma 'char ba yin/ sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi
103b1(phal chen): spyod pa yongasu shes par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi snang ba 'byung ba yin/ sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi
103b2(phal chen): sdug bsngal gyi phung po rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje'i sprin chen po kun nas 'du ba yin/ rigs kyi bu
103b3(phal chen): 'dor na de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i tshul dang / sgo grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu dag bya/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam
103b4(phal chen): kyi yongs su sgrub par bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ni/ ye shes khong du chud par bya ba'i
103b5(phal chen): phyir/ chos thams cad la yang dag par bzhol ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ni/ yongasu dag par bya ba'i phyir/ zhing thams
103b6(phal chen): cad la yang dag par bzhol ba'o// rigs kyi bu de lta bas na bdag gi smon lam nam mkha'i dbyings rnam par dag pa'i mtha' gang du thugs pa de'i
103b7(phal chen): mtha' klas par shogs shig/ bdag gi smon lam 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag pa'i mtha' gang du thugs pa'i de'i mtha' klas shog shig/
103b8(phal chen): bdag gi smon lam sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang / bag chags kyi tshams kyi sbyor ba dang / bag la nyal gyi mtha' gang du thugs
104a1(phal chen): pal/ pa de'i mtha' klas par shog shig/ ces de ltar smon lam btab po// smras pa/ 'phags pa rnam par thar pa 'di'i ming ci/
104a2(phal chen): zhig bgyi/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu rnam par thar pa 'di ni nyon mongs pa med pa bde ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba ste/ rigs kyi bu kho mos kyang byang chub
104a3(phal chen): sems dpa' rnam par thar pa de cig pu shes par zad na/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par 'dzin par bya ba'i phyir/
104a4(phal chen): sems rgya mtsho dang ldan pa/ lhag pa'i bsam pa bstan pa'i phyir ri rab dang 'dra ba/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad rab tu sos par
104a5(phal chen): byed pa'i phyir/ sman gyi rgyal po mthong na legs pa lta bu/ sems can thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa sel ba'i phyir nyi mar gyur pa/ sems can
104a6(phal chen): thams cad kyi bsam pa'i gan su gyur pas sa lta bu'i sems dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi don byed pa'i rlung sems can la ye shes kyi snang ba
104a7(phal chen): 'byin pa'i phyir mar mer gyur pa/ zhi ba'i sgras sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi char yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin 'babs pa'i sprin du gyur pa/ bsod nams
104a8(phal chen): kyi 'od zer gyi dra ba rab tu 'gyed pa'i zla ba lta bu/ 'gro ba thams cad yongasu bsrung ba la bzhugs pa'i phyir brgya byin lta bu/ de dag gi spyod pa
104b1(phal chen): shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod pa'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i srab pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa smos pa 'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi
104b2(phal chen): rnam pa mtha' dbus med pa yongasu bstan pa nus re skan/ rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi rgya mtsho rnam par rlom pa 'di nyid na yul chu ba gtsang
104b3(phal chen): ma zhes bya ba yod de/ de na drang srong 'jig mchog dbyangs shes bya ba 'dug gi/ de'i gan du song la dris shig/ de'i rigs kyi bu khyod la byang chub sems
104b4(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa bstan par 'gyur ro// de nas tshongs dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi dge snyen ma yid bzhin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge
104b5(phal chen): snyen ma yid bzhin la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang ltas nas phyag 'tshal nas ngo mchi mas gang bar
104b6(phal chen): dus te/ byang chub mchog tu dkon pa rjes su sems shing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen rim gror bya bar dkon par rjes su bsam pa dang / skyes ba/
104b7(phal chen): dam pa dang phrad par dkon par rjes su bsam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po thob par bya ba rje su bsam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
104b8(phal chen): bsam pa yongasu dag pa dkon pa rje su bsam pa dang / skal pa nyams pa'i bshes gnyen dang phrad par dkon pa rjes su bsam pa dang / byang chub
105a1(phal chen): tu yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par mos shing sems nges par bzhog pa dkon par rjesu bsam pa dang / me mnya
105a2(phal chen): ba med pa'i chos kyi tshul rjesu bsam pa dang / sems dri ma med cing mi 'phrogs pa'i sbyor ba yang dag par bsgrub pa dka' ba rjesu bsam pa dang /
105a3(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du shugs drag po rnam par bskyed pa'i chos kyi snang ba dkon par rje su bsam pa byed cing / dge gnyen ma yid bzhin gyi
105a4(phal chen): drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang byang chub sems dpa'i gdam ngag gi rjes su song ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub
105a5(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyod pa yongasu dag par bya ba'i rje su song ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi stobs rnam par 'phel
105a6(phal chen): bar bya ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas lta ba'i shugs drag pos rab tu snang bar bya ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ chos kyi gter thob par bya/
105a7(phal chen): ba la shugs drag po skyes pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ smon lam chen po mngon par bsgrub pa'i shugs drag po rab tu 'phel ba'i sems dang ldan
105a8(phal chen): pa/ ches thams cad kyi phyogs la mngon du lta ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rang bzhin gyi 'od kyi snang bar bya ba'i sems dang ldan pa/
105b1(phal chen): sgrib pa thams cad rnam par mthong ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ chos kyi dbyings la mun pa med par lta ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ rdo rje rin po che mthu bo
105b2(phal chen): ches mi chog pa ltar dri ma med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ bdud thams cad kyi dpung gis rgol bar dka' zhing thub par dka' ba'i sems dang ldan
105b3(phal chen): pa/ de ltar gyi yul chub tsang ma ga la ba der phyin nas drang srong 'jig mchog dbyangs tshol tshol ba las/ de'i tshe drang srong 'jig mchog dbyang
105b4(phal chen): dge ba sbyang ba'i gnas/ shing dang shing phran sna tshogs grangs med pa'i nags tshal mdangs dga' ba/ lo ma rgyas pa shing gi kun nas 'grig pa/
105b5(phal chen): rtag tu me tog sna tshogs rgyas pa dang ldan pa'i shing sna tshogs can/ rtag tu shing mang po dang / ldan pa'i shing thog gi shing dang ldan pa/ rin po che
105b6(phal chen): sna tshogs kyi shing drung rin po che'i srang leb kyi rtag tu gshig pa dang ldan pa/ tsan dan dam pa'i shing kun nas rnam par bres pa/ a ka ru yid du
105b7(phal chen): 'ong ba'i shing las spos kyi dri rtag tu 'byung bas rab tu brgyan pa/ phyogs bzhi nas shing ba lta la rnam par mdzes pa skyes pa yongs su brgyan
105b8(phal chen): pa/ nya dro ta'i shing yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ 'dzam bu shing las rtag tu shing tog smin par 'brul ba/ me tog gi tshal pad mo dang / u
106a1(phal chen): ba la gsar du skyes pas rab tu brgyan pa zhig na 'dug 'dug ste/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi drang srong 'jig
106a2(phal chen): mchog dbyangs la drang srong stong phrag bcus bskor cing / tsan dan gyi yal ga shin tu 'brel ba'i bya skyibs shig na thor tshugs kyi cod pan can/
106a3(phal chen): lpags pa dang tsa'i gos gyon pa/ shing shun gyi srad g.yog can/ rtsa'i stan la 'dug pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang drang srong 'jig mchog
106a4(phal chen): dbyangs ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'phrad pa'i bsam pas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni yang
106a5(phal chen): dag pa'i lam ston pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'byung ba'i sgo yin par yang dag par lta/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa la bzhog pas/
106a6(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gradam ngag la rag lus par yang dag par lta/ la stobs bcu'i ye shes rin po che
106a7(phal chen): gling du skyel bas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi mnyan pa la rag lus yang dag par lta/ stobs bcu'i ye shes snang
106a8(phal chen): ba yang dag par skyed pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi sgron mas snang bar byas pa yin par yang dag par lta/
106b1(phal chen): nyam mnyes par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong du phyin par byed/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par
106b2(phal chen): yang dag par lta/ mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa yongasu ston pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mar me ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dag par
106b3(phal chen): lta/ g.yang sa'i 'jig pa thams cad med par byas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stegs ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dag par lta/ byams
106b4(phal chen): pa chen po'i stobs kyi sim par yongasu skyed pa'i phyir/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'dug ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dag par lta/ snying
106b5(phal chen): rje chen pos yongasu skyed pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shugs drag po ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dag par lta zhing / chos kyi rang bzhin
106b6(phal chen): gyi tshul la rab tu snang bar byed pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsal bar mthong bas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rag las par mthong nas/ lus
106b7(phal chen): thams cad kyi phab ste/ phyag byas nas langs te drang srong 'jig mchog dbyangs la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas nas 'dun du 'dug ste/ thal mo
106b8(phal chen): sbyar nas yid du 'ong ba'i tshul gyi yid du 'ong ba'i tshig brjod de 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
107a1(phal chen): phalachub tu sems bskyed nas/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la slab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/
107a2(phal chen): 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdam ngag rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes thos nas/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems
107a3(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ de nas drang srong 'jig mchog dbyangs kyi bram ze'i byis pa stong
107a4(phal chen): phrag bcu po de dag la ltas te/ 'di skad ces smras so// byis pa dag rigs kyi bu 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/
107a5(phal chen): sems can thams cad 'jigs pa med pa la 'gron du gnyer ro// rigs kyi bu 'di ni sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don du sta gon du gnas pa/
107a6(phal chen): ste/ ye shes rgya mtsho la mngon du gyur pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin gyi char bdung bar 'dod pa'o// chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad
107a7(phal chen): la 'jug par byed pa'o// ye shes kyi snang ba chen po la gnas par 'dod pa'o// snying rje chen po'i sprin bsdu bar 'dod pa'o// chos kyi char chen po mngon par
107a8(phal chen): 'dod pa'o// ye shes chen po'i zla ba 'jig rten du shar bar byas te/ nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba thams cad rab tu bzhil bar 'dod pa'o// sems can thams
107b1(phal chen): cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par spel bar 'dod pa'o// de nas bram ze'i byis pa stong phrag bcu po de dag gis/ me tog dri zhim la yid du 'ong zhing kha dog sna tshog
107b2(phal chen): dang ldan pa mang pos// tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la gtor to// mngon par gtor to// rab tu gtor to// mngon par phyag 'tshal to// de ltar gtud de
107b3(phal chen): phyag 'tshal nas g.yas phyogs nas bskor ba byas nas/ tshig 'di skad du brjod do// sems can thams cad yongs su skyob par 'gyur ro// sems can dpya
107b4(phal chen): ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid par 'gyur ro// byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad rnam par bcod par 'gyur ro// gshin
107b5(phal chen): rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad rnam par bzlog par 'gyur ro// mi khom pa'i sgo thams cad gcod par 'gyur ro// srid pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad
107b6(phal chen): yongs su snyam par 'gyur ro// srid pa'i 'ching ba bcod par 'gyur ro// sdug bsngal gyi phung po rnam par bzlog par 'gyur ro// ma rig pa'i mun pa sel
107b7(phal chen): bar 'gyur ro// bsod nams kyi 'khor yug gi 'jig rten yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro// ye shes rin po che'i 'byung gnas yongasu ston par 'gyur ro// /
107b8(phal chen): ye shes kyi nyi ma 'char bar bgyid par 'gyur ro// chos kyi mig rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten rnams pa mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa yang dag par
108a1(phal chen): phal/ #ston par 'gyur ro// de nas drang srong 'jig mchog dbyangs kyi byis pa de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// byis pa dag gi bla na med pa
108a2(phal chen): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyod pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad kyi bde ba rab tu skyed de/ rigs
108a3(phal chen): kyi bu thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par 'gyur ro// byis pa dag rigs kyi bu 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ste/
108a4(phal chen): de bas na 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad kyi yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ro// de nas drang srong 'jig mchog dbyangs kyi tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la
108a5(phal chen): 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa gzhan gyi mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan thob po// nor bzangs kyi smras pa/
108a6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa gzhan gyi mi thub pa 'di'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis/ de nas drang srong 'jig mchog dbyangs kyis lag pa g.yas
108a7(phal chen): ba brkyang ste/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi mgo bo byug nas/ lag pa g.yas pas gzung ngo // tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la drang srong 'jig mchog
108a8(phal chen): dbyangs kyi lag pas bzung ma thag tu/ de'i mod la tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi/ phyogs bcur sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag bcu'i shin tu phra ba
108b1(phal chen): snyed kyi ning mthong bar gyur te/ de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi zhabs kyi drung na bdag nyid 'dus
108b2(phal chen): bshes par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag kyang rnam pa grangs med par rnam par dag pa'i brgyan dang ldan pa mthong ngo // de dag na'ang de bzhin gshegs
108b3(phal chen): ba'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho kha dog sna tshogs can rgyan rnam pa tha dad pa dang ldan pa dag 'khod par mthong ngo // 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de dag
108b4(phal chen): na'ang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po 'bar bas brgyan pa dag bzhugs par mthong ngo // de dag las kyang tshig dang yi ge cig
108b5(phal chen): las kyang phyogs pa med par chos bstan pa nyan to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo de dag kyang phan tshun ma 'dres par yang dag par 'dzin to//
108b6(phal chen): chos kyi sprin char sems can gyi bsam pa sna tshogs la 'bab pa de dag kyang yang dag par 'dzin to// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang yang dag par 'dzin to//
108b7(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sngon gyi smon lam mos pa sna tshogs kyi rnam par sbyang ba rgya mtsho la'ang zhugs so// sangs rgyas kyi yang dag par rngub sngon lam
108b8(phal chen): sna tshogs rgya mtshos rnam par dag pa rgya mtsho de dag la'ang zhugaso// sangs rgyas kyi sku mdog sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshim par 'gyur ba/
109a1(phal chen): larnam par dmigs pa de dag kyang mthong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer gyi dra ba 'dod chags bral bas/ sna tshogs kyi rnam
109a2(phal chen): par dag pa'i rkyen gyi dkyil 'khor de dag kyang mthong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi stobs kyi de dag la'ang ye shes snang ba sgrub pa med pa dang ldan pas zhugs so//
109a3(phal chen): de dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa gzhan pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi ye shes kyi 'od kyi snang bar gyur pa/ ting nge 'dzin rnam par snang mdzad kyi
109a4(phal chen): snying po snang ba rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin ye shes mi zad pa'i rnam par thar pa dang ldan pa/ gzungs kyi sgo snang ba phyogs kun gyi dra ba rab tu thob
109a5(phal chen): pa/ gzungs kyi sgo rdo rje'i snying pos sems rab tu gsal bar byas pa/ ting nge 'dzin ye shes rtsegs pa rnam par phye ba'i yul la rnam par phye ba
109a6(phal chen): rab tu thob pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa/ gzhi kun nas rnam par brgyan pa'i snying po yul du gyur pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi
109a7(phal chen): snang ba sangs rgyas nam mkha'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor rab tu zhugs pa/ ting nge 'dzin pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo mu khyud kyi
109a8(phal chen): sems can rab tu snang bar byas pa/ ting nge 'dzin dus gsum gyi ye shes rin po che mi zad pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu brtson pa des/ de bzhin gshegs
109b1(phal chen): la lar ni lo bye ba brgya lon pa snyam/
109b2(phal chen): pa la la'i zhabs kyi drung du ni/ nyin zhag cig lon par shes so// la lar nyin zhag bdun lon pa sten/ la lar ni zla ba phyed lon pa snyam/ la lar ni
109b3(phal chen): zla ba cig lon pa snyam/ la lar ni lo cig lon pa snyam/ la lar ni lo brgya lon pa snyam/ la lar ni lo stong lon pa snyam/ la lar ni lo brgya stong phrag
109b4(phal chen): lon pa snyam/ la lar ni lo bye ba lon pa snyam/ la lar ni lo bye ba stong lon pa snyam/ la lar ni lo bye ba brgya phrag stong lon pa snyam/ la lar ni lo
109b5(phal chen): bye ba khrag khrig len pa snyam/ la lar ni lo bskal pa phyed lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa gcig lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa brgya lon pa
109b6(phal chen): snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa stong lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa brgya phrag stong lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa bye ba lon pa snyam/ la lar
109b7(phal chen): ni bskal pa bye ba phrag brgya lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa bye ba phrag stong lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa brgya phrag stong lon pa snyam/ la
109b8(phal chen): lar ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong lon pa snyam byed pa nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la la'i zhabs kyi drung du ni bskal pa brjod du med pa'i
109b9(phal chen): yang brjod du med pa snyed lon par gyur pa snyam byed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa la la'i drung du ni/ bskal pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
110a1(phal chen): #lon pa sum byed pa nas/ bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed khron
110a2(phal chen): bar mnyam par byed par gyur to// drang srong 'jig mchog dbyangs kyi tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs btang ba dang / des yang dag drang srong 'jig mchog
110a3(phal chen): dbyangs kyi 'dun na 'dug par shes par gyur to// de la drang srong 'jig mchog dbyangs kyi smras pa/ rigs kyi bu dran mod/ smras pa/ 'phags pa
110a4(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi byin gyi brlabs kyi dran no// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa gzhan gyi mi thub pa'i
110a5(phal chen): rgyal mtshan 'di shes par zad nas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan
110a6(phal chen): pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ dus thams cad du 'khor lo bskor ba/ sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa/ de bzhin
110a7(phal chen): gshegs pa 'byung ba'i nyi ma la rnam par dmigs pa'i rgyan rab tu 'god pa/ dus gsum gyi yul skad cig cig gi ye shes su yang dag par
110a8(phal chen): bsdud pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad lus shin tu rnam par bkram pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad la ye shes snang ba'i rang bzhin dang
110b1(phal chen): ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ mngon sum du mngon par langs pa/ sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du spyong
110b2(phal chen): pa rnam par spyod pa dang / 'thun pa'i tshul dang ldan pa/ 'dod pa bzhin du kun tu snang zhing / dri ma med pa la 'od dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor
110b3(phal chen): rnam par dag pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod pa'am/ smon lam gyi khyad par smos pa'am/ zhing gi mngon par 'du ba shes pa'am/
110b4(phal chen): ye shes kyi yul 'jug par bya ba'am/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'am/ rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug par bya ba'am
110b5(phal chen): rnam par thar pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba/ lus rnam par phye ba'i mtshan ma gzung bar bya ba'am/ dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa brjod/
110b6(phal chen): ba'am/ ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu snyan par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ yul yongs su tshol ba zhes bya ba yod de/
110b7(phal chen): de na bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched ces bya ba 'dug gi/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la slab
110b8(phal chen): par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang dga' rang ste/ mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing bde ba skyes nas/
111a1(phal chen): pa ladrang srong 'jig mchog dbyangs kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos 'tshal te/ drang srong 'jig mchog dbyangs la lan brgya stong
111a2(phal chen): du bdag las phyogs nas banor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang smras nas/ drang song 'jig pachog dacangs kyi rlung rnas sa nga // shin tu rgyas pa chen
111a3(phal chen): mdo// // sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las sdong pos brgyan pa// / bam po dgu bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas
111a4(phal chen): tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa/ gzhan gyi mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi ye shes kyi snang ba byas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi
111a5(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon sum du rnam par spyod pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa mngon
111a6(phal chen): sum gyi ye shes kyi mngon par shes pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i ye shes kyi sems snang bar gyur pa/ dus thams
111a7(phal chen): cad du yang dag par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes snang ba rab tu thob pa/ 'du shes kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yang dag par 'jug
111a8(phal chen): pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yul gyi snang bar gyur pa/ 'gro ba thams cad las khyad par du 'phags dang ldan pa'i ye shes snang ba thob pa/ thams cad
111b1(phal chen): kyi rjes su song ba'i spyod yul la rnam par spyod pa/ mngon du gyur pa gnyi su rnam par rtog pa med pas mnyam pa nyid du bstan pa'i ye shes lhun len pa/
111b2(phal chen): dmigs pa thams cad la rab tu 'dal ba'i ye shes snang ba dang ldan pa/ mnyam pa thams cad la mngon du gyur pa'i bzod pa rnam par dag pa mos pa/
111b3(phal chen): mdzod la mkhas pa/ rang bzhin gyi chos la bzod pa khong du chud pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i rang bzhin sgom
111b4(phal chen): pa dang mi 'bral ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shugs drag po las phyir mi ldog pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ stobs bcu ye shes
111b5(phal chen): snang ba'i 'od rab tu thob pa/ chos kyi dbyings brjod pa la mngon par mos pas/ ngom pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyi
111b6(phal chen): la rnam par spyod yul la 'jug pa khong du chud par sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyan mtha' yas pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i
111b7(phal chen): sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor mtha' yas pa rnam par sbyang ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten gyi
111b8(phal chen): khams dra ba mi zad pa khong du chud pa'i ye shes mtha' dang / dbus med par mngon du gyur pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sems can rgya mtsho mtha' yas
112a1(phal chen): lenapa yong su smin par byed pa/ 'dul bar bya ba la zhum pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa des/ byang chub sems dpa'i
112a2(phal chen): spyod yul mtha' yas pa la yang dag par lta ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa mtha' yas pa la yang dag par lta ba dang / 'jig
112a3(phal chen): rten gyi khams rnam par phye ba sna tshogs mtha' yas pa la yang dag par lta ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa dmigs pa phra ba dang yang ba'i
112a4(phal chen): khongasu chud par bya ba la yang dag par lta ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gzhi mtha' yas pa'i ming gi drang sna tshogs yang dag par lta ba dang / 'jig
112a5(phal chen): rten gyi kham su rnam par spyod pa rnam par dag pa/ mtha' yas pa'i kun rdzob rnam pa tha dad pa yang dag par lta ba dang / sems can gyi mos pa sna tshogs
112a6(phal chen): mtha' yas pa yang dag par lta ba dang / sems can rnam par phye ba'i rnam par tha dad pa dang / mtha' yas pa la yang dag par lta ba dang / sems
112a7(phal chen): can mtha' yas pa yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i khong du chud par bya ba la yang dag par lta ba dang / sems can dang phyogs dang dus
112a8(phal chen): mtha' yas pa'i ring gi rnam pa sna tshogs la yang dag par lta ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen mngon du bya ba byed cing / mthar gyi yul tshol dang ldan
112b1(phal chen): pa gang na ba dang / bram de rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched ga la ba der byin to// de'i tshe bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgrub pan
112b2(phal chen): gzhir byas shing / bka' thub drag po la spyod de/ de'i phyogs bzhi nas me'i phung po ri rab tsam du che ba bus pa dang / ri shin tu tho ba'i g.yang sa'i lam
112b3(phal chen): gyi rgyud spu gri'i so sa bshib pas 'khor bar snang ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi bram ze'i rgyal ba'i 'od kyi skye mched kyi rkang pa gnyis la
112b4(phal chen): spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'dun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
112b5(phal chen): chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la spyad pa dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'bag
112b6(phal chen): pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdam ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do// zhes bdag gi thos nas/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems
112b7(phal chen): dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu song
112b8(phal chen): la spu gri'i so dang / rA ba'i da la 'jog ste/ me'i 'ob 'dir 'tshong shig dang / des khyod kyi byang chub sems dpa'a'i spyod pa yongs su dag par
113a1(phal chen): 'gyur ro// zhes nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ mi khom pa brgyad las rnam par
113a2(phal chen): zlog par yang shin tu dkon/ mir gyur te kham pa phun sum tshogs shing rnam par dag pa yang shin tu dkon/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba yang shin tu dkon/
113a3(phal chen): dbang po nyams pa med pa yang shin tu dkon/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thob pa yang shin tu dkon/ skyes bu dam pa dang 'phrad pa yang shin tu dkon/ yang dag pa'i
113a4(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gnyen yang shin tu dkon/ yang dag pa'i tshul rjes su bstan pa las legs par bsdud pa yang shin tu dkon/ yang dag par 'tsho bar
113a5(phal chen): bya ba yang shin tu dkon/ mi'i 'jig rten na chos dang gnyen pa'i chos la nan tan byed pa yang shin tu dkon/ de skad zer zhing bdag gi dge ba'i bar chad la zhugs
113a6(phal chen): la/ de ltar bdag gi srog bcad par brtson pa'i bdud cig ma yin nam/ bdud kyi byin gyi brlab pa 'am/ bdud kyi ris su gtogs pa'am/ dge ba'i
113a7(phal chen): gshes gnyen ltar rdzus pa'am/ byang chub sems dpa' la mi chags par byed pa zhig ma yin grang / bdag gi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bgegs byed/
113a8(phal chen): par 'dod pa zhig ma yin grang / bdag lam gol bar zhugs par 'dod pa zhig ma yin grang / bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi chos khong du chud par bya ba'i chos
113b1(phal chen): kyi sgo la bgeg byed pa zhig ma yin grang snyam nas/ de de ltar sems nas yid la byed pa'i tshe tshangs pa stong phrag bcu steng gi bar snang la gnas te/ 'di skad
113b2(phal chen): ces 'dzer to// rigs kyi de lta bu sems bstan par ma byed cing / rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di ni ting nge 'dzin rdo rje 'od 'phro ba'i snang ba rab tu thob pa ste/
113b3(phal chen): brtson 'grus kyi zlog pa med pa'o// brtsam pa chen po mthar 'byung ba la zhugs pa'o// 'gro ba thams cad kyi srid pa'i rlan bskam pa la mngon par brtson
113b4(phal chen): pa'o// lta ba'i rnam pa dang grol ba thams cad brtul ba la brtson pa'o// nyon mongs pa'i lcag lcig thams cad zad par sregs pa la sta gon du gnas pa'o//
113b5(phal chen): mi khom mi shes pa'i bas dgon thams cad snang bar bya ba la rtson pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi rga shi'i dbyang 'jig pa rnam par zlog pa la yid dam
113b6(phal chen): brtan pa'o// dus gsum gyi mun pa gsal ba la mngon par brtson pa'o// chos thams cad kyi 'od zer bgye ba la zhugs pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'phags
113b7(phal chen): ba 'di dka' bubo lngas yongasu gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ tshangs pa ji srid cig mkhan po dang dbang sgyur ba dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi gtso bor rang rang
113b8(phal chen): rlom pa zhig sems dpa'i lta ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs la mngon par zhen pa de dag thams cad 'phags pa 'di dka' thub dang ldan pa rtul shugs kyi mthus pa
114a1(phal chen): rang gi gnas na bag dga' ba med cing / de dag gi bsam gtan gyi ro dga' ba myong ba med pas/ 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong
114a2(phal chen): ngo// de dag byin pa dang / 'phags pa 'di rdzu 'phrul gyi byin dang drag shul gyi dka' thub dang / rtul shugs kyi zil gyi mnan te/ lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad
114a3(phal chen): zlog pa/ nga rgyal dang rlom sems can thams cad rab tu snang ba'i phyir chos ston to// 'gro ba thams cad la byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen pos khyab
114a4(phal chen): bar bya ba dang / byang chub kyi bsam pa brtan par bya ba dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa shin tu yang bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag
114a5(phal chen): par lta ba la mngon par brtson par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi dkyil 'khor thob par bya ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / thams cad du
114a6(phal chen): grags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs la thogs pa med cing sgrib pa med par bya ba'i chos ston to// bdud stong phrag bcu yang steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas/
114a7(phal chen): lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po ches mngon par gtor te 'di skad 'dzer to// rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/
114a8(phal chen): 'od 'phro ba'i phung po 'di las snang ba chen po 'byung zhing / khro bo cag gi khyim dang lus dang rgyan gyi longs spyod zil gyi gnon to// de'i phyir kho bo cag kyang
114b1(phal chen): so so'i gnas na bag dga' ba med pas/ 'khor dang bcas te 'phags pa de'i drung du 'dong ngo // kho bo cag gi de'i drung du phyin nas kyang / 'phags pa
114b2(phal chen): 'di ni kho bo cag la ci nas kyang rang rang gi sems sor chud nas/ byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
114b3(phal chen): phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston to// dbang sbyar gyi lha'i rgyal po stong phrag bcus kyang lha rdzas kyi me tog gi mngon par gtor te/ 'di skad
114b4(phal chen): mdzer to// rigs kyi bu 'di dka' thub lngas yongasu gdung ba byed pa'i tshe/ kho bo cag rang rang gi gnas na dga' ba med de/ de ltar bdag cag kyang
114b5(phal chen): rang rang gi skye bo'i 'khor dang bcas te de'i drung du 'dong ngo // bdag cag drung du phyin pa dang / 'di ni bdag cag la rang rang gi sems la dbang sgyur
114b6(phal chen): ba thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to// nyon mongs pa thams cad la dbang sgyur ba thob par bya ba dang / bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du skye ba thob pa
114b7(phal chen): bya ba dang / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i dbang rab thob par bya ba dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang sgyur ba thob
114b8(phal chen): par bya ba dang / yo byad la dbang ba'i rgyan yong su dag par bya ba dang / bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshe la dbang rgyur ba thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston
115a1(phal chen): to/ rab 'phrul dga'i lha'i rnam ze stong phrag bcu yang stong gi bar snang la 'khod do// lha rdzas kyi glu yang dag par
115a2(phal chen): sbyar ba'i nga ro snyan pa'i dbyangs spags te/ mchod pa byas nas 'di skad 'dzer to// rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongasu gdung ba
115a3(phal chen): mdzad pa'i tshe/ me'i phung po 'di las de dang de 'dra ba'i 'od 'byung zhing / des kho bo cag gi gzhal med khang 'di dag rnam par dag pa ste gsal
115a4(phal chen): ba dang / 'od shin tu dang bar 'gyur ro// rgyan 'di dag dang lha'i bu mo 'di dag kyang rnam par dag cing gsal la 'od shin tu deng bar 'gyur ro//
115a5(phal chen): de bas na bdag cag kyang lha'i bu dang / lnga'i bu mo'i tshogs kyis 'khor dang bcas par 'dod pa la dga' bar tshor ba med de/ 'dod pa'i bde ba
115a6(phal chen): la mngon par dga' ba med pas lus dang sems sim par gyur nas/ 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dor ba yin te/ 'phags pa 'di ni bdag cag
115a7(phal chen): de ltar phyin pa rnams sems rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to// sems kyi 'od dang bar bya ba dang / sems shin tu dag par bya ba dang /
115a8(phal chen): sems las su rung bar bya ba dang / sems kyi dga' ba yongasu skyed pa dang / stobs bcu'i ye shes thob pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang / chos kyi
115b1(phal chen): shugs chen po rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku tshad med pa mngon par bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir/ lus rnam par dag par bya ba dang
115b2(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung thob par bya ba'i phyir/ ngag rnam par dag par bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rab tu thob par bya bar sems
115b3(phal chen): rnam par dag par bya ba'i chos ston to// dga' ldan gyi lha'i rgyal po stong phrag bcu'i lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa dag kyang steng gi
115b4(phal chen): bar snang la 'khod nas/ spos sna tshogs kyi phye ma'i sprin gyi char mngon par phab mchod pa byas te/ phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces 'dzer to//
115b5(phal chen): rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongasu gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ bdag cag kyang rang rang gi gnas dga' ba med de/ de ltar
115b6(phal chen): dga' ba med pas 'di'i drung du 'dong ste/ bdag cag phyin pa rnams la 'di ni yul thams cad la ltos pa med par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to//
115b7(phal chen): chog shes pa'i sems su bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bskyed pa dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rab tu thob par bya ba nas sangs
115b8(phal chen): rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to// rab tshe ma'i lha'i rgyal po stong phrag bcu dang / lha'i bu dang lha'i bu mo'i
116a1(phal chen): patshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa dag gis kyang lha rdzas kyi me tog man d+ha ra ba'i char mngon par bab ste/ 'di skad ces 'dze
116a2(phal chen): to// rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa de'i tshe/ bdag cag kyang lha rdzas kyi glu snyan pa la dag pa med pas/
116a3(phal chen): de ltar dga' ba med pas 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ste/ bdag cag phyin nas kyang 'phags pa 'di ni 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad rnam
116a4(phal chen): par zlog par bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to// lha'i dbang po brgya byin stong phrag cu so so
116a5(phal chen): nas nye ba'i dbang po sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / lha'i bu dang lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pas lha rdzas kyi go dang rin po che'i rgyan dang me tog
116a6(phal chen): gi sprin gyi char mngon par phab ste/ 'di skad ces 'dzer to// rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongasu gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ bdag
116a7(phal chen): cag kyang brgya byin gyi khang pa dang / bza' shing gi ra ba dang rtse ba'i nag tshal dang / lha rdzas kyi rol mo bdung zhing bkrol ba dang / bag yon glu len
116a8(phal chen): pa'i longs spyod la dga' ba med de/ de ltar bdag cag dga' ba med pas 'phags pa de'i drung du 'dong ngo // bdag cag der phyin nas kyang 'phags
116b1(phal chen): pa 'di ni kho bo cag la 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad yongs su spang ba'i phyir chos ston to// 'di dag thams cad ni rtag pa ma yin te/ mi rtag cing
116b2(phal chen): 'jig par 'gyur ba'i chos can no// zhes bya ba'i tshig brjod do// gregs pa dang bag med pa thams cad yongasasu bcad pa dang / bla na med pa'i byang
116b3(phal chen): chub spro ba skyed pa'i phyir chos ston to// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 'dis ltas pa tsam gyis ri rab kyi rtse mo thams cad kyang g.yo bar 'gyur te/ des bdas
116b4(phal chen): cag bshigs pas sems skyo bar 'gyur te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems rten pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shesu smon lam mngon par bsgrub po// /
116b5(phal chen): klu'i rgyal po shugs ldan dang dga' bo dang / nyer dga' bo la sogs pa/ klu brgya stong phrag bcu dag kyang steng gi bar snang la gnas shing dus dang mthun
116b6(phal chen): pa'i lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi sprin dang / klu'i bu mos glu snyen pa'i nga ro snyan pa'i dbyangs dang / lha rdzas kyi spos chu'i rgyun rab tu 'bab pas char mngon
116b7(phal chen): bar bab ste/ 'di skad ces 'dzer to// rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzes pa'i tshe/ me'i phung po 'di las
116b8(phal chen): 'od chen po 'byung ste/ de'i klu'i gnas thams cad snang ba byas nas phye ma'i char dang / nam mkha' lding gi 'jig pa yongs su gsal to// khro ba
117a1(phal chen): pala'abyung ba yongs su zhi bar byas te/ lus sim par byas te/ yid shin tu mos par byed do// de ltar sems shin tu
117a2(phal chen): mos par byas nas/ 'phags pa 'di ni bdag cag la chos ston te/ 'di ltar klu'i lam gyi rgyud ngan pa rnam par smad pa dang / sgrib pa'i las tham
117a3(phal chen): cad rab tu spang ba'i phyir nyes pa 'tshag su btsud cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du btsud de/ thams
117a4(phal chen): cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu dgod do// gnod byin gyi dbang po stong phrag bcu yang nam mkha'i dbyingasu 'khod do// mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi
117a5(phal chen): bram ze'i rgyal ba'i drod kyi mched dang / tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la mchod pa byas nas 'di skad ces 'dzer to// rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di
117a6(phal chen): ni dka' thub lngas yongasu gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ kho bo cag gi 'khor kun kyang mi rnams la byams pa'i sems skye bar gyur te/ gnod sbyin
117a7(phal chen): dang / srin po dang / grul bum thams cad kyang byams pa'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de dag thams cad byams pa'i sems dang ldan zhing
117a8(phal chen): 'tshe ba med pa la zhugs pa kho bo cag gi drung du 'dong ngo // kho bo cag kyang de ltar byams pa'i dbang gi zil gyi non pas/ rang rang gi gnas de
117b1(phal chen): dang de dag na mngon par dga' ba med de/ de ltar bdag cag kyang rang rang gi skye ba 'khor dang bcas te 'phags pa'i drung du 'dong ngo // 'phags
117b2(phal chen): pa bdag cag de ltar ma 'ongs pa rnams la 'di sku las byung ba'i 'od kyi lus thams cad snang bar byas shing bde bas khyad par mdzad de/ de ltar
117b3(phal chen): bdag cag lus dang sems bde bar gyur nas 'phags pa 'di ni ci nas kyang bdag la gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / grul bum dang / lus srul
117b4(phal chen): po mang po byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur pa de lta chos ston to// dri za'i dbang po stong phrag bcu dag kyang steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas 'di skad
117b5(phal chen): ces mdzer to// rigs kyi bu kho bo cag kyang rang rang gi gnas na 'khod pa'i tshe/ 'phags pa dka' thub lngas yongasu gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe me'i
117b6(phal chen): phung po 'di las 'od byung ste/ bdag gi gnas snang bar gyur to// de ltar bdag cag 'od des pho ga ste/ bde ba bsam gyi mi khyab pa dang ldan par
117b7(phal chen): gyur pas/ 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ste/ bdag cag drung du phyin nas kyang / 'phags pa 'di ni bdag ci nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag pa
117b8(phal chen): rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston to// lha ma yin gyi dbang po stong phrag bcu dag kyang rgya mtsho'i nang nas mthon
118a1(phal chen): pal/ @te nam mkha' la pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces 'dzen
118a2(phal chen): to// rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongasu gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ kho bo cag gi lha mo yin gyi 'jig rten rgya mtsho dang / ri rab bcas
118a3(phal chen): ba'i sa chen po'i dkyil 'khor rab tu g.yo bar 'gyur ro// bdag cag kun gyi nga rgyal dang rlom sems dang dregs pa thams cad rtul zhugs dang /
118a4(phal chen): dka' thub kyi zil gyi non te/ 'phags pa de'i drung du 'dong ngo // der byin nas kyang 'phags pa 'di ni bdag cag la rgyu thams cad rab tu spangs
118a5(phal chen): pa dang / chos zab mo'i bzod pa la bzud pa dang / mi g.yo ba'i chos nyid la rab tu dgod pa dang / stobs bcu ye shes yongasu grub par bya
118a6(phal chen): ba'i phyir ston to// nam mkha' lding gi dbang po shugs chen po 'dzin pa la sogs pa nam mkha'i lding gi dbang po stong phrag bcus kyang bram ze'i
118a7(phal chen): bu shin tu sdug gu'i gzugasu mngon par sprul te 'di skad ces 'dzer to// rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad
118a8(phal chen): ba'i tshe/ me'i phung po 'di dag las 'od chen po byung ste/ bdag cag gi gnas snang bar byas nas/ yongs su g.yo bar byed do// des bdag
118b1(phal chen): cag kyang 'jigs shing skrag ste skyo ba'i yid dang ldan par 'gyur ba nas/ 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo // 'phags pa 'di yang bdag cag la
118b2(phal chen): chos ston cing byams pa chen po la yang dag par sbyor ba mdzad do// snying rje chen po la yang dag par dgod pa mdzad do// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho 'jug pa
118b3(phal chen): la yang dag par sbyor bar mdzad do// 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba'i sems can mngon par gdon par bya ba'ang yongasu sbyor ba mdzad do// lhag
118b4(phal chen): pa'i bsam pa'i sgo rnam par dag par bya ba'ang rab tu sbyor bar mdzad do// shes rab dang thabs shin tu gsal ba la'ang yang dag par sbyor ba
118b5(phal chen): mdzad do// rnam pa ji lta bu yongasu smin par sems can gdul bar bya ba la'ang rab tu sbyor ba mdzad do// mi'am ci'i dbang po stong phrag bcu
118b6(phal chen): yang steng gi bar snang la 'khod de 'di skad ces 'dzer to// rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe//
118b7(phal chen): kho bo cag gi gnas na 'khod pa'i ta la'i phreng ba la dril bu'i dra ba rin po che'i srad bu'i lnga ldir spel ba'i sil snyan dang rol mo'i yo byad dang /
118b8(phal chen): rin po che'i rgyan dang khyim gyi longs spyod thams cad las sangs rgyas kyi sgra 'byung ngo // chos kyi sgra dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
119a1(phal chen): ngaladage 'dun gyi sgra dang / byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa'i smon lam gyi sgra 'byung ngo // 'jig rten khams kyi grangs su
119a2(phal chen): bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni byang chub sems dpa'i ming du bya ba zhig dka' yongasu gtong bar byed do// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangasu che ge mo zhig na ni/
119a3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i ming 'di zhes bya ba zhing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yongasu spyod pa byed do// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
119a4(phal chen): grangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni byang chub sems dpa'i ming dang 'di zhes bya ba zhig snying po byang chub tu 'gro'o// 'jig rten gyi khams su bya ba che ge ma
119a5(phal chen): zhig na ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i ming dang 'di zhes bya ba zhig dpung dang gzhon par bcas pa'i bdud rab tu pham par byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag
119a6(phal chen): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan dang
119a7(phal chen): 'di zhes bya ba zhig chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mdzad do// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangasu bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan dang
119a8(phal chen): ni che ge mo zhig sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las ma lus par mdzad nas phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba
119b1(phal chen): mdzad do// zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin te/ rigs kyi bu 'dzam bu gling gi rtsa dang shing dang / yal ga dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma thams cad rdul shin tu phra
119b2(phal chen): ba'i char glags pa'i mur thugs par ni rung yang srid kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi smon lam dang / byang
119b3(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa'i khyad par gang kho bo cag gi gnas na yod pa'i shing ta la'i phreng ba las rol mo'i yo byad dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang khyim gyi
119b4(phal chen): longs spyod rlung gi spyod pa'i sgra 'byung zhing nga ro 'byin pa dang / rna lam du grags pa'i mtha' ni thugs par mi rung ngo // de ltar bdag cag kyang sangs rgyas dang chos
119b5(phal chen): dang dge 'dun dang / byang chub sems dpa' rab tu 'jug pa'i smon lam dang / spyod pa dang mtshan gyi chu klung gi sgras dga' ba chen po'i shugs drag pos
119b6(phal chen): nyam su bde ba skyes te/ 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo // de ltar bdag cag phyin par gyur nas kyang 'phags pa 'di ni bdag cag la ci nas kyang khro bo cag
119b7(phal chen): gi 'khor gyi sems can du ma zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur de lta bur chos ston pa mdzad do// 'dod pa la spyod
119b8(phal chen): pa'i lha'i bu stong phrag dpag tu med pa kha dog shin tu mdzes pa dag kyang na mkha'i la 'khod cing / yid sprul pa'i mchod pas mchod pa byas nas/ 'di skad ces
120a1(phal chen): @#'dzer to// 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ me'i phung po 'di dag las rnam pa 'di lta bu'i 'od 'byung
120a2(phal chen): ste/ 'od de mar na mnar med pa yan chad du sems can dmyal ba rnams snang bar byas nas sems can dmyal ba'i sems can rnams kyang sdug bsngal rtse zil
120a3(phal chen): par byas te/ 'od de nyid kyi 'phags pa 'di dag gi mig lam du snang bar bstan pas de'i phyir kho bo cag kyang 'phags pa 'di las sems mos par gyur nas
120a4(phal chen): 'dod pa la spyod pa'i lha'i bu ris mnyam bde ba skyes so// de ltar bdag kyang 'phags pa 'dis mdzad pa la drin du bzo zhing mthong bas mi ngom pas 'dod pa'i
120a5(phal chen): dga' ba thams cad yongasu spangs te 'phags pa de'i drung du 'dong ngo // der bdag cag phyin nas kyang 'phags pa 'di ni ci nas kyang sems can tshad med pa rnams
120a6(phal chen): byang chub tu smon lam 'deb par 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston par mdzad do// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi tshul rnam pa 'di lta bu thos nas dga' mgur rang ste 'gu
120a7(phal chen): zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes te/ bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched la yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes skyed de/ bram ze rgyal ba
120a8(phal chen): drod kyi skye mched kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa de ltar bdag gi dge ba'i gnyen gyi bka' dang 'gal bar bgyi ba'i
120b1(phal chen): nong par bshags so// de nas bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched kyi tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smras so// byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig
120b2(phal chen): rjesu bstan dang mthun byed cing / dran pa nye bar gzhag ste bla ma'i ngag bcog mi byed na/ de phyir de'i don rnams thams cad mthun pa 'grub par 'gyur/ mthun pa
120b3(phal chen): mthun pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes byang chub drung du 'tshang yang rgya/ de nas tshong dpon gyi dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi ri'i g.yang sa'i lam spu gri'i sos bshib pa la 'dzeg
120b4(phal chen): te/ me'i phung po chen po der 'chongs so// de ltar 'tshong pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bstan pa zhes bya ba thob par 'gyur ro// me des
120b5(phal chen): reg nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu zhi ba'i bde ba'i mngon par shes pa zhes bya ba thob par gyur nas des 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags
120b6(phal chen): pa me'i phung po la de ltar reg na bde ba dang / ri'i lam spu gri snyam pa 'di yang reg na bde ba de ni ngo mtshar che'o/ des smras pa rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems
120b7(phal chen): dpa'i rnam par thar pa dkyil 'khor mi zad pa thogs pa med pa ste/ rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa dkyil 'khor yongs su mi zad
120b8(phal chen): pa 'di shes par zad na kho bos byang chub sems dpa' me'i phung po lta bu 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang lta bu'i rnam pa thams cad yongs su zad par
121a1(phal chen): ngal/ #bya ba'i smon lam can du mtshon phyi mi ldog pa dang ldan pa sems dang thugs pa med cing dma' ba med pa dang ldan pa yid zhum pa med
121a2(phal chen): pa can rdo rje'i snying po dang ldan pa'i mthu chen po lta bu rtsam pa chen po// mthar phyin par bya ba la skyed lug pa med pa/ sbyor ba lhod pa med pa/ rlung gi dkyil
121a3(phal chen): 'khor lta bu 'gro ba thams cad kyi don du brtson pa/ brtson 'grus phyir mi ldog pa dang ldan pa'i go cha bgos pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod du
121a4(phal chen): nus re skan/ songs rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na grong khyer seng ge rnam par bsgyid pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na rgyal po seng ge'i dpal gyi bu mo byams
121a5(phal chen): ma zhes bya ba/ bu mo lnga brgya'i 'khor dang 'dug gi/ de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la slab par bya ba dang / ji
121a6(phal chen): ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tsheng dpon gyi nor bzangs kyi bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ bram ze rgyal
121a7(phal chen): ba'i drod kyi skye mched la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogasu skor ba byas nas yang dang ltas te/ bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched kyi drung nas song ngo // de nas
121a8(phal chen): tshong dpon gyi nor bzang dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim gro bsam gyi mi khyab pa la zhugs pa/ mos pa rgya chen pos rnam par dag par theg pa chen po la mngon du
121b1(phal chen): phyogs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mngon par mos pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la yang dag par zhugs pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rjes su 'breng bar
121b2(phal chen): spro ba/ chos kyi rim gro la rnam par spyod pa/ chags pa med pa'i ye shes la mngon du gyur pa/ yang dag pa'i mtha' shin tu rtogs pa/ ye shes kyi mtha' la
121b3(phal chen): gnas pa'i yul dang ldan pa/ dus gsum skad cig cha shas la khong du chud par byed pa/ nam mkha' gnyis su med pa mngon du gyur pa mi gnyis pa'i mtha'i
121b4(phal chen): rnam par gdon mi za ba thob pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' la rnam par mi rtog par gnas pa sgrib pa med pa'i mtha' 'dul bar khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs
121b5(phal chen): par/ chos kyi mtha' dang mi 'gal bar bya ba la gzhol ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtha' la mtha' med par khong du chud pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad
121b6(phal chen): kyi mtha' la rnam par mi rtog par gnas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi 'du shes kyi dra ba rnam par gtor ba'i ye shes la bzhol ba/ zhing la mngon
121b7(phal chen): par chags pa thams cad dang bral ba/ sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la chags pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas
121b8(phal chen): kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba la gnas pa med par spyod pa/ sems can thams cad la bdag med pa dang / sems can med pa'i 'du shes dang
122a1(phal chen): phal/ #ldan pa/ sgra thams cad tshig gi lam lta bur khong du chud pa/ gzugs thams cad gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan dang mnyam
122a2(phal chen): par rnam par rig par bya ba la gzhol ba de/ mthar gyi seng ge rnam par bsgying pa'i grong khyer ga na ba der byin te/ bu mo bya ma mtshol zhing yongasu rmed rmed
122a3(phal chen): pa las/ rgyal po seng ge'i dpal gyi bu mo byam ma 'khor bu mo lnga dang ldan pa ste/ khang pa rnam par snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'i nang na khri sprul
122a4(phal chen): gyi snying po can gser gyi lcag phod kyi dra bas legs par blang ba/ lha rdzas kyi stan bsting ba la 'dug cing / chos ston to// zhes thos nas seng ge rnam
122a5(phal chen): pa ra sgying ba'i grong khyer du song nas/ rgyal po seng ge dpal gyi gnas gang na ba der phyin nas rgyal po'i phyi sgo'i sgo gang na ba bu mo byam ma mthong bar
122a6(phal chen): dga' ba'i phyir 'dug 'dug pa dang / der des srog chags brgya phrag du ma dang / srog chags stong phrag du ma dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma dang
122a7(phal chen): 'dod ba mthong nas/ khyed gang nas 'od de gang du 'dong zhes dris pa dang / de dag na re nged ni bu mo byams ma'i drung du chos snyan pa'i phyir 'dong zhes nas
122a8(phal chen): des bsam pa 'dir ni su 'gro yang bkag pa med pa lta zhing snyam ste de'ang nang du byin to// de ltar phyin te ltas na khang pa rnam par snang ba'i snying po can
122b1(phal chen): de yang gzhi shel du 'dug pa'i sa las blangs te/ bai DUr+ya'i ka ba skye ba rtsig pa rdo rje las byas pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi lhun dang ldan pa'i ba gam brgya
122b2(phal chen): phrag steng gi brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che grangs med pas rnam par bris yang / rin po che stong gi snying po'i me long gi dkyil 'khor gyi shin tu spangs
