122b3(phal chen): par byas pa/ nor bu rin po che 'gro ba yid du 'ongs pas rnam par brgyan pa/ rin po che'i shing thags grangs med pa'i yongs su bskor ba/ gser
122b4(phal chen): gyi dril bu brgya stong shin tu khrol ba'i sgra brnyen pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i brgyan dang ldan pa mthong ngo // bu mo byams ma de yang mig dkar nag
122b5(phal chen): 'gyes pa/ sgra mthon 'thing du 'dug pa/ mdog gser gyi kha dog ltar 'dug pa mthong nas de'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan
122b6(phal chen): brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas nas thal me sbya re te 'dun du 'dug nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags ma bdag gi bla na med pa
122b7(phal chen): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la slab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi
122b8(phal chen): ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags ma 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdam ngag rjes su bstan pa mdzad do// zhes bdag gi thos nas 'phags pa ji
123a1(phal chen): laltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la slab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad
123a2(phal chen): du gsol// smras pa rigs kyi bu kho bo'i gnas kyi rgyan la ltos shig ces nas des kun tu nyul te ltas pa dang / rtsigs pa re re dang / ka ba re re ba dang /
123a3(phal chen): me long gi dkyil 'khor re re dang / rnam pa'i bye brag re re dang / dbyibs re re dang / nor bu rin po che re re dang / gser gyi dril bu re re dang / rin po
123a4(phal chen): che'i shing re re dang / ba spu'i bu ga re re dang / rin po che'i se mo do re re las kyang chos kyi dbyings thams cad na zhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thog
123a5(phal chen): ma thugs bskyed pa dang bcas pa/ spyod pa dang smon lam gyi yul dang bcas pa 'byung ba'i rgyan dang bcas pa/ mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam 'phrul
123a6(phal chen): dang bcas pa/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang bcas pa/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ston pa dang bcas par gzugs brnyan gyi tshul gyi mthong
123a7(phal chen): bar gyur to// dmigs pa de dag re re las ji lta ba bzhin du dmigs pa thams cad las kyang mthong bar gyur to// 'di ltar dper na chus yongasu gang ba'i
123a8(phal chen): tsho dang zhing rnyog pa med pa la rnam par gsal ba ni/ nam mkha' nyi zla skar ma'i tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du yongasu snang ngo //
123b1(phal chen): de bzhin du khang pa rjer par snang ba'i snying po'i dmigs pa re re las kyang chos kyi dbyings kun na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzugs brnyan
123b2(phal chen): gyi tshul du yongs su snang bar gyur te/ de'i bu mo byams ma'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu'i phyir te/ des de ltar rnam par ltas nas/ sangs rgyas mthong ba'i
123b3(phal chen): rgyan gyi mtshan ma de yongs su gzung ste/ thal mo sbyar nas bu mo byams ma'i gdong du ltas pa dang / des smras pa rigs kyi bu kho mo ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
123b4(phal chen): phyin pa'i sgo'i rgyud kun nas nam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba thob pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'i rgyud 'di ni/ kho mo'i de bzhin gshegs pa
123b5(phal chen): chu klung gang gsum cu rtsa drug gi bye ma snyed las yongasu bstsal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'i rgyud kun nas
123b6(phal chen): rnam par brgyan pa 'di sna tshogs kyi khong du chud par bya bas rtogs par mdzad de/ gcig gi gang gsung ba de yang gnyis kyi ma gsungs so// smras pa 'phags
123b7(phal chen): ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo rgyud kun nas rnam par brgyan pa 'di'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis/ spras pa rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
123b8(phal chen): pa'i sgo'i rgyud kun nas rnam par brgyan pa 'di la kho mo mngon du byed cing / sems pa dang rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / rnam par dpyod pa dang / rjes su
124a1(phal chen): bal/ sems pa dang / dran par bya ba dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / rnam par rtag pa dang / mngon par bsgrub pa dang / yang dag
124a2(phal chen): par brgyan par bya ba dang / rab tu rnam par dbye ba byed pa'i tshe/ gzungs kun nas sgo zhes bya ba yongasu skye ste/ gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor der ni chos
124a3(phal chen): kyi sgo brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu yongasu 'du'o// khongasu chud do// mngon du 'gyur ro// mngon par 'du'o// khong du 'khod do// 'di lta ste/
124a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi sgo dang / chos kyi sgo dang / sems can gyi sgo dang / 'das pa'i sgo dang / ma 'ongs pa'i sgo dang / da ltar byung ba'i sgo dang / gnas pa
124a5(phal chen): mtha'i sgo dang / bsod nams kyi sgo dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi sgo dang / ye shes kyi sgo dang / ye shes kyi tshogs kyi sgo dang / smon lam gyi sgo dang /
124a6(phal chen): smon lam gyi rnam pa'i sgo dang / spyod pa'i sgo dang / spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i sgo dang / spyod pa yongs su 'byung ba'i sgo dang / spyod pa yongs su rdzogs
124a7(phal chen): par bya ba'i sgo dang / las kyi sgo dang / las dang mi 'gal ba'i sgo dang / las kyi rgyud kyi sgo dang / las mngon par 'du bya ba'i sgo dang / mi mnyam
124a8(phal chen): pa'i las yongasu spang ba'i sgo dang / yang dag pa'i las la nan tan du bya ba'i sgo dang / las la dbang sgyur ba'i sgo dang / legs par spyad pa yang dag
124a9(phal chen): ralegs par spyad pa'i sgo dang /
124b1(phal chen): bar blang ba'i sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin khong du chung bar bya ba'i sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin la rnam par spyad pa'i sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi
124b2(phal chen): spyod yul gyi sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin las 'das pa'i sgo dang / mngon pa'i sgo dang / sems rgya mtsho'i sgo dang / sems kyi rnam grangs kyi sgo dang / sems
124b3(phal chen): kyi rgyud yongasu dag par bya ba'i sgo dang / sems kyi thib po snang bar byed pa'i sgo dang / sems kyi mtsho dang bar bya ba'i sgo dang / sems 'byung ba'i sgo dang
124b4(phal chen): sems rnam par rgyu ba'i sgo dang / sems kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sgo dang / nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi sgo dang / nyon mongs pa sbyor ba'i sgo dang /
124b5(phal chen): mos pa'i sgo dang / sems can gyi spyod pa tha dad pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten 'byung ba'i sgo dang / sems can gyi bsam pa'i sgo dang / sems can gyi 'dra
124b6(phal chen): shes kyi rnam pa'i sgo dang / phyogs kyi sgo dang / chos phyogs kyi sgo dang / snying rje chen po'i sgo dang / byams pa chen po'i sgo dang / zhi ba'i sgo dang / ngag
124b7(phal chen): las kyi sgo dang / tshul gyi sgo dang / khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo dang / rnam par phye ba'i sgo dang / yang dag par 'du ba'i sgo dang / chags pa med pa'i mtha
124b8(phal chen): sgo dang / kun gyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi sgo dang / nyan thos kyi sgo dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi
125a1(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams snrel bzhi'i sgo dang /
125a2(phal chen): phal/ sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi chos kyi sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi 'byung ba'i chos sgo dang / 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sgo dang / 'jig
125a3(phal chen): rten gyi kun na gnas pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sgo dang / 'jig
125a4(phal chen): rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa la rnam par dga' ba'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag pa la kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sgo dang / 'jig
125a5(phal chen): rten gyi khams cig tu rnam par dag pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhi mnyam pa nyid khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams spyi
125a6(phal chen): tshug su rgyu ba'i sgo dang / mig 'phrul du 'dug pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sgo dang / gnas kyi 'du shes kyi rnam par 'gyur ba'i sgo dang / phra
125a7(phal chen): brgya chen por khong du chud pa'i sgo dang / rtsachen po phra bar khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas mthong bar bya ba'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku rnam pa
125a8(phal chen): tha dad pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer gyi dra ba'i rnam pa tha dad pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi 'khor lo rnam par phye ba'i sgo dang / sangs
125a9(phal chen): rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo tha dad pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo tha mi dad pa'i sgo dang /
125b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i nges tshig gi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo kun tu 'khor ba'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las kyi sgo dang /
125b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par bye ba'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho
125b3(phal chen): 'jug pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod
125b4(phal chen): ba'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi sems can pha rol gyi sems thugasu chud pa
125b5(phal chen): sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul ba'i sgo dang / dga' ldan gyi pho brang na bzhugs pa'i sgo nas yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba bstan
125b6(phal chen): pa'i bar gyi sgo dang / sems can gyi don tshad med pa mdzad pa'i sgo chos zab mo'i tshul gyi sgo dang / chos sna tshogs kyi tshul gyi sgo dang / byang chub sems
125b7(phal chen): kyi chos kyi rnam pa'i sgo dang / byang chub kyi sems 'byung ba'i rnam pa'i chos kyi sgo dang / byang chub sems kyi tshogs kyi rnam pa'i sgo dang / smon lam gyi
125b8(phal chen): rnam pa'i sgo dang / spyod pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / mngon par shes pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / 'byung ba'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / gzungs rnam par dag pa'i
126a1(phal chen): pal/ rnam pa'i sgo dang / ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / shes rab yongs su dag pa'i rnam pa
126a2(phal chen): sgo dang / byang chub tshad med pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / dran pa rnam par dag pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dag ste/ rigs kyi bu kho bos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
126a3(phal chen): pa'i sgo'i rgyud dran pas kun nas rnam par brgyad pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa' sems nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa dang /
126a4(phal chen): blo gros kyi dbyings ltar yangs pa/ rgyud bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi brtan pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam du zhugs pa 'jig rten gyi chos yongasu
126a5(phal chen): mi rgyu ba/ ye shes snang ba'i mig rab rib med pa/ rab tu thob pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad mun pa med par khong du chud pa/ blo nam mkha' ltar
126a6(phal chen): tshad med pa dang ldan pa dmigs pa thams cad rjes su song ba'i dmigs pa can/ chags pa med pa'i sa snang ba'i snying po dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad
126a7(phal chen): kyi don rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pa/ zil gyis gnon la 'jig rten kun gyi zil gyi mi non pa/ 'jig rten spyod pa'i tshul la rnam par spyod la/ 'jig
126a8(phal chen): rten gyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa 'jig rten gyi don byed pa la rtson pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi ngag gi tshul la rnam par mkha
126b1(phal chen): pa/ 'gro ba thams cad du gnas pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs pa rton pa/ dus kyi 'khor lo thams
126b2(phal chen): cad la dbang bsgyur ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ brjod pa nus re kan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ yul mig gsum
126b3(phal chen): pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na dge slong lta na sdug pa zhes bya ba 'dug gi/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la slab par bya ba dang /
126b4(phal chen): ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang kyi bu mo byams ma'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ bu mo byams
126b5(phal chen): ma la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyog su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang ltas te/ bu mo byams ma'i drung nas song so// de nas tshong dpon gyi
126b6(phal chen): bu nor bzangs byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi rnam par spyod pa zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi zab mo khong du chud
126b7(phal chen): bar bya ba rjes su bsam pa dang / sems can gyi ye shes shin tu phra zhing zab pa rjes su bsam pa dang / 'jig rten gyi 'du shes rnam par zab me
126b8(phal chen): rjes su bsam pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang / sems kyi rgyud kyi dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam
127a1(phal chen): phalapa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang / rang bzhin gyi bden pa'i dbyings
127a2(phal chen): za ba mo rjes su bsam pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi rnam par spyod pa'i bden pa'i dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang / chos kyi dbyings
127a3(phal chen): brgyan pa'i rgyan gyi dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang / lus kyi 'khrul 'khor shugs kyi 'khor ba'i dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang
127a4(phal chen): las kyi sna tshog su gyur pa'i dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa byed cing / mthar gyi yul dmigs gsum pa gang na ba der phyin te/ yul gyi
127a5(phal chen): 'khor dang / tshong 'dus kyi 'khor dang / grong rdal gyi 'khor dang / yul gru'i 'khor dang / lhas kyi 'khor dang / drang srong dge sbyong gi
127a6(phal chen): 'khor dang / yul phyogs kyi 'khor dang / chu rgyud kyi 'khor dang / ri'i sa la sul gyi 'khor dang / nags tshal chen po'i 'khor dag tu dge
127a7(phal chen): slong lta na sdug pa yongs su tshol tshol ba las/ dge slong lta na sdug pa nag tshal stug po zhig na gzhon zhing dngal bab pa gzugs mdzes shing sdug sa
127a8(phal chen): lta na yid du 'ong ba'i sgra mthon 'thing g.ya su 'khyil ba dang ldan pa/ mgo bo gdug ltar 'dug pa/ gtsug tor gyi spyi bo can/ dpral ba yangs
127b1(phal chen): pa mig dkar nag byas shing rings la/ rdzi ma ba'i rdzi ma ltar 'dug pa/ sna'i dbyibs legs shing bzang la ran par mdzes pa dang ldan pa/ ma mchu 'cha
127b2(phal chen): ltar mdog bzang zhing shin tu legs pa dang ldan pa/ so mnyam zhing thag bzang la shin tu dkar ba bzhi bcu tshangs pa dang ldan pa/ 'gram pa'i lha nga seng ge
127b3(phal chen): ltar 'dug pa/ mkhur ba shas gang zhing rgyas pa/ smin tshugs gzhu ltar 'dug cing ring la shin tu mdzes pa/ mdzod spu zla ba'i kha dog ltar 'dug pa'i
127b4(phal chen): thig le tsa na/ rna shal ring zhing lhod par 'chang ba/ zla ba nya ba ltar bzhin mdangs dang ldan zhing shin tu bzang ba/ mgur zlum zhing dung ltar mdzes pa/
127b5(phal chen): snying khar dpal gyi be'us brgyan pa/ ro stod seng ge ltar 'dug pa/ thal gong shin tu rgyas pa/ dpung mgo'i lhun legs shing zlum pa/ lag pa ring
127b6(phal chen): la dra bas 'brel pa'i sor mo can/ rkang lag 'khor los brgyan pa/ ska lag gzhon zhing 'jam la sha rgyas pa/ mdun shin tu mtho ba/ skyed pa rje ltar
127b7(phal chen): 'dug pa/ lus che zhing drang / brla bzlum pa/ phe mtshan gsang ba'i sbub su 'dug pa/ byin pa ri dgas e na ya'i byin pa ltar 'dug pa/ sor mo rang /
127b8(phal chen): ba/ rkang pa'i rting ba yang ba/ 'od 'dom gang ba dang ldan pa/ mdog gser gyi mdog ltar 'dug pa/ ba spu re re nas g.yas phyogasu gyen du 'khyil ba
128a1(phal chen): ngalashing ny+tsa tro ta'i rgyal po ltar chu zhing gang ba/ lus mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos shin tu brgyan pa/ mig mi 'gebs shig
128a2(phal chen): dgod pa dang / dran pa nye bar gnas pa/ ri'i rgyal po kha ba can ltar rtsa dang nag tshal dang / sngan dang shing phran sna tshogs kyi brgyan pa/ blo shin tu yang
128a3(phal chen): pa/ ye shes kyi spyod yul can/ yul thugs pa med pa/ dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rkyen sprin gyi sgra lta bu dang ldan pa/ g.yo ba rlom sems dang
128a4(phal chen): g.yeng ba dang / spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ ye shes kyi spyod yul ma 'dres pa sangs rgyas kyi yul rgya chen po'i snang ba
128a5(phal chen): thob pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / 'dul ba'i bsam pa rgyun mi chad pa'i snying rje chen po'i dkyil 'khor shin tu yangs
128a6(phal chen): bskyed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshul yongs su gzung ba dang / sems can ye shes snang ba yang dag par bskyed pa'i phyir/ de
128a7(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul rjesu dran zhing 'gro ba thams cad kyi don du chags pa la zhugs te/ drag dal med cing bang dral med la shin tu mdzes par
128a8(phal chen): chags pa/ gnas gtsang ma'i gos dang ldan pa/ lha dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi
128b1(phal chen): 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pas bskor cing 'dug pa mtho
128b2(phal chen): ngo // dge slong lta na mdzes pa de 'chag pa'i tshe/ phyogs mngon du gyur pa'i lha rnams phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su sgrub pa byed do// rkang
128b3(phal chen): gi 'gro ba'i lha rnams rin po che'i pad+mos gom pa 'dor ba'i tshe/ yongs su blang bar byed do// mi'i lha snang ba'i dkyil 'khor zad mi shes pa
128b4(phal chen): rnams kyang mun pa dang ra ba ri ba rnam par sel to// 'dzam bu rgyal mtshan gyi nag tshal gyi lha rnams kyang me tog mang po'i char mngon par
128b5(phal chen): 'babs so// sa'i lha mo g.yo ba'i snying po can rnams kyang thal mo sbyar cing phyag 'tshal lo// rlung gi lta thogs pa med pa'i stobs can rnam
128b6(phal chen): kyang sros dang bdug spos dang me tog 'thor ba'i rlung rab tu 'gyed do// mtshan mo'i lha gnas par byed pa lus shin tu brgyan pa rnams kyang lus
128b7(phal chen): shin tu sdud cing phyag 'tshal lo// nyon mongs pa'i lha rtag tu sad par bya ba'i dkyil 'khor can rnams rin po che phyogs sdang bar byed rgyal mtshan
128b8(phal chen): thogs shing / snang ba skyed pa'i phyir nam mkha'i dbyings la 'khod do// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang dge slong lta na sdug pa gang na der phyin nas/
129a1(phal chen): phal/ @dge slong lta na sdug gi rkang pa'i bol gnyis la spyi bos btugs te phyag 'tshal nas dge slong lta na sdug gi rkang pa'i bol ga
129a2(phal chen): la bzhin sbyar te/ legs par phyis nas 'dun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag gi bla na med pa yang dag par
129a3(phal chen): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bzhugs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su tshol ba zhig lags te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems
129a4(phal chen): dpa' rnams la gdam ngag rjes su rtan par mdzad do// zhes bdag gi thos na 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
129a5(phal chen): pa la slab par bgyi ba dang / nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ des sbas pa rigs kyi bu kho bo ni chos btab dar la bab pa rab tu byung
129a6(phal chen): bas btab na bsar du zhugs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu kho bo ni tshe de 'dra ba cig gi de bzhin gshegs pa chu klung gang ga sum cu rtsa brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyi drung du
129a7(phal chen): tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad de/ bdag gi de bzhin gshegs pa la la'i zham 'bring du nyin cig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad do// la lar ni nyin zhag bdun
129a8(phal chen): du/ la lar ni zla ba byed du/ la lar ni zla ba cig tu/ la lar ni lo cig tu/ la lar ni lo brgyar/ la lar ni lo stong du/ la lar ni lo brgya phrag
129b1(phal chen): stong du/ la lar ni lo bye bar/ la lar ni lo khrag khrig brgya/ la lar ni lo bye ba brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par/ la lar ni bskal pa/
129b2(phal chen): bar mar/ la lar ni bskal pa phyed du/ la lar ni bskal bar de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa la la'i zham 'bring du ni bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang
129b3(phal chen): brjod du med par tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad do// bskal pa bgrang ba'i tshul 'di nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la chos ston par thos te/ gdam
129b4(phal chen): ngag rjes su stan pa yang dag par byangs so// smon lam brgyan yongs su spangaso// yang dag pa'i sgrub pa'i yul la zhugaso// sprod pa'i dkyil 'khor
129b5(phal chen): yongs su sbyangs so// pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho yongasu rdzogs par byas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa yongasu shes
129b6(phal chen): par byas so// de dag gi chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba phan tshun ma 'dres pa dag kyang yongasu shes so// de dag gi stobs mnyam pa nyid kyang khong du chud
129b7(phal chen): par byed do// de dag gi bstan pa yang dam pa'i tshod zad pa'i mthar thug gi bar du yongs su bzung ngo // kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams
129b8(phal chen): cad kyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin mngon par sgrub pa'i stobs kyi rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa'i mngon par bsgrubaso// /
130a1(phal chen): phalakho bos de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnams kyang spyod pa thams
130a2(phal chen): cad la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i stobs kyi rang bzhin gyi spyod pa yongasu dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon par bsgrubs so// kho bos de bzhin
130a3(phal chen): gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dge ba yang dag par kun tu bzang po'i spyod pas 'byung ba'i stobs kyi mngon par
130a4(phal chen): bsgrub po// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu kho bo cag la 'di na 'chag pa'i tshe/ phyogs kyi rgyud kyi sgo thams cad kyang shin tu rnam par lta ba'i ye shes
130a5(phal chen): kyi sgo mngon du 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi thams cad kyang / smon lam chen po mngon par bsgrub pa'i stobs kyi sems bskyed
130a6(phal chen): pa cig la 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa 'da' zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir rnam par 'grub par 'gyuraro//
130a7(phal chen): sems can gyi skad cig la sems can gyi spyod pa'i tshul gyi sgo brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu

130b1(phal chen): ro// sems bskyed pa cig las sangs rgyas brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa mthong ba rnam par dag la bdag kyang snga phyi'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnam
130b2(phal chen): la mchod pa'i smon lam mngon par sgrub pa'i stobs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la
130b3(phal chen): mchod pa dang / snyen bkur ba dang / rim gro bya ba'i phyir mngon du 'gyur ro// sems bskyed pa cig la de bzhin gshegs pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med
130b4(phal chen): pa'i chos sprin gyi char rnams kyang chos kyi 'khor lo yongasu gzungs dang / smon lam mngon par sgrub pa'i stobs kyis chos kyi tshul grangs med pa rnam par 'tshangs
130b5(phal chen): rgya zhing khong du chud par bsam pa la mngon par 'babs so// sems bskyed pa cig la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med

130b7(phal chen): thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir mngon du 'gyur ro// sems bskyed pa cig la ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang
130b8(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad yang dag par 'du bya ba'i smon lam mngon par sgrub pa'i stobs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yongasu dag par bya ba'i

136b7(phal chen): brjod pa la skyes pa na shin tu snyan pa'o// de'i 'dun na bye ma'i phung po chen po dpag tshad du ma'i tshul dang ldan pa zhig 'dug pa las/ 'di la bye ma'i 'bru
136b8(phal chen): 'di nyid cig yod do// zhes bya ba nas bye ma'i 'bru brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa la 'di snyed cig yod do// zhes rab tu phye nas/ bgrang rtsis/
137a1(phal chen): ngalate/ bgrangs su bcad do// des bye ma'i phung po rtsis kyi rngar bstan pas/ shin tu bstan nas 'di skad smras so//
137a2(phal chen): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi grangs kyi tshul 'di ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams cig nas cig tu rgyud pa kun na yang yod de/ byang chub
137a3(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams kyi bgrang ba'i tshul gyi shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'jam klasma dag kyang bgrang zhing rtsi'o// de bzhin du lho phyogs dang /
137a4(phal chen): nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs 'tshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs 'tshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshams dang / nub
137a5(phal chen): byang gi phyogs 'tshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyog su yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams grangs pa'i tshul 'dis/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'jam klas
137a6(phal chen): pa dag bgrang zhing rtsi'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bgrang ba'i tshul 'di ni/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ming du bya ba
137a7(phal chen): cig nas cig tu rgyud pa stan du yod pa thams cad na'ang yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bgrang ba'i tshul gyis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
137a8(phal chen): gyi khams cig nas cig tu rgyud pa bgrang zhing rtsi'o// de ltar 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ming cig nas cig tu rgyud pa stan du yod pa de bzhin du/ phyogs
137b1(phal chen): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bskal pa'i ming cig nas cig tu rgyud pa stan du yod pa dang / sangs rgyas cig nas cig tu rgyud pa stan du yod pa dang /
137b2(phal chen): chos kyi ming cig nas cig tu rgyud pa stan du yod pa dang / sems can gyi ming cig nas cig tu rgyud pa bstan du yod pa dang / las kyi ming cig nas cig
137b3(phal chen): tu rgyud bstan du yod pa dang / ku la 'ang 'jug ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bgrang ba'i tshul 'di nyid ni phyogs bcu nas ming du bya ba cig na
137b4(phal chen): cig tu rgyud pa stan du rung ba ji snyed pa thams cad la'ang 'jug ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bgrang ba'i tshul 'di nyid ni phyogs bcu na ming
137b5(phal chen): cig tu rgyud pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bgrang zhing rtsi'o// de ltar rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes snang ba chos thams cad shes
137b6(phal chen): bar bya ba'i bzo mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad kyi bgrang la zhugs pa/
137b7(phal chen): chos kyi tshul thams cad kyi bgrang la zhugs pa/ dus gsum gyi bgrang la zhugs pa/ sems can thams cad kyi grangs la zhugs pa/ chos kyi phung
137b8(phal chen): po thams cad kyi grangs la zhugs pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi grangs la zhugs pa/ chos thams cad kyi ming gi 'kho
138a1(phal chen): la/ 'khor lo la dbang sgyur ba/ de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan shes pa brjod pa 'am/ spyod yul smos pa'am/ yul
138a2(phal chen): brjod pa'am/ stobs sngags pa'am/ bsam pastan pa'am/ tshogs yongs su spyod pa'am/ sngon lam bshad par bya ba'am/ spyod pa yongasu stan
138a3(phal chen): ba'am/ pha rol tu phyin pa yong su dag pa mngon par brjod pa'am/ yang dag par sgrub pa yong su dag pa yang dag par snyan pa'am/ ting nge 'dzin khyad
138a4(phal chen): bar smos pa'am/ ye shes snang ba khong du chud par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid ni/ grong khyer rgya mtsho bstan pa zhes
138a5(phal chen): bya ba yod do// de na dge snyen ma phul du byung ba zhes bya ba 'dug gi/ de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
138a6(phal chen): ba la srab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshig thos nas spu g.yos te
138a7(phal chen): dga' ba chen po'i shugs skyes nas/ rab tu dga' ba'i yid dang ldan par 'gyur ba/ ngo mtshar gyi bsam pa rab tu dkon pa thob bo// 'gro ba mang po la bar
138a8(phal chen): pa'i sems dang bsam pas 'byung ba/ sangs rgyas skyes pa cig tu rgyan pa la 'gro ba la dbang sgyur ba/ chos kyi 'khor lo rnam par dag pa'i blo gros la
138b1(phal chen): bstan pa thams cad du rjes su song ba'i rigs pa rnam par bye bas 'byung ba bstan pa la brtson pa/ dus gsum gyi dbyings ma 'dres pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
138b2(phal chen): yul dang ldan pa/ bsod nams mi zad pa'i rgya mtsho las byung ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ ye shes kyi snang ba chen po lnga dang sbyar ba/ khams gsum gyi khyim
138b3(phal chen): du bsdud pa'i sgo shin tu gcog pa des/ khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug gi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas khye'u dbang phyug la lan brgya stong du g.yas
138b4(phal chen): phyogasu bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang ltas te/ khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug gi drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang dge ba'i bshes
138b5(phal chen): gnyen gyi gdam ngag gi sprin char yongasu 'dzin pa byed cing / gang chen mtsho ltar sprin chen po'o// char gyi ngem mi shes pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi nyi ma'i
138b6(phal chen): ye shes kyi 'od zer gyi dge ba yongasu smin par byas pa'i sa'i gzhi las/ dbang po'i myur gu thon cing skyes pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi zla ba nya zhing
138b7(phal chen): rgyas pa'i gdam ngag gi 'od zer gyi dra bas lus dang sems shin tu tshim par byas pa/ dpyid kyi nyi ma'i 'od kyi gdung ba'i ri dgas kyi tshogs gsal
138b8(phal chen): zhing gsal ba'i gang gi chu 'thung bar 'dod pa ltar/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdam ngag gi chu la 'thung 'dod par/ bung ba mang po 'khor zhing lding
139a1(phal chen): pabs rgyas par gyur pa'i pad mo dang ldan pa'i pad mo'i mtsho ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdam ngag gi rje sems can gyi me/
139a2(phal chen): tog pun da ri ka kha phye ba/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi yongs su rgyas pa/ rin po che'i gling ltar/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdam ngag gi/ gdam ngag
139a3(phal chen): gi rin po che g.yel ba'i snang bas sems shin tu snang bar byed pas/ 'dzam bu'i shing chen po me tog dang 'bras bu'i tshogs chen po dang ldan pa ltar/
139a4(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdam dag/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogasu gyur pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa/ klu'i dbang po chen po rtsed mo dam
139a5(phal chen): bas/ rtse ba las byung ba'i nam mkha'i sprin chen po ltar/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdam ngag thos pa'i tshogasu gyur pa'i snang ba shin tu che ba/ sum cu
139a6(phal chen): rtsa gsum pa'i 'jig rten gyi brgyan pa'i sna tshogs kyi spos ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdam ngag las byung ba'i/ chos kyi dri ma med pa sna tshogs
139a7(phal chen): rtsegs pa'i sngor gyur pa/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i/ brgya byin lha ma yin gyi dbang po'i tshogs rab tu 'joms pa ltar/
139a8(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdam ngag las byung ba'i/ yon tan dri ba med pa'i tshogs kyi yongasu bskor cing / zil gyi mi non la/ gzhan yang zil
139b1(phal chen): gyi gnon pa/ de ltar gyi grong khyer rgya mtshor ga na ba der phyin te/ dge snyen ma phul du byung ba yongs su tshol tshol ba las/ de la skye ba mang pos bstan
139b2(phal chen): te/ rigs kyi bu dge snyen ma phul du byung ba'i grong khyer gyi dbus kyi rang gi khyim na 'dug go// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang dge snyen ma/ phul
139b3(phal chen): du byung ba'i gnas gang na ba der song ste/ thal mo sbyar nas sgo gang na sdod pa dang / des dge snyen ma phul du byung ba'i khyim de shin tu rgya che la yang shing
139b4(phal chen): rin po che'i ra bas yongs su bskor ba/ phyogs bzhi nas sgo shin tu mdzes pa/ rnam par phye ba rin po che tshad med grangs med pa'i rgyan gyi brgyan pa/
139b5(phal chen): bsod nams kyi rnam par smin par bsgrub pa mthong nas/ de khyim der song ste kun tu ltas te/ dge snyen ma phul du byung ba phyug cing shin tu bzhon pa/ thog
139b6(phal chen): mar dar la bab la/ gzugs mngon zhing mdzes la lta na sdug pa/ kha dog dam pa pri ya ba shin tu rgyas pa dang ldan pa/ skra phye mar bzhag pa/ lus la rgyan med
139b7(phal chen): pa/ gos dang smad g.yog dkar por bgos pa/ rin po che'i khri la 'dug pa mthong ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' ma rtogs par/ de'i lus sam
139b8(phal chen): sems kyi dbang ngam/ gzi brjid dam kha dog zil gyi mi non pa'i sems can ni khyim de na gang yang med de/ lha'ang mi'ang rung ste/ sems can gang gi dge snyen
140a1(phal chen): ma bul du byung ba mthong bar gyur pa/ de dag thams cad kyi dge snyen ma phul du byung ba la/ ston pa'i 'du shes su bsam pa zhig rin
140a2(phal chen): po che'i khri la 'dug pa mthong // gzhan yang khyim de na stan lha rdzas dang / mi'i rdzas las shin tu 'phags pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i las kyi rnam par smin
140a3(phal chen): bas/ yongs su grub pa bye ba stong phrag bcus bting ba dang / 'dun du phru ba gcig bya zhag bzhag pa las/ kha zas dang / sgom gyi ba gam gos dang / rgyan
140a4(phal chen): gyi longs spyod kyi bag gzhan ci yang mi snang ngo // bud med stong phrag bcu tsam zhig 'dun na 'dug par mthong na yang / de dag thams cad kyang / lha'i bu mo kha
140a5(phal chen): dog dang ldan pa/ lha'i bu mo'i gzugs dang ldan pa/ lha'i bu mo'i tshul dang ldan pa/ lha'i bu mo'i spyod pa dang ldan pa/ lha'i bu mo'i longs spyod dang ldan pa/
140a6(phal chen): lha'i bu mo'i tshul du shig pa dang ldan pa/ lha rdzas kyi gos yid bzhin du gyon pa/ lha rdzas kyi lhab lhub kyi shin tu klubs pa/ lha'i bu mo'i skad lta bu'i dbyangs
140a7(phal chen): snyan pa dang ldan pa/ lha'i bu mo'i chu zheng mdzes pa dang ldan pa sha stag ste/ de'i 'khor gyi bud med kyang de ci bsgo ba bzhin du byed cing 'dun na 'khod do// rim gro
140a8(phal chen): byed do// bkur sti byed do// gdong du ltar// ci bsgo ba nyan cing gnas so// rjes sar byed do// yongasu lta'o// rnam por lta'o// bdud do// rab tu 'dud do//
140b1(phal chen): phyag 'tshal lo// de dag lus las spos kyi ngad ldang bas ni/ grong khyer de'i 'khor thams cad du dri zhib pos khyad par 'dug ste/ sems can gang gi dri de tshor bar
140b2(phal chen): gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / gnod sems med par sems dang / shar gnyer ba med pa'i sems dang / 'tshe ba med pa'i sems dang / phra dog dang / 'jungs pa
140b3(phal chen): dang bral ba'i sems dang / sgyu dang / g.yo med pa'i sems dang / chags pa dang / khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang / zhum pa med pa dang / bzang thob med pa'i sem
140b4(phal chen): dang / byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang / sdom pa la gnas pa'i sems dang / gzhan gyi yongasu bzung ba la re ba med pa'i sems su 'gyur te/ gang
140b5(phal chen): gi de dag gi skad thos pa de dag thams cad kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / dul ba'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gang gi de dag mthong bar 'gyur ba de dag
140b6(phal chen): kyang 'dod chags dang bral ba tsam du rang rang gi shes par 'gyur ro// de ltar mthong nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ dge snyen ma phul du byung ba'i rkang pa
140b7(phal chen): gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge snyen ma phul du byung ba la lan brgya steng du mar g.yas phyogs nas skor ba byas nas/ 'dun du 'dug go// thal mo sbyor
140b8(phal chen): nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags ma bdag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ byang
141a1(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la slab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags ma ni byang chub sems dpa
141a2(phal chen): rnams la gdas dag ngas su batha pa mdza sa// zhes bdag gi bstan/ 'phagasmram de sar byung chub sems dpa/ byang chub sems dpa'i byung gA
141a3(phal chen): par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ smras pa rigs kyi bu kho mas ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsod nams
141a4(phal chen): kyi mdzod mi zad pa'i rgyan ces bya ba thob pa ste/ rigs kyi bu kho mo ni bru ba gcig po 'di las mos pa sna tshogs can rnams/ kha zas ci la dga' ba bzhin du/
141a5(phal chen): tshod ma sna tshogs dang / ro sna tshogs dang / kha zas sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs kyi tshim par byed do// rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo ni phru ba gcig po 'di
141a6(phal chen): las ci dga' ba'i kha zas kyi sems can brgya yang yongs su tshim par byed do// sems can stong dang / sems can brgya phrag stong dang / sems can bye ba
141a7(phal chen): dang / sems can bye ba phrag brgya dang / sems can bye ba phrag stong dang / sems can bye ba brgya phrag stong dang / sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag
141a8(phal chen): stong dang / sems can brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa sos par sna tshogs can rnams kyang ci la dga' ba'i kha zas kyi yongasu tshim par byed do//
141b1(phal chen): yongs su stobs par byed do// yongs su dga' bar byed do// yongs su mgu bar byed do// yongs su spro bar byed do// shin tu tshim par byed do// yid bde
141b2(phal chen): bar byed do// 'on kyang phru ba 'di las 'god par 'gyur ba med do// 'grib pa med do// dma' bar mi 'gyur ro// zad par mi 'gyur ro// 'bri bar mi
141b3(phal chen): 'gyur ro// sa tshams yod par mi 'gyur ro// mthar thugs par mi 'gyur ro// mur thug par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu bzhud de dang 'dra ba sems
141b4(phal chen): can 'dzam bu gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / de bzhin du gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang / stong gi 'jig rten gyi kham
141b5(phal chen): kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin
141b6(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed dang / sems can mos pa sna tshogs can/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig 'od kyang //
141b7(phal chen): ji ltar dga' ba'i kha zas tshod ma sna tshogs dang / ro sna tshogs dang / kha dog sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs kyi yong su tshim par byed do// yongasu dga'
141b8(phal chen): bar byed do// nyams bde bar byed do// yid shin tu bde bar byed do// 'on kyang phru ba 'di las 'god par 'gyur ba med de 'grib pa med do// dma'
142a1(phal chen): phal/ bar mi 'gyur ro// zad par mi 'gyur ro// sa 'tshams yod par mi 'gyur ro// mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro// mur thug par
142a2(phal chen): mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gal te phyogs bcu 'jig rten gyi khams cad du rtogs pa'i sems can mos pa sna tshogs can/ bsam pa sna tshogs can thams
142a3(phal chen): cad 'ong bar gyur na'ang / de dag thams cad ci la dga' ba'i kha zas kyi yong su tshim par byed pa nas yid bde bar byed pa'i bar byed do// kha zas sna tshogs
142a4(phal chen): kyi ji lta ba de bzhin du btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang / ro dam pa sna tshogs dang / stan sna tshogs dang / mal cha sna tshogs dang / bzhon pa sna tshogs dang /
142a5(phal chen): gos sna tshogs dang / me togs sna tshogs dang / phre ba sna tshogs dang / spos sna tshogs dang / bdug spos sna tshogs dang / byug pa sna tshogs dang / bye ma
142a6(phal chen): sna tshogs dang / rin po che sna tshogs dang / rgyan sna tshogs dang / rin po che shing rta sna tshogs dang / gdugs sna tshogs dang / rgyal mtshan sna tshogs dang
142a7(phal chen): lha'i ba dan sna tshogs dang / yo byed kyi yul rnam pa sna tshogs kyi yongasu tshim par byed pa nas/ yid dga' bar gyur pa'i bar du byed do// rigs kyi bu
142a8(phal chen): gzhan yang shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams cig na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas sku'i tha ma 'dzin pa gang ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang thams cad/
142b1(phal chen): kyang kho mo kha zas gsol cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi 'bras bu skyes par mdzad do// shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten khams gcig
142b2(phal chen): nas ji ltar de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams rgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
142b3(phal chen): bye ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
142b4(phal chen): dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong
142b5(phal chen): gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
142b6(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed nas/ de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi
142b7(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas tha ma 'dzin pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang / kho mo'i kha zas gsol cing
142b8(phal chen): thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu skyes par mdzad do// shar phyogs na bzhugs pa'i ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang /
143a1(phal chen): phalabyang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs 'tshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs 'tshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshams dang /
143a2(phal chen): nub byang gi phyogs 'tshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs na ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin no// rigs kyi bu shar phyogs kyi 'jig
143a3(phal chen): rten gyi khams cig na sku tshe gcig gi thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag kyang kho mo'i kha zas la gsol zhing snying po byang chub tu
143a4(phal chen): bzhugs nas/ bdud sde dang bcas pa pham par mdzad de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// shar phyogs kyi 'jig
143a5(phal chen): rten gyi khams cig na bzhugs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag
143a6(phal chen): stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba dang / 'jig rten khams bye ba brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya
143a7(phal chen): phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / gling bzhi
143a8(phal chen): pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / steng gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi
143b1(phal chen): khams rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed nas// shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas
143b2(phal chen): kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na byang chub sems dpa'i ske tshe gcig gi thogs pa/ ji
143b3(phal chen): snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang / kho mo'i kha zas las gsol cing snying po byang chub tu bzhugs nas/ bdud sde dang bcas pa 'pham
143b4(phal chen): pa mdzad de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// shar phyogs na bzhugs pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ lho phyogs dang /
143b5(phal chen): nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs 'tshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshams dang / nub byung
143b6(phal chen): gi phyogs 'tshams dang / 'og gi phyogs dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na byang chub sems dpa'i sku tshe'i tshad cig gi thogs pa ji snyed
143b7(phal chen): cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i kha zas las gcig snyed po byang chub tu zhugs te/ bdud sde dang bcas pa 'pham mdzad nas/ bla na med
143b8(phal chen): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na bzhugs pa ji lta ba bzhin du/
144a1(phal chen): phal@#'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig
144a2(phal chen): rten gyi khams bye ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya
144a3(phal chen): phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /
144a4(phal chen): stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gsum gyi stong
144a5(phal chen): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed nas/ rigs kyi bu steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul
144a6(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed na/ byang chub sems dpa' sku tshe gcig gi thogs pa snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang / kho mo'i kha zas gsol cig
144a7(phal chen): snying po byang chub tu zhugs nas/ bdud sde dang bcas pa 'pham par mdzad de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang
144a8(phal chen): rgya'o// rigs kyi bu khyod kyi kho mo'i 'khor bud med stong phrag bcu po 'di dag mthong ngam/ sbas pa 'phags pa bdag gi mthong ngo // spras pa rig
144b1(phal chen): kyi bu bud med 'di dag la sogs pa brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu kho mo dang bskal par spyod pa/ smon lam gcig pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba cig pa/
144b2(phal chen): 'byung ba'i rkyen cig pa/ smos pa'i lam rnam par dag pa cig pa/ kho mo dang bskal ba mnyam par dran pa rnam par dag pa bskal pa mnyam par
144b3(phal chen): blo tshad med par gyur pa/ bskal ba mnyam par dbang po rab tu thob pa/ skal ba mnyam par sems kyi rgyas par 'gyengs pa/ skal ba mnyam par
144b4(phal chen): spyod yul dang ldan pa/ skal pa mnyam par chos kyi tshul la zhugs pa/ skal pa mnyam par don nges par rtogs par/ skal ba mnyam par chos
144b5(phal chen): kyi don ston pa/ skal pa mnyam par gzugs rnam par dag pa/ skal pa mnyam par stobs tshad med pa/ skal pa mnyam par brtan gyi mi thub
144b6(phal chen): pa/ skal pa mnyam dbyangs rnam par dag pa tshad med pa'i yon tan brjod du med pas rnam par spyod pa thams cad la skal pa mnyam par yon tan
144b7(phal chen): brjod du med pa rnam par dag pa/ las kyi rnam par smin pa la kha na ma tho ba med cing rnam par dag pas skal pa las kyi rnam par dag pa/ 'gro
144b8(phal chen): ba thams cad yongasu skye bas par/ skal pa mnyam par byams pa chen po rgyas par 'gyed pa/ 'gro ba thams yongasu smin par byed cing skye ba'i
145a1(phal chen): laphyir skal ba mnyam par snying rje chen pos rgyas par 'gengs pa/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad
145a2(phal chen): tshim par byed pa'i lus yongasu ston pas mnyam par lus kyi lam rnam par dag pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi nges pa'i tshig tha dad pa la skal ba mnyam
145a3(phal chen): par dag gi las rnam par dag pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du skal ba mnyam par 'dod pa/ sangs rgyas la mchod
145a4(phal chen): cing rim gro bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad bskal pa mnyam par rgyu ba/ chos thams cad kyi tshul khong du chud par bya ba la skal pa
145a5(phal chen): mnyam par mngon par mngon sum du gyur pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad thob par bya ba skal pa snyam par spyad pa/
145a6(phal chen): rnam par dag pa sha stag cig kyang yod de/ rigs kyi bu bud med stong phrag bcu po 'di dag kyang / skad cig gcig tu 'di lta ste/ byang chub
145a7(phal chen): sems dpa'i sku tshe gcig gi thogs pa zhal zas yongs su 'bul ba'i phyir phyogs bcur rgyas par 'dod do// phru ba 'di nyid nas kha zas zla
145a8(phal chen): shing / srid pa'i tha ma dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnams la bsod snyoms dbul ba'i phyir phyogs bcur rgyas par 'dong ngo //
145b1(phal chen): bru ba 'di nyid nas kha zas blangs shing phyogs bcur rgyas par bkang ste/ yi dgas kyi tshogs thams cad kha zas kyi yongasu tshim par byed do// rigs
145b2(phal chen): kyi bu de ltar kho mo ni phru ba 'di nyid nas lha rnams kyi lha'i kha zas kyi yongs su tshim par byed do// klu rnams kyi klu'i kha zas kyi/ gnod sbyin
145b3(phal chen): rnams ni gnod sbyin gyi kha zas kyi/ dri za rnams ni dri za'i kha zas kyi/ lha ma yin rnams ni lha ma yin gyi kha zas kyi/ nam mkha' lding rnams ni nam mkha' lding
145b4(phal chen): gi kha zas kyi/ mi 'am ci rnams ni mi'am ci'i kha zas kyi/ lto 'phye chen po rnams ni lto 'phye chen po'i kha zas kyi/ mi rnams ni mi'i kha zas kyi/ mi ma
145b5(phal chen): yin pa rnams ni mi ma yin pa'i kha zas kyi/ yongs su tshim par byed do// rigs kyi bu yud tsam cig sdod dang / de'u re mngon du 'gyur ro// dge bsnyen ma
145b6(phal chen): phul du byung ba des tshig de brjod ma thag tu/ de'i mod la 'di lta ste/ dge snyen ma phul du byung bas mngon gyi smon lam gyi bos pas/ sems can grangs med pa
145b7(phal chen): zhig/ shar phyogs kyi sgo nas nang du 'ongs par gyur to// de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ dge snyan ma phul du byung ba'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi bos pas/ sems can
145b8(phal chen): grangs med pa zhig/ lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs kyi sgo nas nang du 'ongs par 'gyur te/ de ltar 'ongs pa de dag dge snyen ma phul du byung
146a1(phal chen): bal/ bas bstan de dag bkod de/ so so nas mi dga'i kha zas tshod ma sna tshogs dang / ro sna tshogs dang / kha dog sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs
146a2(phal chen): dang ldan pas yongs su tshim par byas so// yongasu bstabs par byas so// yongasu dga' bar byas so// yongasu mgu bar byas so// yongasu spro bar byas so//
146a3(phal chen): shin tu tshim par byas so// yid bde bar byas so// kha zas sna tshogs kyi ji lta ba de bzhin du btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang / ro dam pa sna tshogs dang / stan sna
146a4(phal chen): tshogs dang / mal cha sna tshogs dang / gzhon pa sna tshogs dang / gos sna tshogs dang / me tog sna tshogs dang / 'phreng ba sna tshogs dang / spos sna tshogs dang /

146a7(phal chen): byas so// lha rnams ni lha'i kha zas yongasu tshim par byas so// klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang /
146a8(phal chen): 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams kyang kha zas kyi yongs su tshim par byas pa nas/ yid bde bar 'gyur ba'i bar du byas pa'o// 'on kyang bru ba de las
146b1(phal chen): god par 'gyur ba med do// 'grib pa med/ dam pa med/ zad par 'gyur ba med/ sa 'tshams su 'gyur ba de/ mthar thug pa med do// mur thug pa med do//
146b2(phal chen): de nas dge snyen ma phul du byung ba des/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsod
146b3(phal chen): nams kyi mdzod mi zad pa'i rgyan zhes bya bar zad na/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams chen po'i rgya mtsho mi zad pas/ mi zad pa'i bsod nams dang ldan pa/
146b4(phal chen): bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya chen po shin tu bsags pas/ nam mkha' lta bur gyur pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi sngon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed pas/ nor bu rin
146b5(phal chen): bo che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po lta bu 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsrung bas bsod nams chen po'i 'khor yug dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad du
146b6(phal chen): rin po che snyim pa nas char ltar 'thor bas/ bsod nams chen po'i sprin du gyur pa/ ches kyi grong khyer gyi ske 'byed pas bsod nams chen po'i mdzad la mngon sum
146b7(phal chen): du lta ba/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi 'phongs pa'i mun pa sel bas/ bsod nams chen po'i sgron mar gyur pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par
146b8(phal chen): nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs rgyud 'di nyid na/ grong khyer 'byung ba chen po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na khyim bdag mkhas pa zhes bya ba 'dug gi de'i gan
147a1(phal chen): bal/ #du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/
147a2(phal chen): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge snyen ma phul du byung ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge snyen ma phul du byung ba la lan brgya stong du
147a3(phal chen): mar g.yas phyog su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang ltas te de dag dge snyen ma phul du byung ba'i drung nas lta bas ma ngoms bzhin du song ngo // de nas
147a4(phal chen): tshongs dpon gyi bu nor bzangs bsod nams kyi mdzod mi zad pa'i rgyan gyi rnam par thar pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa de/ bsod nams rgya mtsho de la ni
147a5(phal chen): rjes su sems/ bsod nams mkha' de la ni kun tu lta/ bsod nams kyi phung po de la ni yongs su 'dzin/ bsod nams kyi ri bo de la ni mngon
147a6(phal chen): par 'dzeg/ bsod nams kyi tshogs de ni yang dag par bsdud/ bsod nams kyi chu bo la ni yongs su 'bog/ bsod nams kyi steg bu de ni rab tu
147a7(phal chen): 'bab/ bsod nams kyi dkyil 'khor de ni yongs su sbyong / bsod nams kyi gter de la ni yang dag par lta/ bsod nams kyi tshul de la ni yongasu dran
147a8(phal chen): bar byed/ bsod nams kyi chos de ni yongs su 'dzin/ bsod nams kyi rgyud de ni yongasu sbyong ba byed/ mthar gyi grong khyer 'byung ba chen po gang na ba der
147b1(phal chen): phyin nas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'dod cing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen lta ba/ sgom pa'i sems kyi rgyud dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi byin gyi
147b2(phal chen): brlabs pa'i sems dpa' dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la thogs med pa'i sbyor ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim gro byas pa skyo ba med pa'i
147b3(phal chen): brtson 'grus dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rag lus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi nges par gyur pa'i bsod nam
147b4(phal chen): kyi tshegs thams cad dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rnam par spel ba'i thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa dang / gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par dge ba'i bshes
147b5(phal chen): gnyen la rim gro bya ba la mkhas pa dang / rnam par spel ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang / rnam par dag par gyur pa'i byang chub lhag pa'i bsam
147b6(phal chen): ba dang / yang dag par 'phel ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po dang / yongs su smin par gyur pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang / yang dag par 'phel
147b7(phal chen): ba'i smon lam chen po mngon par bsgrub pa dang / shin tu yangs par gyur pa'i snying pos bdag nyid thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur par mthong nas/
147b8(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad las byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pas/ chos kyi snang ba yang dag par blang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
148a1(phal chen): #bcu snang bar 'phel bar byed cing / khyim bdag mkhas pa yongs su tshol tshol ba las/ grong khyer gyi dbus su lam gyi ba
148a2(phal chen): mdo zhig na/ rin po che sna bdun gyi stegs bu zhig la rin po che grangs med pa las byas pa'i waM/ nor bu rin po che'i rkang pa rdo rje dang in dra ni la sna tsha
148a3(phal chen): kyi sbyin pa bkye ba/ gser gyi lcags por gyi dra bas legs par blang ba/ nor bu rin po che dri ma med pa'i snying po can/ rin po che lnga brgya tsam gyi gdus
148a4(phal chen): legs par brgyan pa/ lha rdzas kyi stan sna tshogs gting pa/ gam yo nas lha rdzas kyi gos kyi rgyal mtshan dang ba dan mang po bsgreng ba/ rin po che du ma'i
148a5(phal chen): dra bas kun nas g.yogs pa/ rin po che'i bla re chen po bres pa bla nas gser dang / rin po che'i me tog gi lnga ldi mang po bkye ba zhig la 'dug cing / 'dzam
148a6(phal chen): bu'i chu klung gi gser gyi gdugs yu ba dra ba med pa/ bai DUr+ya las byas pa ni drung nas bsgreng zhing rlung g.yab dri ma med rdul yab dang pa'i rgyal po lta bus ni

148a8(phal chen): 'das par sgra 'byin pa lnga brgya tsam gyi/ g.yas g.yon nas rdung zhing dkrol/ grong khyer 'byung ba chen po 'khod pa'i sems can shin tu dga' bar bya ba'i
148b1(phal chen): don dang / lha rdzas kyi lha'i me tog gi sprin gyi char ni kun nas 'bab par gyur pa/ g.yog srog chags stong phrag bcu tsam sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskal par mnyam
148b2(phal chen): par spyod pa/ bag nyan cing ci dga' byed pa/ lha rdzas las 'das pa'i brgyan gyi shin tu brgyan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa yongasu grub pa dang lnga

148b4(phal chen): song ste/ phyi nas khyim bdag mkhas pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ khyim bdag mkhas pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogasu skor ba byas
148b5(phal chen): nas/ mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smraso// 'phags pa bdag ni 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar bgyi ba dang / sems
148b6(phal chen): can thams cad shin tu bde ba la 'god pa dang / sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las mngon par 'don pa dang / sems can thams cad chos rin

149a6(phal chen): dpa' rnams/ sems can thams cad kyi rten du gyur pa bshad du gsol/ de skad ces smras pa dang / khyim bdag mkhas pas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs
149a7(phal chen): la 'di skad ces sbas pa dang / khyim bdag mkhas pas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces sbas so// rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyi bla na med pa yang
149a8(phal chen): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mes bskyed pa legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu sems can gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems

149b2(phal chen): bas mi skyo ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim gro bya bas sgyid lug pa med pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal bas yid mi bde ba skyed pa dang / dge
149b3(phal chen): ba'i bshes gnyen btsal ba las phyir mi ldog pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la mos shing dad pa'i yid las rnam par mi ldog pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen

149b5(phal chen): bkur byas pas mi skyo ba de lta bu ni shin tu dkon no// rigs kyi bu khyod kyi kho bo'i 'khor 'di dag mthong ngam smras pa/ 'phags pa mthong ngo // smras pa/ rigs
149b6(phal chen): kyi bu 'di dag kyang kho bos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dag kyang 'di dag ni kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa'i rig su bskyed
149b7(phal chen): pa'o// 'di dag ni kho bos pha rol tu phyin pa sdud do// gsos pa'o// kho bos chos dkar po thams cad kyi bskyed pa'o// 'di dag ni kho bos de bzhin gabye

150a1(phal chen): la bkod pa'o// 'di dag ni kho bos 'jig rten gyi 'khor las zlog pa'o// 'di dag ni kho bos chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la bcud do//
150a2(phal chen): 'di dag ni kho bos ngan song gsum gyi rgyud du ltung ba yongs su bzung ba'o// 'di dag ni kho bos chos nyid khong du chud par bya ba la bkod pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de
150a3(phal chen): ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can thams cad kyi skyabasu gyur pa yin no// rigs kyi bu kho bos yid kyi mdzod nas byung ba'i bsod nams mang po thob pa
150a4(phal chen): ste/ de'i mthus kho bos ni zas 'dod pa rnams la zas kyi sbyin pa byed do// btung ba 'dod pa rnams la btung ba dang / ro'i dam pa 'dod pa rnams la ro'i dang
150a5(phal chen): pa/ zas 'dod pa rnams la zas dang / bca' ba 'dod pa rnams la bca' ba dang / ldag pa 'dod pa rnams la ldag pa dang / mur pa 'dod pa rnams la mur
150a6(phal chen): pa dang / gos 'dod pa rnams la gos dang / me tog 'dod pa rnams la me tog dang / 'phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la 'phreng ba dang / spos 'dod pa rnams la spos
150a7(phal chen): dang / gdug pa 'dod pa rnams la bdug pa dang / byug pa 'dod pa rnams la byug pa dang / bye ma 'dod pa rnams la phye ma dang / rgyan dang lhab sgrub 'dod pa
150a8(phal chen): rnams la rgyan dang lhab lbub dang / rin po che 'dod pa rnams la ni rin po che dang / gser 'dod pa rnams la ni gser dang / dngul 'dod pa rnams ni
150b1(phal chen): dngul dang / mu tig 'dod pa rnams la ni mu tig dang / rten 'dod pa rnams la rten dang / mal cha 'dod pa rnams la mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang yo
150b2(phal chen): byad 'dod pa rnams la na ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad dang / bzhod pa 'dod pa rnams la ni bzhon pa dang / dgal ba 'dod pa rnams la dgal ba dang / glang po dang
150b3(phal chen): rta dang 'a glang dang bung bu dang / ma he dang ra lug 'dod pa rnams la glang po dang rta dang / shing rta dang / ba glang dang / bung bu dang / ma he dang ra lug dang /
150b4(phal chen): rgyal mtshan dang gdugs dang ba dan 'dod pa rnams la rgyal mtshan dang gdugs dang / ba dan dang / bran po dang bran mo dang 'dod pa rnams la bran pho dang bran
150b5(phal chen): mo dang / 'khor gyi byis pa 'dod pa rnams la 'khor gyi byis pa dang / bud med 'dod pa rnams la bud med dang / bu mo gzhon nu 'dod pa rnams la bu ma
150b6(phal chen): gzhon nu dang / cod pan dang / gtsug gi rin po che 'dod pa rnams la cod pan dang / gtsug gi rin po che dang / rdor bag dang bcas pa'i gtsug gi
150b7(phal chen): po che 'dod pa rnams la zor bag dang bcas pa'i nor bu rin po che dang / sgra thon 'ding dri ma med pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dod pa rnams la/ swa thon 'bring dri ba
150b8(phal chen): dkyil 'khor gyi sbyin par byed pa nas/ yo byad sna tshogs thams cad 'dod pa la'ang yo byad sna tshogs thams cad kyi sbyin par byed do// rigs kyi bu yu ci
151a1(phal chen): ngalazhig sdod dang / de'u re mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro// de skad du khyim bdag mkhas pa des tshig de brjod ma thag tu/ de'i
151a2(phal chen): modo la sems can grangs med pa zhig/ khyim bdag mkhas pa'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi bos pas phyogs tha dad pa dang / yul dang gnas tha dad pa dang / grong
151a3(phal chen): khyer tha dad pa dang / grong rdal tha dad pa dang / tshong 'dus tha dad pa dang / ljongs tha dad pa dang / 'or gyi grong tha dad pa dang / khyim tha dad pa dang / sems
151a4(phal chen): can gyi rgyud tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi rigs tha dad pa dang / sems can rnam pa mi mthun pa tha dad pa dang / lam gyi rgyud tha dad pa dang / gnas kyi rnam
151a5(phal chen): pa dang / ming du bya ba tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi skye mched rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ kha zas sna tshogs don du gnyer ba/ kha zas sna tshog
151a6(phal chen): 'dod pa bsam pa tha dad pa dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba ba tsam mi 'dod pa dang / kha zas rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs don du gnyer ba/ lam gyi rgyud
151a7(phal chen): rnam pa sna tshogs kyi khyad par du skye mched la gnas pa/ 'di lta ste/ mi'i nang nas 'bras chen dang / sran chen dang / khur ba dang skyo ma dang / nya dang sha la
151a8(phal chen): sogs pa/ kham gyi bza' ba'i kha zas sna tshogs don du gnyer ba dang / ming nang nas ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba'i rgyud thams cad na rnam par spyod pa dag
151b1(phal chen): su dang byang chub sems da
151b2(phal chen): las kyang / kha zas dang btung ba sna tshogs don du gnyer ba dag/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa thogs pa med par gtong ba'i rnga'i sgra dang / byang chub
151b3(phal chen): sems dpa' sngon gyi smon lam gyi bos pas kun kyang 'ongs par gyur te/ 'ongs nas kyang khyim bdag mkhas pa la slongs mo 'debaso// gdong du lta'o sdod do//
151b4(phal chen): gsol ba 'deb so// de nas khyim bdag mkhas pas slong mo ba de dag kun nas 'dus par shes nas/ yul tsam du bsam te/ na mkha' la ltas pa dang /
151b5(phal chen): na mkha'i dbyings nas kha zas dang / btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa dri sna tshogs dang ldan pa mang po mthon
151b6(phal chen): lag 'thil la 'ong bar 'gyur to// des de dag yongasu blangs shing de ltar kun nas 'dus pa'i slongs mo ba mos pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa de dag ci 'dod pa'i zas
151b7(phal chen): dang / btung ba'i rnam pa dang / yo byad kyi khyad par thams cad kyi yongasu tshim par byaso// ci 'dod pa yongasu byin no// rab tu dga' bar byas so// shin
151b8(phal chen): tu tshim par byas so// dga' ba shin tu skyes par byaso// nyams shin tu bde bar byaso// yid rab tu dga' bar byaso// de ltar de dag shin tu tshim par byas
151b9(phal chen): nas/ des kyang chog ste/ de'i 'og tu chos ston pa 'di lta ste/ ye shes kyi tshogs rgya chen po brtsegs pa'i rgyu yongasu brjod de chos ston to// 'phongs pa
152a1(phal chen): phalathams cad 'byung mi srid pa'i rgyu yongasu brjod pa dang / skyid pa chen po yongasu sgrub pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongasu brjod pa dang / chos
152a2(phal chen): kyi ye shes kyi tshul thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyud yongasu brjod pa dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya chen po bsags pa'i rgyud yongasu brjod pa dang / dga' ba bzangs
152a3(phal chen): ba'i zas rab tu thob pa'i byung ba'i rgyu yongasu brjod pa dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos shin tu rgyan pa'i lus thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongasu brjod pa dang /
152a4(phal chen): thub pa med pa'i stobs rnam par dag pa 'thob par 'byung bar rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / bla na med pa'i kha zas yong su shes pa thob par 'byung ba'i rgyu yod
152a5(phal chen): su brjod pa dang / bdud kyi dpung thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i bsod nams kyi tshe stobs mi zad pa rab tu 'thob par 'byung ba'i rgyu yong su brjod par
152a6(phal chen): byas te chos bstan to// des kha zas don du gnyer 'ong ba rnams la/ na mkha'i dbyings nas kha zas rnam pa sna tshogs blangs shing tshim par byas te/ de dag
152a7(phal chen): tshe dang bsod nams dang stobs dang / bde ba dang / spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa thob par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to// des btung ba don du gnyer cing 'ong
152a8(phal chen): ba rnams la btung ba mang po zhim pa kha na ma tho ba med pa/ yid shin tu dga' bar byed pa dag gi tshim par byas nas/ de dag la 'khor bas skom zhing 'khor ba las/
152b1(phal chen): dga' ba las rnam par bzlog pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la dga' zhing sangs rgyas kyi chos la mos pa yongasu bskyed pa'i phyir chos ston to// des ro'i mchog
152b2(phal chen): don du gnyer cing 'ongs pa rnams la ro'i mchog sna tshogs dngar ba dang / sgyur ba dang / lan tshwa dang / tsha ba dang / kha ba dang / ska ba rnam pa tha dad pas yongs
152b3(phal chen): tshim par byas te/ de'i 'og tu skyes bu chen po'i mtshan ro bro ba'i mchog thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to// des gzhon pa don du gnyer cing phyogs kyi rgyud snga
152b4(phal chen): tshogs nas 'ongs pa rnams la/ gzhon pa sna tshogs kyi sbyin pa yongasu btang ste/ de dag theg pa chen po la gnas par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to// des gos don du
152b5(phal chen): gnyer ba phyogs sna tshogs nas 'ongs pa kun nas 'dus par shes nas/ yud tsam du bsams te/ na mkha'i dbyings la bltas pa dang / na mkha'i dbyings las
152b6(phal chen): gos sna tshogs sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dkar po dang leb rgan dang / shel gyi kha dog du 'dug pa/ kha dog sna tshog su can/ kha dog du mar can
152b7(phal chen): rnam par dag pa thon cing / lag pa'i thil du 'ongs pas/ de dag gi slong mo ba de dag la yongasu sdud pa nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo tsha shes pa dang /
152b8(phal chen): khrel yod pa bla na med pa dang / mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bu thob par gyur pa rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to// de bzhin du yo byad sna tshogs thams
153a1(phal chen): lacad ji ltar 'ongs pa'i slong mo ba rnams la btud pa byas nas ci rigasu chos ston to// de ltar khyim bdag mkhas pas byang chub sems
153a2(phal chen): dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i yul snyan par byas nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smra so// rigs kyi bu kho bos ni yid kyi mdzod nas
153a3(phal chen): byung ba'i bsod nams kyi rnam par thar pa 'di shes par zad nas/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' yo byad la dbang thob pa/ rin po che'i lag pa thob par
153a4(phal chen): gyur pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad yong su khyebs par byas shing / sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa sna tshogs bsgrub pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs
153a5(phal chen): pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du rin po che kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char rab tu 'bebs pa/ de bzhin du rgyan kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / cod
153a6(phal chen): ban kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / khang pa brtsegs pa'i kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / na bza' kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / lha rdzas kyi rol mo brdung ba
153a7(phal chen): dang / bkrol ba dang / klu yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs snyan pa sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / me tog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / spos sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / bdug spos
153a8(phal chen): dang 'phreng ba byug pa dang / bye ba dang chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs dang / rnam pa thams cad du sangs rgyas thams
153b1(phal chen): cad mchod pa sprin gyi char dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyi gnasu sangs rgyas thams cad
153b2(phal chen): mchod cing bsnyen bkur ba dang / sems can thams cad yongasu smin pa dang / 'dul bar bya ba'i phyir yo byad thams cad kyi sprin gyi char 'bebs pa de dag gi spyod
153b3(phal chen): bshes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod pa 'am/ rnam par 'phrul pa bstan par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ grong khyer seng ge'i/
153b4(phal chen): gzugs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen tsug bud ces bya ba 'dug gi/ de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems
153b5(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dga' rangs te/ mgu zhing nyams bde ba dang /
153b6(phal chen): tshim shing yid bde ba skyes nas/ khyim bdag mkhas pa la chos kyi rim 'gro slob pa'i tshul stan te/ de'i byin gyi rlabs kyi chos thams cad thob par 'gyur
153b7(phal chen): ba yongasu lta zhing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang de la rag lus par lta ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dben par sems pa rgyun mi chad par snyan pa dang
153b8(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi bka' bzhin du mnyan pa'i sems dang ldan par bstan pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi dbang du 'gyur ba'i rjesu 'brang bar
154a1(phal chen): bal/ bya ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdam ngag dang / tshig mnyam par bya ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen las byung ba'i/
154a2(phal chen): dad pa'i dbang po la bsam pa byed cing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdabs te btang bas dge ba'i bshes gnyen sten cing bkur ba dang / rjesu 'brang bar bya
154a3(phal chen): ba'i sems kyi khyim bdag mkhas pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ khyim bdag mkhas pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas rgya
154a4(phal chen): nas/ yang dang yang ltas te khyim bdag mkhas pa'i drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang bsod nams kyi chu bo de ni yid ches par sems/
154a5(phal chen): bsod nams kyi zhing de la ni yang dag par lta/ bsod nams kyi ri bo ni yongasu sbyong ba/ bsod nams kyi mu stegs de la ni yang dag par 'dzeg/ bsod nams kyi
154a6(phal chen): mdzod de ni rnam par 'jed/ bsod nams kyi gter de la ni shin tu lta/ bsod nams kyi dkyil 'khor de ni yongasu sbyong na/ bsod nams kyi phung po de ni yang
154a7(phal chen): dag par len/ bsod nams kyi stobs de ni yongasu skyed/ bsod nams kyi shugs de ni rnam par 'phel bar byed cing / thar gyi grong khyer seng ge'i gzugs gang
154a8(phal chen): na ba der phyin te/ chos kyi tshong dpan rin po che bcug phung yang su tshol tshol ba las tshong dus kyi srang zhig na 'dug pa mthong nas des de'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi dza
154b1(phal chen): phyag 'tshal te g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas nas/ mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces sbas so// 'phags pa bdag gi bla na med pa yang dag
154b2(phal chen): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed de/ byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba
154b3(phal chen): ma 'tshal te// 'phags pa lam gang gis bdag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i// byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi man ngag
154b4(phal chen): legs par mi rtsal tam// de nas chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen tsug phud kyi tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi lag nas bzung ste// rang gi khyim gang na ba der
154b5(phal chen): khrid de bstan nas/ 'di skad ces smra so// rigs kyi bu kho bo'i khyim la ltos shig ces nas// des ltas nas khyim de dag cing 'od gsal ba 'dzam bu'i
154b6(phal chen): chu klung gi gser las byas pa ste// yangs shing mtho la dngul gyi ra bas skor ba// shel gyi tshig pas shin tu legs brtsigs pa mdzes par byas pa/ bai
154b7(phal chen): phung po brgya phrag stong gi rab tu brgyan pa mus la gar pa'i ka ba kye ba// mu tig dmar po las byas pa'i seng ge'i khri shin du bshams pa/ rin po che'i rang
154b8(phal chen): bzhin sdang ba'i sems seng ge'i rgyal mtshan sbeng ba// nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'i bla re bris pa// gser gyi dra ba yid bzhin gyi nor bus brgyan
155a1(phal chen): ngal/ pa kun nas yogs// nor bu rin po che sna tshogs grangs med pas rab tu brgyan pa// a s+pha gar ba las rtsigs pa'i//
155a2(phal chen): rdzing bu chu sil bas gang ba dang ldan pa'i rin po che thams cad kyi shing bskor ba// rgya che zhing yang ba rim pa bcu rtsegs pa// shin du mtho ba sgo brgya dang
155a3(phal chen): ldan pa 'dug pa mthong ngo // des de'i khyim de'i nang du phyin te kun tu ltas nas// rim khang tha ma'i nang bza' ba dang // btung ba'i rnam pa yongasu gtong
155a4(phal chen): ba mthong ngo // rim khang gnyis pa'i nang na gos kyi rnam pa thams cad yongasu gtong ba mthong ngo // rim khang gsum pa'i nang nas rin po che thams
155a5(phal chen): cad kyi brgyan pa lha ba lbub yongasu gtong ba mthong ngo // rim khang bzhi pa'i nang na btsun mo 'khor dga' ba'i yo byad bud med rin po che'i steng na bzang
155a6(phal chen): tu bya ba yongasu gtong ba mthong ngo // rim khang lnga pa'i nang nas lnga pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i chos yang dag par 'gro ba'i dga' ba mos pa/
155a7(phal chen): 'jig rten la phan pa dang / bde ba'i sems kyi spyod pa dang ldan pa/ gtsug lag thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa// gzungs kyi tshul dang ting nge 'dzin
155a8(phal chen): gyi phyag rgya dang // ting nge 'dzin las rnam par ldang ba/ tingange 'dzin rnam par dbyed pa dang // ye shes kyi snang ba mngon par sgrub pa 'dus shing 'dod
155b1(phal chen): pa mthong ngo // rim khang drug pa'i nang na byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa rab tu thob pa// shes rab shin tu zab
155b2(phal chen): pa rab tu zhi ba'i// chos thams cad mkhyen par shes pa// ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo dang // snying po mang pos sgo kun nas 'byung ba// sgrib pa
155b3(phal chen): med pa'i spyod yul can// mi gnyis pa la yang dag par spyad pa/ chos yang dag par 'gro ba la rnam par sprul pa// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyud
155b4(phal chen): kyi rjes su 'brang zhing rnam par 'byed pa dang // rab tu bsal bar byed pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo mang po yang dag par 'gro ba byed pa rnams
155b5(phal chen): nas 'dus shing 'khod pa mthong ste// 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo zhi ba'i snying po zhes bya ba dang // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo
155b6(phal chen): 'gro ba thams cad du ye shes rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba dang // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo mi g.yo ba'i gleng zhes bya ba dang // shes rab kyi pha rol
155b7(phal chen): tu phyin pa'i sgo rdul dang bral ba'i 'od zhes bya ba dang // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo thub par dka' ba zhes bya ba dang // shes rab kyi pha rol
155b8(phal chen): tu phyin pa'i sgo 'gro ba thams cad mos par byed cing rje su 'brang ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo phyi bzhin 'brang
156a1(phal chen): bapa'i tshul gyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba dang // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo rgya mtsho'i snying po zhes bya ba dang // shes
156a2(phal chen): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo kun tu lta ba'i btang snyoms thob pa zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo mi zad pa'i mdzod dang ldan pa zhes bya
156a3(phal chen): ba dang // shes rab tu pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo chos thams cad kyi tshul rgya mtsho zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo 'gro ba rgya mtsho
156a4(phal chen): rjesu song zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa zhes bya ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo ches
156a5(phal chen): kyi sprin la dmigs pas/ rim pa mi dmigs pa'i gnas zhes bya ba dang / de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu
156a6(phal chen): tshang bar yang dag par 'gro bar byed cing / rgyan rjod du med pa'i shin tu rnam par bye ba'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na mkhod pa mthong bar gyur te/
156a7(phal chen): rim khang bdun pa'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' sgra brnyan lta bu'i bzod pa rab tu thob pa/ da thabs dang ye shes rnam par gdon mi za ba la shin du
156a8(phal chen): byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yang dag par 'dzin pa sha stag 'dus shing 'khod pa mthong ngo // rim khang brkyang pa'i nang na byang chub se
156b1(phal chen): dpa' ma nyams par 'gro ba'i mngon par shes pa rab tu thob pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rnam par rgyu ba/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du gzugs
156b2(phal chen): rnyen rab tu 'byung ba/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du lus shin tu rnam par phye ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung nas kun nas mi 'phags
156b3(phal chen): pa'i yul dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku yang dag par gzhol pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor sngon du brjod pa'i
156b4(phal chen): gtam gyi skyes bur gyur pa// sha stag kun nas 'dug cing 'khod par mthong ngo // rim khang dgu pa'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' tshe cig gi thogs pa sha stag
156b5(phal chen): 'dus shing 'khod pa mthong ngo // rim khang bcu pa'i nang na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thog ma byang chub tu thugs skyed pa dang / spyod pa dang 'byung ba dang /
156b6(phal chen): smon lam rgya mtsho dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i yul dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang bcas pa dang / chos
156b7(phal chen): kyi 'khor lo rab tu sgrogs pa dang bcas pa dang / sems can 'dul ba mdzad pa'i byin rlabs dang bcas pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang chos kyi tshong dpon
156b8(phal chen): rin chen tsug bud la 'di skad ces smra so// 'phags pa khyod la 'di lta bu'i phun sum tshogs pa mnga' na phun sum tshogs pa'i rnam pa ji lta bu zhing du
157a1(phal chen): palasbyang ba mdzad na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ni su zhig la yongasu bkrung bsgrung / des smras pa rigs kyi bu kho bos te/ 'das pa'i/
157a2(phal chen): dus kyi skal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i yang pha rol cig na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'khor lo sna tshogs zhes bya bar/
157a3(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings 'od zer mtha' yas pas yongasu rgyan pa'i chos kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba mkhyen pa dang zhab su ldan pa bde bar gshegs
157a4(phal chen): pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sbyar ba lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du 'byung ste/
157a5(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa de ye shes rnam par snang ba la sogs pa nyan thos bye ba phrag rgya dang / ye shes nyi ma'i gzi brjid la sogs pa/ byang chub sems
157a6(phal chen): dpa' bye ba phrag brgya stong dang / thabs cig tu rgyal po chos kyi dbang phyug rgyal po spyan drang nas bza' shi gi ra ba chen po che rgyal mtshan rgyan gyi mdzes pa
157a7(phal chen): zhes bya bar gshegs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa grong khyer du gshegs nas/ tshong 'dus kyi srang nas bzhud pa'i tshe// kho bos de bzhin gshegs
157a8(phal chen): pa de dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang / bcas pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir sil snyan dang / rol mo'i sgra zhig kyang byung /
157b1(phal chen): spos kyi ri lu cig gcig kyang bsregs te/ bdug spos kyi bsangs// spos kyi ril bu gcig pu de de ltar bsregs pas zhag bdun du 'dzam bu'i gling
157b2(phal chen): thams cad kyang spos kyi na 'un gyi sprin kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi lus dang 'dra bas yongasu khebs par gyur to// spos
157b3(phal chen): kyi na 'un gyi sprin de dag las kyang sgra 'di skad du brjod do// de bzhin gshegs pa ni bsam gyi mi khyab pa ste/ dus gsum du dri ma med pa'i ye shes kyi
157b4(phal chen): phung po dang ldan pa'o// thams cad mkhyen pa ste sgrib pa thams cad mi mthong ngo // nyon mongs pa'i bag chags thams cad yongasu byang ba ste/ de bzhin
157b5(phal chen): gshegs pa la yon phul ba thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i don chen tshad med pa sgrub par 'gyur ro// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag pa
157b6(phal chen): gzhol bar 'gyur ro// zhes de skad du kho bo'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu smin par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba la shugs dang /
157b7(phal chen): yang dag par bskyed pa'i phyir spos kyi na bun de las sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyi sgra'i rnams pa de lta bu byung ngo // rigs kyi bu de ltar de bzhin/
157b8(phal chen): gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang / kho bos gsum du yongasu bsngos te/ gsum gang zhe na 'di ltar
158a1(phal chen): pa la/ phong pa thams cad shin du rgyun bcod pa dang / dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen sangs
158a2(phal chen): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mthong ba yong su rdzogs par 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir yongasu bsngos// rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub seMs
158a3(phal chen): dpa'i rnam par thar pa smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor thogs pa med pa'i ces bya ba 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rin po
158a4(phal chen): che'i tshad med de nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang sangs rgyas thams cad mtha' yas pa mthong ba zhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas
158a5(phal chen): dang / grogs pa rab tu thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam mtha' yas pa'i tshul gyi snang bar gyur pa/ chos kyi tshul mtha' yas par mngon
158a6(phal chen): par brlan pas shin du gtogs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i mos pa mtha' yas pa'i stobs yongasu skyes pa/ byang chub sems
158a7(phal chen): dpa'i gzhan gyi mi thub pa med pa/ mtha' yas pa'i rgyal mtshan can/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes snang ba mtha' yas pa'i rgyu dang ldan pa/
158a8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i chos mtha' yas pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa/ de thar gyi yul snga'i rtsa ba gang na ba der phyin nas/ grong khyer gang du kun sgo yongs
158b1(phal chen): tshol zhing phyogs dang phyogs 'tshams dang // yul phyogs nyen 'khor kun dang / sgang dang gzhongs dang mnyam pa dang / mi mnyams pa thams cad yongs
158b2(phal chen): skyo ba med pa'i bsas pa dang / 'jigs pa med pa'i bsam pa dang / ldog pa med pa'i brtson 'grus dang / thub pa med pa'i sems kyi dge ba'i bshes
158b3(phal chen): gnyen gyi gdam ngag ma brjod pa dang / rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi spyod pa ma nor bas sems rab tu bsgoms pa dang / sgo kun nas rnam par dmigs
158b4(phal chen): pa'i dbang po dang ldan pa dang / bag med pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / mi dang snang ba g.yang ba med par kun du tshol tshol ba nas yul spa'i rtsa ba'i
158b5(phal chen): dbus zhig na/ grong khyer kun nas sgo'i tshong dus kyi lnga la steng phrag bcu'i gnasu gyur pa de shin du bzang por grub pa/ rab rten par bsor ba shin tu
158b6(phal chen): thob pa/ bzhi mtho brgyad kyi brgyan pa 'dug pa mthong ste/ de'i nang na spos tshong kun tu lta ba yang spos tshong gi khyams zhig na 'dug pa mthong nas/
