158b7(phal chen): spos tshong kun tu lta bas gang na ba der phyin te/ spos tshong kun tu lta ba'i rkang pa gnyis pa spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo
158b8(phal chen): sbyar te 'di skad ces smra so// 'phags pa bdag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyes nas/ ji ltar byang chub sems
159a1(phal chen): la/ dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan tu bgyi ba ma 'tshal to// smras pa/ rig
159a2(phal chen): kyi bu de ltar khyod kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyes pa leg so leg so// rigs kyi bu kho bos ni sems can thams
159a3(phal chen): cad kyi nad shes te/ rlung las gyur pa dang / 'khris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / cha nyams par 'khrugs pa dang / gzhan
159a4(phal chen): gyi gnod par byas pa dang / mi ma yin pa las gyur ba dang / dug 'thung ba dang / sngags dang / mtshon dang / ro langs pa'i sbyor ba sna tshogs
159a5(phal chen): dang / me las gyur pa dang / chu las bskyod pa las gyur pa dang / sngangs pa las gyur pa dang / 'jigs pa sna tshogs las gyur pa thams
159a6(phal chen): cad kyang shes so// nad de dag thams cad ni bar bya yang shes ste/ 'di ltar sgrub par byas pa yang rab tu shes so// skyug par bya ba dang / bkrug
159a7(phal chen): ba de brta ba dang / brtar pa dang / sna'i cho ga dang / nya ra dang / dugs lhums dang / byug pa dang / dug gso ba dang / 'byung po'i gnod med par bya ba
159a8(phal chen): dang / bcud dang / khrus dang / bzhag pa dang / bskyed pa dang / kha dog spang ba dang / nyams stong pa'ang rab tu shes te/ rigs kyi bu phyogs bcu
159b1(phal chen): na sems can gang ji snyed cig kho bo'i drung du 'ongs pa de dag thams cad kyi nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed de/ nad sos nas kyang legs par bkru ba dang / lus
159b2(phal chen): la byug pas byug par byas nas ci tshul gyi rgyan gyi yan lag shin du brgyan te/ ci rigs pa'i gos lus la bskon na kha zas bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa sna tshogs
159b3(phal chen): kyi yongasu tshims par byas te/ nor dpag tu med pas kyang phun sum tshogs par byed do// de'i 'og tu yang de grwa la mi gtsang ba bstan ci 'dod chags spangs
159b4(phal chen): pa'i phyir chos ston to// byams pa chen po yongasu bsngags shing zhe sdang spangs pa'i phyir ston to// chos rnam par dbye ba'i bye brag bstan cing gti mug spang ba
159b5(phal chen): phyir chos ston to// khyad par khong du chud pa'i tshul gyi sgo yang dag par bstan cing / cha nyams pa'i spyod pa dang / nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir chos ston to//
159b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi chos dang ldan pa'i gtam thams cad yongasu brjod cing / byang chub kyi sems 'byung ba'i rgyu yongasu ston to// 'khor ba'i sdug ba
159b7(phal chen): tshad gzung du med pa yongasu bstan cing / snying rje chen po 'byung ba'i rgyu yongasu ston to// bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rgya chen po bsogs pa yang dag par
159b8(phal chen): bsngags shing yon tan tshad med pa thob pa dang / 'byung ba'i rgyu yong su rten to// sems can thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba dang / gdul bar bya ba yongasu
160a1(phal chen): labastan cing / theg pa chen po'i sngon lam 'byung ba'i rgyu yongasu ston to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang bskal pa thams cad
160a2(phal chen): gnas par bya ba'i spyod pa'i dra ba shin du rgyas par bshad cing / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa thob pa dang / 'byung ba'i rgyu yongasu ston to//
160a3(phal chen): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu bsngags shing mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku 'thob pa dang / 'byung ba'i rgyu yongasu ston te//
160a4(phal chen): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu brjod cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i yongasu dag pa thams cad du 'gro ba thob pa dang / 'byung ba'i rgyu yongasu ston to// bzod
160a5(phal chen): ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu brjed cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs dang sku mdog rnam par dag pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i rgyu yongasu ston to// brtson
160a6(phal chen): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu brjod cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku thob par dga' ba yongasu ston to// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu brjod
160a7(phal chen): cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku zil gyi mnon la/ zil gyi non pa rnam par dag pa'i rgyu yongasu ston to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasasu brjod ci
160a8(phal chen): chos kyi sku yong su dag pa yongasu ston pa'o// thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu brjod cing / 'gro ba thams cad la mngon du gyur pa'i sku btsang zhi
160b1(phal chen): rnam par dag pa yongasu ston to// smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu brjod/ bskal pa thams cad kyi dus 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems dang / sgrogs
160b2(phal chen): pa'i sku rnam par dag pa yongasu ston to// stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu brjod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du mngon par 'byung ba'i sku rnam par
160b3(phal chen): dag pa yongasu ston to// ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu brjod cing / 'gro ba thams cad bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshim par mdzad pa'i sku rnam par dag
160b4(phal chen): pa yongasu ston to// mi dge ba'i chos thams cad la rnam par ldog pa yongasu brjod cing / lta na bul du bzang ba'i rnam par dag pa yongasu ston to// de
160b5(phal chen): ltar de dag chos kyi sbyin pas yongasu bsdus te/ nor dang rin po che mtha' yas pa'i tshogs kyi nye bar brten pa byas shing / so sor 'gyed do// yang rigs kyi
160b6(phal chen): bu kho bo ni spos dang / bdug spos dang / bsgo ba dang / bsku ba sbyong ba shes te/ 'di ltar spos kyi rgyal po gzhal du med pa la sogs pa dang / spos kyi rgyal
160b7(phal chen): po srin du ra ba la sogs pa dang / spos kyi rgyal po mi pham pa la sogs pa dang / spos kyi rgyal po rnam par bsam byed la sogs pa dang / spos kyi rgyal po
160b8(phal chen): ma yod pa la sogs pa dang / spos kyi rgyal po dus dang mthun pa la sogs pa dang / spos kyi rgyal po sbrul gyi snying po'i tsan dan la sogs pa dang / spos kyi rgyal
161a1(phal chen): phalapo sprin gyi a ka ru la sogs pa dang / spos kyi rgyal po dbang po'i 'khrug pa la sogs pa dang / spos kyi sbyor ba thams cad kyang
161a2(phal chen): rab tu shes so// yang rigs kyi bu kho bo ni sems can thams cad yongasu tshim par byed pa dang / sgo thams cad nas sangs rgyas lta zhing mchod pa dang / bstan
161a3(phal chen): bkur ba'i spos kyi gzugs shes te/ rigs kyi bu sems can thams cad yongasu tshim par byed pa dang / sgo thams cad nas sangs rgyas blta zhing mchod
161a4(phal chen): ba dang / snyen bkur ba'i spos kyi gzugs kho bo'i bsam pa thams cad kyang yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur te/ de'i 'thus kho bos sems can thams cad yongs
161a5(phal chen): skyob pa'i rkyen gyi sprin byin gyi rlob pa byed de// 'di ltar spos kyi khang partsegs pa'i sprin gyi brgyan nas rnam pa thams cad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa mchod
161a6(phal chen): cing rim gro bya ba'i rgyan gyi sprin gyi bar du byin gyi rlob par byed do// rigs kyi bu kho bo nam de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par bya bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ kho
161a7(phal chen): bos sems can thams cad yongasu tshim par byed pa dang / sgo thams cad nas sangs rgyas blta zhing mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba'i spos kyi gzugs
161a8(phal chen): 'di las spos kyi mdzod kyi khang pa rtsegs pa'i sprin tshad gzung du med pa ston cing / phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings thams cad na bzhugs pa'i de
161b1(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor chos kyi dbyings thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi mdzod kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyi rgyan byin
161b2(phal chen): gyi rlob par byed do// chos kyi dbyings thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongasu sbyong ba'i sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi khang pa'i sprin gyi rgyan dang /
161b3(phal chen): spos kyi ra ba'i sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi ba gam gyi sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi rta babs kyi sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi skar khung gi sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos
161b4(phal chen): kyi pu shu'i sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi zla gam gyi sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi gdugs kyi sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgrengs pa'i sprin gyi rgyan
161b5(phal chen): dang / spos kyi lha'i ba dan gyi sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi bla re'i sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi gzugs kyi dra ba'i sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi 'od kyi sprin
161b6(phal chen): gyi rgyan dang / spos kyi snang ba'i dri ma med pa'i sprin gyi rgyan dang / spos thams cad kyi sprin gyi char rab tu 'bebs pa'i rgyan byin gyi rlob te/ rigs kyi bu khe
161b7(phal chen): bos ni sems can thams cad yongasu tshim par byed pa dang / sgo thams cad nas sangs rgyas blta zhing mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba'i spos kyi gzugs
161b8(phal chen): kyi chos kyi sgo 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po lta bur gyur pa ta na don yod pa/ 'grogs na don yod pa/ brtul
162a1(phal chen): ngalashugs rjesu byas na don yod pa/ ming thos na don yod pa/ mthong ba tsam gyi sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zhi bar/
162a2(phal chen): 'gyur ba mthong ba tsam gyis/ sems can thams cad rnams ngan song gi rgyud las ldog par 'gyur ba/ mthong ba tsam gyi sems can thams cad sa
162a3(phal chen): rgyas kyi chos la skabs phye ba thob par 'gyur ba/ mthong ba tsam gyi sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ba/ mthong ba
162a4(phal chen): tsam gyi sems can rnams 'jigs pa dang / 'khor ba'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad kyi 'jigs pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba/ mthong ba tsam gyi sems can
162a5(phal chen): rnams thams cad mkhyen pa'i phyogs la rten par 'gyur ba'i phyir/ mi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba/ mthong ba tsam gyi sems can rga shi'i grogs po
162a6(phal chen): dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ba/ mthong ba tsam gyi sems can rnams chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid la gnas pas mya ngan las 'das pas
162a7(phal chen): bde ba thob par 'gyur ba de dag gi spyod pa la shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod pa nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu sgo phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na grong khyer
162a8(phal chen): ta la'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de nas rgyal po me zhes bya ba 'dug gi/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems da'i
162b1(phal chen): spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor babang / tshong dpon spos tshong kun tu lta bu'i rkang pa/
162b2(phal chen): gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ tshong dpon spos tshong kun tu lta ba la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang ltas
162b3(phal chen): te/ tshong dpon spos tshong kun tu blta ba'i drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge ba'i bshes gnyen gcig tu rgyud pa de dag rjesu
162b4(phal chen): dran par byed cing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdam ngag gi sgo de dag rjesu dran par bya ba dang / bdag ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi yongasu bzung //
162b5(phal chen): zhes rang gi sems yongasu tshim par bya ba dang / bdag ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi yongasu bsrung bas/ de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
162b6(phal chen): byang chub las phyir ldog par yang mi 'gyur ro// snyam du rnam par sems shing sems dga' ba ni rab tu thob thob pa/ sems dang ba dang / sems
162b7(phal chen): rab tu dga' ba dang / sems rangs pa dang / sems mgu ba dang / sems mos pa dang / sems shugs dang / sems rnam par zhi ba dang /
162b8(phal chen): sems rgya chen po dang / sems kyi rgyan dang / sems thogs pa med pa dang / sems la sgrib pa med pa dang / sems rnam par phye ba dang / seMs
163a1(phal chen): phalayang dag par gzhol ba dang / sems kyi dbang dang / sems la dbang sgyur ba dang / sems kyi chos khong du chud pa dang / ses
163a2(phal chen): kyi zhing rgyas par gang ba dang / sems sangs rgyas mthong bas brgyan pa dang / sems stobs bcu'i yid la bya ba dang / mi 'bral ba dang thob nas/ de 'a
163a3(phal chen): gyi ljongs nas ljongs dang / grong nas grong dang yul nas yul du tshol zhing / grong khyer ta la'i rgyal mtshan gang na ba der phyin te/ rgyal po me gang na bzhugs
163a4(phal chen): shes dris nas/ de la 'gro ba gzhan dag gi 'di skad du bstan te/ rigs kyi bu de re rgyal po me ni rgyal po don bsgrub pa'i phyir seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs
163a5(phal chen): shing / rgyal po'i 'phrin las mdzad do// khams rab tu skyong ngo // chad pas bcad par 'os pa ni tshad pas bcad do// bya dga' sdu bar 'os pa ni byar dag
163a6(phal chen): bsdud do// g.yon yod pa rnams la ni gyod med do// rtsod rnams kyi zhal lce ni yongasu gcad do// dma' ba rnams dbugs 'byin to// grags pa rnams
163a7(phal chen): ni 'dul bar mdzad do// srog gcod pa las ni rnam par theg go/ ma byin par len pa dang ni rnam par 'byed par mdzad do// gzhan gyi yongasu bzung
163a8(phal chen): ba la mngon par zhen pa ni rnam par zhi bar mdzad do// rdzun du smra ba las phyir ldog par mdzad do// phra ma'i tshig dang ni rnam par bral bar mdzad do// na
163b1(phal chen): gcod pa'i ngag ni rgyun gcod pa mdzad do// tshig khyal pa las ni yongasu glen no// chags sems dang mi 'dre ba mdzad do// gnod sems dang rgyang sring ngo //
163b2(phal chen): log par lta ba dang ni 'dri ba med par mdzad do// de nas tshong dpon nor bzangs rgyal po me gang na ba der phyin nas// des mthong ba rgyal po me seng ge'i khri chen
163b3(phal chen): po rdo rje mthu bo che'i nor bu sna tshogs kyi sbas pa/ rin po che'i 'od gsal ba rnam pa sna tshogs grangs med pa la byas pa'i rkang bkye ba rin po che gcig ma
163b4(phal chen): yin pas legs par spras shing / brgyan pas yid du 'ong ba'i lhun dang ldan pa/ gser gyi ljag phod kyi dra bas legs par blangs shing chub par brtags
163b5(phal chen): panor bu rin po che du ma'i sgron mas shin tu snang bar byas pa/ nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal mtshan las byas pa'i pad ma'i snying po can lha rdzas kyi
163b6(phal chen): rin po che'i gdan rim pa du ma gting ba/ ga ma yo nas lha rdzas kyi spos sna tshogs kyi bdug spos kyi shin du 'dug pa/ rin po che'i rgyal mtshan bsgrengs
163b7(phal chen): pa brgya phrag stong gi mdzes par byas pa/ rin po che'i ba dan brgya phrag stong rnam par bris pas brgyan pa/ rin po che'i me tog gi chun po sna tshogs kyi lnga
163b8(phal chen): ldi rab tu skyes pas shin tu mdzes par byas pa/ steng nas lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna tshogs kyi bla re sna tshogs bres pa zhig la 'dug cing de ni bzhon zhing da
164a1(phal chen): lal bab pa dang // gzugs mdzes shing blta na yid du 'ong ba// skra mthon 'thing g.yas phyogasu khyil ba dang ldan pa/
164a2(phal chen): mgo'o gdugs ltar 'dug pa// gtsug tor gyi spyi bo can/ dpral ba yangs pa/ mig dkar nag 'bye ba/ shang ring la rdzi ma ba'i rdzi ma ltar
164a3(phal chen): 'dug pa/ sna'i dbyibs legs shing bzang la ran par mdzes pa dang ldan pa/ mchu mtshal skur mdog bzang zhing shin tu legs pa dang ldan pa/
164a4(phal chen): so ma nyams shing thag bzang la shin du dkar ba bzhi bcu tshang pa dang ldan pa/ 'gram pa lha nga seng ge'i 'gram pa ltar 'dug pa/ 'khur ba shas
164a5(phal chen): rgyas pa/ smin mtshugs bzhu ltar 'dug cing ring la shin tu mdzes pa/ mdzod spu zla ba'i kha dog ltar 'dug pa'i thig le can/ rna shal ring
164a6(phal chen): zhing lhod par 'phyang ba/ zla ba nya ltar bzhin mdangs dang ldan zhing shin tu bzang ba/ mgul zlum zhing dung ltar mdzes pa/ snying kha dpal gyi
164a7(phal chen): be'us brgyan pa/ ro stod seng ge'i stong ltar 'dug pa/ thal gong shin tu rgyas pa/ dpung mgo'i lhur len cing zlum pa/ lag pa ring ba dra bar 'brel
164a8(phal chen): ba'i ser mo can/ rkang lag 'khor los brgyan pa/ rkang lag 'jam zhing gzhon la shas rgyas pa/ mdun shin tu mtho ba/ skyed pa rdo rje ltar 'dug
164b1(phal chen): pa/ lus che zhing drang la/ baR+Ya bzlum pa/ pho mtshan gsang ba'i sbubs na 'dug pa/ byin pa ri dgas e na ya'i byin pa ltar 'dug pa/ sor/
164b2(phal chen): mo ring ba/ rkang pa'i ting pa yangs pa/ 'od 'dom gang ba dang ldan pa/ mdog gser gyi kha dog ltar 'dug pa/ bas spu re re nas g.yas phyogs
164b3(phal chen): nas gyen du 'khyil ba/ shing nya dro ta'i rgyal po ltar chu zheng ga ba pa/ lus mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos shin tu brgyan pa/ mgo la nor bu rin po che yi
164b4(phal chen): bzhin gyi cod pan thogs pa/ 'dzam bu'i chu klung gi gser las byas pa'i 'bral ba'i rgyan dang / zla gam gyi mdzes par brgyan pa/ rna ba la rin po
164b5(phal chen): che in dra ni la'i rna cha dri ma med pa 'phyang ba/ nor bu rin po che rin thang med pa'i se mo de'i 'od kyi snang bar byas pa/ dri ma med pa'i ro stong rgyas pa dang
164b6(phal chen): ldan pa/ lha rdzas kyi nor bu dam pa'i dpung rgyan dang gdub bus lag pa mdzes par brgyan pa zhig ste/ rin po che'i gdugs chen po rin po che bai DUr+ya'i
164b7(phal chen): dri ma med pa'i yu ba tsam/ rin po che'i shar bu brgya phrag bcus rnam par phye ba/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi bla gam can/ nor bu rin po che sgra snang
164b8(phal chen): ba rnam par dag pa'i snying po can/ rin po che dril gyi phreng ba las sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba 'byung ba/ nor bu rin po che 'od phyogs kun du 'phro ba can
165a1(phal chen): phadrung du bzung zhing 'greng ba/ rgyal po'i gzi dang dbang chen po la gnas pa/ srid pa la gzhan gyi 'gor gyi rtse ba med pa/ dgra
165a2(phal chen): 'jigs pa dang bral ba'i dbang phyug dang ldan par 'dug pa mthong ngo // de'i 'khor kun nas kyang blon po stong phrag bcu tshogs shing / rgyal po'i dgos pa
165a3(phal chen): bsgrub pa la brtson par mthong ngo // de'i 'dun na chad pas gcod pa'i mi sems can dmyal ba'i bsrungs ma lta bu/ gshin rje'i g.yog 'khor lta
165a4(phal chen): bu 'jigs 'jigs lta bu'i gos gon pa gtum zhing mi zad pa/ 'jigs pa chen po skyed pa/ mig dmar so gtsigs pa/ gdong gi gnyer ma gsu
165a5(phal chen): khro gnyer du sdud pa/ ral gri rta ri dang / lcags kyi chad mdung dang / mda' ba dang / be ra ka dang mdung la sogs pa'i mtshon cha dang / lag cha
165a6(phal chen): thogs pa lus dang / bzhin gyi dbyibs mi sdug cing 'jig su rung ba/ sprin nag nag po ltar 'dug pa/ mi gnyer cing brlang la dngas pa'i sgra drag
165a7(phal chen): po 'dzin pa/ gzi lta bar dka' ba/ 'jigs pa chen po bskyed pa/ srog chags brgya phrag stong gi snying po gem par byed pa/ de lta bu dag chad
165a8(phal chen): par gcad par 'os pa'i sems can/ chad pas bcod pa la brtson pa mthong ngo // de nas srog chags rku ba gzhan gyi nor la 'phrog pa/ sem
165b1(phal chen): can gyi longs spyod chud gson pa/ lam skrag shing 'brog pa grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / lhas me tog dang / grong du chom po byed pa/ khyim phugs
165b2(phal chen): 'debs pa/ sdigs sdigs ltar byed pa/ dug sdug pa/ dkrug ma med pa/ thong mig byed pa/ byi ba byed pa/ log par zhugs pa/ gnod par sems pa/
165b3(phal chen): 'dod che ba/ sdig pa sna tshogs kyi las mi zad par byed pa/ brgya stong mang po bcings pa dam po lngas bcings shing / rgyal po me'i drung du khrid pa mthong ngo //
165b4(phal chen): de dag la'ang rgyal po med cing rig par chad pas gcad par 'gyur ba mthong ngo // des de na rgyal po mes na sgo zhing / la la ni rkang lag bcad/ la la ni rna
165b5(phal chen): ba dang sna bcad/ la la ni mig phyung / la la ni yan lags dang nying lag mgo bo bcad/ la la ni lus thams cad mes btang / la la ni ba tsha'i chu khol mas
165b6(phal chen): lus la gtor cing / phrag pa rnyil ba la sogs pa de lta bu'i chad pa sna tshogs du ma mi zad pa drag pa brlang ba/ yid du mi 'ong ba srog phrog pa dag kyang
165b7(phal chen): byed pa mthong ngo / bsad pa'i rkang lag dang / rna mig dang / sna dang mgo dang / yan lag dang nying lag gi phung po ri tsam du spungs pa mthong ngo // khrag gi
165b8(phal chen): mtsho dpag tshad gsum du zab pa/ chu zheng dang dpag tshad du ma yod pa yang mthong ngo // de nas shi ba'i rkang rus yan lag nyid lag dang / mgo dang / bral
166a1(phal chen): phal/ ba brgya stong du ma la spyang khyi dang / wa dang khyi dang / bya rog dang bya rgod dang / khra dang bya ku ru ra mang pos gang ste/ 'dran cing thog
166a2(phal chen): pa mthong ngo // de la'ang la la ni kha dog 'gyur te/ sngon por 'gyur ba tsam/ la la rnags pa tsam/ la la ni bam pa tsam/ la la ni 'bu zhugs pa tsam du
166a3(phal chen): gyur te/ shin tu kyi g.ya' shing 'jigs 'jigs pa ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo // bsad pa de dag gsod pa'i tshe/ mi sdug tsho dgu byas pas na/ 'jigs 'jam
166a4(phal chen): skad/ snying rje'i rjes skad du ngu zhing cho nges 'debs pa'i sgra chen po thos nas/ skye g.ya' zhing mi dga' chen po bskyed pa/ sems can dmyal ba chen po'i
166a5(phal chen): rigs gzhom pa'i sgra la bu'ang thos so// des de lta la btags te/ brdungs pa dang / shin tu 'jigs pa'i sgra drag shul mthong nas 'di snyam du
166a6(phal chen): gyur to// bdag ni sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par zhugs te/ byang chu
166a7(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyod ba yongasu tshol zhing 'brad de/ de dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la dge ba ni ci zhig la bgyi/ mi dge ba ni gang zhig srang zhes dri drin/
166a8(phal chen): rgyal po mi 'di la ni dge ba'i chos kyang med de/ kha na ma tho ba chen po'i las la spyod pa yid kyi yongasu rtog pa shin tu gtum pa dang ldan pa/ sems can pa
166b1(phal chen): / rol gyi srog gcod pa la zhugs pa/ sems can mnar ba la brtson pa/ tshe phyi ma la lta ba med pa ngan song gi g.yang sa'i gad ka na 'dug pa zhig na/
166b2(phal chen): 'di las cig byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i yang thos par 'gyur ram skam ste/ de de ltar sems shing yid la byed de sems can thams cad yongasu
166b3(phal chen): skyab pa la mngon par brtson pa/ snying rje rgya chen po skyes pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ de la steng gi na mkha' dbyings las lha mang po bos pa/ rigs kyi
166b4(phal chen): bu drang srong rgyal po'i 'od kyi skye mched kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdam ngag bya ba mi dran nam/ des gyen du nam mkha'i dbyings la lhas na dran no zhes
166b5(phal chen): brjod do// lha rnams kyi smras pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdam ngag la de ltar the tshom ma skyed cig/ rigs kyi bu dge ba'i bshes
166b6(phal chen): gnyen rnams ni yang dag par mngon par ston gyi log par ni ma yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa'i
166b7(phal chen): ye shes ni bsam gyi mi khyab bo// sems can yong su sdud pa'i ye shes bsam gyi mi khyab po// sems can phan 'dogs pa'i ye shes bsam gyi mi
166b8(phal chen): khyab po// sems can tshar gcod pa'i ye shes bsam gyi mi khyab bo// sems can bzeng bstod pa'i ye shes bsam gyi mi khyab po// sems can yo
167a1(phal chen): #su sbyong ba'i ye shes bsam gyi mi khyad bo// sems can yongasu bskyod pa'i ye shes bsam gyi mi khyab bo// sems can yongs
167a2(phal chen): bzung ba'i ye shes bsam gyi mi khyab bo// sems can yongasu smin par byed pa'i ye shes bsam gyi mi khyab bo// sems can 'dul ba'i ye shes bsam
167a3(phal chen): kyi mi khyab bo// song rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dris shig ces nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs lha'i ngag mnyan te/ rgyal po me
167a4(phal chen): gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ rgyal po me'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ rgyal po me la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs nas bskor
167a5(phal chen): ba byas nas 'dun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
167a6(phal chen): bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags
167a7(phal chen): ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdam ngag dang rje su rten pa mdzad do// zhes bdag gi thos na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub
167a8(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyod pa bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas rgyal po mes rgyal po'i bya ba byas te//
167b1(phal chen): seng ge'i khri las langs nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi lag pa g.yas pa nas bzungs te/ rgyal po'i pho brang ta la'i rgyal mtshan du khrid do//
167b2(phal chen): de mthar gyi rang gi gan su phyin nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du khrid do// khri la bzhag nas 'di skad ces smras so//
167b3(phal chen): rigs kyi bu nga'i khyim dang longs spyod ltos shes pas/ des ltas na khyim de ni rgya che zhing yangs pa rin po che sna bdun gyi ra bas yongasu bskor ba/ nor bu
167b4(phal chen): rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang pa shin tu mdzes par byas pa/ nor bu rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa brgya stong du mar rab tu brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che bsam
167b5(phal chen): gyi mi khyab pa'i 'od shin tu 'bar bas/ gzi brjid rab tu 'bar bar byas pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi rnam pa tha dad par rnam par phye zhing bris
167b6(phal chen): pas rnam par mdzes par byas pa/ mu tig dmar po'i ka ba bkyes/ nang du seng ge'i khri mu sa la gar pa las byas pa/ rin po che brgya stong du mas
167b7(phal chen): rnam pa sna tshog su brgyan pa shin tu bshams pa/ nor bu rin po che sgra sdang ba'i seng ge'i rgyal mtshan shin tu bsgreng / steng na nor bu rin po che rnam par bla re
167b8(phal chen): bris pa/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi dra bas kun du g.yogs pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs grangs med pas rab tu brgyan pa'i/ ba ga
168a1(phal chen): gyi rgyan dang ldan pa/ a ma gar ba las byas pa'i/ rdzing bu chu bsil bas gang ba dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing
168a2(phal chen): gi 'khor bar 'dug par mthong ngo // de'i 'khor bud med bzang zhing mdzes la lta na sdug pa kha dog rgyas pa/ bzang ba'i phul du byas pa dang ldan pa/
168a3(phal chen): sgyu rtsal thams cad kyi tshul la mkhas pa/ sngon du ldang ba phyi nas nyal ba byams pa dang ldan pa/ ci bsgo ba bzhin du byed cing ngag gnyan pa/ bye ba
168a4(phal chen): phrag bcu yang 'khod par mthong ngo // de nas rgyal po mes tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu ji snyam du sems//
168a5(phal chen): ci ga sdig pa rnams la las kyi rnam par smin pa mngon par grub pa'i nga lta bu yod dam/ lus phun sum tshogs pa 'di lta bu yod dam/ 'khor phun
168a6(phal chen): sum tshogs pa 'di lta bu yod dam/ kyid pa chen po phun sum tshogs pa 'di lta bu yod dam/ dbang phyug dang dbang phun sum tshogs pa 'di lta bu
168a7(phal chen): yod dam/ smras pa/ 'phags pa de lta bu ni ma mchis so// des smras pa rigs kyi bu nga ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgyu ma'i rnam
168a8(phal chen): bar thob pa ste/ rigs kyi bu nga'i yul na gnas pa'i sems can 'di dag phal cher sreg gcod par byed pa dang / ma byin par len pa 'dod pas log
168b1(phal chen): par g.yem pa/ rdzun du smra ba phra ma can/ tshig brlang por smra ba/ byung rgyal du brjod pa chags sems dang ldan pa gnod sems can/ log par lta ba/
168b2(phal chen): sdig pa'i las byed pa/ khro zhing gtum pa/ ba ba rgyal can gyi mi dge ba'i las kyi bya ba sna tshogs dang ldan pa dag/ de dag ni rnam pa gzhan gyi spyod
168b3(phal chen): pa las zlogs pa dang / bgag par snyan par mi nus te/ de ltar rigs kyi bu nga ni sems can 'di dag 'dul ba dang / yongasasu smin par bya ba dang / shin
168b4(phal chen): tu dul bar bya ba dang / phan pa la dgod par bya ba'i phyir snying rje chen po 'dun du byas te/ gsod pa'i gshed ma sprul pa rnams gsad pa'i mir sprul pa
168b5(phal chen): rnams la gsod du bzud pa dang / chad pas bcad pa'i mi sprul pa rnams/ mi dge ba'i las kyi lam la gcod par sprul pa'i mi rnams la chad pa snga
168b6(phal chen): tshogs kyi bcad du bzud pa dang / rkang lag dang / sna dang / rna ba dang / yan lag dang / nying lag dang / mgo bcad pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal
168b7(phal chen): mi zad pa nyam su myong bar 'gyur ba lta bu dag kyang yongasu ston par byed do// de mthong nas pa'i yul khams na gnas pa'i sems can de dag nyes pa
168b8(phal chen): stong zhing skyo ba'i shugs thob par 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa skyo zhing bag tsha ba skye bar 'gyur ro// de dag sdig pa'i las byed pa rnams gtong zhing bag
169a1(phal chen): ngalabyed par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de ltar nga ni sems can 'di dag thabs des nyes pa stong zhing / 'jigs pa'i sems
169a2(phal chen): dang ldan pa dang / skyo ba'i yid dang ldan par shes nas mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam las bzlog ste/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par byas shing
169a3(phal chen): bde ba'i mthar byin pa sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun 'chad pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bde ba la 'god par byed cing / rigs kyi bu nga ni lus
169a4(phal chen): dang ngag gam yid kyis kyang sems can su la yang co mi dri tho mi tsham mo// rigs kyi bu nga ni phyi ma'i mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal gyi bgrangs shes
169a5(phal chen): pa ste/ byol song gi skye gnas glen pa'i kham su gtogs pa las kyang / chung ngu na rtse'i rtse mo lta bu'i srog chags phre'u 'ga' la yang sems bskyed
169a6(phal chen): pa gcig tsam du sdug bsngal bar bya bar mi dga' na/ zhing du gyur cing dge ba'i las kyi lam bskyed par nus pa'i mi lta zhig la ci smos/ rigs kyi
169a7(phal chen): bu nga ni rmi lam na yang mi dge ba'i chos yongasu rgyu ba mi skyed na/ ched du bsam ste lta smos re skan/ rigs kyi bu de ltar ngas ni byang chub sems dpa'i
169a8(phal chen): rnam par thar pa sgyu ma'i rnam pa 'di shes par zad na/ ngas byang chub sems dpa' mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa thob pa/ srid pa dang lam gyi rgyud tham
169b1(phal chen): cad sgyu ma'i rnam par khong du chud pa/ sprul pa lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas 'byung ba/ gzugs brnyan lta bu'i 'jig rten thams cad
169b2(phal chen): rnam par rig pa/ rmi lam lta bu'i chos nyid khong du chud pa/ thogs pa med pa'i sgo chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul la rje su zhugs pa/ mig 'phrul lta bu
169b3(phal chen): spyod pa'i dra bas rtog par 'gyur ba/ ye shes bsgrib pa med pa'i yul dang ldan pa/ kun tu yang dag par gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi byung ba'i//
169b4(phal chen): klog kun tu 'khril ba'i rgyud kyi gzungs la dbang sgyur ba/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul gyi yul khong du chud pa rnams kyi spyod yul shes pa'am/ yon
169b5(phal chen): tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'dri nyid na/ grong khyer 'od bzang po zhes bya ba yod do// de na rgyal po 'od chen po zhes
169b6(phal chen): bya ba 'dug gi/ de'i gan du song la byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/
169b7(phal chen): de nas tshong dpon gyi nor bzangs kyi rgyal po'i me'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ rgyal po me la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs nas
169b8(phal chen): bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang ltas nas rgyal po me'i drung du song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs ye shes sgyu ma des rjesu dran par byed cing /
170a1(phal chen): palabyang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgyu ma'i rnam pa de la bsam pa dang / chos nyid sgyu ma'i rnam pa de la rab tu brtsa
170a2(phal chen): pa dang / las kyi rgyu ma mnyam pa de khong du chung bar bya ba dang / chos kyi sgyu ma mnyam de la rjesu bsam pa dang / chos kyi sa yongasu smin par bya ba
170a3(phal chen): byas pa'i sprul pa mnyam pa de khong du chud par bya ba dang / ye shes la byung ba'i snang ba bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang /
170a4(phal chen): sngon lam gyi rgyud pa'i rnam pa mtha' yas pa mngon par bsgrub pa de mngon par bsgrub par bya ba dang / spyod pa sprul pa'i chos nyid chags pa med
170a5(phal chen): pa de rnam par sbyang ba dang dang / dus gsum sgyu ma'i rnam pa'i mtshan nyid de yang rnam par dbye ba byed cing / mthar gyi yul nas yul du dri ba dang /
170a6(phal chen): kun tu btsal ba dang / rje su rnam par lta bar byed cing / phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams dang / lam dang sman ljongs dang / zang dang / thag thug
170a7(phal chen): dang / khal khol dang / ri dang sul dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / rgyal po'i gnas thams cad du yongasu sbyor
170a8(phal chen): med pa'i sems dang / lus la dub pa med par tshol tshol te/ grong khyer chen po 'od bzang ba'i nye 'khor cig tu phyin nas rgyal po gang na bzhugs
170b1(phal chen): zhes dris na/ de la 'gro ba mang pos bstan pa/ rigs kyi bu de re 'di ni grong khyer 'od bzang po zhes bya ba yin te/ 'di na rgyal po bzhugaso//
170b2(phal chen): zhes nas de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po gang na ba der phyin nas/ grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po mthong ngo // mthang
170b3(phal chen): nas kyang dga' rangs te/ mgu zhing nyam pa de la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas 'di snyam du bsams so// 'di na bdag gis dge ba'i bshes
170b4(phal chen): gnyen bzhugs pa lta ste/ de ring ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen de yang mthong bar gyur to// de las byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongasu yang thos par
170b5(phal chen): 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' byung ba'i sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid bsam gyi mi khyab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yon
170b6(phal chen): tan bsam gyi mi khyab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul bsam gyi mi khyab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' khyu mchog gi mthu byung ba
170b7(phal chen): bsam gyi mi khyab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par spyod pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par
170b8(phal chen): pas rnam par rol pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsums pa chen po thar 'byung ba rnam par dag pa bsam gyi mi khyab
171a1(phal chen): bgapa'ang thos par 'gyur ro// zhes de ltar bsam pa yid la byed cing grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po gang na ba der song ste
171a2(phal chen): phyin nas/ grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po de la ltas na/ gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUr+ya dang / shel dang / mu tig dmar po dang / a s+tha gar
171a3(phal chen): pa dang / mu sa la gar pa dang / rin po che 'di bdun gyi shin tu bzang zhing lta na mdzes pa/ rin po che'i 'obs zab tu zab pa chus gang ba/ gzhi
171a4(phal chen): gser gyi gam pas gang la/ lha rdzas kyi ud pa la dang / pad ma dkar po dang / ku mu ta dang / pun ta ri ka kun nas yog pa dus dang mthun pa'i
171a5(phal chen): tsan dan gyi 'dab ma dang / lu mas 'khor ba bdun gyi kun nas yongasu bskor ba/ rin po che sna bdun gyi ta la'i 'phreng ba rim pa bdun gyi kun nas
171a6(phal chen): yongs su bskor ba/ rdo rje rin po che'i ra ba bdun gyi kun nas yongasu bskor ba/ 'di lta ste seng ge'i yid du 'ongs pa'i rdo rje'i ra ba dang / rdo rje gnas
171a7(phal chen): gyi thub pa med pa'i ra ba dang / 'dug pa'i ngang tshul gyi rdo rje'i ra ba dang / thung par dka' ba'i ngang tshul gyi rdo rje'i ra ba dang / rdo rje brtan pa'i
171a8(phal chen): chags pa med pa'i ra ba dang / rdo rje'i 'od zer rdul dang bral ba'i kha dog gi rgyan gyi rdo rje'i ra bas yongasu bskor te/ rdo rje rin po che'i dra ba de dag
171b1(phal chen): thams cad kyang nor bu rin po che grangs med pas yongasu smras pas/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi leb rgan dang ba so mdzes par rgya pa?/ dngul rin po
171b2(phal chen): che'i ba so'i 'phreng ba mdzes par brgyan pa/ rin po che bai DUr+ya'i ba se'i 'phreng ba mdzes par brgyan pa/ rin po che shel gyi 'phreng ba'i ba so mdzes
171b3(phal chen): bar brgyan pa/ mu tig dmar mo'i ba so'i 'breng ba mdzes pas brgyan pa/ mu tig rin po che rgya mtsho'i ba so'i 'phreng ba mdzes pas rgyan pa ste/
171b4(phal chen): zo khyer chen po de'i sgo chen po brgyad kyi bar bar na'ang dpag tshad bcu bcu yod do// sgo de dag kyang rin po che sna bdun las sna tshogs mdzes par byas
171b5(phal chen): pa ste/ lta na yid du 'ong ba'o// grong khyer chen po de ni de ltar rgya che zhing yangs la/ yan lag rnam pa brgyad du rnam par phye ba/ bai DUr+ya sngon
171b6(phal chen): bo'i sa la gnas pa ste/ grong khyer chen po'i nang na yang srang chen po'i bye ba phrag bcu yod do// srang re re'i glo gnyis nas kyang / khyim chen po
171b7(phal chen): brgya phrag stong khos legs par 'gribs pa ste/ kun kyang rin po che sna tshogs las byas pa dag go// rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs kyi rab tu
171b8(phal chen): brgyan pa dag go// rin po che'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan bsgrengs pa dang / ba dan che phra dang ldan pa dag go/ yo byad thams cad phur sum/
172a1(phal chen): tshogs pa dag go/ sems can bye ba khrag khrig du ma gnas pa dag go/ grong khyer chen po de yang nor bu rin po che
172a2(phal chen): kha dog grangs med pa'i khang pa mdzes par byas pa ste/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi khang pa brtsegs pa la rin po che bai DUr+ya'i dra bas kun nas khya pa
172a3(phal chen): bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyi brgyan pa/ grangs med pa dang ldan pa'o// dngul gyi khang pa brtsegs pa la/ mu tig dmar po'i dra bas kun
172a4(phal chen): nas khyebs pa/ bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i rgyan gyi brgyan pa grangs med pa dang ldan pa'o// bai DUr+ya'i khang pa brtsegs pa la rin po che'i mdzod sna tshogs kyi bas kun nas
172a5(phal chen): khyebs pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyi brgyan pa grangs med pa dang ldan pa'o// shel gyi khang pa brtsegs pa rin po che'i snying po yangs pa'i dra
172a6(phal chen): bas kun nas khyab pa/ bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyi rgyan pa grangs med pa dang ldan pa'o// rin bu rin po che 'gro ba'i yid du 'ongs pa'i khang pa
172a7(phal chen): brtsegs pa la/ rin po che nyi ma'i snying po'i dra bas khyebs pa/ bsam gyi mi khyad pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyi brgyan pa grangs med pa dang ldan pa'o// rin po ni
172a8(phal chen): in dra ni la'i khang partsegs pa la rin po che dpal gyi 'od zer gyi dra bas kun nas khyebs pa/ bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyi rgyan pa grangs med
172b1(phal chen): pa dang ldan pa'o// rin pa che'i rgyal po 'gro ba brgya mtsho'i khang pa brtsegs pa rin po che'i rgyal skar ma'i 'od zer gyi dra bas kun nas khyabs pa/ @
172b2(phal chen): gyi mi khyab pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyi rgyan pa'o// rin po che'i rdo rje'i khang partsegs pa la rin po che'i rgyal po gzhan gyi mi thub pa'i dra bas kun nas khyebs
172b3(phal chen): pa/ bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyi rgyan pa grangs med pa dang ldan pa'o// dus dang mthun pa'i tsan dan khang pa rtsegs pa la lha rdzas kyi me toH
172b4(phal chen): man da ra ba'i dra bas kun nas khebs pa/ bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyi brgyan pa grangs med pa dang ldan pa'o// rin po che'i khang pa brtseg
172b5(phal chen): pa de dag re re zhing yang rin po che'i lan rgan du mas brgyan pa/ rin po che'i stegs bu rim pa bdun gyi bskor ba/ rin po che'i ta la'i 'phreng ba rim pa
172b6(phal chen): bdun gyi 'khor bar dgrigs pa'o// rin po che lan rkan de dag dang / rin po che'i ta la'i de dag thams cad du 'ang phan tshun rin po che'i srad bus sbrel
172b7(phal chen): ba'o// rin po che'i srad bu de dag thams cad kyang gser gyi dril bu'i 'phreng bas brgyan pa'o// gser gyi dril bu'i 'phreng ba de dag thams cad kyang rin
172b8(phal chen): po che'i lda lding sna tshogs kyi rnam par bris shing spel ba'o// rin po che'i lda ldi de dag thams cad las kyang / rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas mngon
172'a1(phal chen): pal/ par sbyangs pa dag ste/ de ltar grong khyer chen po de dag thams cad ni/ nor bu rin po che'i dra ba grangs med pas kun nas khyab pa'o// /
172'a2(phal chen): rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba grangs med pas kun nas khyebs pa'o// lha rdzas kyi spos kyi dra bas grangs med pas kun nas khyab pa'o// lha rdzas kyi me tog
172'a3(phal chen): sna tshogs kyi dra ba grangs med pas kun nas khyab pa'o// rin po che 'bru'i dra ba grangs med pas kun nas khyebs pa'o// rdo rje'i bla re grangs med pas kun nas khyebs
172'a4(phal chen): pa'o// rin po che'i bla re grangs med pas kun nas khyebs pa'o// rin po che'i gdugs kyi bla re grangs med pas kun nas khebs pa'o// gos rin po che'i bla re gra
172'a5(phal chen): med pas kun nas khyabs pa'o// me tog gi phreng ba'i bla re grangs med pas kun nas khyebs pa'o// rin po che'i gdugs dang rgyal mtshan sna tshogs tsugs shing sbreng /
172'a6(phal chen): ba ste/ grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po de'i dbus su rgyal po 'od chen po zhugs pa'i pho brang brtsigs pa/ 'khor kun tu dpag tshad bzhi yod pa ste/ rin po che sna
172'a7(phal chen): bdun las byas pa'o// rin po che sna tshogs kyi stegs bu rim pa bdun gyi yongasu bskor ba'o// rin po che'i dril bu yid du 'ong ba'i sgra bstan pa'i khrol ba'i
172'a8(phal chen): dra ba rim pa bdun gyi sgra kun nas 'byung ba'o// rin po che sna bdun gyi ta la'i 'phreng ba rim pa bdun gyi kun nas bskor ba'o// rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang brtsegs
172'b1(phal chen): pa'i rgyan rgya stong bsam gyi mi khyab pa dang ldan pa'o// rdzing bu rin po che sna tshogs du ma las byas pa/ gser gyi gram pa kun tu bkram pa/ yan lag brgyad dang
172'b2(phal chen): ldan pa'i chus yongasu gang ba/ lha rdzas kyi ud pa la dang / pad ma dkar po dang / ku mu ta dang / me tog pun ta ri kas chu'i steng kun tu yogs pa/ rin po
172'b3(phal chen): che'i me tog dang / 'bras bu'i shing sna tshogs rab tu brgyan pa/ phyogs bzhi nas rin po che ba gus rtsigs pa'i thems skas rnam par skye ba can gyis shin tu
172'b4(phal chen): mdzes par byas pa dang ldan pa/ lha rdzas kyi sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba 'byin pa'i bya phran sna tshogs kyi sgra shin du 'byung ba yod pa/ lha'i dbang po'i pho brang
172'b5(phal chen): dang 'gran pa ste/ de'i dbus na rin po'i 'gro ba snang ba'i khang pa rtsegs pa shing du bzang la mdzes zhing yid du 'ong ba/ rin po che grangs med pa'i rgyan pas
172'b6(phal chen): gyi mi khyab pa'i gya noms par brgyan pa yod de/ de'i nang na rgyal po 'od chen po dam pa'i mchog ces bya ba'i dbyig tu bya ba bzhugs so// de nas tshong dpon
172'b7(phal chen): gyi bu nor bzang rin po che'i 'obs de dag la chags pa'i sems med/ rin po che'i dra ba de dag la ngo mtshar du 'dzin pa'i yid med/ rin po che ta la'i phreng ba
172'b8(phal chen): de dag la ni 'dod cing chags pa med/ rin po che dril gyi dra ba'i sgra la ni ro myong bar byed pa med/ lha rdzas kyi rol mo'i sgra dang / glu ro snyan pa'i dbyangs la ni
173a1(phal chen): phal/ @#chags pa'i sems dang med rin po che'i rnam pa tha dad pa'i gzhal med khang dang / khang partsegs pa sna tshogs kyi longs spyod
173a2(phal chen): pa ni yid la bya ba med par shin tu dga' bar gyur pa'i skyes pa dang / bud med kyi tsho gas chos kyi dga' ba'i mos pas shin tu mos pa sems can gang dang
173a3(phal chen): phrad kyang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen rtag tu dri zhing mthar gyi grong khyer gyi lam gyi sum mdo'i drung shin tu bsdus na/ grong khyer gyi lam sum mdo'i dbus kyi
173a4(phal chen): mchod rten gyi khang pa nas/ lha ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na rgyan chen po dang ldan pa'i khri rin po che bai DUr+ya sngon po'i rkang pa kye ba/ bai DUr+ya dkar po seng ges
173a5(phal chen): blangs pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi lcags bod kyi dra ba legs par rtags pa/ lha rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i rin po che'i stan sna tshogs gting ba/ rin
173a6(phal chen): tho che'i 'bru grangs med pas rnam par brgyan par/ nor bu rin po che'i brgyan bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i dra bas kun nas rgyan pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi
173a7(phal chen): gser gyi snam bu la/ lha rdzas rin po che sna tshogs kyi shin du sba bar skye ba'i gnam yol bris pa/ nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po pad ma'i snying
173a8(phal chen): po dang ldan pa de lta bu'i chos kyi khri chen po la rgyal po 'od chen po mi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyi lus shin tu brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po
173b1(phal chen): sna tshogs brgya bcu thams pas lus shin tu mdzes pa/ gser gyi ri bo ltar rin po che sna tshogs rnam par bkod pas rnam par mdzes pa/ nyi ma'i dkyil
173b2(phal chen): 'khor ltar gzi brjid rab tu 'bar ba/ zla ba nya bzhin rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor ltar blta na bzang ba/ tshangs pa ltar tshangs pa'i 'khor gyi nang na
173b3(phal chen): rnam par mdzes pa/ rgya mtsho ltar zab mo'i chos dang yon tan mtha' yas pa'i rin po che'i tshogs dang ldan pa/ sprin chen po ltar chos kyi rang bzhin
173b4(phal chen): sgra sgrogs pa/ nam mkha'i ltar chos kyi tshul gyi skar ma'i tshogs kyi brgyan pa/ ri rab ltar kha dog bzhi po sems can rgya mtsho'i sems la gzugs
173b5(phal chen): rnyen rab tu snang ba/ rin po che'i gling ltar bzhi ye shes sna tshogs rin po che yongasu gang ba de dkyil mo dkrung du 'dug pa mthong ngo // de'i 'dun na yang
173b6(phal chen): gser dang / ner bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / man shel dang / bye ru dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul rin po che'i phung po dang / lha rdzas
173b7(phal chen): kyi gos kha dog sna tshogs kyi phung po dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs kyi phung po dang / kha zas dang / spyan gzigs sna tshogs kyi phung
173b8(phal chen): dang / zhim pa'i tshogs khyad par du 'phags pa sna tshogs kyi phung po dgod pa dang / dngar ba'i thabs sna tshogs kyi yul du bkod pa mthong ngo //
174a1(phal chen): b.lalha rdzas kyi shing rta rin po che bye ba brgya stong du ma dang / lha rdzas kyi bsil snyen bye ba brgya stong du ma dang / lha rdzas kyi spos kyi
174a2(phal chen): rnam pa bye ba brgya stong du ma dang / nad kyi rkyen sngan dang / yo byad kyi phung po du ma dang / yo byad kyi khyad par thams cad kyi phung po spyod du rung zhing / kha na
174a3(phal chen): ma tho ba med pa mang po sems can rnams ci dga' ba spyod du bzung ba'i phyir bshams te/ dgod pa dang / ba bzhon gser gyi ru rmig can stong phrag
174a4(phal chen): du ma'o ma bres 'jal ba mang po yang // sems can phongs pa yongasu sdud pa'i phyir bkod pa mthong ngo // bu mo rin po che bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
174a5(phal chen): bzhin bzang la shin tu mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ brgyan thams cad kyi rnam par klubs pa/ lha rdzas kyi gos rin po che gyon pa/ lha rdzas kyi can
174a6(phal chen): dan sbrul gyi snying pos lus byugs pa/ sgyu stsal drug bcu rtsa bzhi tshul shes pa/ 'dod pa'i spyod pa dang cho ga thams cad la mkhas pa dag kyang
174a7(phal chen): stsogs shing bkod pa mthong ngo // de'i mdun ni ji lta ba de bzhin du sems can rnams yongasu bsdu ba dang / sems can rnams yong su bzung ba dang /
174a8(phal chen): sems can rnams dga' ba bskyed pa dang / sems can rnams spro ba skyed pa dang / sems can rnams yid dang bar byed pa dang / sems can rnams
174b1(phal chen): kyi sems shin tu bde bar bya ba dang / sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa rnam par zhi bar bya ba dang / sems can rnams chos kyi rang bzhin gyi don la rab tu
174b2(phal chen): bkod pa dang / sems can rnams thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du don mnyam par bya ba dang / sems can rnams gzhan la 'khu ba rnams bzlog par bya ba dang /
174b3(phal chen): lus dang ngag gi ngan du spyod pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / sems can rnams kyi lta ba'i zug rngu yang dag par byung ba dang / sems can rnams kyi lam
174b4(phal chen): yongasu sbyang ba'i phyir/ srang dang lam gyi bzhi mdo dang / sgo dang khyams dag na'ang de bzhin te/ skang re re'i g.yas g.yon kyang / stegs bu bye ba nyi shu tsam
174b5(phal chen): yo byad thams cad yongasu dpung ste/ dkod pa mthong ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang rgyal po 'od chen po la lus thams cad kyi phab nas phyag byas
174b6(phal chen): te/ rgyal po 'od chen po la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs nas bskor ba byas nas mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so//
174b7(phal chen): 'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dnga'i
174b8(phal chen): spyod pa la slab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams gdam ngag dang rje su bstan
175a1(phal chen): lapar mdzad do// zhes bdag gi thos na 'phags pa ji ltar/ byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la/
175a2(phal chen): bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan tu 'gyi ba bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/ smras pa rig sa bu nga ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa/ byams pa chen
175a3(phal chen): po'i rgyal mtshan yong su dag pa/ yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ste/ rigs kyi bu ngas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa byams pa chen po rgyal mtshan 'di yang
175a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas brgya phrag du ma dang / sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag du ma dang / sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag rgya stong du mas brjod du med pa yang brjod du
175a5(phal chen): med pa'i bar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la yongasu dris so// yongasu zhus so// rnam par sbyangs so// yongasu sbyangs so// rnam par bkod
175a6(phal chen): do// rnam par ltas so// rnam par dpyad do// rjes su btsal to// yongasu brtags so// rnam par bris so// rgya cher byas so// rigs kyi bu de ltar nga ni/
175a7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa byams pa chen po'i rgyal mtshan 'di la gnas shing chos dang mthun par khams skyong zhing ston pa'o// chos dang mthun par 'jig
175a8(phal chen): rten la phan par byed do// chos dang mthun par 'jig rten la rjesu spyod do// chos dang mthun par sems can bcol bar byed do// chos dang mthun par sems
175b1(phal chen): can rnams la nan tan byed do// chos kyi dkyil 'khor la sems can rnams yong su 'dzud do// chos kyi tshul sems can rnams la nye bar bsgrub bo// chos
175b2(phal chen): dang 'thun pa sems can rnams la yongasasu bsgo ba byed do// chos kyi nan tan la sems can rnams yongs su sbyor ba'o// chos kyi rang bzhin nges par rtog pa
175b3(phal chen): la sems can rnams rab tu bkod/ byams pa'i sems dang byams pa chen po'i dbang dang / byams pa'i stobs dang / ban pa'i sems dang / bde ba'i
175b4(phal chen): sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / phan 'dogs pa'i sems dang / yongasu bsrung ba'i sems dang / sems can yongasu 'dzin pa mi stong pa'i
175b5(phal chen): sems dang / sdug bsngal thams cad rnam par zlog pa'i smon lam rgyun mi gcod pa'i sems dang / bde ba'i mthar phyin pa la rab tu dgod
175b6(phal chen): par yang dag par spyod pa la sems can rnams rab tu 'god do// bag yang gi bde ba yang dag par bskyed pas/ sems can de dag gi lus
175b7(phal chen): kyang shin tu bde bar byed do// de dag gi 'khor ba'i bde ba la zhen pa'i sems kyi rgyud dang rnam par sbyong bar byed do// de dag gi 'khor ba'i bde
175b8(phal chen): ba la zhen pa'i sems kyi rgyu dang / chos kyi dga' ba dang / mos pa la yongasu bzhol bar byed do// nyon mongs pa'i dri ma thams cad las rnam
176a1(phal chen): phalapar sbyong bar byed do// mi dge ba'i chos thams cad las yongasu sbyong bar byed do// 'khor ba'i rgyud las rnam par zlog
176a2(phal chen): par byed do// chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho la yongasu bzung bar byed do// de dag gi srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud du skye ba thams cad rgyun gcod pa'i
176a3(phal chen): phyir/ sems can gyi ma rigs pa yong su bsreg par byed do// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir/ de dag gi sems/
176a4(phal chen): kyi myu gu yongs su bskyed do// 'brog pa'i dad pa'i stobs yang dag par bskyed pa'i phyir/ de dag gi sems kyi rgya mtsho yang rab tu dang bar byed do//
176a5(phal chen): rigs kyi bu de ltar nga ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa/ byams pa chen po'i rgyal mtshan la gnas te/ chos dang mthun par 'jig rten skyong zhing ston te/
176a6(phal chen): rigs kyi bu nga'i khams na gnas pa'i sems can rnams ni/ ngas 'jigs shing sngangs pa 'am bag tsha zhing skyi g.ya' ba med de/ rigs kyi bu sems ca
176a7(phal chen): gang phongs shing / yo byad sna tshogs kyi brel ba/ bza' ba 'dod pa 'am/ gtung ba 'dod pa 'am/ gos 'dod pa nas yo byad sna tshogs thams cad
176a8(phal chen): gang 'dod kyang rung ste/ de dag thams cad nga'i drung du 'ong ngo // de dag la 'ang ngas snga nas bsham bsham pa'i mdzod sgo phye zhing ci 'dod khyer cig ces
176b1(phal chen): bstan te/ gang gi don du khyed sdig pa'i las la spyod cing / srog gcod pa 'am/ ma byin par len pa 'am/ 'dod pas log par g.yem pa'am/
176b2(phal chen): brdzun du smra ba 'am/ 'phra ma 'am/ ngag brtsub mo dang / tshig khyal pa 'am/ chags sems sam/ gnod sems sam/ log par lta ba dang /
176b3(phal chen): de ma yin pa'i lta ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs la mngon par zhen par gyur pa/ de dag thams cad kyang grong khyer chen po 'di sgo dang bsrang dang / khyams dang /
176b4(phal chen): lam gyi mdo dang / gzhi mdo kun tu spungs te/ snga na byin pa yin gyis/ su ci 'dod pa kun kyang khyer cig ces bstabs shing byin no// rigs kyi bu/
176b5(phal chen): grong khyer 'od bzang po 'di na sems can ji snyed cig gnas pa de dag thams cad na/ byang chub sems dpas te/ theg pa chen por bzhugs pa ste/
176b6(phal chen): de bas na grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po 'di yang / de dag la bsam pa rnam pa ji lta bur dag pa'i tshul bzhin du snang ste/ la la la ni dag par snang ngo //
176b7(phal chen): la la la ni yangs par snang ngo // la la la ni gzhi sa la gnas par snang ngo // la la la ni gzhi rin po che bai dUr+ya las blangs par snang ngo // la la la ni sa'i
176b8(phal chen): ra bas bskor bar snang ngo // la la la ni rin po rdo rje gzhan gyi mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi ra bas bskor bar snang ngo // la la la ni seg ma dang / gyo mos dang
177a1(phal chen): ba'azhing thag thug dang / grog po dang g.yangs mang po can du snang ngo // la la la ni nor bu rin po che dam pa grangs med pa bzhi brgyan
177a2(phal chen): cing yongasu bkram pa dang / lag thil bzhin du gzhi mnyam par snang ngo // la la la ni sa la byas par snang ngo // la la la ni rin po che grangs med pa'i
177a3(phal chen): khang pa dang / gzhal med khang dang khang bzhag dang khang pa brtsegs pa dang khang sngags dang / ba gam dang kar khung gi shar bu dang / zla gam rin po che
177a4(phal chen): seng ge'i dra bas brgyan par snang / grong khyer pha rol du gnas pa'i sems can sngon ngas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sdu ba'i dngos
177a5(phal chen): po bzhi sa yongasu sdus pa/ bsam pa dag pa dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas mang po bstan bkur ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mos par
177a6(phal chen): mos pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba/ de dag la 'ang rin po che las byas par snang ngo // de ma yin pa gzhan dag la ni sa las byas par
177a7(phal chen): bsnang ste/ rigs kyi bu nga'i khams na gnas pa'i sems can yul dang phyogs dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / khams dang /
177a8(phal chen): rgyal po'i pho brang dag na rnyog pa lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi lus kyi rang bzhin gyi bkrugs te/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam zhig byed par
177b1(phal chen): 'dod pas gyur na yang / de'i tshe nged dge la phan par bya ba'i sems kyi byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten gyi dbang po'i klong zhes bya ba/
177b2(phal chen): dang / byams pa chen po sngon du 'gro ba la snyoms par 'jug ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / de nyid mod la sems
177b3(phal chen): can de dag gi 'jigs pa de dag dang / thab mo dang / rtsod pa de dag dang / sems kyi 'khrug pa de dag dang / tshe ba'i sems de dag dang / byang chub sems
177b4(phal chen): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten gyi dbang po'i klong byams pa chen po sngon du 'gro ba de'i tshe chos nyid thos pas rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// nye bar zhi bar 'gyuraro//
177b5(phal chen): rnam par ldog par 'gyur ro// 'gag par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu yud tsam zhig sdong dang / de'i re sngon sum du 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal 'od chen pos de'i
177b6(phal chen): tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin byams pa chen po sngon du 'gro ba 'jig rten gyi dbang po krong la mnyam par gzhag go// de ltar rgyal po 'od chen pos
177b7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin byams pa chen po sngon du 'gro ba 'jig rten gyi dbang po ni/ glong la mnyam par gzhag ma thag tu/ de'i mdo la grong khyer che
177b8(phal chen): po 'od bzang po yul dang phyogs la/ grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / khams dang / rgyal po'i pho brang gi 'khor dang bcas pa rnam pa drug tu g.yoso// /
178a1(phal chen): pade g.yos pa'i tshe rin po che'i dra ba de dag dang / rin po che'i khang pa dang / rin po che'i snying po dang / rin po che'i khyim dang / rin po che'i
178a2(phal chen): gnas dang / rin po che'i gzhal med khang dang / rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang / rin po che'i ba gam dang / rin po che'i bu shu dang / rin po che'i skar khung dang /
178a3(phal chen): rin po che'i steg bu dang / rin po che'i rta babs dang / rin po che'i zla gam dang / rin po che'i seng ge'i dra ba dang / rin po che'i len kan dang / rin po che'i
178a4(phal chen): 'bru dang / rin po che'i bla re dang / rin po che'i sred bus rgyus pa'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba dang / rin po che'i dril bu dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /
178a5(phal chen): rin po che'i ba dan dang / rin po che ta la de dag yang rab tu gams te/ sgra 'byin to// rab tu khrol lo// de dag de ltar sgra 'byin cing yid du 'ong la snyan pa dang /
178a6(phal chen): mnyan na dga' ba'i dbyangs brjod cing rgyal po 'od chen po gang na ba der btud de phyag 'tshal lo// grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po'i nang du/ sems can ji snyed
178a7(phal chen): cig gnas pa de dag thams cad kyang dga' ba dang rangs pa'i sems kyi yongasu brgyan nas/ rgyal po 'od chen po gang na ba der log su mngon tu bltas nas/ lus
178a8(phal chen): thams cad pa'o nas phyag 'tshal lo// de'i khams kyi grong dang grong khyer dang / ljongs dang / lus dang / khams dang / rgyal po'i pho zad 'khor na gnas pa de da
178b1(phal chen): thams cad kyang lus dang sems bde bar gyur te/ dga' zhing rangs pa skyes nas/ rgyal po 'od chen po gang na ba der logs su phyag 'tshal lo// byol song gi skye
178b2(phal chen): gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyang / gcig la gcig byams pa'i sems dang phan pa'i sems su ldan par gyur nas/ rgyal po 'od chen po
178b3(phal chen): gang na ba der log su blta zhing mngon par 'dud ngo do// ri dang skad mthon po'i sa'i phyogs gel ba dang / sman dang / nag 'tshal thams cad kyang / rgyal po
178b4(phal chen): 'od chen po gang na ba der logasu mngon par 'dud par gyur te/ de'i khams na mtsho dang mtshe'u dang lu ma dang / steng ka dang / 'bab chu dang / chu klung dang /
178b5(phal chen): rdzing dang / khron pa ci snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang / rgyal po 'od chen po gang na ba der log su mngon par bzhon zhing / rlabs kyi sgra 'byin par 'gyur/
178b6(phal chen): ro// klu'i rgyal po stong phrag bcu yang a ka ru nag po'i bdug spos kyi dud pa na 'un du 'grigs pa'i spos kyi sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i 'od kyi snang bar byed
178b7(phal chen): cing 'brug sgra sgrogs pa dang / spos chu'i char rgyun shin tu phra ba mngon par 'bebs par 'gyur to// rgya byin dang rab 'tshe ma dang / rab dga' ldan dang //
178b8(phal chen): rab 'phrul dga' dang / dbang sgyur gyi lha'i rgyal po la sogs pa/ lha'i bu stong phrag bcus kyang steng gyi bar snang la 'khod de/ na mkha'i dbyings tham
179a1(phal chen): cad/ lha rdzas kyi rol mo sil snyan gyi bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi sgra byung ba/ dbyangs snyan pa rgya cher bsgrags pa'i brgyan
179a2(phal chen): pa dang / lha'i bu mo grangs med pa lnga'i glu snyen pa'i sprin gyi sgra sgrogs pa'i dbyangs snyan cing yid du 'ong ba'i rgyan gyi brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rin pa
179a3(phal chen): che'i me tog sna tshogs kyi sprin grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gi brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi sprin kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin grangs med pa'i
179a4(phal chen): char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyi rgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i 'phreng ba sna tshogs kyi sprin grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyi brgyan
179a5(phal chen): pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i lhab lhub sna tshogs kyi grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyi rgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi gos sna tshogs dri
179a6(phal chen): med cing 'jam pa kha dog rnam pa tha dad pa'i sprin grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyi brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i gdugs rnam
179a7(phal chen): khar bye ba sna tshogs kyi sprin grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyi brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che seng ge'i yid du 'ong ba'i rgyal mtshan
179a8(phal chen): gyi sprin grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyi brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che 'bar ba'i lce shin tu 'phro ba'i rin po che'i ba dan gyi sprin gra
179b1(phal chen): med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyi rgyan pa dang / rgyal po 'od chen po la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir byin gyi rlabs so// glang po'i rgyal po shugs la
179b2(phal chen): gyi kyang / glang po'i dbang po khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba rnam par 'phrul pa'i mthus/ na mkha'i dbyings thams cad lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna tshogs
179b3(phal chen): kyi pad mo'i sprin grangs med pas yogs par byin gyi rlabs so// lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che'i se mo de grangs med pa rab tu 'phyang ba dang / lha rdzas
179b4(phal chen): kyi rin po che'i snam bu'i lnga ldi dang / chun po grangs med pa rab tu 'byang ba dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna tshogs kyi phreng ba'i rgyud grangs med pa
179b5(phal chen): mngon par 'phyang ba'i rgyan gyi brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna tshogs kyi lhab lhu ba dang / 'phreng ba grangs med pa mngon par 'phyang ba'i rgyan
179b6(phal chen): gyi rgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog gi lnga lding grangs med pa mngon par bres rgyan gyi brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi spos rin po che'i
179b7(phal chen): rgyal po kha dog sna tshogs kyi phyogs thams cad du dri zhim pos rgyas par khengs pa'i sprin grangs med pas kun nas khebs pa'i rgyan gyi rgyan pa dang /
179b8(phal chen): lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i gos kha dog sna tshogs kyi sngon grangs med pa'i char tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyi brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi 'dug spos kyi dud pa
180a1(phal chen): bal/ na thun du khrigs pa'i sprin grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyi rgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma kha dog sna tshogs
180a2(phal chen): kyi sprin grangs med pa'i phra mo 'bab pa'i rgyan gyi rgyan pa dang / lha'i bu mo'i tshogs lha rdzas kyi rol mo byed pa dang / gru nyan pa'i dbyangs yid du
180a3(phal chen): 'ong ba lan cing / stod pa'i sprin gyi kun nas yogs pa'i char rab tu mngon par 'bebs pa'i rgyan gyi rgyan par na mkha'i dbyings byin gyi brlabs/
180a4(phal chen): so// srid pa'i dbang po brgya stong grangs med pa rgya mtsho la gnas pa dang / gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sa gzhi la gnas pa kha
180a5(phal chen): zas su sha dang khrag mthung zhing za ba/ chu la spyod pa dang / ri dgas dang / phyugs dang / bya dang / ba glang dang / rta dang / bong bu dang / skyes
180a6(phal chen): pa dang / bud med kyi mdangs 'phrog pa/ zhe sdang ba'i yid kyi rnam par rtogs pa dang ldan pa/ rtag tu 'gro ba la tshe zhing tho tsam pa la zhugs
180a7(phal chen): pa rnams kyang byams pa dang / phan pa'i sems dam pa dang ldan zhing / bzhin gyi mdog shin du dang ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad la mi tshe zhing
180a8(phal chen): tshab ba med pa la zhugs te/ 'jig rten pha rol blta bar gyur nas/ thal mo sbyar cing shin tu dga' ba'i sems kyi/ rgyal po 'od chen po gang na ba de
180b1(phal chen): logasu btud nas phyag 'tshal te/ lus dang sems kyi bde ba rgya chen po tshungs pa yang myong bar gyur to// gnod sbyin dang / grul bum dang sha za dang /
180b2(phal chen): 'byung po'i dbang po brgya stong du ma yang byams pa dang / phan pa'i sems dam pa dang ldan zhing gzhan gyi mdog shin du dang ba dang / 'gro ba thams
180b3(phal chen): cad la mi 'tshe zhing tho 'tshams pa la zhugs te/ 'jig rten pha rol la lta bar gyur nas/ thal mo sbyar cing shin tu dga' ba'i sems kyi rgyal
180b4(phal chen): po 'od chen po gang na der 'dud cing phyag 'tshal bar gyur te/ lus dang sems kyi bde ba rgya chen po tshungs pa med par yang myong bar gyur to//
180b5(phal chen): de ltar gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can kun gyi 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / mi bde ba dang / sha gnyer dang
180b6(phal chen): thab mo dang / bcod pa dang / sems 'khrug pa dang tshe ba'i sems thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur to// rnam par zhi bar gyur to// 'gag pa
180b7(phal chen): gyur to// phyir ldog par gyur to// gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir/ ji ltar de bzhin du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
180b8(phal chen): gyi khams thams cad nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i bar kun gyi 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa
180b9(phal chen): gyigyisem sa
181a1(phal chen): bdang / mi bde ba dang / sha gnyer ba dang thab mo dang / brtson pa dang / sems 'khrug pa dang / 'tshe ba'i sems
181a2(phal chen): can thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin byams pa chen po sngon du 'gro ba/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po'i klong gi chos nyid thob pa'i phyir/
181a3(phal chen): rab tu zhi bar gyur to// rnam par zhi bar gyur to// rnam par log par gyur to// 'gag par gyur to// phyir log par gyur to// de nas rgyal po
181a4(phal chen): 'od chen po ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smraso// rigs kyi bu nges byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i
181a5(phal chen): ye shes snang ba'i sgo byams pa chen po'i rgyal mtshan 'di shes par zad nas/ ngas byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad bde ba'i
181a6(phal chen): bsam pas rgyas par 'gengs pas/ byams pa chen po'i gdugs tshad med pa dang ldan pa/ 'khor mi tshad med pa dang ldan pas 'gro ba thams ca
181a7(phal chen): 'khor du gyur pa/ rab 'bring dang tha ma'i sbyor bas 'gro ba thams cad yongasu skyabs pa la zhugs pa/ 'gro ba thams cad yongasu bzung ba la zhugs
181a8(phal chen): pa/ byams pa'i sems lta bu dang ldan pa/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi 'od zer 'gro ba thams cad du 'byung bas zla bas nya bas rgyas par lta bur
181b1(phal chen): gyur pa/ shes bya thams cad ye shes kyi 'od kyi snang bar byed pa'i phyir/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lta bur ba/ sems can thams cad kyi sems
181b2(phal chen): kyi mun pas thib po rab tu sel bar sgrol ma chen po lta bur gyur pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi tsho ba'i g.yo rgyu'i rnyog pa dang bar
181b3(phal chen): byed pas/ nor bu rin po che chu 'dang dang 'dra ba/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / smon lam yongasu rdzogs par byed pas/ nor bu rim/
181b4(phal chen): po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po dang 'dra ba/ 'gro ba thams cad ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa khang pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
181b5(phal chen): pho brang chen por bzhog pas rlung dmar chen po 'dra ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod pa 'am/ 'khor las 'tshams bcad
181b6(phal chen): 'am/ chos mnyam pa nyid kyi stobs la tshad bzung ba 'am/ theg pa chen po rgyan gyi bsngags pa yongs su brjod pa'am/ kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa
181b7(phal chen): tshul gyi khyad par brjod pa'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chen po sgom pa'i sgo dbye ba 'am/ snying rje chen po'i sprin yongasu smos nus
181b8(phal chen): re skan// // songs rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ rgyal po gnas brten pa zhes bya ba yod do// de na dge snyen ma mi g.yo
181b9(phal chen): bsod nams kyi ri bo gzhal ba 'am/ yon tan gyi skar ma'i tshogs kyi brgyan pa'i namadze 'u la lta ba 'am/
182a1(phal chen): zhes bya ba 'dug gi/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslang bar bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan
182a2(phal chen): bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs gi rgyal po 'od chen po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas rgyal po 'od chen po la
182a3(phal chen): lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas te/ yang dang yang ltas te/ rgyal po 'od chen po'i drung nas song ngo // shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i
182a4(phal chen): mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las sdong pos brgyan pa//
182a5(phal chen): / bam po dgu bcu rtsa drug pa'o// // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po nas byung
182a6(phal chen): ba ste/ yud tsam du lam gyi mgo btsal nas/ rgyal po 'od chen po'i gdam ngag de la rjes su bsam pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
182a7(phal chen): pa'i tshul byams pa chen po'i rgyal mtshan de/ rjesu dran par bya ba dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'jig rten gyi dbang po'i grong gi snang ba chen po yongs
182a8(phal chen): sgom pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus rnam par dag pa bsam gyi mi khyab pas rgyan pa'i seng ge'i khri'i rgyan rnam par phye ba rnam pa sna tshogs
182b1(phal chen): mi khyab pa de dag kyang mtshan mar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sem can yongs su srin par bya ba rnam par dag pa bsam gyi
182b2(phal chen): de dag mngon par sgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang / bsod nams kyi dbang po// stobs bsam gyi mi khyab pa de dag gi rjes su
182b3(phal chen): spel ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i ye shes kyi tshul bsam gyi mi khyab pa de dag shin tu brtan par bya ba dang /
182b4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i longs spyod kyi bdag nyid che thun mongs du gyur pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa de la rjes su smin par/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas
182b5(phal chen): rnam pa tha dad pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa de rjes su dran par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor phun sum tshogs shing yongs su dag pa de la rtag
182b6(phal chen): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sems can gyi don bsam gyi mi khyab pa de la yid ches par byed pas sems can dga' zhing mos pa'i shugs dang /
182b7(phal chen): sems can gyi nyams bde ba dang / sems can shin tu tshim par bya ba dang / sems rnyog pa med pa dang / sems 'od dad pa dang / sems brtan pa
182b8(phal chen): dang / sems rgyas che ba dang / sems mi zad pa thob ste/ de ltar dge ba'i gshes gnyen rjes su dran zhing yid la byed pa la brtson pas/ gdong ma ni
182b9(phal chen): mas gang nas rjes su mas dpa'/ kyi hud kyi dge ba'i gshes gnyen mthong ba 'di ni yon tan rin po che thams cad 'byung gan su gyur pa'o//
183a1(phal chen): phal/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yong su dag pa/ yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o// byang /
183a2(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i dran pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yongasu sbyong ba'o// byang
183a3(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi snang ba thams cad yongs su bskyed pa'o// sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar gyur pa yongasu sgrub par
183a4(phal chen): gyur pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi sprin gyi char rab tu 'babs pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' smon lam gyi tshul thams cad rab
183a5(phal chen): tu brjod pa'o// shes rab dang ye shes snang ba bsam gyi mi khyab pa yang dag par bskyed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po rten pa'i myug
183a6(phal chen): gu bskyed par byed pa'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag ngan song gi g.yang sa thams cad nas skyong ba'o// dge ba'i bshes
183a7(phal chen): gnyen rnams ni bdag chos mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul khong du chud par bya ba la bzhog pa'o// dge ba'i bshes gonyen rnams ni bdag la lam bde
183a8(phal chen): ba dang / mi bde ba ston pa'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag la theg pa chen po yongasu ston pa'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnam
183b1(phal chen): ni bdag la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i gdam ngag gi 'dems pa'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag la thams
183b2(phal chen): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer gyi lab ston pa'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i gnas su phyin par skyes pa'o// dge ba'i bshes gnye
183b3(phal chen): rnams ni bdag chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug par byed pa'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag dus gsum gyi shes bya ba rgya mtsho'i tshul rab
183b4(phal chen): tu bstan pa'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag la 'phags pa'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu ston pa'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams
183b5(phal chen): ni bdag ni dkar po'i chos thams cad rnam par 'phel bar byed pa'o// zhes de ltar du smre sngags 'don pa'i tshe/ nam mkha'i dbyings la 'khor ba'i lha'i tshogs dang
183b6(phal chen): rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang zhing yang dag par bskul ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi pho ltar gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'di skad ces 'dzer to// rigs kyi bu dge
183b7(phal chen): ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdam ngag la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang thugs shin tu dges par gyur pa yin/
183b8(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshig dang mi 'gal bar gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yang shin tu bsnyen pa yin/ dge ba'i bshes
185a1(phal chen): sa mi g.yo ba gang na ba der song nas/ dge sen
185a2(phal chen): phalaganyen gyi tshig la the tshom mi za ba'i byang chub sems dpa' la ni/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams kyang nye bar bsnyen pa yin/ dge ba'i
185a3(phal chen): kha shes gnyen yid la bya ba dang / mi 'bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' la ni don thams cad kyang mngon du gyur pa yin gyis/ rigs kyi bu rgyal po'i pho brang brten par
185a4(phal chen): dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba gang na ba der song shig dang / de las byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thos par 'gyur ro// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs ting nge 'dzin
185a5(phal chen): gyi ye shes snang ba las langs nas mthar gyi rgyal po'i pho brang bstan par/ dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba yongs su tshol zhing rmed rmed pa las/ de la 'gro ba mang po
185a6(phal chen): brtan pa'i rigs kyi bu dge snyen ma mi g.yo ba de ni/ rang gi khyim na pha ma dang 'grogs shing gzhon nur gyur pa ste/ rang gi gnyen gshes kyi tshogs kyi yongs su
185a7(phal chen): bskor cing / skye bo'i tshogs chen po la chos ston to// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang dga' ba chen po dang mos shing spris yongasu rgyas pa'i sems dang ldan pa
185a8(phal chen): dre/ dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba'i khyim gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ dge bsnyen mi g.yo ba'i khyim gyi sgo na sdod pa'i tshe/ des khyim de thams cad 'od lus dang
185a9(phal chen): sems shin tu bde bar byed pa gsor gyi kha dog du 'dug pa zhig gi khyab ci gsal bar gyur nas/ 'od des tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la phog par smra ba
185b1(phal chen): tu/ tshong ba thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po dang / 'gro ba thams cad dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad dang / kun tu
185b2(phal chen): ba'i btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo lnga
185b3(phal chen): brgya tsam la zhugs par gyur te/ des yongasu skyes so// de dag kyang shin tu phra bzhin gzhon pa ste/ 'di ltar dper na thogs ma mngal nas zhugs pa'i rnam
185b4(phal chen): pa shes pa lta bu ste/ ting nge 'dzin de dag kyang shin tu phra zhing gzhon par skyes par 'gyur ro// des dri zhim po zhing tsher na'ang de ni lha la yang med/ lha'i bu mo
185b5(phal chen): la med/ klu la yang med/ klu'i mo la yang med/ gnod sbyin la yang med/ gnod sbyin gyi bu mo la yang med/ dri za la yang med/ dri za'i bu mo la yang
185b6(phal chen): med/ lha ma yin la yang med/ lha ma yin gyi bu mo la yang med/ na mkha'i lding la yang med/ nam mkha' lding gyi bu mo la yang med/ mi 'am ci la'ang
185b7(phal chen): med/ mi 'am ci'i bu mo la yang med/ lto phye chen po la yang med/ lto phye chen po'i bu mo la yang med/ mi la yang med/ mi'i bu mo la yang med/ mi
185b8(phal chen): bu mo la yang med cing mi srid pa de lta bu'i dri zhim po tshor bar gyur to// bud med de'i gzugs dang mnyam pa yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na med na/ lhag
186a1(phal chen): pha2par lta ga las 'ong / kha dog dang mdog de ltar bu yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mdog dang / kha dog dang / byang chub sems
186a2(phal chen): dpa' dbang skur ba'i kha dog dang / mdog ma rtogs par/ de'i kha dog dang mdog du mnyam pa dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na med na lhag pa lta ga las
186a3(phal chen): 'ong / lus kyi chu zheng dang dbyi bas de lta bu 'ang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i khrun chu zheng dang dbyibs dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba thob
186a4(phal chen): pa'i lus kyi chu zheng dang dbyibs ma rtogs par/ de'i lus kyi chu zheng dang / dbyib su mnyam pa/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na med na/ lhag pa lta ga
186a5(phal chen): las 'od/ 'od kyi rgyan de lta bu'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi rgyan dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang skur thob pa 'od kyi rgyan ma rtog par/ de'i
186a6(phal chen): 'od kyi rgyan dang mnyam phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na med na/ lhag par lta ga las 'ong / de'i kha'i dad kyi dri zhim pa dang / mnyam pa'i mnyam pa'i dri
186a7(phal chen): zhim po de lta bu 'ang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi lha'i gnas sam/ klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi
186a8(phal chen): 'am ci dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i gnas na med na/ lhag pa'i lta ga las 'ong / khyim gyi rgyan dang / longs spyod de lta bu 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa
186b1(phal chen): longs spyod dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dbang skur pa thob pa'i longs spyod ma rtogs pa/ de'i khyim gyi rgyan dang longs spyod du mnyam pa yang / phyogs
186b2(phal chen): bcu'i 'jig rten na med na/ lhag par lta ga las 'ong / g.yog 'khor phun sum tshogs pa de lta bu yang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor phun sum
186b3(phal chen): tshogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa ma rtogs par/ de'i g.yog 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang / mnyam par yang
186b4(phal chen): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na med na/ lhag par lta ga las 'ong ste/ dge snyen ma mi g.yo ba de la 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems kyi lha
186b5(phal chen): ba nus pa'i sems can de lta bu yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi sems can gyi rigs na med do// dge snyen ma mi g.yo ba de mthong ma thag tu nyon mong/
186b6(phal chen): pa zhi bar mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sems can yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi sems can gyi rigs na med do// 'di lta ste dper na tshangs pa chen po
186b7(phal chen): stong brgya phrag bcu la dbang bsgyur ba ni/ 'dod pa la longs spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyi rgyu'o// de bzhin du dge snyen ma mi g.yo ba 'ang mthong ma
186b8(phal chen): thag tu sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa mi rgyu'o// dge snyen ma mi g.yo ba de la lta bas ngom par 'gyur ba'i sems can lta bu 'ang / shes rab
187a1(phal chen): phal/ #kyi ngom pa ma rtog par phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gyi rigs na med do// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs
187a2(phal chen): dge snyen ma mi g.yo ba'i lus kyi sbyin pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa dang / gzugs dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / chu zheng bsam gyi mi khyab pa dang / sa gzhi
187a3(phal chen): dang / grong khyer dang / rin po che thams cad la thogs pa med pa/ 'od zer gyi dra ba'i rgyan bsam gyi mi khyab pa dang / sems can gyi don bsam gyi mi khyab
187a4(phal chen): pa mthong ste/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas byung ba'i dri zhim po tshor nas/ 'khor phun sum tshogs pa mtha' yas pa mthong ste/ khyim dang gzhal med
187a5(phal chen): khang gi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa mi 'phrog pa mthong nas/ yon tan rgya mtsho tshad med pa khong du chud de/ dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba la tshig su bcad pa 'dis
187a6(phal chen): stod to// khyed kyi rtag tu tshul khrims dri med yongs bsrung te/ bzod pa shin tu yangs pa yongasu sgom mdzad cing // brtson 'grus brtan pa rdo rje ltar
187a7(phal chen): bsgrub pa na/ rin po che'i rgyal po lta bur 'gro ba 'phags shing 'bar/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang kyi dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba la tshigasu bcad
187a8(phal chen): pa des mngon par bstod te 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags ma bdag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na ji ltar
187b1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags ma ni byang chub
187b2(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams la gdam ngag dang rjesu bstan pa mdzad do// zhes bdag gi thos na/ 'phags ma ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i
187b3(phal chen): spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ de nas dge snyen ma mi g.yo bas/ byang chub sems dpa'i ngag
187b4(phal chen): 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba nyams bde bas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la dga' bar gyur pa'i tshig tu brjod nas/ 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi
187b5(phal chen): bu de ltar khyed kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam
187b6(phal chen): par thar pa thub par bka' ba'i ye shes kyi snying po thob pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i yid dam bstan pa la slob pa/ chos thams cad mnyam pa
187b7(phal chen): nyid kyi sa'i gzungs kyi sgo thob pa'o// kho mo ni spobs pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba chos bzhi thams cad snang bar brjod pa thob pa'o// kho mo ni chos thams
187b8(phal chen): cad yongs su btsal bas mi skyo ba'i rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thob pa'o// sbas pa/ 'phags ma byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa thub par
188a1(phal chen): phalabaka' ba'i ye shes kyi snying po de'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis/ yi dam la brtan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sgo dang / chos thams
188a2(phal chen): cad mnyam pa nyid kyi sa'i gzungs kyi sgo dang / chos kyi bzhi thams cad snang bar brjod pa'i spobs pa snang ba'i sgo dang / chos yongasu btsal bas mi
188a3(phal chen): ba'i rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo'i yul ni ji lta bu zhig mchis/ spras pa rigs kyi bu 'di ni yid ches par dka'o// smras pa 'phags ma snyan du gsol/
188a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi byin dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi yongasu bzung nas yid lta ba ches par mchis par grangs rtogs pa dang / 'tshal ba dang / rnam par
188a5(phal chen): rtog pa dang / rjes su rtog pa dang / rigs pa dmig su phebs pa dang / goms pa dang / mi 'gal ba dang / rnam par mi rtog pa dang / sgro mngog pa ma
188a6(phal chen): mchis pa dang / mnyam par bgyid pa yang mchis grangs/ de nas dge snyen ma mi g.yo bas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so//
188a7(phal chen): rigs kyi bu sngon 'das pa'i dus shig na dri ma med pa'i skal ba 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa phyag rab tu rkyang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ kho mo yang
