188a8(phal chen): de'i tshe rgyal po klog gis byin pa'i bu cig ma bzhin du gyur nas/ de'i tshe nub mo mi nyal btsal zhig na/ rgyal po'i sgo yang bcad / pa dang ma yang nyal rkyen pa dang /
188b1(phal chen): bud med kyang gnyid kyi log/ rol mo brdung ba dang bkrol ba'i sgra yang ni/ lhan cig spyod pa'i bud med lnga brgya tsam dag kyang nyal bar nyal bar gyur pa zhig na/
188b2(phal chen): kho mo mal gyi steng na 'dug cing na mkha'i dbyings la rgyu ba'i skar ma'i tshogs kyi 'breng ba dam par 'khod pa la lta lta ba las/ steng gi bar snang la bcom
188b3(phal chen): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phyag rab tu brkyang ba/ ri'i dbang po ri rab ltar lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin
188b4(phal chen): dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lho bye chen po dang / 'khor mang pos bskor ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs
188b5(phal chen): grangs med pas yongasu bskor ba/ phyogs thams cad du 'od zer gyi dra ba thogs pa med pas rgyas par khyab pa'i sku bzhugs par mthong ngo // de bzhin gash+ye
188b6(phal chen): pa'i sku'i ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas kyang dri zhim po rnam par 'di lta bu byung ste/ des kho mo'i lus dang sems shin du bde bar gyur/ mal gyi steng nas langs
188b7(phal chen): te/ ser mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar te sa la babs nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyag rab tu brkyang ba de la phyag 'tshal te/ de la spyi rtsug la/
188b8(phal chen): la ltas na'ang mthar thug pa ma rung / g.yas g.yon gyis tshed kyi zin par ma rung / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po phun sum tshogs pa ni skye bar 'gyur/ 'od
189a1(phal chen): phakyi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'khor phun sum tshogs pa ni 'grub par 'gyur/ yid kyi rang bzhin gyi/
189a2(phal chen): gnas dang / longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa ni skye bar 'gyur/ ye shes phun sum tshogs pa ni
189a3(phal chen): rnam par dag par 'gyur/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa phun sum tshogs pa ni yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur/ bzung
189a4(phal chen): phun sum tshogs pa ni yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur/ spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa ni dbang du 'gyur snyam pa dang / rigs kyi bu de nas bcom ldan
189a5(phal chen): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa/ byan rab tu brgyan pa des/ kho mo'i bsam pa thug su chud nas/ de skad ces bka' stsal to// bu ma khyod kyi
189a6(phal chen): rmongs pa thams cad gnam pa'i phyir thub pa med pa'i sems bskyed cig/ mngon par zhen pa thams cad sal ba'i phyir/ 'bum pa med pa'i sems bskyed
189a7(phal chen): cing / chos thab pa'i tshul khang du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ shun pa med pa'i sems bskyed cig/ sems can byasam pa mi zang dang / ldan pa
189a8(phal chen): mdo'i gling du ltung bas mi skul ba'o sems bskyed cig/ sring po'i lam rgyud thams cad du lci ba'i skye ched du mgo mongs pa med pa'i sems bskyed kyi/
189b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad lta bar mos pa rgyun mi chad pa'i phyir ngom mi shes pa'i sems bskyed cig/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yongasu bzung
189b2(phal chen): ba'i phyir/ chog mi shes sems bskyed cig/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos tshul snang ba rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ nges par rtogs pa'i sems
189b3(phal chen): bskyed cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bzung ba'i phyir/ yang dag par gzung ba'i sems bskyed cig/ de bzhin ga
189b4(phal chen): pa'i zhal nas byung shes par bya ba lta ci smos kyi/ chung ngu na bdar ba tsam la yang 'khrug pa med pa'i sems skyed cig/ bu mo khyod kyi sems can
189b5(phal chen): rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos rin po che rnam par dbye ba'i phyir/ rnam par dbye ba'i sems skyed cig zhes byang ste/ de ltar rigs
189b6(phal chen): kyi bu kho mos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phyag rab tu brkyang pa las/ chos kyi
189b7(phal chen): tshul gyi sgo rnam pa de lta bu dag thos nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes las kyi mngon par mos par 'gyur/ stobs bcu'i rang bzhin la ni
189b8(phal chen): mngon par smin par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyis gsungs la ni mngon par dad par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi rgyan ni yongasu sbyang bar
190a1(phal chen): phalagang / sangs rgyas kyi sku phun sum tshogs pa ni yongs su bsgrub par dka'/ sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang dpe byad
190a2(phal chen): bzang po rnam par dag pa la ni mngon par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor phun sum tshogs pa ni mngon par mos par 'gyur/ sangs
190a3(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa la ni mngon par dad par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa la ni mngon par mos par gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi
190a4(phal chen): sku tshe'i tshad phun sum tshogs pa la ni mngon par dga' nas/ rdo rje ltar ri dang / mtshon cha thams cad kyi mthus thub par dka' ba'i sems nyon mongs pa
190a5(phal chen): thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mi phye mi tshugs pa bskyed de/ rigs kyi bu de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du sems
190a6(phal chen): bskyed pa de'i mthus/ skal ba 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig tu yid kyi rgu las kyang 'dod pa la spyod par mi dran na/ gnyis kyi gnyis
190a7(phal chen): 'du ba lta ci smos/ rigs kyi bu de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du/ rang gi gnyen gshes la'ang khong khro ba'i sems gcig ma bskyed na/ de ma yin
190a8(phal chen): sems can ma nyes pa gzhan lta ci smos// de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du/ bdag tu lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa cig tsam yang bskyed par
190b1(phal chen): mi dran na de ma yin pa'i yo byad gzhan la bdag gir byas te/ mngon par chags pa lta ci smos/ shi po ba dang mjal na gnas pa'i tshe'ang / sems rmongs pa 'an
190b2(phal chen): 'du shes sna tshogs sam/ lung du ma snyan pa'i sems kyang byung du mi dran na/ legs par bsam shing lta ci smos/ skal pa de snyed gcig tu sangs rgyas gcig
190b3(phal chen): kyang chung ngu na rmi lam du mthong ba'i rnam par smigs pa yang rje su mi dran na/ byang chub sems dpa'i mig bcus mthong bar gyur pa lta ci smos/ de nas nye ba
190b4(phal chen): bzung ba tshun chad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yang dag par 'dzin kyang / chung na ming du bya ba'i rnam pa tsam gyi chos kyi tshig dang yi/
190b5(phal chen): ge gcig kyang brjod par mi dran na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal gyi mdzod nas byung ba lta ci smos/ de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun tshad du/ chos kyi rgya mtsho/
190b6(phal chen): de snyed cig 'thung 'thung na chung ngu na/ 'jig rten pa'i chos rnam tshig 'ga' ma bsam ma rtogs par mi dran no// de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du de skye
190b7(phal chen): cig gi chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho las kyang chung ngu na/ 'jig rten pa'i bzo'i rgyus dang tshul yang rung ste/ chos kyi tshul gyi sgo gang la yang / kho mos ting nge
190b8(phal chen): 'dzin mngon par bsgrub pa ste lta bur med do// de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa de snyed kyi chos kyi 'khor lo zad yang / ji/
191a1(phal chen): ba/ ltar yongasu bzung ba las/ sems can 'dul ba'i dbang du bya ba ma rtogs par chung ngu na/ rjesu rgyud pa'i rgyus tsam gyi tshig
191a2(phal chen): dang / yi ge 'ga' bor bar mi dran no// de nas nye bar bzung ba tsam tshun chad du/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho de snyed cig mthong yang chung ngu na/ sprul pa'i sangs
191a3(phal chen): rgyas kyi smon lam gyi rgyud kyang rung ste/ smon lam 'ga' yang kho mos sems can rgya mtsho 'ga' thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon par ma bsgrub
191a4(phal chen): pa med do// de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho de snyed cig go/ sngon gi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho las/ byang chub
191a5(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyod pa 'ga' tsam yang / kho mos bdag gi spyod pa yongasu dag par bya ba'i phyir/ mngon par bsgrub pa de lta bu mi dran no// de nas nye/
191a6(phal chen): bar bzung ba tshun chad du/ sems can gang khoms bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma sprul pa de lta bu cig kyang mig lam du 'ong ba mi
191a7(phal chen): dran no// de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa cig kyang mngon par bsgrub pa
191a8(phal chen): mi dran no// rigs kyi bu de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du/ bskal pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig lon yang tshig dang / yi ge 'ag
191b1(phal chen): la yang the tshom bskyed pa 'am/ gnyis kyi 'du shes sam/ rnam par rtog pa'i 'du shes sam/ sna tshogs kyi 'du shes sam/ rab kyi 'du shes sam/
191b2(phal chen): bzang ngan gyi 'du shes sam/ sdug mi sdug gi 'du shes bskyed du mi dran no// rigs kyi bu kho mos ni de tshun chad du/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang mi 'bral
191b3(phal chen): lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang ma 'bral lo// byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang ma 'bral lo// yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen
191b4(phal chen): rnams dang ma 'bral lo// sangs rgyas kyi smon lam thos pa dang ma 'bral lo// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thos pa dang ma 'bral lo// byang chub sems
191b5(phal chen): dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul thos pa dang ma 'bral lo// byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i ye shes snang ba'i tshul thos pa dang thob pa dang ma 'bral lo// mtha'
191b6(phal chen): dbus med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dra ba la 'jug cing khong du chud par bya ba'i tshul thos pa dang mi 'bral lo// mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sems can
191b7(phal chen): kyi khams 'byung ba'i rgyu thos pa dang thob pa dang ma 'bral lo// 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i dra ba'i dkyil 'khor yongasu zad par bya ba'i
191b8(phal chen): ye shes snang ba dang ma 'bral lo// sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'byung ba'i rgyu'i ye shes thos pa dang ma 'bral lo// sems can thams cad
192a1(phal chen): pa lakyi bsam pa ji lta bu bzhin du lus yongasu ston pa dang ma 'bral lo// sems can thams cad shes par byed pa'i dbyangs kyi/
192a2(phal chen): dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa dang ma 'bral lo// rigs kyi bu kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo thub par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snying
192a3(phal chen): po 'di dang / chos thams cad yongs su tsal bas mi skyo ba'i rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'di la snyom par bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i
192a4(phal chen): sgo yi dam la brtan pa 'di rnam par phye ba dang / gzungs kyi sgo chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi sa 'di dang / spobs pa'i ye shes snang ba'i sgo chos kyi
192a5(phal chen): gzhi thams cad snang bar brjod pa 'di rnam par phye ba dang / cho 'phrul bsam gyi mi khyab pa yod na/ rigs kyi bu khyod mngon sum du lta bar 'dod dam/
192a6(phal chen): smras pa 'phags ma 'tshal lo// de nas dge snyen ma mi g.yo ba de na de ltar 'dug bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo thub par dka'
192a7(phal chen): ba'i ye shes kyi snying po la sogs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo don yod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan la sogs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo stobs bcu'i
192a8(phal chen): ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor mngon du gyur pa la sogs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi zad pa'i mdzod la sogs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin
192b1(phal chen): gyi sgo brgya stong phrag bcu la rnam par lta ba dang / rnam par dpyad pa dang / rjes su 'jug pa dang / nges par rtogs par byas so// de ltar dge snyen
192b2(phal chen): ma mi g.yo ba snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi phyogs bcur 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med phrag
192b3(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rnam pa drug tu g.yos pa dang / bai DUr+ya yongs su dag pa'i rgyu las gyur par gnas par mthong ngo // 'jig rten gyi
192b4(phal chen): khams re re'i gling bzhi pa'i bye ba phrag brgya brgya na/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag brgya brgya bzhugs par mthong ste/ la la ni dga' ldan gyi
192b5(phal chen): gnas na bzhugs pa nas/ la la ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mdzad pa'i bar du'ang mthong ngo // de yang 'jig rten gyi khams bai DUr+ya'i rang bzhin
192b6(phal chen): de dag yongasu dag cing / sgrib pa med pa'i phyir te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag so so nas 'od zer dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor chos kyi dbyings thams
192b7(phal chen): cad rgyas par khyab par mnga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag so so'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor shin tu rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho yang mthong bar gyur
192b8(phal chen): to// de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor chos kyi 'khor lo thams cad brjod pa/ sems can thams cad kyi rnal lam du rnam par grags
193a1(phal chen): bzhinapa 'ang thos par gyur to// de nas dge snyen ma mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la/
193a2(phal chen): 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyi mthong ngam/ thos sam shes sam smras sam/ 'phags ma mthong ngo // thos so// rig go/ rigs kyi bu'o/
193a3(phal chen): mo ni de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa/ yid ma brtan pa la bslob cing / chos thams cad yongasu brtsal bas mi skyo ba'i rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam
193a4(phal chen): par bzhag ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo thub par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snying po la gnas nas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi sa'i
193a5(phal chen): gzungs khong du chud pa dang / spobs pa'i chos ye shes snang ba'i chos kyi gzhi thams cad snang bar brjod pa la/ mkhas pa'i legs par bshad pas
193a6(phal chen): sems can thams cad yongasu tshim par byed par zad na/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan tshad med pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa dang ldan pa/ nam
193a7(phal chen): mkha'i dbyings la mdab chags khyu mchog 'khod pa ltar/ gnas med par spyod pa na mkha' lding gi dbang po ltar yongs su smin pa'i byang chub sems
193a8(phal chen): dpa' gdon pa'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i tshong ba ltar stobs bcu'i ye shes rin po che mngon par 'dod cing thams
193b1(phal chen): mkhyen pa nyid kyi rin po che'i gling du rgyu ba/ mthu dang ldan pa'i nya ba ltar yid du 'ong ba'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi brgya dang ldan pa'i lags pas srid/
193b2(phal chen): pa'i chu las byung ba'i sems can yongasu smin par mngon par gdon pa'i phyir/ chos kyi rgya mtsho la rnam par rgyu ba/ lha'i dbang po ltar nyon mongs pa lha ma
193b3(phal chen): yin gyi yul chen rdul ba bzlog pa'i phyir/ khams gsum gyi yongs su bkang zhing rnam par rgyu ba/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar sems can gyi srid pa'i
193b4(phal chen): chu dang nyon mongs pa'i 'dam shin du bskal ba'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyings na mkha'i dbyings la yang dag par 'phags pa/ zla ba nya shing rgyas pa ltar
193b5(phal chen): 'dul ba'i yid kyi me tog ku mu da rnam par kha dbye ba'i phyir/ ye shes kyi na mkha'i mngon par shes pa/ sa'i bzhi ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i
193b6(phal chen): dbang po'i myu gu skyed cing rnam par spel ba'i phyir/ byams mi byams dang / mthon dman med par 'jig rten na mnyam par gnas pa/ rlung dmar ltar
193b7(phal chen): sems can gyi nyon mongs pa dang / lta ba'i shing phan gyi nag tshal dang / kun dga' rtsa ba nas 'dod pa'i phyir/ chags pa med par phyogs thams cad
193b8(phal chen): du rnam par rgyu ba/ 'khor los sgyur ba ltar bsdu ba'i dngos po'i yo byad dang / rkyen gyi 'gro ba thams cad yongasu bsdu ba'i phyir/ 'jig rten na rnam par
194a1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpas
194a2(phal chen): 'jig rten na rnam par spyod pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu phyogs
194a3(phal chen): kyi rgyud 'dadi kyi yul dga' 'dzin tshad med pa na/ grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa zhes bya ba yod do// de na kun tu rgyu thams cad du 'gro ba zhes bya ba
194a4(phal chen): 'dug gi de'i gan du song la ji ltar/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon
194a5(phal chen): gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba la lan brgya stong du mar
194a6(phal chen): g.yas phyogs nas bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba'i drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor ba za
194a7(phal chen): dge snyen ma mi g.yo ba mngon du byas te/ dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba'i gdam ngag rjes su dran par byed cing / dge snyen ma mi g.yo bas bstan pa
194a8(phal chen): dang / yang gu par bstan pa dang / bsgrags pa dang / bshad pa dang / brjod pa dang / yang dag par brjod pa dang / bzhag pa dang / rnam par
194a9(phal chen): bye ba dang / smos pa dang / rgya chen po bstan pa de dag thams cad gdon mi za bar yid la ches shing / rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / rjes su
194b1(phal chen): bsam pa dang / 'khong du chud bar bya ba dang / sgom pa dang / yongs su bsgom pa dang / yongasu gzhan du mi 'gyur ba dang / rtogs par bya ba dang /
194b2(phal chen): snang bar bya ba dang / mnyam par bya ba byed cing / mthar gyi gnas nas gnas dang / yul nas yul du rgyus te/ rgyu zhing song song nas yul
194b3(phal chen): dga' 'dzin tshad med pa'i gang na ba der byin nas/ grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa rmed cing tshol tshol te/ nyi ma nub tu tsha ba zhig na/ yul grong khyer
194b4(phal chen): dga' ba 'dzin par phyin nas/ grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin par nang du song ste/ grong khyer gyi lam gyi gzhi mdo'i dbus zhig tu phyin nas/ srang gi
194b5(phal chen): sgo nas srang gi sgo dang / lam gyi gzhi mdo' nas lam gyi gzhi mdo dang / grong phrag nas grong phrag du kun tu sgyu thams cad du 'gro ba tshol tshol
194b6(phal chen): zhing rmed rmed pa dang / mtshan mo mi nyal tsam zhig na/ grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa'i byang phyogs logs na ri shin tu med pa shes bya ba yod/
194b7(phal chen): de'i ri'i rtse mo dang / gel ba dang / sman sna tshogs dga' dga' ltar skyes pas brgyan pa/ 'od chen po dang ldan pa la/ nyi ma shar ba lta bur
194b8(phal chen): gnas pa mthong ngo // des ma snang ba de mthong nas dga' ba'i shugs chen po skyes te/ 'di snyam du bsam so// bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen
195a1(phal chen): pa la/ ri'i rtse mo 'di gdon mi za bar mthong bar 'gyur ba lta zhig snyam nas/ grong khyer de nas byung ste/ ri shin tu med pa ga na
195a2(phal chen): ba der phyin pa dang / ri shin tu mod pa de la 'dzegs nas/ ri'i rtse mo snang ba chen po can gang na ba der phyin pa dang / rgyang ring po zhig nas kun tu
195a3(phal chen): rgyu thams cad du 'gro ba tshangs pa chen po bas kyang lhag pa'i kha dog dang ldan pa/ dpal gyi shin tu 'bar ba zhig/ tshangs pa stong phrag bcus kun
195a4(phal chen): nas bskor te/ 'chags na chag cing 'dug pa mthong nas de'i drung du phyin te/ rkang pa gnyis la spyi bo'i phyag 'tshal nas/ de la lan rgya stong du
195a5(phal chen): mar g.yas phyog su bskor ba byas te/ mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te/ 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag gi bla na med pa yang dag
195a6(phal chen): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du/
195a7(phal chen): bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams gdam ngag rjes su bstan pa mdzad do// zhes bdag gi thos na/ 'phags pa
195a8(phal chen): ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ smras pa
195b1(phal chen): rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni thams cad du 'gro ba/
195b2(phal chen): ste/ thams cad kyi rjes su songs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa'o// sgo thams cad du rnam par spyod pas snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi
195b3(phal chen): sgo dang / dngos po med pa la gnas pas mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / chos kyi dbyings kun gzhir thug par thal ba'i shes rab
195b4(phal chen): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes snang ba'i sgo dang ldan pa'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bos ni sems can gyi gnod kyi 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad dang /
195b5(phal chen): sems can gyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad dang / sems can gyi shi pho ba'i sgo thams cad dang / sems can gyi sgo thams cad dang / srid pa'i lam gyi
195b6(phal chen): rgyud tha dad par thams cad dang / skye ba skye mched sna tshogs kyi 'jig rten gyi gnas rnam pa tha dad pa dag gi/ sems can kha dog dang dbyings dang /
195b7(phal chen): chu zheng dang / rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa skye ba kun tu 'brel pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i 'byor pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ mos pa sna tshogs can 'di
195b8(phal chen): lta ste/ lha'i lam gyi rgyud rtogs pa dang / klu'i lam gyi rgyud du rtogs pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi lam gyi rgyud du rtogs pa dang / dri za'i lam gyi rgyud
196a1(phal chen): pa // du rtogs pa dang / lha ma yin gyi lam gyi rgyud du rtogs pa dang / na mkha' lding gi lam gyi rgyud du rtogs pa dang / mi 'am/
196a2(phal chen): ci'i lam gyi rgyud du rtogs pa dang / lto phye chen po'i rgyud du rtogs pa dang / sems can dmyal ba'i lam gyi rgyud du rtogs pa dang / byol song gi skye
196a3(phal chen): gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud du rtogs pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud du rtogs pa dang / mi'i lam gyi rgyud du rtogs pa dang / mi ma yin pa'i lam
196a4(phal chen): gyi rgyud du rtogs pa dang / lta ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs gnas pa/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la mos pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mos pa dang / theg pa che
196a5(phal chen): po la mos pa'i sems can rnams kyi don thabs sna tshogs dang / ye shes kyi tshul dang / sbyor ba sna tshogs kyi byed de/ 'di ltar sems can la la la bzod pa rgyus tha
196a6(phal chen): dad pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i gzugs snang bas/ 'jig rten gyi bzo rnams bslabs shing / don byed do// sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen
196a7(phal chen): ba'i ye shes bstabs pa'i phyir/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis yongs su bsdu ba'i thabs kyi don byed do// sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa
196a8(phal chen): nyid du 'gyur ba'i ye shes kyi sgo snang ba yongasu bskyed pas/ pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par brjod cing don byed do// sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste/ byang
196b1(phal chen): chub kyi sa bon chud mi za bar brtan cing / yongasu bskyed pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems can yongasu brjod cing don byed do// sems can la la la ni 'di/
196b2(phal chen): lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yong su dag par bya ba dang / sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i smon lam yongasu bskyed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
196b3(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa rnam pa thams cad yang dag par brjod pas byed do// sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste/ ngan du spyod pa'i rnam par smin pa dang mthun pa'i rgyus//
196b4(phal chen): sems can dmyal ba'i lam gyi rgyud kyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ba yongs su bstan pas skyo ba yongs su cing don byed do// sems can la la la ni
196b5(phal chen): 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bskyed pa'i yon tan thams cad ni/ gdon mi za bar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'bras bu mtha' thug par 'gyur bar
196b6(phal chen): brjod pas/ dga' ba chen po bskyed cing don byed do// sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang sku la mos pas/ thams cad
196b7(phal chen): mkhyen pa nyid du smon lam 'debs par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan dang / bsngags pa yang dag par brjod pas don byed do//
196b8(phal chen): sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste/ mi ldog cing lhun gyi grub pa dang / rgyun chad pa med par sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las nan tan du mdzad pa'i mthu dang ldan
197a1(phal chen): phalaba'i/ sangs rgyas kyi sku thob par mos pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba brjod pas don byed do// sems/
197a2(phal chen): can la la la ni 'di lta ste/ tshur zil gyi don la/ par zil gyi mi non pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku phun sum tshogs pa thob par mos pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ sangs
197a3(phal chen): rgyas kyi mnga' chen po yongasu brjod cing don byed do// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang kho bo ni grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa 'di'i bzhi mdo'i 'phongs thams cad dang/
197a4(phal chen): srang thams cad dang / lam gyi sum mdo thams cad dang / grong mtshams thams cad dang / khyim thams cad dang / 'thun par 'dus pa'i rdul thams cad
197a5(phal chen): dang / grong thams cad dang / grong gi rgyud thams cad du/ rnam pa ji ltar tshogs shing 'dus pa'i skyes pa dang / bud med dang khye'u dang bu mo rnams kyi bsam
197a6(phal chen): ba ji lta ba dang / sbyor ba ji lta ba dang / mthu ji lta ba dang / rnam par spyod pa bzhin du de dag dang mthun pa'i lus kyi chu zheng dang / dbyibs mngon par
197a7(phal chen): bsgrubs shing chos ston kyang / sems can de dag gis des su bstan pa dang / de ga las 'ong ba mi shes te/ gzhan du na thos nas ma nor bar nan tan
197a8(phal chen): du byed pa ni med pa 'ang ma yin no// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'dzam bu gling 'di ni zhags pa thub/ lta ba rnam pa sna tshogs la mngon par zhen pa dgu bcu
197b1(phal chen): rtsa drug 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyi nang du yang sems can lta ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs la chags pa rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ thams cad dang /
197b2(phal chen): mthun par gnas te/ rigs kyi bu ji lta khro bo grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa 'di ni sems can gyi don mdzad cing 'dug pa de bzhin du 'dzam bu gling gi grong
197b3(phal chen): khyer dang / ljongs dang / yul khams dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor thams cad na yang sems can gyi don byed do// 'dzam bu gling na ji lta ba bzhin
197b4(phal chen): du gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang / de bzhin du stong dang stong gnyis pa dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang /
197b5(phal chen): de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sems can gyi 'jig rten du bya ba thams cad dang / sems can gyi gnas su bya ba thams cad dang / sos
197b6(phal chen): can gzhir bya ba thams cad dang / sems can gyi khams su bya ba'i ming du rtogs pa de thams cad dang / sems can yongasu rgyu ba thams cad dang /
197b7(phal chen): sems can yongasu 'du ba thams cad dang / sems can rgya mtsho gnas pa thams cad dang / sems can gyi rgyud pa thams cad dang / sems
197b8(phal chen): can gyi phyogasu bya ba thams cad dang / sems can gyi phyogs mtsham su bya ba thams cad dang / sems can gyi spyod pa'i gnas thams cad du'ang
198a1(phal chen): thabs sna tshogs dang / tshul sna tshogs dang / sgo sna tshogs dang / rigs pa sna tshogs dang / 'phrad pa sna tshogs dang /
198a2(phal chen): thabs kyi tshul sna tshogs dang / bya ba sna tshogs kyi sems can rnams kyi don byed do// gzugs dang kha dog sna tshogs yongasu brtan cing mos par
198a3(phal chen): bya ba dang / tshig gi lam sna tshogs brjod pas kyang sems can rnams kyi don byed do// rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa tham
198a4(phal chen): cad du/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi rjes su song ba 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad kyi mnyam pa'i lus dang
198a5(phal chen): ldan pa/ bdag dang sems can gyi lus su tha mi dad pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ 'khrul pa'i 'khor lo rgya chen pos srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud thams
198a6(phal chen): cad du khyab pa/ 'jig rten gyi skye ba thams cad rang gi lus la rjesu spyod pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi lhan dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba'i sprul pa'i
198a7(phal chen): 'khor lo la brtson pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi rigs dang rgyud dang / cher skyes pa rab tu ston pa/ bskal pa thams cad du gnas pa la rdzogs
198a8(phal chen): ba med pa'i smon lam gyi 'khor la dang ldan pa/ mig 'phrul lci bu'i spyod pa rnam par dbye ba'i sdang ba rab tu thob pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi don
198b1(phal chen): byed kyang gos med par gnas pa la brtson pa/ dus gsum gyi 'gro ba'i dbyings mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa dang / ye shes kyi dbyings bdag me/
198b2(phal chen): ba dang ldan pas snang bar byas pa'i snying rje chen po mtha' yas pa'i snying po dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu bskyed pa la mngon
198b3(phal chen): par brtson pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod pa nus re skan// / song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na yul
198b4(phal chen): khams chen po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod ud pa la zhes bya ba 'dug gi/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub
198b5(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan tu bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi kun du rgyu thams cad/
198b6(phal chen): du 'gro ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ kun tu rgyu thams cad du 'gro ba la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas nas/
198b7(phal chen): yang dang yang ltas nas/ kun du rgyu thams cad du 'gro ba'i drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs lus dang srog la ni mi lta ba/
198b8(phal chen): srid pa'i longs spyod dang / yongs su zin pa dang / nye bar blangs pa mngon par chags pa'i gnas thams cad la ni mi lta/ sems can gyi yul gyi
199a1(phal chen): phaladaga' ba thams cad la ni mi lta ba/ gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya thams cad la ni mi lta
199a2(phal chen): g.yog 'khor dang / longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa thams cad la ni mi lta ste/ rgyal srid dang / dbang phyug gi dbang gi bde ba thams cad la ni mi/
199a3(phal chen): lta ba la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bla na med par yong su dag par mngon par bsgrub pas/ sems can thams cad yongasasu smin par bya ba dang / brdul
199a4(phal chen): ba dang / yongs su dag par bya ba la blta ba mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur dang rim 'gro bya bas mi ngoms pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
199a5(phal chen): cad la lta ba dang / rang bzhin med pa yongasu shes pa'i ye shes khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad la lta ba yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad
199a6(phal chen): kyi don du nan tan du bya ba las mnyam pa med par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan thams cad la lta ba dang / bskal pa thams cad
199a7(phal chen): du/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la yang dag par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam chen po la lta ba/ de bzhin
199a8(phal chen): gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad du 'jug par bya ba lta ba/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo re rer byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
199b1(phal chen): grangs med pa thams cad bzung pa la rnam par 'phrul bar bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad la lta ba/ de bzhin
199b2(phal chen): gshegs pa thams cad chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag par gzung bas mi ngoms par bya ba'i phyir/ chos kyi ye shes snang ba'i 'khor lo thams cad la
199b3(phal chen): lta ba de/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan 'di dang / gzhan dag kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen las byung ba ste/ dge ba'i bshes
199b4(phal chen): gnyen de dag thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin par yang dag par lta zhing / mthar gyi yul khams chen po gang na ba der byin nas/
199b5(phal chen): spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod ud pa la'i yongs su rmed cing tshol tshol ba las/ mthong nas spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod ud
199b6(phal chen): ba la gang na der phyin te/ drung du song nas/ spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod ud pa la'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ spos 'a
199b7(phal chen): gi tshong dpon longs spyod ud pa la la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ spos 'tshong gis tshong dpon longs spyod ud
199b8(phal chen): pa la 'dun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa'i ye shes 'tshal
200a1(phal chen): phal/ te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam sngon gyi dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar yang dga'/
200a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sku yongasu grub par bgyi bar dga' yang dga'/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku yongs su 'tshal ba
200a3(phal chen): yang dga'/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su dag par bgyi bar yang dga'/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge
200a4(phal chen): 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad snang bar bgyi bar yang dga'/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su brtan
200a5(phal chen): pa yang dga'/ sgrib pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par gtong ba yang dga'/ zhing gi dkyil 'khor thams cad du rnam par rgyu bar 'tshal nas bla/
200a6(phal chen): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab pa/
200a7(phal chen): dgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan tu bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyis nas/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ba ma 'tshal
200a8(phal chen): lo// smras pa rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni spos
200b1(phal chen): thams cad shes te/ spos sbyor ba thams cad dang / bdug spos thams cad dang / bdug spos sbyor ba thams cad dang / byug pa thams cad dang / byug
200b2(phal chen): pa sbyar ba thams cad dang / phye ma thams cad dang / phye ma sbyar ba thams cad dang / spos dang byug pa dang / phye ma'i rnam pa thams cad kyang shes te/ lha'i spos
200b3(phal chen): kyang shes so// klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i spos
200b4(phal chen): kyang shes so// nad gso ba'i spos dang / yid mi bde ba gsal ba'i spos dang / 'jig rten gyi dga' ba yongs su bskyed pa'i spos dang / nyon mongs pa
200b5(phal chen): zhi bar bya ba'i spos dang / 'du byas kyi dga' ba dang / bde ba sna tshogs yongs su bskyed pa'i spos dang / 'du byas thams cad la skyo ba yongs su bskyed
200b6(phal chen): ba'i spos dang / bag bya ba'i gnas thams cad sel ba'i spos dang / sangs rgyas yid la bya ba'i rgyud la yang dag par 'byung ba'i spos dang / chos
200b7(phal chen): kyi tshul khong du chud par ba'i spos dang / 'phags pas spyod pa'i spos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spos rnam pa tha dad pa dang / byang chub
200b8(phal chen): sems dpa'i sa thams cad rnam par dgod pa'i spos kyang shes te/ kho bos de dag thams cad rnam pa ji lta bu 'ang rab tu shes so// 'byung ba dang /
201a1(phal chen): ra yongs su dag pa dang /
201a2(phal chen): @rtse ba dang / 'grub pa dang / yongs su rdzogs pa dang / yongs su snang ba dang / rab tu sbyar ba dang / yongs su spyad ba /
201a3(phal chen): yul dang mthu dang / las dang rgyud yang rab tu shes so// rigs kyi bu mi'i 'jig rten na spos glang po che'i snying po zhes bya ba/ klu yongs su 'khrun
201a4(phal chen): par byed pa yod do// de'i ri lu til gyi 'bras bu rtsam gyi kyang yul khams chen po thams cad spos kyi sprin gyi dra ba shin du sdug pas kun nas khyebs par
201a5(phal chen): zhag bdun du spos chu'i rgyun tu 'phra ba'i char mngon par 'bab bo// de'i tshe sems can su'i lus sam gos la spos chu'i rgyun de dag gau bab par
201a6(phal chen): gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / me tog gser gyi kha dog tu 'dug pas rnam par thar pa rgyan pa gos dang lus su 'gyur ro// khang pa dang / gzhal
201a7(phal chen): med khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa gang du bab par de dag thams cad kyang / me tog gser gyi kha dog lta bus rnam par brgyan par gnas so//
201a8(phal chen): sems can khyim gyi nang na gnas pa gang gi spos spos kyi sprin gyi dra ba de la rlung gi dad pa'i dri tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / zhag bdun
201a9(phal chen): du dga' ba dang / mos pa chen pos yongs su rgyas par gyur te/ lus dang sems la bde ba dang dga' ba sna tshogs kyang rab tu myong bar 'gyur ro//
201b1(phal chen): de dag gi lus la yang khams 'khrug pa las gyur pa 'am/ gzhan gyi gnod par bya ba las gyur pa'i nad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ba med do// sems
201b2(phal chen): kyi sdug bsngal dang / yid kyi mi bde ba yang mi 'byung ngo // 'jigs pa 'am sdang ba 'am/ bag tsha ba dang / yid 'khrugs pa 'am/ gnod
201b3(phal chen): sems kyang mi rgyu ste/ de dag thams cad zhag bdun dga' ba dang / bde ba skyes te/ gcig la gcig byams pa'i sems su 'gyur ro// rigs
201b4(phal chen): kyi bu ni de dag de ltar dga' ba dang / nyams bde ba skyes pa rnams bsam pa dag par bya ba'i phyir/ ji nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
201b5(phal chen): byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba'i de ltar chos ston te/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu ri ma ya las 'byung ba'i tsan dan sa stengs dam pa zhes bya ba yod de/
201b6(phal chen): de lus la bskus nas me'i 'obs su mchod kyang tshig pa med do// rigs kyi bu rgya mtsho'i mtha' nas 'byung ba'i spos gzhan gyi thub pa med pa zhes
201b7(phal chen): bya ba yod de/ des rnga'am dung la skus na de'i sgras gzhan 'khor thams cad pham par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu mtsho 'am ma dros pa'i ngogs nas
201b8(phal chen): 'byung ba'i e ka ru nag po pad mo'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i ri lu til gyi 'bru rtsa ma zhig gi dris kyang 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad rgyas par
202a1(phal chen): @bkang bar 'gyur te/ sems can gang gi spos kyi dri de tshor ba de dag thams cad kyang sdig pa la sdod cing sdom pa'i sems can
202a2(phal chen): rab tu thob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu ri'i rgyal po kha ba can las byung ba'i spos kyi rnam pa 'od dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i dri tshor na sems
202a3(phal chen): can de dag 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems su 'gyur ro// kho bo ni de dag la ci nas kyang rdul dang bral ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ting nge 'dzin thob
202a4(phal chen): bar 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston to// rigs kyi bu srin po'i 'jig rten nas 'byung ba'i spos kyi rnam pa rgya mtsho'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de ni 'khor
202a5(phal chen): los sgyur ba'i longs spyod kyi don du 'byung ste/ des bdugs ma thag tu 'khor los sgyur ba'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa yang na mkha'i
202a6(phal chen): dbyings la gnas so// rigs kyi bu lha'i 'khor chos bzang po nas 'byung ba'i spos kyi rnam pa byed pa zhes bya ba yod de/ des bdugs ma thag
202a7(phal chen): tu lha rnams sangs rgyas kyi dri zhim po dran par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu lha'i rgyal po rab tshe ma'i gnas nas/ spos kyi rnam par dag pa'i mdzod
202a8(phal chen): zhes bya ba yod de/ des bdugs ma thag tu/ tshe ma'i lha'i bu thams cad lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe ma'i drung du song ngo // de dag der phyin nas kyang lha'i rgyal
202b1(phal chen): po rab tshems chos kyi gtam bya'o// rigs kyi bu dga' ldan gyi gnas na spos kyi rnam pa si du ba ra zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i spos kyi dung ba byang chub sems
202b2(phal chen): dpa' tshe cig gi thogs pa chos kyi stan la 'dug pa'i mdun du phyung na/ spos kyi sprin chen pos chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par gang zhing / de bzhin gshegs
202b3(phal chen): ba'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du rgyan pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i chos kyi sprin chen po'i char rab tu 'bab po// rigs kyi bu lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul
202b4(phal chen): dga'i gnas na/ spos kyi rnam pa yid 'phrog pa zhes bya ba yod de/ des lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga'i gnas su 'dugs na zhag bdun du chos kyi sprin gyi char
202b5(phal chen): bsam gyi mi khyab pa 'bab par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu kho bos ni spos sbyar ba de shes su zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' skyon gyi dri ma med pa 'dod pa'i
202b6(phal chen): 'jig rten thams cad rgyan du 'phags pa/ nyon mongs pa'i bdud kyi zhags pa dang bral ba/ srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/ ye shes
202b7(phal chen): sgyu ma'i rnam pa dang / gzugs kyi rnam par spyod pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi gos pa med pa/ chags pa med pa'i ngang tshul can bsgrub pa med pa'i ye shes
202b8(phal chen): kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa/ thogs pa med pa ye shes kyi spyod yul du ldan pa/ kun bzhi'i gnas thams cad la mi gnas par srid pa'i kun gzhi dang gnas
203a1(phal chen): 'alen/ thams cad du/ rgyu ba rnams kyi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod pa 'am/ tshul khrims kyi spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i sgo yongs
203a2(phal chen): smos pa 'am/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'i spyod pa brjod pa 'am/ gnod pa spyod pa med pa'i lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi rgyud bstan par nus re skan// / song rigs
203a3(phal chen): kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ grong khyer khang pa rtsegs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na mnyan pa dga' bo zhes bya ba 'dug gi de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar
203a4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi spos tshong gi
203a5(phal chen): tshong dpon longs spyod yud pa la'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ spos tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod ud pa la la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyog
203a6(phal chen): su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang ltas te/ spos tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod ud pa la'i drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs grong
203a7(phal chen): khyer khang brtsegs pa'i 'gro ba'i lam du 'jug pa'i tshe/ lam gyi rgyan thur dang / lam mnyam pa dang / lam gyi thag thug dang / lam rdul yod pa dang /
203a8(phal chen): lam rdul med pa dang / lam bde ba dang / lam mi bde ba dang / lam dog pa dang / lam gyegs pa med pa dang / lam 'khrug pa dang / lam 'khrugs pa
203b1(phal chen): med pa rnam par dpyad de bltas nas/ 'di snyam du sems so// 'di ltar bdag dge ba'i bshes gnyen de'i drung du 'gro ba 'ang na/ byang chub sems dpa'i la
203b2(phal chen): gyi nan tan gyi rgyur 'gyur ro// pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam gyi nan tan gyi rgyur 'gyur ro// sems can la phan gdags pa'i lam gyi nan tan gyi rgyur 'gyur ro//
203b3(phal chen): sems can thams cad byams pa dang thon dman du gyur pa'i g.yang sa las rnam par bzlog pa dang / sems can thams cad mi mnyam pa'i nan tan las sgyur
203b4(phal chen): ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i rdul rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi mi dge ba'i lta ba sna tshogs kyi ldong du ma
203b5(phal chen): dang / tsher ma dang / gyo mo dang / bseg ma bsam pa dang / chos kyi dbyings bsgrib pa med pa la gzhol bar bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i pa/
203b6(phal chen): brang du thogs pa med par bskyal ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi 'byung gnas so//
203b7(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gnyen la ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rag lus so// zhes de de ltar sems shing yid la byed pas/ spyod pa thub par dka' ba de
203b8(phal chen): mthar gyi grong khyer khang pa rtseg pa der phyin nas/ mnyan pa dpa' bo yongasu rmed cing tshol tshol ba las/ grong khyer chen po zhig gi sgo rgya mtsho chen po
204a1(phal chen): ngal/ ngogs na/ mnyan pa dpa' bo de tshong ba rgya phrag stong tsam dang / srog chags brgya stong du ma gtam sna tshogs nyan par
204a2(phal chen): 'dod pa sha stag gcig gi kun nas skor cing rgya mtsho'i gtam yongasu brjod pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya mtsho sems can rnams la ston cing 'dug
204a3(phal chen): pa mthong ngo // mthong nas mnyan pa dga'o gang na ba der song ste/ phyin nas mnyan pa dpa' bo'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ mnyan pa/
204a4(phal chen): dga' bo lan brgya stong du mar ge yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ mnyan pa dpa' bo'i mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so//
204a5(phal chen): 'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa
204a6(phal chen): la spang bar bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdam ngag dang / rjes su bstan pa
204a7(phal chen): mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan
204a8(phal chen): du bgyi ba bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/ smras pa rigs kyi bu khyod kyi de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ ye
204b1(phal chen): shes chen po 'thob par 'byung ba'i rgyu'i dri ba dang / 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyi rgyud 'byung ba'i rgyu dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gling gnas
204b2(phal chen): su 'gro ba 'byung ba'i rgyu dang / dbyer med pa'i theg pa chen po 'byung ba'i rgyu dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bas 'jigs pa dang /
204b3(phal chen): bral bar 'gyur ba'i lam gyi nan tan 'byung ba'i rgyu dang / zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / rgyud sna tshogs khong du chud par bya ba'i ye shes kyi lam 'byung
204b4(phal chen): ba'i rgyu dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad du 'gro bas rnam par sbyong ba'i smon lam gyi shing rta'i 'khor lo thogs pa med pa'i lam 'byung ba dang /
204b5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gzi brjid kyi dpa' rlabs kyi rnam par rgyan pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang / tshul gyi lam gyi 'byung ba dang / rnam par
204b6(phal chen): dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu dang / chos kyi phyogs dang / sgo thams cad kyi phyi ma'i mtha'i lam 'byung ba dang / rnam par dag par 'byung ba'i rgyu dang / thams cad
204b7(phal chen): mkhyen pa'i rgya mtsho 'jug pa'i lam 'byung ba dang / rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu 'dri ba legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni rgya mtsho'i
204b8(phal chen): ngogs kyi grong khyer khang pa brtsegs pa 'di na/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa snying rje chen po'i rgyal mtshan yongasu sbyong zhing gnas te/ rigs kyi bu
205a1(phal chen): ngalakho bos ni 'dzam bu gling gi sems can phongs pa rnams mthong nas/ de dag gi don du bka' ba spyod de/ de dag gi bsam pa
205a2(phal chen): yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// 'jig rten gyi zang zing gis yongs su bsdud par bya'o// chos kyi longs spyod kyi de dag yongs su tshim par bya'o// de dag
205a3(phal chen): la bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi lam man ngag tu bstan par bya'o// ye shes kyi tshogs rnam par 'brel bar bya'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs yongs su
205a4(phal chen): spel bar bya'o// byang chub kyi sems bskyed par bya'o// byang chub kyi bsam pa rnam par dag par bya'o// snying rje chen po'i stobs nye bar brtan par
205a5(phal chen): bya'o// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnam par zhi bar bya'o// 'khor ba'i spyod pas yongs su mi skyo ba'i stobs shin tu brtan par bya'o// sems can
205a6(phal chen): rgya mtsho bsdu ba 'di dag sbyar bar bya'o// yon tan rgya mtsho'i nan tan gyi sgo la dgod par bya'o// 'di dag la chos rgya mtsho'i ye shes snang bar nye bar
205a7(phal chen): bsgrub par bya'o// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho thams cad kyang 'di dag gi mngon par mthong bar bya'o// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgya mtsho la 'ang 'di dag
205a8(phal chen): bzud par bya'o// zhes de lta bu'i bsam pa dang yid la byed pa la brtson par kho bo rgya mtsho'i dogs kyi grong khyer khang pa rtsegs pa 'di ni gnas so//
205b1(phal chen): rigs kyi bu kho bo ni de ltar 'gro ba la phan pa dang / bde bar brtson pas/ rgya mtsho chen po'i rin po che'i gling thams cad kyang shes so// rin po che'i
205b2(phal chen): 'byung gnas thams cad dang / rin po che'i ris thams cad dang / rin po che'i gtogs thams cad kyang rab tu shes so// klu'i gnas thams cad
205b3(phal chen): dang / klu'i 'khrugs pa thams cad dang / gnod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad dang / gnod sbyin gyi 'khrugs pa thams cad dang / srin po'i gnas
205b4(phal chen): thams cad dang / srin po'i 'jig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung ba'i gnas thams cad dang / 'byung po'i bar chad thams cad
205b5(phal chen): rnam par zhi bar bya ba yang rab tu shes ste/ grong yod pa thams cad glong thams cad bgrol ba dang / dpa' brlabs chen po yongasu spangs pa dang /
205b6(phal chen): chu'i kha dog rnam pa tha dad pa 'ang rab tu shes so// nyi zla dang gza' skar gyi tshogs yongs su 'khor ba dang / nyin zhag dang ska cig dang / yung
205b7(phal chen): tsam dang thang cig kyang rab tu shes so// phan tshun du 'gro ba'i shol 'dums dang / bde mi bde dang / glu'i 'khrul 'khor brtan par bya ba dang /
205b8(phal chen): gru bzung ba dang / gru phul ba dang / rlung rdo ba dang / rlung bskyed pa dang / gru sbyar zhing bzlog pa dang / gru brtod pa dang / gru tang ba yang rab tu sheso//
206a1(phal chen): larigs kyi bu de ltar kho bos ni shes pa de lta bu dang ldan pas/ rtag tu sems can gyi don dang / dgos pa byed do// tshong pa'i tshogs
206a2(phal chen): grub rten pos lam bde zhing nye zhor ma 'gyur la/ mi 'jigs pa nas chos kyi gtam gyi dga' ba dang / spro ba bskyed cing bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rin po
206a3(phal chen): che'i gling du phyin par byas nas de dag rin po che'i thams cad kyi tshogs te/ phun sum tshogs par 'byung ba dang / phyir yang 'dzam bu gling du bgyed kyang
206a4(phal chen): rigs kyi bu kho bo'i gru ni nam yang 'bub pa 'am/ nye zhor gyur pa ma myong ste/ sems can gang gi kho bo'i chos ston pa'i thos pa de dag kyang / 'khor ba'i
206a5(phal chen): rgya mtsho thams cad du nye zhor gyur pa'i 'jigs pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgya mtshor 'jug pa'i ye shes kyang mngon sum du/
206a6(phal chen): 'gyur ro// srid pa'i rgya mtsho skam pa'i don du'ang rab tu 'jug par 'gyur te/ dus gsum rgya mtsho'i ye shes snang ba 'ang rab tu 'thob po// sem
206a7(phal chen): can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rgya mtsho zad par bya ba'i phyir yang mngon par mos par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho'i rnyog
206a8(phal chen): dang bar bya ba'i phyir yang rab tu brtson par 'gyur ro// zhing rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yang brtson 'grus brtsom par 'gyur ro//
206b1(phal chen): phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad rgyas par bkang ba las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// 'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho tha dad pa'ang khong du chud par 'gyur/
206b2(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho'i rje su 'ang 'brang bar 'gyur ro// 'gro ba'i bsam pa rgya mtsho ji lta ba bzhin du'ang gzugs brnyan 'byung bar 'gyur ro// /
206b3(phal chen): rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / 'grogs pa dang / rjes su dran pa'i chu klung gi dbyangs shes
206b4(phal chen): bya ba thob par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho thams cad du rnam par spyod pa nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad kyi gos
206b5(phal chen): pa med pa lta ba'i rnam pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad kyi chags pa'i chu srin gyi 'jigs pa dang bral ba/ chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang gzhi las
206b6(phal chen): rnam par rgyu ba 'gro ba rgya mtsho thams cad du bsdu ba'i dngos pos yongs su sdu ba'i rgya mtsho dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgya mtsho dang
206b7(phal chen): 'grogs pa/ sems can gyi mngon par chags pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu srub pa/ dus rgya mtsho thams cad dang tha mi dad pa/ rnam par spyod pa 'gro/
206b8(phal chen): ba rgya mtsho thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba'i dmigs shes pa/ 'gro ba rgya mtsho thams cad kyi 'dul ba'i dbres las mi 'da' ba de dag gi spyod pa shes
207a1(phal chen): phalapa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na grong khyer dga' ba zhes bya ba yod
207a2(phal chen): de/ de na tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pa zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par
207a3(phal chen): bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi mnyan pa dpa' bo'i rkang pa nyid la phyag byas nas/ mnyan pa dpa'
207a4(phal chen): bo la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas te/ yang dang yang ltas nas/ gdong mchis mas rkang ste dus zhing dge ba'i gshes gnyen blta
207a5(phal chen): bas ngoms bzhin du/ mnyan pa dpa' bos drung nas song ngo // shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po zhes bya ba las sdong pos brgyan pa//
207a6(phal chen): bam po dgu bcu rtsa bdun pa'o//
207a7(phal chen): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs byams pa chen pos/ sems can gyi khams tshad med pa rgyas par rkang pa'i sems can dang ldan pa/ snying rje chen po rlan
207a8(phal chen): gyi mngon par rlan pa'i rgyud can/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rgyan shin tu brtsegs pa/ nyon mongs pa'i rdul dang mun pa dang / dri ma dang / 'dam/
207b1(phal chen): thams cad dang bral ba/ chos mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la lam gyen thur med pa la zhugs pa/ dge ba'i chos tshad med pa la
207b2(phal chen): 'jug pa'i skor zhugs pa/ mi dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi mi shigs pa'i brtson 'grus brtan pa'i mthu sngon du mdor ba dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems
207b3(phal chen): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bsam gyi mi khyab pa rab tu byung ba rgya chen po'i bde ba thob pa/ shes rab kyi nyi ma'i 'od zer snang bas/ ma rig pa'i mun pa ma lus
207b4(phal chen): par bsal ba/ thabs kyi ser bu bde zhing bsil bas blags pa'i ye shes kyi me tog gi rgyas pa smon lam chen po rgya mtsho'i 'byung ba'i ye shes tshul dang
207b5(phal chen): mthun pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du thogs pa med par rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi pho brang du thogs
207b6(phal chen): pa med par 'gro ba la mngon du gyur pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam la mngon par mos pa de/ grong khyer dga' ba'i 'phreng ba gang na ba der byin te/ tshong
207b7(phal chen): dpon rgyal ba'i dam pa yongasu rmed cing tshol tshol ba las/ grong khyer dga' ba'i 'breng ba'i shar phyogs logs kyi 'dab cig na/ shing a sho ka'i
207b8(phal chen): nags tshal sna tshogs shes bya ba 'dug pa de'i nang na/ khyim bdag stong phrag du ma zhig gi bskor te/ grong khyer gyi bya ba sna tshogs yongasu 'gro zhing
208a1(phal chen): phade la brten te/ bdag tu bya ba thams cad yang dag par gzhol ba dang / yongasu 'dzin pa thams cad yongasu btang ba dang /
208a2(phal chen): dngos pos 'dzin pa thams cad rab tu spang ba dang / mngon par zhen pa thams cad shin tu gshigs pa dang / srid pa'i 'ching ba thams cad gcad
208a3(phal chen): par bya ba dang / lta ba'i rnam par thabs kyi sgo glegs gcig pa dang / the tshom dang / yid gnyis dang / nem nur gyi ra'i rib thams cad rnam par
208a4(phal chen): bsal ba/ g.yo rgyu'i rnyog pa shin du btang ba dang / phra dog dang ser sna'i dri ma yongs su sbyang ba dang / sems kyi rgya mtsho shin tu brtsal bar bya ba
208a5(phal chen): dang / sems rnyog pa med pa la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / dad pa rnyog pa med pa'i stobs bskyed de/ sangs rgyas lta bar mos pa bskyed
208a6(phal chen): ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i stobs bsngags shing sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par blang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la mos
208a7(phal chen): ste/ byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs yongs su bskyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs yang dag par bstan cing / byang
208a8(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i dran pa'i stobs rnam par dag pa'i mthar phyin par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi gtam byed cing / 'di ltar byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la mngon par
208b1(phal chen): mos par bya ba'i phyir chos ston cing 'dug mthong ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi gtam de'i rjes su chad chad du bstan nas/ tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pa'i
208b2(phal chen): rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ ring mo zhig tu btud nas chos la shin du gus pa'i bsam pas tshig 'di skad du brjod do// 'phags pa nor bzangs nor bzang
208b3(phal chen): zhes bgyi ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su tshol na/ ci nas kyang bdag byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslob par 'gyur ba dang / bslabs nas kyang
208b4(phal chen): ci nas sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang / 'dul ba'i don la mngon du mos par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhal lta ba las mi 'bang
208b5(phal chen): ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos thos par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin gyi char yongs su bzung ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos
208b6(phal chen): kyi tshul nan tan tu bgyi ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa dang / bskal pa thams cad du gnas kyang byang chub sems
208b7(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pas yongs su mi skyo ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin/
208b8(phal chen): brlabs yang dag par gnod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs rnams la snang ba thob par 'gyur ba/ de ltar 'phags pas bdag la bshad du/
209a1(phal chen): @#gsol/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu rgyal po dam pas tshong dpon gyi bu nor ba'angs la 'di skad ces sbas so// rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyi tha
209a2(phal chen): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni 'di lta ste dngos po med pa la gnas pas mngon par 'du
209a3(phal chen): bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul thob pa'i mthus/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo thams cad du 'gro ba yongs su sbyang ste/ de ltar kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i
209a4(phal chen): spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i sgo thams cad du 'gro ba 'di la gnas shing / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi
209a5(phal chen): lha'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / mtsho ma'i lha'i gnas thams cad dang / dga' ldan gyi lha'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / 'phrul dga'i lha'i 'jig rten tha
209a6(phal chen): cad dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / bdud kyi gnas thams cad dang / 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha'i ris su rtogs pa thams
209a7(phal chen): cad dang / lha'i gnas thams cad dang / lha'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / klu'i gnas thams cad dang / gnod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad dang / srin po'i
209a8(phal chen): 'jig rten thams cad dang / srin po'i gnas thams cad dang / grul bum gyi 'jig rten thams cad dang / grul bum gyi gnas thams cad dang / yi dgas
209b1(phal chen): kyi 'jig rten thams cad dang / yi dgas kyi gnas thams cad dang / dri za'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / dri za'i gnas thams cad dang / lha ma yin gyi 'jig
209b2(phal chen): rten thams cad dang / lha ma yin gyi gnas thams cad dang / na mkha' lding gi 'jig rten thams cad dang / na mkha' lding gi gnas thams cad dang / mi 'am
209b3(phal chen): ci'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / mi 'am ci'i gnas thams cad dang / lto phye chen po'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / lto phye chen po'i gnas thams cad dang /
209b4(phal chen): mi'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / mi'i gnas thams cad dang / grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / khams dang / rgyal po'i pho brang
209b5(phal chen): 'khor dang / 'dod pa'i kham su rtogs pa'i sems can gyi rgyud thams cad du chos ston to// chos ma yin pa'i ni zlog go/ brtsod pa ni zhi bar byed do// 'thab
209b6(phal chen): pa ni rnam par zlog go/ 'khrug pa ni nye bar zhi bar byed do// yul du lhags pa ni rnam par zlog go// shags 'gyed pa ni zhi bar byed do// mdud par 'dzin
209b7(phal chen): pa ni rab tu sel te/ bcing ba thams cad ni yongs su gcod do// brtson ra thams cad ni mngon par 'dral lo// 'jigs pa ni rnam par bzlog go/ mi dge
209b8(phal chen): kha'i las kyi 'du byed ni rgyun gcod do// srog gcod pa las ni sems can rnam par bzlog go/ ma byin pa len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yems pa dang /
210a1(phal chen): ba lerdzun du smras pa dang / phra ma dang / zhe bcod pa dang / tshig 'khyal pa dang / chags sems dang / gnod sems dang / los
210a2(phal chen): par lta ba las ni sems can rnam par zlog go// mi dge ba thams cad ni byed du 'jug go/ dge ba'i chos thams cad ni byed du 'jug go// sems can
210a3(phal chen): thams cad ni bzo thams cad la slob tu 'dzud do// 'jig rten rnams rab tu dga' bar bya ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / zhag
210a4(phal chen): pa thub pa thams cad la gong ma'i ye shes khyad par du 'phags pa brjod pa'i phyir rje su 'brang bar bya ba dang / lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad rnam par zlog
210a5(phal chen): pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad brjod cing bstan pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten la phan par 'gyur ba'i rtsug lag thams cad kyang ston to//
210a6(phal chen): rnam par 'god do// rab tu stsal bar byed do// de bzhin du tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du gzugs kyi khams kyi lha thams cad zil gyi mnan te
210a7(phal chen): chos ston to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ji ltar de bzhin du/ phyogs bcur yang 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas
210a8(phal chen): kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig rgya stong brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin du phra ba rnyed dag tu chos ston to// sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang stan
210b1(phal chen): to// byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang / nyan thos kyi chos dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang ston to// sems can dmyal ba yang ston to// sems can
210b2(phal chen): dmyal bar 'gro ba'i lam dang / sems can dmyal ba'i sems can gyi mi bde ba 'ang ston to// byol song gi skye gnas kyang ston to// byol song gi skye gnas
210b3(phal chen): kye lam gyi rgyud tha dad pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam du 'gro ba'i lam dang / byol song gi smre gnas su skyes pa'i sdug bsngal yang ston to// gshin
210b4(phal chen): rjes 'jig rten yang ston to// gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba'i lam dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal yang ston to// mtho ris kyi 'jig
210b5(phal chen): rten to// mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du 'gro ba'i lam dang / mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi dga' bar spyod pa dang / longs spyod kyang ston to// ma'i 'jig rten
210b6(phal chen): yang ston to// me'i 'jig rten gyi lam rgyud du 'gro ba'i lam dang / mi'i 'jig rten gyi bde ba dang / sdug bsngal nyam su myong ba sna tshogs kyang ston to// de ltar
210b7(phal chen): rigs kyi bu kho bo ni 'jig rten gyi chos ston to// 'jig rten gyi kun 'byung ba dang / 'jig rten nub par 'byung ba dang / 'jig rten gyi kha na ma tho ba dang /
210b8(phal chen): 'jig rten nas 'byung ba yang ston te/ de yang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i lam yang dag par bstan pa dang / 'khor ba'i skyon rnam par zlog pa dang /
211a1(phal chen): #thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yon tan yang dag par brjod pa dang / srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud mgo 'khor ba dang / sdug bsngal du/
211a2(phal chen): gyur pa yang dag par bstan pa dang / sgrib pa med pa'i chos nyid du brjod pa dang / 'jig rten rgyu ba'i bya ba yongasu bstan pa dang / 'jig rten du 'byung ba
211a3(phal chen): dang / ldog pa'i bde ba dang / sdug bsngal thams cad smos pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi ming du bya ba rnam par bsgom pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
211a4(phal chen): pa'i chos gnas pa med pa mngon par snyan pa dang / las dang nyon mongs pa'i 'khor lo thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos
211a5(phal chen): kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba bzhin du brjod pa'i phyir chos ston to// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i sgo thams cad du 'a
211a6(phal chen): ba/ dngos po med pa la gnas pas mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus brgyan pa 'di shes par zad na kho bos byang chub sems dpa'
211a7(phal chen): thams cad mngon par shes pa zhing gi dbyings thams cad du sgyu ma lta bu'i ye shes kyi lus kyi rgyas par 'gengs pa/ kun tu lta ba'i ye shes kyi sa rab tu thob
211a8(phal chen): pa/ tshig gi lam dang / sgra thams cad rnam par dmigs pa la shin tu gzhol ba'i rna ba dang ldan pa/ dus gsum rgyas par 'gengs pa'i chos kyi sgo sna
211b1(phal chen): pa rab tu thos pa/ chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i ye shes la dbang sgyur ba'i skyes bu dpa' bo// sems can tshad med bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i
211b2(phal chen): bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs par bya ba la ma 'dres pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'i lce yangs shing sra ba la yid du 'ong ba dang ldan
211b3(phal chen): pa/ bsam pa tha dad pa'i sems can rgya mtsho yid du 'ong ba'i kha dog dang dbyibs su ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang mnyam pa'i lus/
211b4(phal chen): sgyu ma lta bu dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / mi gnyis pa'i spyod lam gyi bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i lus la gzhol ba/ dus gsum
211b5(phal chen): thams cad rjes su 'bral ba'i ye shes kyi lus dang ldan pa/ na mkha'i dbyings ltar tshad med pa'i spyod yul dpag tu med pa'i yul dang ldan pa de dag
211b6(phal chen): gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod pa nus re skan// / song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi yul shu ma phyi ma'i mtha' na/ grong
211b7(phal chen): khyer ka li ka'i nags tshal zhes bya ba yod de/ de dge slong ma seng ge rnam par sgyings zhes bya ba 'dug gi de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems
211b8(phal chen): dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi/ rkyong dpon
212a1(phal chen): pal/ @#rgyal ba dam pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su
212a2(phal chen): bskor ba byas nas yang bltas te/ tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pa'i drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs mthar gyi yul shu ma phyi ma'i mtha'i grong
212a3(phal chen): khyer ka ling ka'i nags tshal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam pa sgyings pa yongasu tshol zhing sems can kun la rmed pa'i tshe/
212a4(phal chen): gang nas gang du song ba de dang der/ rogs po rgya phrag du ma dang / bu mo brgya phrag du ma zhig srang dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo dang / lam gyi gsum mdo dag
212a5(phal chen): nas tshogs te rjes su 'brang ngo // skyes pa brgya phrag du ma dang / bud med pa rgya phrag du ma zhig gi kyang / rigs kyi bu de re dge slong ma seng ge rnam par
212a6(phal chen): bsgyings pa ni/ grong ka ling ka'i nags 'tshal 'di nyid kyi bza' shing gi ra ba chen po rgyal ba'i 'od kyi byin pa'i nyi ma'i mdog na sems can tshad med pa'i don
212a7(phal chen): du chos ston cing 'dug go/ zhes ston to// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs bza' shing gi ra ba nyi ma'i mdog der phyin nas/ kun du btsal te bltas
212a8(phal chen): nas/ bza' shing gi ra ba de na shing zla ba shar ba zhes bya ba/ khang pa rtsegs pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ 'od sna tshogs kyi kha dog can 'od kyi mdog dang
212b1(phal chen): ldan pa/ 'khor kun du dpag tshad kyi khyon tsam du 'od kyi rgyas par 'gengs pa mang po dang / lo ma'i shing yongs su 'bebs pa zhes bya ba bdugs kyi rnam pa dang /
212b2(phal chen): dbyings su 'dug pa'i mdab mas kun nas khebs pa/ bai DUr+ya sngon po'i kha dog ltar 'dug pa'i sprin gyi mdog dang ldan pa mang po dang / me tog gi shing me tog
212b3(phal chen): gi mdzod zhes bya ba ri'i rgyal po kha ba can ltar mdangs dga' ba'i dbyibs sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ kha dog sna tshogs kyi me tog mi zad pa'i char rab tu 'bebs
212b4(phal chen): pa/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i pho brang gi rgyan gyi kun nas 'du ba dang / sus kyang mi shigs pa lta bu mang po dang shing thogs gi shing rtag tu smin pa'i ro/
212b5(phal chen): dpe med pa'i 'bras bu tshogs zhes bya ba/ gser gyi ri bo'i lhun po ltar 'dug pa rtag tu shing thogs phun sum tshogs par gnas pa mang po dang / rin
212b6(phal chen): po che'i rgyal po'i shing rnam par snang ba'i mdzod zhes bya ba/ rin po che'i rgyal po dpe' med pa'i dbyings ltar 'dug pa/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i 'phreng ba
212b7(phal chen): dang / se mo de dang rgyan rin po che'i yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i mdzod nas byung ba ltar phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa/ rin po che'i kha dog grangs med pa'i
212b8(phal chen): 'byung gnas su gyur pa mang po dang / gos kyi shing dga' bar byed pa zhes bya ba/ lha rdzas kyi gos rin po che'i kha dog sna tshogs kyi tshogs rab tu 'gyed
213a1(phal chen): phalacing 'phyang bas shin tu rgyan pa mang po dang / rol mo'i shing dga' ba bskyed pa zhes bya ba/ lha rdzas las kyang lhag pa'i
213a2(phal chen): rol mo yid du 'ong ba'i sgra snyan pa mang po dang / spos kyi shing kun tu zhim pas brgyan pa zhes bya ba phyogs thams cad thogs pa med par rnam pa thams
213a3(phal chen): cad du 'ong ba'i spos kyi ngad 'byung ba mang po dag kyang yod pa mthong / mtshe'u dang lu ma dang / lteng ka dang rdzing bu rin po che bdun gyi pha gus tha brtsig
213a4(phal chen): pa/ phyogs bzhi nas rin po che'i them sgras bcugs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi khri 'phang dus dang mthun pa'i tsan dan gyi dri zhim pos skus pas kun nas
213a5(phal chen): bskor ba/ gzhi rin po che'i rgyal po bai DUr+ya sngon po las legs par blangs pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi bye ma bdal ba/ yan lag brgya dang
213a6(phal chen): ldan pa'i/ lha rdzas kyi dri yid du 'ong ba can gyi 'ang ba can gyi yongs su gang ba/ rin po che'i pad mo dang / ud pa la dang / ku mu ta dang / me tog pu
213a7(phal chen): ta ri ka kha dog sna tshogs lha rdzas kyi gsung dang ldan pas chu kun nas sogs pa/ bya bran sna tshogs kyi khyu lha rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i gzugs yid du
213a8(phal chen): 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ sgra snyan pa byin cing brjod pas gang ba lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing gyi phreng ba legs par dkye bas yongs su bskor cing
213b1(phal chen): rgyan pa dang ldan pa shin tu sna tshogs de dag gi drung thams cad du 'ang rin po che'i seng ge'i khri sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs dang ldan pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi
213b2(phal chen): bsam gyi mi khyab pa du mas brgyan pa/ lha rdzas kyi stan rin po che sna tshogs 'brel bar sting pa/ lha rdzas kyi spos dang bdug spos kyi rnam pa thams cad kyi
213b3(phal chen): bdugs pa dang / lha rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i dar rin po che mngon par dpyangs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi bla re ba kye ba/ rin po che sna tshogs dang /
213b4(phal chen): 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi dra ba sna tshogs kun na bres pa/ rin po che'i dril bu yid du 'ong zhing snyen pa'i sgra 'byin pa mang pos brgyan pa/ 'khor du lha
213b5(phal chen): rdzas rin po che'i bstan brgya stong phrag du ma bting zhing bshams pa mthong ngo // rin po che'i shing drung la lar ni seng ge'i khri chen po rin po che'i pad mo snying po
213b6(phal chen): can bshams pa mthong ngo // la lar ni seng ge'i rin po che spos kyi rgyal po'i pad mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo // la lar ni seng ge'i khri nor
213b7(phal chen): bu rin po che'i rgyal po klu'i rgyan gyi pad mos byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo // la lar ni seng ge'i khri rin po che seng ge'i pad mos snying po byas pa bsham
213b8(phal chen): pa mthong ngo // la lar ni seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po rnam par snang ba'i pad me'i snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo // la lar ni seng ge'i khri
214a1(phal chen): phal/ rin po che'i rgyal po rnam par snang ba'i pad mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo // la lar ni seng ge'i khri rin po che'i
214a2(phal chen): rgyal po dbang po'i rdo rje pad mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo // la lar ni seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po rgyal po 'gro ba'i yid du 'ong
214a3(phal chen): pa'i pad mes snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo // rin po che'i shing drung la lar ni seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po mdog dkar po'i pad mos
214a4(phal chen): snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo // bza' shing gi ra ba de'i gzhi thams cad kyang rin po che sna tshogs kyi yongs su bkang ba zhing rgya mtsho chen po
214a5(phal chen): ltar rin po che'i gling gi yongs su gang bar mthong ngo // bai DUr+ya sngon po'i dam pas bslabs te/ rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan pa'i sa phyogs
214a6(phal chen): ka tsa li 'di ltar reg na bre zhing 'jam yang gom pa bor zhing bteg pa'i tshe mthon dman med par rdo rje rin po che'i mchog gi pad mo dri yid du 'ong bar zhim
214a7(phal chen): zhing reg na bde ba'i bsil ma kun tu bkram pa/ dang ngur dang / rma bya dang / khrung khrung dang / kun la dang / ka la bing ka dang / kai ki la dang / rdzi ban dzi/
214a8(phal chen): ka sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba'i nga ro 'byin pa mang po bkang ba/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i tsan dan gyi shing mang po'i nags tshal shin tu legs pas 'grig pas
214b1(phal chen): mdzes par brgyan pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi pad mo'i sprin gyi char dang / rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs mi zad pa'i char rgyun du 'bab pa 'dres pa nags tshal las kyang
214b2(phal chen): khyad du 'phags pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang bu brtsegs pa du ma brgyan par bkod pa'i nang nas/ spos kyi rgyal po'i bdug spos kyi rgyal po'i bdug spos rin
214b3(phal chen): thang med pa rtag tu 'thul zhing zhim pa lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang po'i rgyan las kyang lhag pas brgyan pas/ lha rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i rin po che'i dra ba sna tshogs
214b4(phal chen): kyi kun tu bres pa/ mu tig rin po che'i me tog gi 'phreng ba dang / lda ldi kun nas bris pa rab tu brgyan pa/ rin po che'i dril bu rnam pa sna tshogs su dgye ba'i
214b5(phal chen): gser gyi dra ba 'bab pas kun nas dkris pa rol mo'i shing dang rin po che'i ta la las dril bu'i dra ba rlung gi legs par bskyod pas/ yid du 'ong ba'i sgra snyen pa'i
214b6(phal chen): dbyangs bya dang ldan pa/ dbang sgyur ba'i lha'i rgyal po'i lha mo dpe tshul shin tu bzang ba rnams kyi glu snyan pa'i sgra rab tu yid du 'ongs pa blangs pa/ lha rdzas kyi
214b7(phal chen): yid bzhin gri gos kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char rab tu 'bab pas rnam par mdzes pa rgya mtsho chen po ltar kha dog sna tshogasu ldan pas blta na btang mi bra ba/
214b8(phal chen): khang pa rtsegs pa rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa brgya stong grangs med pa rab tu brgyan pa/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i pho brang lta blta na bzang ba/ rin po che sna tshogs
215a1(phal chen): phal/ @#rnam par phye bas/ rnam pa thams cad du brgyan pa'i gzugs shin du legs par rnam par sbreng zhing bkram pas kun nas lta na mdzes pa
215a2(phal chen): dbang po 'jig rten ltar shin tu mdzes pa'i de'u sna tshogs kyi brgyan pa/ yid du 'ong ba'i 'od snang ba chen po rtags par 'byung ba/ tshangs pa chen po'i gzhal
215a3(phal chen): med khang ltar nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po 'gro ba'i yid du 'ong ba'i 'od kyi 'bar ba ste/ bza' shing gi ra ba chen po nyi ma'i mdog ces bya ba de/ dge slong ma seng
215a4(phal chen): ge'i rnam par bsgyings pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu stobs dang byin rlabs che zhing bsam gyi mi khyab pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa'i gnas su gyur pa'i
215a5(phal chen): nam mkha'i dbyings ltar byas yangs shing tshad med de/ rgya chen po dang ldan par mi mthong ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi de ltar yon tan tshad med bsam
215a6(phal chen): gyi mi khyab pa tshogs pa'i bza' shing gi ra ba'i rgyan byang chub sems dpa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa yongasu grub pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
215a7(phal chen): rgya chen po las skye ba/ sangs rgyas la mchod cing rim 'gro byas pa'i rgyu mdun pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa las byung ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yod
215a8(phal chen): pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ma lus pas mi 'phrogs pa/ chos kyi rang bzhin sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bus grub pa dge ba'i bsod nams dri ma med pa rgya chen pos grub cing 'byung
215b1(phal chen): ba/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par sgyings pa'i sngon gyi spyod pa bzang po legs par byas pa'i/ rgyu mthun pa'i stobs dang / shugs kyi byung ba/ nyan thos dang
215b2(phal chen): rang sangs rgyas dang mthun mongs ma yin pa/ mu stegs can dang pas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyi mi 'phrogs pa/ bdud kyi lam yongs su rgyu ba thams cad kyi mi
215b3(phal chen): tshugs pa/ byis pa so so skye bo thams cad kyi ltar med pa mthong ste/ shing sna tshogs de dag gi drung gi seng ge khri rin po che de dag la'ang dge slong ma seng ge rnam
215b4(phal chen): par bsgyings pa/ lus shin du mdzes pa/ spyod lam zhi ba/ dbang po zhi ba/ yid zhi ba shin du dben pa/ dbang po thub pa/ glang po ltar shin tu 'du
215b5(phal chen): ba/ mtsho ltar dang zhing bsal ba/ snyogs pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po yid bzhin gyi nor bu ltar 'dod pa thams cad sgrub pa/ pad+mo
215b6(phal chen): ltar chu mi chags pa ltar/ 'jig rten gyi chos kyi ma gos pa/ seng ge ltar 'jigs pa dang skyi g.ya' ba med pa/ mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pas ra'i
215b7(phal chen): dbang po ltar mi skul ba/ tshul khrims rnam par dag pas yid du 'ong ba'i spos kyi rgyal po ltar 'gro ba'i sems tshim par byed pa/ kha ba tsan dan ltar nyon
215b8(phal chen): mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ sman gyi rgyal po lta na bzang ba ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rnam par zhi bar byed pa/ chu lha'i zhags
216a1(phal chen): phagapa ltar blta na don yod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od ltar lus dang / sems kyi bag yangs bde ba bskyed pa/ tshangs pa/
216a2(phal chen): chen po ltar 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang gti mug+na nas ldang bral bar rin po che'i rgyal po nor bu chu 'dang ltar nyon mongs pa snyog pa can du gyur pa'i sems
216a3(phal chen): can gyi sems rab tu dang bar byed pa/ zhing gzhin pa ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pa 'dug par mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan de dag la
216a4(phal chen): 'ang 'khor sna tshogs 'khod par mthong ste/ 'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha'i bu dbang po la sogs pa rtsang ma'i gnas kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i
216a5(phal chen): bu rnams khyod cing / dge slong ma seng ge'i rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo rnam par thar pa mi zad pa yang dag par snyan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan
216a6(phal chen): la la la ni tshangs pa yid du 'ong ba la sogs pa tshangs pa'i ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams khyod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas
216a7(phal chen): dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa/ gzhi kun nas 'byed pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha'i rgyal po
216a8(phal chen): dbang sbyar la sogs pa/ gzhan 'bral dbang byed kyi lha'i bu/ lha'i bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dag 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings
216b1(phal chen): pas chos kyi sgo byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i dbang gi rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba yang dag par snyan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la
216b2(phal chen): la ni lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga' la sogs pa 'phrul dga'i lha'i bu mo 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas
216b3(phal chen): chos kyi sgo thams cad dge bas rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gi stan la la la ni lha'i rgyal por dga' ldan gyi ris
216b4(phal chen): gtogs pa'i lha'i bu dang lha'i bu mo 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing dge slong ma seng ge rnams par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo rang gi sems kyi mdzod/
216b5(phal chen): kyi grong zhes bya ba yang dag par ston pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi bstan la la la ni lha'i rgyal po rab mdzes ma la sogs pa lha'i bu mo 'khor dang bcas pa rnams
216b6(phal chen): 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo rgyan mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi bstan la la
216b7(phal chen): la ni lha'i rgyal po rgya byin la sogs pa sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing dge slong ma seng ge
216b8(phal chen): rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo skyo ba'i sgo zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni klu'i rgyal po gang chen mtsho// la so
217a1(phal chen): b.lapa klu'i rgyal po 'od brgya pa dang / dga' bo dang bsnyen dga' bo dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / shugs ldan dang / ma gros pa/
217a2(phal chen): la sogs pa klu'i bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa klu'i byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi
217a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / yul gyi 'od kyi rgyan ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni rgyal po chen po ngal sos pa
217a4(phal chen): la sogs pa gnod sbyin gyi dbang po gnod sbyin gyi bu mo dang / gnod sbyin gyi byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnams
217a5(phal chen): par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa'i mdzod ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni dri za'i
217a6(phal chen): rgyal po gnas bsrung ba la sogs pa dri za'i bu mo dang / dri za'i byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par
217a7(phal chen): bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo dga' ba mi zad pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha ma yin gyi dab
217a8(phal chen): po sgra can la sogs pa lha ma yin rnams lha ma yin gyi bu mo dang / lha yin gyi byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam
217b1(phal chen): par bsgyings pas chos kyi dbyings zhes bya ba'i tshul gyi shugs kyi rgyan pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni na mkha
217b2(phal chen): lding gyi dbang po shugs 'dzin chen po la sogs pa na mkha' lding gi dbang po na mkha' lding gi bu mo dang / na mkha' lding gi byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas
217b3(phal chen): ba rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo'i srid pa'i rgya mtshos 'jigs pa'i yul zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan
217b4(phal chen): pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi bstan la la la ni mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ldong po la sogs pa mi 'am ci'i dbang po dang mi 'am ci'i bu mo dang / ci 'am ci'i byis
217b5(phal chen): pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa snang ba zhes bya ba yang dag
217b6(phal chen): par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni lto phye chen po'i dbang po khro gnyer gdong la sogs pa/ lto phye chen po'i bu mo dang / lto phye chen po
217b7(phal chen): byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing // dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sangs rgyas la dga' ba skye ba zhes bya ba yang dag
217b8(phal chen): par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang bu mo brgya stong pa mang po 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge
218a1(phal chen): phalarnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo khyed par 'gro ba zhes yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni srin po
