218a2(phal chen): dbang po rtag tu mdangs phrogs stobs kyi rgyal po la sogs pa srin po'i dbang po srin po'i bu mo dang / srin po'i byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams
218a3(phal chen): 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo snying rje zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni sem
218a4(phal chen): can nyan thos kyi theg pa la mos pa 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo ye shes khyad par 'phags pa'i mthu zhes bya
218a5(phal chen): ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni sems can rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mos pa rnam 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge
218a6(phal chen): rnam par sgyings pas chos kyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya chen po'i 'od zhes bya ba yang dag par snyan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni sems ca
218a7(phal chen): theg pa chen po la mos pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par sgyings pas ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes snang ba'i sgo zhes bya ba yang dag par
218a8(phal chen): snyan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' thog mar sems bskyed pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par sgyings pas
218b1(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam gyi phung po zhes bya ba yang dag par snyan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems/
218b2(phal chen): dpa' sa gnyis pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par sgyings pas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rdul dang bral ba'i dkyil 'khor
218b3(phal chen): zhes bya ba yang dag par snyan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa gsum pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong
218b4(phal chen): ma seng ge rnam par sgyings pas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu zhi ba'i rab tu brgyan ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la
218b5(phal chen): la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa bzhi pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams
218b6(phal chen): cad mkhyen pa nyid du shugs kyi yul 'byung zhes bya ba yang dag par ston pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa lnga pa
218b7(phal chen): la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par sgyings pas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sems kyi rgyud me tog gi snying po zhes bya ba yang dag
218b8(phal chen): par snyan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa drug pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par sgyings
219a1(phal chen): palapas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnam par snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yang dag par snyan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni
219a2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sa bdun pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par sgyings pas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo kun nas zhes bya ba
219a3(phal chen): yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa brgyad pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng
219a4(phal chen): ge rnam par bsgyings pas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo chos kyi dbyings su lus shin tu rnam par phye ba'i yul zhes bya ba yang dag par snyan pa mthong ngo // 'khor
219a5(phal chen): gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa dgu pa la gnas pa 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par sgyings pas chos kyi sgo mi dmigs pa'i
219a6(phal chen): stobs kyi gnas kyi brgyan pa zhes bya ba yang dag par snyan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu pa la gnas pa rnams
219a7(phal chen): 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sgrib pa med pa'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba yang dag par snyan pa mthong ngo //
219a8(phal chen): 'khor gyi stan pa la la la ni lag na rdo rje'i 'khor 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par sgyings pas chos kyi sgo ye shes rdo rje mthu bo che'i rgyan ces bya ba
219b1(phal chen): ya dag par snyan pa mthong ngo // de ltar skye ba'i skye mched rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad kyi sems can du gdags pa dang / sems can gyi lam gyi rgyud ci snyed
219b2(phal chen): pa de dag gi sems can yongs su smin par rnam par 'dul ba snod du gyur pa ji snyed cig/ bza' shing gi ra ba der 'ongs shing 'khor gyi stan la so sor 'khod pa
219b3(phal chen): bsam pa tha dad pa'i mos pa'i mi tshungs pa/ bsam pa bzhin du gzhol bar gyur pa tha dad pa'i ro rngams chen po dang ldan pa rnams la/ dge slong ma seng ge
219b4(phal chen): rnam par sgyings pas ji nas kyang thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur pa de lta de ltar chos ston pa mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/
219b5(phal chen): de ni dge slong ma seng ge rnam par sgyings pa des kun du lta steng snyoms pa dang ldan pa la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad shin du snyan pa la sogs
219b6(phal chen): pa dang / chos kyi dbyings gzhi tha dad pa la sogs pa dang / sgrib pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par thar pa la sogs pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi
219b7(phal chen): dge ba'i sems yang dag par 'byung ba la sogs pa dang / khyad par yod pa'i brgyan la sogs pa dang / chags pa med pa'i tshul gyi snying po la sogs pa dang /
219b8(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa dang / sems kyi mdzod la sogs pa dang / kun tu mos pa mngon par sbubs pa'i snying po la sogs pa dang / shes
220a1(phal chen): @rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo brgya steng grangs med panon pa'i phyir te/ bza' shing gi rab nyi ma'i mdog der byang chub sems
220a2(phal chen): dpa' 'am/ sems can gzhan ji snyed cig dge slong ma seng ge rnam par sgyings pa la lta ba dang chos nyan pa dang / phyir 'ongs pa de dag thams cad kyang /
220a3(phal chen): sngon dge slong ma seng ge rnam par sgyings pas dge ba'i chos yang dag par blang ba la bkod pa nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir
220a4(phal chen): mi ldegs pa'i bar du byas pa sha stag go/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi dge slong ma seng ge rnam par sgyings pa'i bza' shing gi ra ba phun sum tshog
220a5(phal chen): ba dang / nags tshal phun sum tshogs pa dang / gtsug lag khang phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'chags pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / longs spyod phun sum
220a6(phal chen): tshogs pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang / dbang chen po phun sum tshogs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa phun sum
220a7(phal chen): tshogs pa dang / dbyangs kyi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa de lta bu mthong ste/ chos kyi tshul bsam gyi mi khyab pa'ang thos nas chos kyi sprin gyi char chen pos
220a8(phal chen): sems mngon par rlan pa de'i yid la dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas bsam pa rnam par dag pa phun sum tshogs par byas kyi da ni g.yas phyogasu
220a9(phal chen): mal cha phun sum tshogs pa dang /
220b1(phal chen): bskor ba lan brgya stong du ma zhig tu bya'o snyam pa dang / de'i mos la dge slong ma seng ge rnam par sgyings pa bza' shing ra ba dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du
220b2(phal chen): bcas pa de dag thams cad kyang snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// de ltar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba bya'o snyam du bsam nas bskor ba byed pa'i tshe//
220b3(phal chen): 'khor thams cad na'ang dge slong ma seng ge rnam par sgyings pa 'dug ma thos nas/ 'dun du 'dug te thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags
220b4(phal chen): ma bdag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa nas/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bgyi
220b5(phal chen): ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags ma ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdam ngag rjes su bstan pa mdzad do// zhes bdag
220b6(phal chen): gis thos nas/ 'phags ma ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la slab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan bya ba bdag la bshad
220b7(phal chen): du gsol des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rlom sems thams cad yongs su bcom pa zhes bya ba thob bo//
220b8(phal chen): smras pa 'phags ma byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i rlom sems thams cad yongs su bcom pa de'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis/ smras pa rig
221a1(phal chen): ngalakyi bu de ni ye shes snang ba ste/ dus gsum du byung ba'i brgyan sems skad cig gi cha shas la rnam par dmigs pa'i rang bzhin
221a2(phal chen): no// smras pa 'phags ma ye shes snang ba de'i yul yang ji lta bu zhig mchis/ smras pa rigs kyi bu kho mos ye shes snang bas 'di la sgrub pa dang / yongasu
221a3(phal chen): bsgrub pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad rab tu 'thad pa zhes bya ba ting nge 'dzin skyes ste/ de ting nge 'dzin thob ma thag tu yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus kyi phyogs bcu
221a4(phal chen): thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams cad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sku tshe gcig gi thogs pa/ dga' ldan gyi pho brang na bzhugs pa thams cad re re la yang /
221a5(phal chen): lus sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i/ rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mchod pa/ rnam pa tha dad pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
221a6(phal chen): kyi brjod pa/ sbyar ba'i phyir 'gro ste/ 'di ltar lus dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang /
221a7(phal chen): lto phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i dbang po'i lus me tog gi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / spos kyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / bdug spos kyi
221a8(phal chen): sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / phreng ba'i sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / byug pa'i sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / bye ma'i sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / na bza'i
221b1(phal chen): sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / bdugs kyi sprin yongasu 'dzin pa dang / rgyal mtshan gyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / ba dan gyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang /
221b2(phal chen): rin po che'i lha ba lhub kyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i dra ba'i rgyan gyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i gnam yol gyi rgyan gyi sprin yongasu
221b3(phal chen): 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i rgyan rnam par phye ba'i sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i sprin ma'i rgyan gyi yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i gdan gyi
221b4(phal chen): rgyan gyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa mchod par sbyar ba'i phyir 'gro'o// dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs/ byang chub sems dpa'i sku tshe gcig gis thogs
221b5(phal chen): pa rnams la mchod par bya ba'i phyir/ ji ltar 'gro ba de bzhin du yul gyi skur gshegs pa dang / bltam pa dang / btsun me'i 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs
221b6(phal chen): pa dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang / snying po byang chub tu gshegs pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas shing snying
221b7(phal chen): po byang chub la zhugs pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro rab tu bskor ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / de bzhin du lha'i gnas na
221b8(phal chen): bzhugs pa dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / mi 'am ci dang / lho phyed chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa gnas na bzhugs
222a1(phal chen): b.lapa nas/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems dang / bsam pa yongs su tshim par mdzad nas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar
222a2(phal chen): de dag thams cad la'ang yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus rnam pa de lta bu'i bdag gi rnam pa de lta bu'i mchod par byed cing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drub tu
222a3(phal chen): 'gro'o// sems can gang gis kho mos sangs rgyas mchod pa dang / rim gro byed pa'i las 'di shes par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa
222a4(phal chen): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro// sems can gang kho mo'i drung du 'ong ba de dag thams cad la 'ang kho mos ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
222a5(phal chen): phyin pa'i gdam ngag rjes su bstan pa 'di nyid ston te/ rigs kyi bu kho mo ye shes kyi mig gis sems can thams cad la lta yang / sems can gyi 'du
222a6(phal chen): shes kyang mi skyed do// rlom sems kyang mi byed do// 'gro ba thams cad kyi skad rgya mtsho'amanyan te/ tshig gi lam thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pas/
222a7(phal chen): rlom sems su byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang mthong ste/ chos kyi yongasu shes pas rlom sems su byed pa'ang med do// de bzhin gshegs
222a8(phal chen): pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su 'dzin kyang chos kyi rang bzhin khong du chud pas rlom sems su byed pa med do// sems kyi skad cig re re la chos
222b1(phal chen): dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs kyang chos nyid rgyu ma'i rang bzhin khong du chud pas rlom sems su byed pa med do// rigs kyi bu kho mos byang chub sems
222b2(phal chen): dpa'i rnam par thar pa rlom sems cad yongs su bcom pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med
222b3(phal chen): pa la zhugs pa/ chos thams cad la rlom sems med par gnas kyang / skyil mo klungs gcig gi chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gyengs pa/
222b4(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rang gi lus su 'dus par ston kyang skad cig gcig gi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'dongs pa/ lus la
222b5(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul thams cad 'byung zhing rgyu ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa spu'i nyags ma cig gi sbams shing
222b6(phal chen): mngon par 'phen pa/ rang gi ba spu'i bu gar 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i 'du ba dang / 'jigs pa'i bskal pa yongs su ston pa/ ska cig
222b7(phal chen): cig la bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par mnyam pa nyid kyi yang dag par 'dzud pa/ skad cig gcig gi brjod du med pa yang brjod
222b8(phal chen): du med pa'i skal bar 'khor bar de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod pa nus re skan// song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di
223a1(phal chen): phalanyid na yul sprod par ka ba na/ grong khyer rin po che'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de na bcom ldan 'das ma lha'i bshes/
223a2(phal chen): gnyen ma zhes bya ba 'dug gi de'i gam du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar
223a3(phal chen): nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gi bu nor bzangs kyi dge slong ma seng ge rnam par sgyings pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/
223a4(phal chen): dge slong ma seng ge rnam par sgyings pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor bA nas yang dang yang bltas te/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par
223a5(phal chen): sgyings pa'i drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs shes rab kyi snang ba chen po des sems can snang bar gyur pa de/ thams cad
223a6(phal chen): mkhyen pa'i ye shes snang ba de la ni/ sems chos nyid rang bzhin gyi stobs snang ba de yang dag par rjes su lta ba/ sems can thams cad kyi skad
223a7(phal chen): rnam par dmigasu mdzod kyi gzungs kyi tshul de ni bstan par byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag par
223a8(phal chen): 'dzin pa'i gzungs kyi tshul 'di ni/ shin du rgya che bar byed snying rje chen po 'gro ba thams cad kyi skyabasu gyur pa'i stobs de ni nye bar ston/ chos
223b1(phal chen): thams cad kyi tshul snang ba'i sgo nas yang dag par byung ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shugs de la ni rab tu rtogs/ chos kyi dbyings rgya chen po'i//
223b2(phal chen): dkyil 'khor rgyas par 'gengs pa'i smon lam yongs su dag pa de'i rjes su ni 'brang / chos thams cad kyi phyogs snang bar byed pa'i/ ye shes
223b3(phal chen): kyi 'od de ni/ shin tu gsal bar byed/ chos thams cad kyi phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par bye ba rgyas par 'gengs pa'i mngon par
223b4(phal chen): shes pa'i stobs de ni mngon par sgrub/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang dran pa thams cad nye bar spangs pas brtsams pa mthar dbyung ba'i smon
223b5(phal chen): de ni yongs su rdzogs par byed cing / mthar gyi yul bgrod par bka' ba'i grong khyer rin po che'i rgyan gang na ba der byin te/ bcom pa ma lha'i
223b6(phal chen): bshes gnyen ma yongs su tshol tshol ba dang / de la bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen gyi yon tan mngon par ma shes la/ ye shes kyi spyod yul gyi tshul
223b7(phal chen): la mi mkhas pa'i mi ji snyed pa de dag 'di snyam du sems te mi 'di ltar zhi zhing dul ba'i dbang po dang ldan pa/ de ltar shes bzhin dang ldan te de
223b8(phal chen): ltar 'khrul pa med cing de ltar yid 'khrug pa med la/ de ltar gnya shing gang tsam du lta ste/ de ltar gnod pas mi tshungs shing / de ltar mtshan mar
224a1(phal chen): ngalami 'dzin la/ gzugs kyi rnam pa thams cad g.yeng ba mig dang ldan te/ yid la brel pa med cing bsam pa zab la
224a2(phal chen): mngon par mdzes te/ rgya mtsho ltar 'dug cing sems mi nyam mi 'khrug pa de la/ bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen mas gnyen mas ko ci zhig
224a3(phal chen): bya/ 'di lta bu dag ni 'dod chags la dga' ba med de sems phyin ci log dang yang mi srid do// 'di lta bu dag la ni mi sdug cing gtsang ba'i 'du
224a4(phal chen): shes yongs su rgyu ba med de/ 'di lta bu dag ni 'dod pas 'khol kyang mi srid do// 'di lta bu dag ni bud med dbang du gyur pa med de/ 'di lta bu
224a5(phal chen): dag ni bdud kyi spyod yul la spyod kyang mi srid do// 'di lta bu dag ni bdud kyi yul la chags pa med do// 'di lta bu dag ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du
224a6(phal chen): bying yang mi srid do// 'di lta bu dag ni bdud kyi zhags pas bcings par 'gyur ba med de/ mi gos pas kyang mi srid do mnyam mo// gang bcom
224a7(phal chen): ma sa lha'i bshes gnyen ma'i yon tan gyi khyed par mngon par shes shing / ye shes kyi spyod yul mngon du gyur pa de dag ni 'di skad ces 'dzer to//
224a8(phal chen): rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen la yongs su dri bar sems pa ni khyod kyang thob par bya ba legs par thob pa ste legs so leg so// /
224b1(phal chen): khyod ni nges par sangs rgyas su ston pa'o// khyod ni bdag nges par sems can thams cad kyi gnas su bsgyur bar 'dod pa'o// khyod ni nges par sems can/
224b2(phal chen): thams cad kyi 'dod chags kyi drug du dbyung bar 'dod pa'o// khyod ni bdag nges par sdug cing gcing gtsang ba'i 'du shes rnam par gtong bar 'dod pa'o//
224b3(phal chen): rigs kyi bu de re bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma ni/ grong khyer gyi lam gyi sum mdo'i byang phyogs logs shig na rang gi khyim na 'dug go// de nas tshong dpon
224b4(phal chen): gyi bu nor bzangs kyi tshig de thos nas dga' rangs te/ mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen pa khyim gang na
224b5(phal chen): ba der phyin nas de'i khyim che zhing yangs la/ rin po che'i rab rim pa bcus bskor ba/ 'obs spos chus gang ba/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i pad mo dang / ud pa
224b6(phal chen): la dang / me tog ku mu ta dang / bun da ri kas chus yongs su khebs pa/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang ba/ gzhi gser gyi phye ma bdal ba/
224b7(phal chen): spos yid du 'ong ba dang 'dres pa'i chus dri zhim pas gang ba/ rin po che'i sil ma mang pos shin du brgyan pa rim pa bcus kun nas bskor ba rin po che thams cad las
224b8(phal chen): byas pa'i khang pa dang / gzhal med khang pa brtsegs pa rnam par dkrigs shing ba gam dang / rtabs dang / skar khung gi shar bu dang / zla gam ser ge'i shing
225a1(phal chen): la@thags dang / snang ba'i rgyal mtshan la sogs pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od kyi 'bar ba/ rin po che'i rnam pa sna tshogs grangs med
225a2(phal chen): ba'i 'byung gnas kyi brgyan pa/ rin po che'i bai DUr+yas sbas pa'i gzhi dang ldan pa/ lha rdzas kyi spos zhim po thams cad kyi 'khor thams cad nas gdugs shing
225a3(phal chen): bsangs pa/ a ga ru gag po mchog gi gdugs spos kyi dri zhim par gdugs pa/ spos kyi byug pas 'khor kun nas byug pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi lan kan
225a4(phal chen): gyi tshig ngos kun du bres pa/ steng 'dzam bu'i klung gi gser gyi dra ba rin po che sna tshogs kyi rab tu sbas pas kun nas bka' pa/ gser gyi dril bu'i dra ba brgya
225a5(phal chen): stong rlung gis skyod cing 'khrol ba'i sgra yid du 'ong / zhing snyan par 'byung ba/ rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi sprin sil ma kun tu bkram pas rin po che'i
225a6(phal chen): me tog gi rgyan dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng bas sgo shin du brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi dra ba mu med par brjod
225a7(phal chen): du yod pa/ rin po che'i bye ru'i sdong po dang rdo rje dang man shel la sogs pa'i gter brgya stong kun gyi shes pa phun sum tshogs pas mdzod mi zad pa dang
225a8(phal chen): ldan pa/ gza' shing gi dra ba chen po bcus brgyan mthong ste/ de nas bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma gzugs mdzes shing / bzung blta na sdug pa
225b1(phal chen): nom pa'i kha dog dam pa rgyas pa dang ldan pa/ gser gyi kha dog ltar 'dug pa'i mdog can/ skra mthon thing du 'dug pa/ lus kyi yan lag nyid lag tshul dang
225b2(phal chen): 'dra bar rnam par grub pa/ 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha dang mi'i thams cad las 'phags pa'i kha dog dang / gzugs dang / dbyibs mdzes pa dang ldan pa/
225b3(phal chen): tshangs pa las kyang 'das pa'i dbyangs kyi yan lag dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sgra skad kyi tshul la mkhas pa/ rgyan thams cad dang ldan zhing yid
225b4(phal chen): du 'ong ba'i dbyangs can rnam par thar pa'i yi ge 'khor lo'i rgyan la mkhas pa dang ldan pa/ gzo dang gtsug lag thams cad la mkhas par byung ba/
225b5(phal chen): chos kyi ye shes sgyu ma la mkhas par bslab pas byang chub sems dpa'i thabs dang tshul rnam pa thams cad du thob pa/ rin po che'i lbab lbub sde tshogs kyi
225b6(phal chen): rnam par brgyan pa'i lus yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ rin po che thams cad las byas pa'i dra ba 'od shin du gsal bas lus rab tu brgyan pa/ lha rdzas
225b7(phal chen): kyi nor bu rin po che'i rgyan dang lhang lhub grangs med pas rab tu rgyan pas lus shin du 'bar ba/ nor bu rin po che dam pa yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i cod pan
225b8(phal chen): thogs pa/ rin po che'i bai DUr+ya'i 'phreng ba mdo bzungs rdo rje rin po che sna tshogs dang / nor bu rin po che'i seng ge mdzes pa sna tshogs skye ba 'gul na
226a1(phal chen): @#thogs pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba spyad pa la skal pa mthun pa dang sngon lam cig pa'i 'khor mang po gzhan gyi mi byed cing yid du
226a2(phal chen): ba dang ldan pa/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po'i ter mi zad pa'i mdzod dang ldan pa 'dug pa thong ste/ des khyim de dag thams cad dang /
226a3(phal chen): rin po che'i gnas dang gzhal med khang gi rgyan de dag thams cad kyang / rang gi lus las byung ba'i 'od dga' bar byed pa/ lus bde ba dang sems khong nas
226a4(phal chen): dga' bar byed pas gsal shing snang bar byas pa mthong ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma'i rkang pa gnyis
226a5(phal chen): la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags ma bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
226a6(phal chen): byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma
226a7(phal chen): 'tshal te/ 'phags ma ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do// zhes bdag gis thos na/ ji ltar byang
226a8(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslabs par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba 'phags ma dag la stan du gsol/ des smras pa rigs kyi bu
226b1(phal chen): kho mos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar phyin pa zhes bya ba thos ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mas ni lha rnams/
226b2(phal chen): la lha mo'i gzugs dang / kha dog dang dbyibs dang / chu zheng las kyang lhag par kha dog bsal ba dang / rnam par dag cing mos pa bzhin du snang bar
226b3(phal chen): byed do// de bzhin du klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lto phye chen po dang mi dang ma yin pa rnams
226b4(phal chen): la yang / bud med kyi gzugs dang kha dog dang dbyibs dang / chu zheng lhag par 'od bsal zhing rnam par dag pas ji ltar mos pa bzhin du snang bar
226b5(phal chen): byed do// sems can gang 'dod chags kyi kun nas 'khor ba'i sems dang ldan pa dag kho mo'i drung du 'ongs na yang / de dag thams cad la kho mo ni
226b6(phal chen): 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ba'i phyir chos ston to// de dag gi chos de thos nas 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems
226b7(phal chen): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chags pa med pa zhes bya ba 'ang rab tu thob bo// la la ni kho mo mthong ma thag tu 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur te/ byang chub
226b8(phal chen): sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dga' ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'ang rab tu thob po// la la ni gtam byas pa tsam gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba mthong bar
227a1(phal chen): bzob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bral
227a2(phal chen): 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chags pa'i dbyings zhes bya ba'ang rab tu 'thob bo// la la ni lag nas
227a3(phal chen): bzung ba tsam gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba 'thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rjes su 'gro zhing
227a4(phal chen): gnas pa zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob bo// la la ni gcig tu 'grogs pa tsam gyi 'dod chags dang bral bas snang ba zhes bya ba yang rab tu thob bo//
227a5(phal chen): la la ni bltas pa tsam gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba 'thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu zhi ba'i rnam pa'i rgyan zhes bya
227a6(phal chen): bar 'ang rab tu 'thob bo// la ni glang ba tsam gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba 'thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin pas kyi rgol ba
227a7(phal chen): rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba yang 'thob po// la la ni mi gtsug pa tsam gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba 'thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge
227a8(phal chen): 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi yul snang ba zhes bya ba'ang rab tu thob bo// la la ni srang du khyad pa tsam gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub
227a9(phal chen): sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bsdud cing / mi stong pa'i snying po zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob po// la la ni 'o byas pa tsam gyi
227b1(phal chen): 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad bsod nams kyi mdzod la reg par byed pa zhes bya ba
227b2(phal chen): yang rab tu 'thob bo// de ltar kho ma ni sems can gang ji snyed cig kho mo'i drung du 'ong ba de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa
227b3(phal chen): 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar phyin pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa chags pa med pa la mngon du gyur pa 'di nyid la rab tu 'god do// smras pa 'phags ma
227b4(phal chen): khyod de lta bu'i phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa de khyod dge ba'i rtsa ba ni gang du skyed/ phrin las ni ci lta bu zhig rtsegs/ smras pa rigs kyi bu kho mos dran
227b5(phal chen): na/ 'das pa'i dus shig na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar
227b6(phal chen): gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa bla na med pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shin tu tho bar
227b7(phal chen): gshegs pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa shin du mtho bar gshegs pa de/ sems can rnams la thugs rtse ba'i don du rnam
227b8(phal chen): pa'i gnas na bzang ba zhes bya 'angag shig su nam pa'i bam pa la nabs kyi ldan pa'i rtse grong khyer de rnams cad kyang rab tu g.yis nas yang shing
228a1(phal chen): ba la rin po che du ma las byas par yongs su sgrub par 'gyur te/ steng gi bar snang yang rin po che mang po'i 'od kyi rnam par brgyan
228a2(phal chen): pa dang / rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs kyi yongs su gang ba dang / lha rdzas kyi rol mo sna tshogs kyi sgra rab tu 'byung ba dang / lha'i lus kyi sprin tshad
228a3(phal chen): med par rgya che bas mkhyab par gyur to// rigs kyi bu kho mo yang de'i tshe tshong dpon gyi chung ma shin tu gyur te/ blo gros bzang mo zhes bya'o// de nas kho mo
228a4(phal chen): cho 'phrul gyi yang dag skul nas khyim thabs dang lhan cig 'dod 'dong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa grong bar gyi srang du gshegs pa la dad pa chen po skyes
228a5(phal chen): te kho mos rin po che'i dril bu gcig cig pu'o// de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu mtho bar
228a6(phal chen): gshegs pa'i zhabs ring na 'dug ste/ des kho mos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// rigs kyi bu kho mos byung
228a7(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i bar byin pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa' thabs dang ye shes
228a8(phal chen): mtha' yas pa la gnas pa bsod nams brgya che zhing yangs pa'i mdzod dang ldan pa/ ye shes kyi yul thub pa med pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am yon/
228b1(phal chen): tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di ni/ grong khyer dge ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba yod des/ de nas khyim bdag/
228b2(phal chen): nan khug zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten tsan dan gyi khri 'bang can la mchod pa byed pa zhig 'dug gi/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang
228b3(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la slab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi bcom pa ma lha'i
228b4(phal chen): bshes gnyen ma'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma la la na brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor
228b5(phal chen): ba byas nas yang dang yang ltas te/ bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma'i drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi grong khyor dge ba'i
228b6(phal chen): pha rol tu phyin par khyim bdag nan khugs kyi khyim gang na ba der phyin nas/ khyim bdag nan lugs kyi rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/ mdun du
228b7(phal chen): 'dug nas thal me sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed ni
228b8(phal chen): ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyong ba la bslab par bgyid pa dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'bigs pa/
229a1(phal chen): phal/ ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang / rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ ji ltar
229a2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan du bgyi ba 'phags pas bdag la bshad du gsol//
229a3(phal chen): des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa yongasu mi zad pa thob bo// rigs kyi bu kho bo'i sems kyi rgyud las ni/
229a4(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nas kyang sems can 'dul ba'i dbang du mdzad pa ma togs par 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nas kyang shin du mya nga
229a5(phal chen): las 'das pa'i tshul du/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa med do// yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba med do// rigs kyi
229a6(phal chen): bu kho bo ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten tsan dan gyi khri 'phangs kyi mgo 'byed pa ste/ kho bo mchod rten gyis sgo 'byed pas/ byang chub sems
229a7(phal chen): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi zad pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba 'thob bo// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid la sems kyi skad cig skud
229a8(phal chen): cig tu mnyam par bzhog ste/ sems kyi skad cig thams cad la'ang khyad par gyi rnam pa du ma rab tu thob po// spras pa 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin de
229b1(phal chen): yul gyi ji lta bu zhig mchis/ smras pa rigs kyi bu kho bo ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'i tshe/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'di sangs rgyas
229b2(phal chen): gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa bsod nams skyabs la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / gser thub dang / log pa dang sel dang /
229b3(phal chen): thams cad mnga' ba dang / gtsug stor dang / rnam par gzigs dang / rgyal dang rdzogs mdzad dang / grags chog dang / pad mo bla la sogs pa
229b4(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang / sangs rgyas mthong ba tsam 'brel bas/ sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pas/ sangs rgyas gcig
229b5(phal chen): nas gcig tu rgyud pa rgyun mi chad pa'i tshul gyi mngon sum du mthong ste sems kyi skad cig gcig las sangs rgyas brgya'ang mthong ngo // de'i 'og ma'i
229b6(phal chen): sems kyi sangs rgyas stong yang mthong ngo // de'i 'og ma'i sems kyi sangs rgyas brgya phrag stong yang mthong ngo // de bzhin du sangs rgyas bye ba dang /
229b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgya dang / sangs rgyas bye ba phrag stong dang / sangs rgyas bye ba rgya phrag stong dang / sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dang / sangs rgyas
229b8(phal chen): bye ba dung phyuphyar dang / sangs rgyas bye ba thams cad thams cad dang / sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dang / de'i 'og ma'i sems kyi sangs rgyas 'byung
230a1(phal chen): #/ bcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa brjod du med pa dag kyang mthong ngo // de'i 'og ma'i sems kyi de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam du/
230a2(phal chen): gling gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyang mthong ngo // de'i 'og ma'i sems kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i bar gyi rdul shin du
230a3(phal chen): phra ba snyed kyang mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis thugs dang po bskyed pa'i tshogs gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa la'ang 'jug go// thug
230a4(phal chen): dang po bskyed pas thob pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa la'ang 'jug go/ smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa mngon par sgrub pa rnam par dag pa'ang 'jug
230a5(phal chen): spyod pa rnam par dag pa la'ang 'jug go/ pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa la 'ang 'jug go/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa thad
230a6(phal chen): yongs su sgrub pa'ang 'jug go/ bzod pa snyed pa rnam par dag pa la'ang 'jug go/ bdud kyi khrug ma rnam par thor ba'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung
230a7(phal chen): ba la 'jug go/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa la'ang 'jug go/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par dag par mdzad de rnam
230a8(phal chen): bar tha dad pa la'ang 'jug/ sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa rnam pa tha dad pa la'ang 'jug go/ 'khor kun nas 'dus pa tha dad pa
230b1(phal chen): la'ang 'jug go/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa la'ang 'jug go// chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba'i khyu mchog gi mthu byung ba la'ang 'jug//
230b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul la 'jug go/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi chos bstan pa la yang shin tu
230b3(phal chen): rnam par bsal ba dang / ma 'dres par dran pa te yang dag par 'dzin to// dran pas yongasu bcangaso// rigs pas rab tu shes par byed do// blo grom
230b4(phal chen): kyi shin tu rnam par 'byed do// blos rtogs par byed do// shes rab kyi snang bar byed do// ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa'i bya ba
230b5(phal chen): pa la sogs pa dag kyang mthong zhing shes te/ sems kyi skad cig cig la/ sangs rgyas brgya 'ang mthong ngo // de'i 'og ma'i sems kyi sangs rgyas stong yang
230b6(phal chen): mthong ba nas/ de'i 'og ma'i sems kyi de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag kyang
230b7(phal chen): mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi thugs dang po bskyed pa'i tshogs cig tu rgyud pa'i 'ang 'jug go/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi chos snyan pa
230b8(phal chen): yang shin tu gsol ba dang / ma 'dres par rjes su dran te/ yang dag par 'dzin to// dran pas yongasu bcangaso// rigs pas rab tu shes par byed do//
231a1(phal chen): b.lablo gros rnam par 'byed do// blo rtags par byed do// shes rab kyi pha snang bar byed do// ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud de/ sngon gyi/
231a2(phal chen): mtha' dang phyi ma'i mthar rtogs pa'i sems sangs rgyas cig nas cig tu rgyud pa mthong zhing shes pa de dag bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'das
231a3(phal chen): pa/ ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa cig nas cig tu rgyud pa thams cad kyang shes shing mthong ngo // de bzhin
231a4(phal chen): gshegs pa de dag gi thugs dang po bskyed pa'i tshogs cig nas cig tu rgyud pa la'ang 'jug go/ sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa de la'ang rgyun mi chad
231a5(phal chen): pa dang / mi zad pa dang / dad pas shes par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus dang / zhe non pas khong du chud pa'i bya ba dang / byang chub sems
231a6(phal chen): dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi shugs rnam par 'phel bar byed pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / de'i yul la
231a7(phal chen): ma zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mi phog par shes shing khong du chud par byed do// rnam par snang ba la sogs pa da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs
231a8(phal chen): pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa cig nas cig tu rgyud pa thams cad mthong shing shes te/ sems kyi skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas brgya
231b1(phal chen): 'ang mthong zhing shes so// de'i 'og ma'i sems kyi sangs rgyas stong yang mthong nas/ de'i 'og ma'i sems kyi de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du
231b2(phal chen): med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bar du 'ang mthong ste/ nam na de bzhin gshegs pa gang gi zhal lta bar dga' ba de'i tshe 'ang de bzhin du
231b3(phal chen): mthong ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bstan pa dang / bstan par mdzad pa dang / bstan par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang thos so// mthong
231b4(phal chen): nas kyang 'dzin to// dran pas yongs su bcang so// rigs pas rab tu shes par byed do// blo gros kyi rnam par 'byed do// blo rtogs par byed do// shes
231b5(phal chen): rab kyi snang bar byed do// rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'i mthar byin pa 'di shes par zad
231b6(phal chen): nas kho bros byang chub sems dpa' dus gsum skad cig gcig tu shes pa'i rab tu thob pa/ skad cig cha shad la ting nge 'dzin rnam par phye ba la spyod pa/
231b7(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma la phyung ba/ rtog pa la rnam par rtogs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa tham cad dang mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin rjes
231b8(phal chen): rtogs pa/ bdag dang sems can dang sangs rgyas mi dmigs par spyod pa/ rang bzhin gyi 'od bsal ba'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa/ ye shes kyi
232a1(phal chen): pal/ 'khrul 'khor gyi 'jig rten gyi dra ba dgyengs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho thams cad dang / mi 'gal bar rnam par spyod
232a2(phal chen): pa chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rnam par rtog par byed pa'i ye shes yul dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos bstan pa rnam par rig par byed
232a3(phal chen): ba'i ye shes kyi yul can de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod pa nus re kan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na
232a4(phal chen): ri gru 'dzin ces bya ba yod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po zhes bya ba 'dug gi/ de'i gnas su song la ji ltar byang chub
232a5(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ zhes na de'i tshe tshigs su gcad pa 'di nyis smras so// song shig nor
232a6(phal chen): bzangs dpal gyi chu rgyal dpung zhig na/ mkhas pa rnams kyi ri rgyal gru 'dzin mdzes pa yod/ rin chen rgyud byas shing dang nag tshal me tog mang / @
232a7(phal chen): shing ra brdzid dang chu phran 'bab par ldan/ ri mchog de la snyan pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang / 'gro ba rnams la phan pa'i don du rnam par spyod/ de
232a8(phal chen): gan song dang nor bzangs khyod la mgon po'i// yon tan rgya chen tshul la 'jug par byed/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi khyim bdag nan khru
232b1(phal chen): kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ khyim bdag nan khugs la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ yang dang yang /
232b2(phal chen): ltas nas khyim bdag nan khugs kyi drung nas song ngo // shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las sdong pos rgyan pa//
232b3(phal chen): / dam po dgu bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// // de nas chongs
232b4(phal chen): dpon gyi bu nor bzangs khyim bdag nan khugs kyi gdams ngag rjes su sems shig byang chub sems dpa'i mos pa'i mdzod de ni shes par byed do// byang
232b5(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i rjes su dran pa'i stobs de ni rjes su dran par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul cig tu sa gcig tu rgyud pa'i stobs ni yang dag par 'dzin//
232b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas cig nas cig tu rgyud pa'i mtshams ni khong du chud bar byed do// rnam thos pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tsan de dag gi rjes su 'brang / sangs rgyas kyi
232b7(phal chen): chos tan pa'i de dang ni mthun par byed// sangs rgyas yang dag pa'i rgyan de ni khong du chud par byed/ sangs rgyas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i khyu ma
232b8(phal chen): gi mthu phyung ba de la ni/ yid ches par byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i phrin las bsam gyi mi khyab pa de ni mngon du byed cing / mthar gyi ri gru 'dzin ga
233a1(phal chen): na ba der 'ong nas gru 'dzin gyi steng du phyin te/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po yongasu med cing tshol tshol
233a2(phal chen): ba las/ nub phyogs logs kyi rigs sman ma ljongs mtsho dang mtshe'u dang / 'bab chus mdzes par gyur pa dang / bai DUr+ya ngon po'i dkyil 'khor ltar
233a3(phal chen): sngo zhing 'jam pa la bzhon pa'i spang nags tshal chen po mthong nas 'jug pa zhig na/ rin po che rdo rje rdo zhig na dkyil mo dkrus bcas te 'dug zhing / rin
233a4(phal chen): po che sna tshogs kyi rdo stengs la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dpag tu med pas kun nas skor cing chos ston te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'gro ba
233a5(phal chen): thams cad yongs su sdud pa'i yul byams pa chen po'i sgo gsal bar ston pa zhes bya bar yang dag par ston cing 'jug pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang
233a6(phal chen): dga' rangs te mgu zhing skams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba bskyed nas dga' ba skyes shing mi 'dzum pa'i mig gi thal me sbyar nas/ dge ba'i bshes ga
233a7(phal chen): la dad pa'i shugs dang ldan pas sems mi khrug pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong na/ sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar 'dzin pa/ dge ba'i gnyen
233a8(phal chen): gnyen las byang ba'i chos kyi sprin thams cad yang dag par bzung ba'i 'du shes dang ldan pa yon tan dang nan tan thams cad dge ba'i gshes gnyen la/
233b1(phal chen): rag lus pa'i 'du shes can/ dge ba'i gshes gnyen dang phrad pa shin tu dka' bar sems pa dge ba'i gshes gnyen la stobs bcu'i ye shes rin
233b2(phal chen): po che 'byung zhing thob par 'gyur ba'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i gshes gnyen las ye shes snang ba mi zad pa 'byung ba'i 'du shes can/ dge
233b3(phal chen): ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tan gyi bsod nams kyi rgyun rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni thams cad
233b4(phal chen): mkhyen pa nyid kyi sgo yang dag par ston pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i gshes gnyen ni ye shes kyi rgya mtsho chen po la 'jug pa'i yongasu ston
233b5(phal chen): par 'du shes pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs yang dag par 'dus pa yongs su skyed pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pa ste//
233b6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po gang na ba der phyin to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos//
233b7(phal chen): tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi ring zhig nas tshur 'ong ba mthong nas/ smras pa tshur shog dpe med pa'i theg pa chen po dang yangs shing bsam gyi mi khyab
233b8(phal chen): ba la zhugs pa la zhugs pa/ skye ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyi gtser shing skyabs med par 'gyur ba'i 'gro ba thams cad yongs su
234a1(phal chen): phagasu/ skyabs pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon sum du gyur pa/ 'jig rten thams cad las
234a2(phal chen): 'das te dpe med tshad med pa la mngon par mos pa/ snying rje chen po byin gyi rlabs pas 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyabs pa'i blo gros can/ blta na
234a3(phal chen): kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la mngon tu ltas pa/ smon lam chen po'i dkyil 'khor yongasu sbyang ba'i sems dang ldan pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi
234a4(phal chen): sprin yongs su bzung bar mos pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pas yongs su mi shes bsam pa dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdam ngag
234a5(phal chen): la yang dag par zhugs pa/ 'jam dpal ye shes brgya mtsho las byung ba'i yon tan gyi gnas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs thob par bya ba la mngon du
234a6(phal chen): ltas pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi snang ba dang / shugs rab tu thob pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprin gyi char yang dag par bzungs pa la mngon par mos pa'i
234a7(phal chen): sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas mthong bas dag pa dang mos pa'i shugs kyi yid rab tu bde bar 'gyur ba legs par spyod par tshad med cing bsam gyi
234a8(phal chen): mi khyab pa'i shugs kyi mngon par rlan pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ yon tan la nan tan du bya ba'i shugs kyi rnam par dag pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes
234b1(phal chen): kyi mdzod bdag la mngon du gyur pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i lam gyi shugs gzhan la yongs su bstan pa'i bsam pa can/ snying rje chen
234b2(phal chen): po'i shugs ma nyams pa'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes snang ba'i shugs yang dag par bzung ba'i blo gros can khyod 'ongs pa
234b3(phal chen): legs so// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po gang na ba der song nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
234b4(phal chen): spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas
234b5(phal chen): phyogasu su bskor ba byas nas mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
234b6(phal chen): ba'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la brlab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du
234b7(phal chen): bgyi ba ma 'tshal te 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do// zhes bya bdag gi thos nas/ ji ltar
234b8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la brlab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba 'phags pas bdag la bshad du gsol/ de nas byang chub sems
235a1(phal chen): pal#dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos mdog 'dzam bu'i chu klung gi gser gyi mdog du 'dug pa 'od kyi dra ba sna tshogs tshad med
235a2(phal chen): ba phro ba'i rgyan sprin rab tu 'gyed pa'i lag pa kyeng ste/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po las byung ba'i 'od zer sna tshogs dri ma med pa/ lus dang sems kyi bde
235a3(phal chen): ba tshad med pa'i rab tu skyed pa'i tshogs kyi shin tu rgyas pa'i lag pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi spyi bo la bzhags te/ 'di skad ces smras so// rigs
235a4(phal chen): kyi bu de ltar khyod ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed pa legaso legs so// rigs kyi bu de ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i
235a5(phal chen): sgo snying rje chen po'i sgo thogs pa med pa zhes bya bar shes te/ rigs kyi bu nga'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo snying rje chen po'i sgo thogs pa med pa
235a6(phal chen): de na/ 'gro ba thams cad la dbye bar byed par sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / 'dul ba la zhugs pa sgo kun nas thos shing rnam par rigs
235a7(phal chen): par 'gyur bas sems can yongs su sdu ba dang 'dul ba nye bar gnas pa ste/ rigs kyi bu nga byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo// snying rje chen po'i
235a8(phal chen): sgo thog pa med pa la gnas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sems can thams cad kyi sgos pa la
235b1(phal chen): 'ang ta gon du gnas te/ sbyin pas kyang sems can yong su sdud do// ngag snyan pa dang don bya ba dang don mthun pas kyang sems can yongs su sdud do//
235b2(phal chen): gzugs kyi lus rnam par snyan pas sems can yongasasu smin par byed do// kha dog dang dbyibs dang / gzugs bsam gyi mi khyab pa stan te/ rnam par
235b3(phal chen): dmigs par bya ba dang / 'od zer gyi dra bas kyang sems can rab tu sim par byed cing yongasu smin par byed do// bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dbyangs brtse/
235b4(phal chen): pa dang / ci la yang dga' ba'i spyod lam yong su bstan pa dang / mos pa sna tshogs dang tshul mthun par chos bstan pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par
235b5(phal chen): 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang / dge ba'i chos bsags par bag gi byed pa'i sems can gyi sems yongs su bskul ba dang / bsam pa dang
235b6(phal chen): mthun par sprul pa sna tshogs tshad med pa yong su ston pa dang / rigs sna tshog su skyes pa'i sems can rnams dang bskal ba mthun pa'i gzugs
235b7(phal chen): yongasu snyan pa dang / gnas cig tu 'grog pas kyang sems can yongasu bsdus shing yongasu smin par byed do// rigs kyi bu de ltar ngas byang chub sems
235b8(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo snying rje chen po'i sgo thogs pa med pa 'di yongs su sbyang bas 'gro ba thams cad rab tu ston pa'i smon lam bskyed nas/ 'di ltar
236a1(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi g.yang sa'i 'jigs pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs pa zhi bar bya ba dang /
236a2(phal chen): sems can tha mas cad kyi sgo spongs pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par zlog pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi bcings pa'i 'jigs pa yongs su
236a3(phal chen): bcang ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi srog la bab par mi med pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par zlog pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi yo
236a4(phal chen): byad kyi 'phong ba'i 'jigs pa bsal ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi tshogs med pa'i 'jigs pa zhi bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad
236a5(phal chen): kyi grags pa med pa'i 'jigs pa las yongs su bzla ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / sems can
236a6(phal chen): thams cad kyi 'khor du bag tsha ba'i 'jigs pa med par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad mchi ba'i 'jigs pa'i las rnam par bzla ba dang / sems
236a7(phal chen): can thams cad kyi ngan song gi 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi lam mun pa nyams nga phyir mi ldog pa'i snang bas bsal
236a8(phal chen): bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi bskal pa mi nyams pa dang / 'gro ba'i 'jigs pa shin tu gsal ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi sdug
236b1(phal chen): pa dang bral ba'i 'jigs pa 'gags par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi mi sdug pa dang / 'grogs pa 'jigs pa med par bya ba dang / sems can
236b2(phal chen): thams cad lus la mi bde ba'i 'jigs pa dang bral bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad sems la mi bde ba'i 'jigs pa las bsgrol ba dang / sems
236b3(phal chen): can thams cad sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrugs pa las yongs su bzla ba'i phyir yongs su thams cad rab tu tan pa'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub
236b4(phal chen): pa 'di byas so// sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs pa rnam par zhi bar bya ba'i phyir yang 'jig rten du rje su dran pa'i sgo byin gyi brlabaso// sems can
236b5(phal chen): thams cad 'jigs pa dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir/ rang gi min gyis 'khor lo yang 'jig rten du rnam par dmigs par byas so// dus ji lta bu bzhin du
236b6(phal chen): 'gro ba'i rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i phyir/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi rnam pa'i bye brag mtha' yas pa dang / mnyam par nga'i lus kyang byin gyi brlab so// /
236b7(phal chen): rigs kyi bu de ltar nga ni thabs 'dis sems can thams cad 'jig pa las yongasu bkrol zhing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad thob par bya ba'i phyir/ bla na med
236b8(phal chen): pa yang dag par rdzogaso pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / phyir mi ldog par byed do// rigs kyi bu ngas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo snying rje chen po
237a1(phal chen): palasgo thogs pa med pa 'di thob par zad na/ ngas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po rnams sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon
237a2(phal chen): lam gyi dkyil 'khor lo rnam par dag/ byang chub sems dpa' dang kun tu bzangs po'i spyod pa khong du chud par rtogs pa dge ba'i chos mngon par 'du bya ba
237a3(phal chen): rgyun mi gcod pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rgyud la rtag tu snyam par bzhag pa/ bskal ba thams cad du gnas
237a4(phal chen): shing spyod pa las phyir mi ldog pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa/ dus gsum thams cad kyi tshul rjes su rtogs pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten khams thams cad kyi klong
237a5(phal chen): yongasu khyil ba'i rgyud la mkhas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi mi dge ba'i sems rnam par zhi bar byed pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dge
237a6(phal chen): ba'i semos yongasu 'phel ba'i rgyud dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor ba'i rgyun las phyir mi ldog par byed pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa/ de dag
237a7(phal chen): gis spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// g.yas phyogs bskor ba byas te/ gus par kun tod na/ nor bzang
237a8(phal chen): shin tu dul ba lho phyogs rgyud du song // spyan ras gzigs dbang drang srong snying rje rnam spyod pa// rin chen ri'i sul na gnas pa des kyang mthong / rin chen
237b1(phal chen): sna tshogs rdo rje ri'i sman ljongs na/ pad mo'i seng ge'i khri la bstan pa 'dug/ lha dang lha min klu dang srin po mi 'am ci/ rgyal ba'i sras kyi bskor cing de la
237b2(phal chen): chos kyang bston// mthong nas nor bzangs dga' med skyed par 'gyur// bstan te yon tan rgya mtsho rkang la phyag 'tshal nas// ji nas bzangs po'i spyod
237b3(phal chen): ba bdag gi thob 'gyur bar// 'phags pas thugs rjes bskyed des gdams shing srab par gsol// bsod nams rgyas pas brgyan pa'i dri med lag
237b4(phal chen): kyang te// 'od sprin 'dra ba rgya chen bzangs po rab ston nas// nor bzangs spyi bor bzhag te sems can rnam dag pa/ spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po
237b5(phal chen): mkhas pas tshig 'di smras// sangs rgyas sras po da ni rnam par cig sgo shes/ ye shes snying po rgyal ba kun gyi thugs rje 'jug/ 'gro ba thams cad skyabs
237b6(phal chen): cing yongs su sdu phyir 'byung // kun tu bdag nyid rang la byams pa bzhin du rgyu// 'gro ba sdang thams cad sdug bsngal kun las skyong // gang rnams dam
237b7(phal chen): du bcings shing dgra lag byin pa dang // lus la bzer cing de bzhin brtson rang bcud pa yang nga'i ming thos bcing shing bzung ba thar par 'gyur// rgyal
237b8(phal chen): bo bdag la nyes pa'i g.yon byas bsad spangs pa// de tshe dag nga'i ming yang dran gyur na// 'da' spangs de'i lus la phog par mi 'gyur te/ mtshon no/
238a1(phal chen): phalabatab kyang de dag mi 'jug 'gal bar 'gyur// dbang po'i 'khor du phyin dang gang rnams rtsod gyur pa// dgra rnams kun las
238a2(phal chen): rgyal 'gyur grags pa thob par 'gyur/ grags dang grogs dang rigs dang nor rnams 'phel bar 'gyur// nga'i ming 'dren de dag thub pa med par 'gyur/
238a3(phal chen): gang gi nga'i ming ni rje su dran byas nas// de dag kun pos 'jigs dogs dgras 'jigs nags phyin ste// seng ge dom gzigs can zan g.yag rgod
238a4(phal chen): sbrul gang yang // dgra rnams kun las rgyal zhing 'jigs pa med par 'gyur// gang rnams la las nga'i ming zhig dran byas nas// sdang ba'i sems kyi rin
238a5(phal chen): chen ljongasu bor gyur tam// so la bdag ci med rab tu 'bar bar bor gyur kyang // me rnams pad+mos gang ba'i chu'i rter du 'gyur// nga'i ming ni ska cig yud
238a6(phal chen): tsam rjes dran na// rgya mtsho chu bor de'i nang du 'chi mi 'gyur// chu bos mi khyer me'i dbu su tshig mi 'gyur// don med kun mi 'gyur don rnams 'grub pa
238a7(phal chen): 'gyur// shing sgrog yig cing sdug sgrog de bzhin ltung rnams dang // bsnyas shing khyas pas bsad de bzhin brin shing slus pa dang // spyod shing bsdig
238a8(phal chen): te be shes dang spa ba ba rnam pa las/ nga'i ming tsam dran par byas nas thar pa thob// gang rnams shar snyan sna tshogs glag lta ji snyed dang / gang rnams
238b1(phal chen): rtag tu zhe sdang mi snyan brjod pa'i rnams// nga'i ming thos dran byas snyan pa brjod par 'gyur// mthong ba tsam gyi mod la byas pa'i sems kyang skye/
238b2(phal chen): nga'i ming tsam la la gang gi dran byas na// gnod pa'i don du ro langs sngags dang byad byed pa'i// dgra rnams rtag tu de'i zil gyi non par 'gyur/ ma
238b3(phal chen): lus dug gi de'i lus la mi tshugaso// la la gang gi nga'i ming tsam dran byas na/ klu dbang srin tshogs mkha' lding sha za thams cad dang // grul bum srul
238b4(phal chen): po mtshe byed gdums pa'i sems ldan pa/ mdangs 'bregs 'jig byed rmi lam 'ong 'ang zhi bar 'gyur/ nga'i ming ni ska cig yud tsam dran byas kyang //
238b5(phal chen): pa dang ma dang mnyan shes 'dza' ba kun dang yang bral bar mi 'gyur sdungs dang 'grogs par de bzhin min/ nor bzangs mi 'gyur 'phongs pa'i dngos su
238b6(phal chen): mi 'gyur ro// nga'i ming gi rje su la la dran byas na/ 'di ni shi 'phos mnar med sems dmyal mi 'gro ste// byol song skye gnas yid dgas mi khom gnasu
238b7(phal chen): min/ sems can dag pa lha dang mi'i gan su skye// nga'i ming ni la la gang gi dran byas na/ dmus long zhar ba 'on pa zha bor mi 'gyur gsal smra ba lta sdug
238b8(phal chen): 'gyur// bskal pa bya ba mang po dbang po kun ldan 'gyur// la la gyis nga'i ming ni rjes dran na/ sems can dag pa 'di nas shis pos phyogs
239a1(phal chen): #bcu'i// 'jig rten khamasu sangs rgyas mngon gsum skye bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas mthong 'gyur de dag chos kyang thos par
239a2(phal chen): 'gyur/ 'di dang de bzhin gzhan dag thabs mang ji snyed kyi/ 'gro bar sems can ngan thul gzhal dang zad mi nus// sangs rgyas sras po ngas ni rnam
239a3(phal chen): thar gcig bsgoms te// yon tan can gyi yon tan thams cad ngas mi shes// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba zhes bya ba shar
239a4(phal chen): phyogs nas nam mkha'i dbyings las 'ongs te/ mi 'jed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor yug gi rtse mor 'dug/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan
239a5(phal chen): du mi sems dpa'/ mi 'jed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi yug gi rtse mo la rkang pa gnyis bor mi 'jed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug du g.yos
239a6(phal chen): te/ rin po che du ma'i rang bzhin du kun nas par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba des/ nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'ong thams cad zi
239a7(phal chen): gyi non pa dang / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lto phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs
239a8(phal chen): ba dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon po dang / me dang rin po che dang / glog dang skar ma'i tshogs 'od kyang zil gyi non pa de lta bu'i 'od lus las skye ste/
239b1(phal chen): sems can dmyal ba chen po dag kyang snang bar byas/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud thibs po thams cad kyang
239b2(phal chen): snang bar byas te/ ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad kyang de ma thag tu zhi'o// sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa yang nyam su mi gnod
239b3(phal chen): par gyur to// mya ngan gyi zug du dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyang rtse zil bar gyur te// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad 'ang rin po che'i sprin gyi char
239b4(phal chen): pha ba te/ me tog dang spos dang gdugs pa dang / phreng ba byug pa dang / phye ma dang / nam bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi
239b5(phal chen): brgyan thams cad dang ldan pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char yang mngon par phab ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song na/ de'i lus
239b6(phal chen): de'i gzugs brnyen ni sems can thams can gyi gan su snang ba de/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sim par byed pa la mngon par gzhol bas ri gru 'dzin/
239b7(phal chen): de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i drung du'ang phyin par snang ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dang
239b8(phal chen): bos// da pon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smra so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyi byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di
240a1(phal chen): palaphyin par mthong ngam// smras pa 'phags pa mthong ngo // smras pa rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i
240a2(phal chen): gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la slab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan tu bya ba dris shig de nas tshong
240a3(phal chen): dpon gyi bu nor bzangs byang chub sems dpa' spyad ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa'
240a4(phal chen): spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyeg su skor ba byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang po'i drung
240a5(phal chen): nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin snyed pa'i byang chub
240a6(phal chen): sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po lta bas kyang ma ngoms bzhin du sgo ba dang ma 'gal bar/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba ga
240a7(phal chen): na ba der song ste/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ 'dun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te 'di
240a8(phal chen): skad smra so// 'phags pa bdag gi bla na med pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub dang/
240b1(phal chen): spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tu gyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjesu brtan
240b2(phal chen): pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la slab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba 'phags
240b3(phal chen): pas bdag la bshad du gsol/ des smras pa rigs kyi bu nga ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgo kun tu 'gro ba thos pa'o// smras pa 'phags
240b4(phal chen): pa khyod kyi de bzhin gshegs pa gang gi drang nas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgo kun tu 'gro ba zhes bgyi ba 'di snyed 'jig kyi khams de ni ji srid/
240b5(phal chen): cig na mchis/ 'jig rten gyi khams de nas bzhud nas ni ji srid cig lags/ smras pa rigs kyi bu gnas 'di ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
240b6(phal chen): 'jig rten dang / dge sbyong dang / bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgus kyang shes par bka' ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang / byang chub sems
240b7(phal chen): dpa'i brtson 'grus mi ldog pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mi 'phrog pa'i yul te/ de ni rigs kyi bu dge ba'i gshes gnyen gyi yongasu ma zin
240b8(phal chen): pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ma dgongs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bsags pa bsam pa yongasu ma dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po ma thob pa/ shes rab kyi
241a1(phal chen): phalamig dang mi ldan pa rnams kyi thos pa 'am yongs su bzung ba 'am/ yid ches pa 'am/ khong du chud par bya ba mi nuso//
241a2(phal chen): smras pa sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi bzungs kyi dad pa dang / mos par bgyid na/ 'phags pas bdag la bka' mi btsal
241a3(phal chen): tam/ des smras pa rigs kyi bu ni shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dpal gyi snying po dang ldan pa'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa dpal kun
241a4(phal chen): nas yang dag par 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas 'od ste/ de bzhin gshegs dpal kun nas yang dag par 'byung ba'i zhabs kyi drung nas ngas
241a5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgo kun tu 'gro ba 'di thob pa// rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi snying po/ dang ldan pa de nas
241a6(phal chen): nga song nas ni bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig 'das te/ sems bskyed pa re re zhing
241a7(phal chen): yang gom pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig bor ro// gom pa re re kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul
241a8(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed kyi zhing 'das te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dang ldan pa shes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
241b1(phal chen): 'das de dag thams cad la 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chod pa bla na med pa yid kyi rang bzhin chos mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rgyas btab pa/ de
241b2(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pas snang ba byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba yongasu bskyed pas mchod pa byaso// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can gyi khams
241b3(phal chen): rgya mtsho ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong ste/ de dag thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho yang khong du chud do// de dag thams cad kyis dbang po'i 'khor
241b4(phal chen): lo yang yongasu shes shing bsam pa dang / mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du bzungs kyi lus yongs su stan to// chos kyi dbyings rab tu grag so// 'od kyi
241b5(phal chen): dkyil 'khor yongasu skyeso// yo byad sna tshogs pas kyang nye bar sdud do// rang gi lus kyang de dag la byin gyi rlabs te/ de ni yongasu smin par bya ba dang /
241b6(phal chen): gdul ba'i bya ba rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyiraro// shar phyogs nas ji ltar 'ongs pa de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang /
241b7(phal chen): byang shar gyi phyogs 'tshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs 'tshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs 'tshams dang / 'og dang
241b8(phal chen): steng gi phyogs nas kyang de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu ngas ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgo kun tu 'gro ba zhes bya ba 'di shes par zad na/
242a1(phal chen): phalangs byang chub sems dpa' phyogs kun tu mngon par gzhol ba/ tha mi dad pa'i ye shes kyi yul dang ldan pa chos kyi dbyings
242a2(phal chen): thams cad du lus rnam par bkod pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthun par spyod pa/ zhing thams cad du lus
242a3(phal chen): kyi rgyas par dgyengs pa/ chos thams cad kyi rgyud kyi rje su song ba/ dus gsum gyi rgyud mnyam pa nyid gyur pa chos kyi phyogs kyi rgyud dang mnyam pa nyid du
242a4(phal chen): gyur pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba'i rgyud thams cad du rnam snang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud thams cad la rnam par rtog pa med pa/ chags
242a5(phal chen): pa med pa'i rgyud thams cad khong du chud pa/ gnas med pa'i rgyud la rab tu gnas pa/ de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nas
242a6(phal chen): re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ grong khyer sgo dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na lha chen po zhes bya ba'i lha 'dug gi/ de'i
242a7(phal chen): gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba dris shig/ de nas tshong
242a8(phal chen): dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi
242b1(phal chen): 'gro ba la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang ltas te/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i drung nas so
242b2(phal chen): ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa brgya chen po'i rjesu song ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'
242b3(phal chen): gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i ye shes kyi spyod yul 'dod pa'i ngang tshul can/ mngon par shes pa chen po'i mngon par sgrub pa'i yul la yon tan gyi khyad
242b4(phal chen): bar tu lta ba/ brtson 'grus btan pa'i go cha rab tu dga' ba'i khyad par thob pa/ bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i rnam par thar par rnam par rtse ba'i rje su song ba'i
242b5(phal chen): bsam pa dang ldan pa/ de byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan gyi sa la nan tan du byed/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sa la ni rnam par spyod/ gzugs kyi sa la ni rab tu gnas
242b6(phal chen): bar byed/ smon lam gyi sa la ni 'jug par byed/ tha dad pa yang dag par shes par byed pa'i sa la rjesu slob/ stobs kyi sa la ni yongasu sgrubs cing mthar gyi
242b7(phal chen): grong khyer sgo dang ldan pa gang na ba der song ste/ lnga lha chen po kun tu dris pa dang / de la 'gro ba mang pos bstan pa/ rigs kyi bu de re lha lha chen po grong khyer gyi
242b8(phal chen): lam gyi bzhi mdon/ bdag nyid shin tu che bas sems can rnams la chos ston cing 'dug go// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs lha lha chen po gang na ba der/
243a1(phal chen): phal// song ste/ lha lha chen po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phag
243a2(phal chen): pa bdag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba
243a3(phal chen): dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdam ngag dang rje su brtan pa mdzad do// zhes bdag gis thos na/
243a4(phal chen): ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba 'phags pa bdag la bshad du gsol/ de nas lha lha
243a5(phal chen): chen pos lag pa bzhis phyogs bzhir sbyangs te/ rgya mtsho chen po bzhi las shin tu myur ba'i shugs kyi chu blangs te/ bdag gi gdong bkrus nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor/
243a6(phal chen): bzangs la gser gyi gtor te 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni mthong bar shin tu bka' ste/ thos par yang rab tu dga'o//
243a7(phal chen): skyes bu mchog gi me tog pun da ri ka ni 'jig rten gyi phul du bya ba yin pas ngo mtshar slad du byung ba yin pas/ 'jig rten gyi gan su gyur pa'o// 'gro ba'i stan
243a8(phal chen): du gyur pa'o// sems can rnams la snang ba chen po 'byin pa'o// lam rmongs pa rnams la lam bde ba ston pa mdzad/ chos kyi tshul bzung ba la mgon du gyur
243b1(phal chen): pa'o// thams cad mkhyen pa'i grong khyer du phyin par bya ba la ded dpon chen por gyur pa ste/ de la kho bo 'di snyam du sems so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dang/
243b2(phal chen): chen po rnams kyi ming ni sems dri ba med pa rnams la/ rang gi lus kyi gzugs snyan ston cing lus rnam par dag pa rnams la mngon par snang ba dang / ngag
243b3(phal chen): gi nyes pa spangs pa rnams dbyangs kyi snang ba yongasu gnon par byed pa dang bsam pa dag pa rnams la dus thams cad du mngon sum du gyur par gnas pas lta
243b4(phal chen): ba ngan pa 'dzin pa yin par bsamaso// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sprin gyi dra ba thob bo// smras pa 'phags pa byang chub sems
243b5(phal chen): dpa'i rnam par thar pa sprin gyi dra ba de'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis/ de nas lha lha chen pos tsheng dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi mdun du rin po che tsam gyi gser gyi
243b6(phal chen): phung po dang / dngul gyi phung po dang bai DUr+ya'i phung po dang shel gyi phung po dang / mu sa la gar ba'i phung po dang / a mra gar pa'i phung po dang / nor bu rin po che
243b7(phal chen): rang bzhin snang ba'i phung po dang / nor bu rin po che dri ma med pa'i snying po'i phung po dang / nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'i phung po dang / nor bu rin po che'i
243b8(phal chen): phyogs kun du mngon pa'i phung po dang / gtsug gi nor bu rin po che dang / cod pan gyi phung po dang / nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi phung po dang / dpung rgyan gyi
244a1(phal chen): ngalaphung po dang / rna cha'i rgyan gyi phung po dang / rngu bu'i phung po dang / ske rags kyi phung po dang / brkang bdub kyi phung po dang /
244a2(phal chen): mu tig dmar po'i dra ba'i phung po dang / nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi phung po dang / yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad kyi brgyan gyi phung po dang / nor bu
244a3(phal chen): rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i phung po dang / me tog thams cad dang / spos thams cad dang / bdug pa thams cad dang / 'phreng ba thams cad dang /
244a4(phal chen): byug pa thams cad dang / phye ma thams cad dang / gos thams cad dang / bdugs thams cad dang / rgyal mtshan thams cad dang / lha'i ba dan thams
244a5(phal chen): cad dang / rol mo brdungs pa thams cad dang / rol mo dkrol ba thams cad dang / 'dod pa'i yul thams cad dang / bu mo bye ba brgya stong grangs med
244a6(phal chen): ba dag kyang nye bar bstan nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu de dag las khyer la smin pa mang po ni sbyin cig/
244a7(phal chen): bsod nams mang po ni bsgying shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni mchod cig/ sems can mang po ni sbyin pas bsdus pa'i dngos pos yong bsdus te/
244a8(phal chen): steng pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mkhod cig/ 'jig rten gyi sbyin pa la slob shig/ gtang bar bka' ba yongasu gtong ni ston cig/ rigs kyi bu khyod la
244b1(phal chen): kho bos ji ltar yo byad kyi rnam par sdus pa 'di bzhin du sbyin pa'i bsam pa dang ma bral sems can tshad med pa'i bdag gi bsam pa'i rgyan kyang stong pas yod
244b2(phal chen): su sgo ba byed do// sangs rgyas dang / chos dang dge 'dun dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / dge ba'i gshes gnyen rnams la'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed
244b3(phal chen): cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag skul bar byed de/ rigs kyi bu gzhan yang kho bo ni sems can 'dod pa'i dga' bas
244b4(phal chen): myos pa/ yul gyi longs spyod la yongs su chags pa rnams la/ yul de dag mi 'dug par byin gyi rlab so// 'gro bas gnon pa dang nga rgyal chen dang /
244b5(phal chen): rgyags shing grags pa dang / rlom pa tshar cad pas/ 'dul ba rnams ni gtum shing srin po ltar mi 'dug pa'i 'jig pa'i lus sha za shing khrag mthung ba'i tshul
244b6(phal chen): dang ldan par bstan te/ rloms dang mnyan pas khrug pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byed do// le lo can brtson 'grus bor ba'i sems can rnams la ni/ me
244b7(phal chen): dang chu dang rgyal po dang / rkun po dang / gnod pa'i 'jigs pa dang / yongasu bstan cing sgo bar byas te/ brtson 'grus brtsom pa la mgod par byed do//
244b8(phal chen): de ltar thabs de dang de dag gi/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi phyogs dang mi mthun pa rab tu gzhom pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi tshogs bas
245a1(phal chen): paltab dang / sgrib pa'i rig yangs sa'i lam yang dag par bzla ba dang / sgrib pa med pa'i chos la bzung ba'i phyir mi dge ba'i
245a2(phal chen): thams cad las rnam par bzlog ste/ dge ba thams cad phun sum tshogs pa yang dag par mgod par byed do// rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems
245a3(phal chen): dpa'i rnam par thar pa sprin gyi dra ba 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' dbang po ltar nyon mongs pa'i lha ma yin rab tu 'jom pa/ ri chu
245a4(phal chen): ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi me'i phung po zhi bar byed pa/ me'i dbang po ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyi srid pa'i chu skyems par byed pa/ rlung ltar
245a5(phal chen): 'dzin pa'i mngon par chags pa thams cad kyi ri rnam par thor ba/ rdo rje ltar bdag gi 'du shes sra ba'i brag rab tu rnyil ba/ de dag gi spyod pa shes pa
245a6(phal chen): 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu 'dzam bu gling 'di nyid kyi yul ma ga ta'i snying po byang chub na sa'i lha mo bstan ma zhes bya ba
245a7(phal chen): 'dug gi de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/
245a8(phal chen): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi lha lha chen po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ lha lha chen po la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogasu bskor
245b1(phal chen): ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ lha lha chen po'i drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs mthar gyi yul ma ga ta'i snying po byang chub tu
245b2(phal chen): sa'i lha mo bstan ma gang na ba der song ba dang / de 'gro ba'i tshe sa'i lha mo brgya stong phrag bcu gcig la cig 'di skad ces 'dzer te/ sems can thams cad
245b3(phal chen): kyi bstan du gyur pa zhig 'di nas tshur 'ong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po can thams cad kyi ma rigs pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs 'dral bar 'gyur ba zhig ni 'di
245b4(phal chen): nas tshur 'ong ngo // chos kyi rgyal po'i rigasu byung ba/ chags pa med cing dri ma med pa'i chos kyi rgyal po'i go phangs dam pa thob par 'gyur ba zhig ni 'di nas
245b5(phal chen): tshur 'ong so// ye shes kyi mthu bo che rdo rje'i tshon cha can no// phas kyi rgol ba'i 'khor thams cad rab tu 'dul ba zhig ni 'di nas tshur 'ong so// zhes nas
245b6(phal chen): de'i med la lha mo bstan ma la sogs pa sa'i lha mo brgya stong phrag bcus sa chen po rab tu bskyed des/ 'brug sgra zab mo lta bu'i sgra chen po grags par byas
245b7(phal chen): nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'od chen pos snang bar byas te/ lus rin po che'i rgyan dang lhab lhub thams cad kyi shin tu brgyan nas/
245b8(phal chen): grogs gi 'breng ba'i tshogs nam mkha'i dbyings las gyur cig/ snang ba lta bu sha stag tu bye de/ shing thams cad myu gu skye bar byed/ me tog gi shing
246a1(phal chen): b.lathams cad la kha 'bu bar byed/ chu klung gi rgyud thams cad ni 'bab par byed/ mtsho dang mtsho'u dang lu ma thams cad ni rgyab par byed/ ma
246a2(phal chen): chu'i ni rab tu 'bab par byed/ me tog gi sprin rab tu thor ba'i rlung chen po ni ldang bar byed/ sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong sgra sgrog par byed/ lha rdzas
246a3(phal chen): kyi gzhal med khang dang / rgyan gyi tshogs mang po ni rab tu dkrol bar byed/ baglang dang khyu mchog dang / glang po dang / rtag dang ri dgas kyi dbang po rab
246a4(phal chen): tu sgra 'byin par byed/ lha dang lha ma yin dang klu dang 'byung po rnams ni 'phrug par sgra 'byin byed/ ri'i dbang po rnams ni phan thug par byed/ gter gyi chog
246a5(phal chen): bye ba brgya stong ni mngon du 'byung bar byed cing sa'i 'og nas mthon to// de nas sa'i lha mo stan mas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smra so//
246a6(phal chen): rigs kyi bu khyod 'dir 'ongs pa leg so// sa'i phyogs 'dir khyod kyi gan su 'gyur te/ kho mo'i mngon sum du dge ba'i rtsa ba brgyad pa yin ni/ de'i
246a7(phal chen): rnam par smin pa'i phyogs 'ga' rtsam lta bar 'dod dam/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi sa'i lha mo spyan ma'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal
246a8(phal chen): te/ sa'i lha mo bstan ma la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas nas/ sa'i lha mo stan ma'i mdun du 'dug ste/ thams cad thal mo
246b1(phal chen): sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags ma phyag 'tshal lo// de nas sa'i lha mo stan mas rkang pa'i mthil gyi sa chen po la rtab bo// rin po che'i gter
246b2(phal chen): bye ba brgya stong grangs med pas rab tu brgyan pa bstan nas 'di skad smras so// rigs kyi bu rin po che gter bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di dag kyang khyod kyi
246b3(phal chen): rjes su 'brang ba'o// khyod kyi mngon du 'gro ba'o// khyod kyi ci gar spyad pa'o// khyod kyi bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba'o// khyod kyi
246b4(phal chen): bsod nams kyi stobs kyi srung ba'o// 'di las longs te khyod ci dgos pa de dag bgyi shig/ rigs kyi bu gzhan yang kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i
246b5(phal chen): rnam par thar pa'i ye shes thub par bka' ba'i snying po can thob pa ste/ de ltar kho mo byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'ad dang ldan pas de bzhin
246b6(phal chen): gshegs pa mar me mdzad tshun chad du byang chub sems dpa'i rgyas 'brang ba zhing rtag tu bsrung ba ste/ de tshun chad rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems
246b7(phal chen): dpa'i sems kyi spyod pa la rnam par spyod do// ye shes kyi yul la 'jug go/ smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor khong du chud par byed do// byang chub sems
246b8(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa rnam par dag pa rjes su rtogs par byed do// ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi tshul gyi rjesu 'brang ngo // byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par shes pa
247a1(phal chen): #'am/ sems rgya chen pos brgyas par 'gengaso// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi stobs kyi dbang sgyur ba dang / zhing
247a2(phal chen): gi dra ba thams cad rgyas par dgang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi lung bstan pa yang dag par mnon pa dang / dus thams cad mngon par
247a3(phal chen): 'tshang rgya bar yang dag par bstan pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba'i tshul thams cad dang / mdo sde yang dag par brjod pa'i chos kyi sprin gyi tshul thams
247a4(phal chen): cad dang / chos snang ba chen po snang bar bya ba'i tshul dang / sems can thams cad dang yongasu min par bya ba'i tshul dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par
247a5(phal chen): 'phrul pa thams cad yang dag par bstan pa'i tshul yang rje su rtogs par byed do// yang dag par nod do// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par
247a6(phal chen): thar pa ye shes thub par bka' ba'i snying po can 'di yang bskal pa'i ri rab kyi rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gcig tu/ 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba'i rgya
247a7(phal chen): mtshan zhes bya bar bskal pa snang bas rnam par brgyan pa la de bzhin gshegs pa spyan bzang po las thob ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo byang chub sems
247a8(phal chen): dpa'i rnam par thar ye shes thub par dka' ba'i snying po can 'di la yongs su spyod spyod/ rnam par spyod spyod/ shin tu spyod spyod/ yang dag par 'phel bar
247b1(phal chen): byed byed do// shin tu rgyas par byed byed pas bskal pa bzang po la thug gi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang / ma bral lo// de srid kyi bar gyi
247b2(phal chen): kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba skyed
247b3(phal chen): cig kur te// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad snying po byang chub tu gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa 'am mthong ste/ kho mo ni de bzhin gshegs
247b4(phal chen): pa de dag thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon sum du mthong ba'o// rigs kyi bu kho mo byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa ye shes thub par dka' ba'i
247b5(phal chen): snying po can 'di shes par zad na/ kho mo byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zham 'bring du 'brang ba/ sangs rgyas thams
247b6(phal chen): cad kyi gsungs kyi rje su 'brang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'jug par dka' ba la rab tu zhugs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi skad cig gi
247b7(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa'i shugs dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / snyam pa nyid du gyur pa'i lus dang ldan pa/
