247b8(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sgongs pa dri ma med pa'i snying por gyur pa/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad tu rtog tu mngon par sgrub pa/ sangs rgyas
248a1(phal chen): phalakyi phrin las tha mi dad pa'i pho nyar 'gyur/ de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ so
248a2(phal chen): rigs kyi bu 'dzam bu gling 'di nyid kyi yul ma ga ta zhes bya ba na/ grong khyer ser skya'i gnas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na mtshan ma'i lha mo dbyings
248a3(phal chen): dang ldan pa zhes bya 'dug gi/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan
248a4(phal chen): tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs gi sa'i lha mo bstan ma'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ sa'i lha mo
248a5(phal chen): bstan ma la lan rgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs nas skor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ sa'i lha mo bston me'i drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong
248a6(phal chen): dpon gyi bu nor bzangs sa'i lha mo stan ma'i gdam ngag rjes su dran par byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa ye shes thub par dka'
248a7(phal chen): ba'i snying po can de'i rje su dran par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi tshul de'i rje su bas
248a8(phal chen): ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar rnam par 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes shin tu phra ba de la rnam par lta ba dang / byang chub
248b1(phal chen): sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho de la 'jug par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes tha dad pa de la yid ches par bya ba/
248b2(phal chen): dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes shin tu sbyang ba des rje su rtogs par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes
248b3(phal chen): rgya mtsho de la 'babs bya ba byed cing / grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas gang na ba der phyin te/ grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas la g.yas phyogasu bskor nas/
248b4(phal chen): shar phyogs logs kyi grong khyer gyi sgo nas song ste/ nyi ma nub nas ring por ma lon pa zhig tu grong khyer gyi lam gyi sum mdo'i dbus zhig na/ byang chub sems
248b5(phal chen): dpa'i gdam ngag mthun par len pa de/ mtshan me'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa mthong bar 'dod cing dge ba'i gshes gnyen yod na sangs rgyas kyi ye shes thob par
248b6(phal chen): 'gyur bar nges pa'i blo gros dang ldan pa/ ye shes kyi mig kun tu lta ba'i yul gyi rang bzhin gyi byin gyi rlabs dang ldan pa/ phyogs thams cad du mngon par gzhol
248b7(phal chen): zhing dge ba'i las bshes gnyen la lta ba'i sems kyi mos pa dang / ye shes chen po'i snying por gyur pa'i 'du shes kyi sems dang ldan pa dmigs pa thams
248b8(phal chen): cad la rab tu zhugs pa'i ye shes kyi mig dang ldan pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul thams cad du ye shes rgya mtsho 'jam klas pas rgyas par dgyengs pa dang ldan
249a1(phal chen): @pas ting nge 'dzin gyi mig gi phyogs thams cad du shes bya'i brgya mtsho rnam par ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gi tshig gi phyogs thams cad
249a2(phal chen): du shes bya'i rgya mtsho la rnam par lta ba ye shes chen po'i mig thob par bya ba la rab tu gzhol zhing bsam pa rtse cig tu bzhag nas 'dug 'dug pa dang / mtshan
249a3(phal chen): mo'i lha ze'i dbyings dang ldan pa de/ grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas kyi steng gi na mkha'i dbyings la nor bu rin po che sna tshogs dpe byad pa'i khang pa rtsegs
249a4(phal chen): pa zhig na/ rin po che seng ge'i khri chen po spos zhim po thams cad kyi pad mo'i snying po can zhig la/ lus kyi mdog gser gyi kha dog du 'dug pa/ sgra 'jam
249a5(phal chen): zhing mang la mthon thing du 'dug pa/ mig dkar nag dbyes pa/ gzugs bzang ba/ shin tu mdzes pa/ lta na bdug pa/ lus brgyan dang lhab lhub
249a6(phal chen): thams cad kyi klubs shing brgyan pa/ kha dog bsgyur ba'i gos bgos pa/ tshangs pa'i gtsug tor gyi gcod pan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi brgyan dang
249a7(phal chen): thogs pa/ lus la rgyu skar dang / bza' dang / skar can dang / skar ma'i tshogs thams cad kyi gzugs rnyan snang bar gyur pa 'dug pa mthong ngo //
249a8(phal chen): sems can gyi khams langs par mi lom pa dang / ngan seng dang / ngan 'gro dang / log par srung ba nas sems can ji snyed cig yongasu 'akrol ba de da/
249b1(phal chen): thams cad kyang de'i ba spu'i sbub su chud par mthong ngo // ji snyed cig mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi bkod pa dang / ji snyed cig nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
249b2(phal chen): kyi byang chub dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yong su smin par byas pa de dag thams cad kyang / de'i ba spu'i sdub su chud par mthong ngo // lus mngon par sgrub
249b3(phal chen): pa dang / gzugs mngon par sgrub pa dang / kha dog mngon par sgrub pa'i thabs sna tshogs kyi ji snyed cig yongasu smin par byas pa de dag kyang de'i ba spu'i sbubasu chud dar
249b4(phal chen): mthong ngo // nga ro mngon par sgrub pa dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag mngon par sgrub pa dang / skad cig gi tshul sna tshogs yongs su sbyar ba ji snyed cig gi yongasu smin par
249b5(phal chen): byas pa de dag kyang / de'i ba spu'i sgo nas rjesu brjod pa thos so// dus mngon par sgrub pa dang / bsam pa dang / mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gyi rje su 'brang
249b6(phal chen): bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i
249b7(phal chen): sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa'i khyu mchog gi mdu byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par spyong pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yongasu sa pa dang /
249b8(phal chen): dmyal sem ma pa'i long su lta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par lta ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
250a1(phal chen): bseng ge chen po'i rnam par bgyings pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pas rnam par rtse ba cig gis/ des sems can
250a2(phal chen): yongasu smin par byas pa de dag kyang / de'i ba spu'i sbubasu chud par mthong ngo // des thabs sna tshogasu ldan pa'i chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho de dag mthong zhing thos nas
250a3(phal chen): dga' rangs te/ mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa de lus thams cad kyi phangab nas phyag 'tshal te/
250a4(phal chen): langs nas mtshan mo'i lha mo dbying dang ldan pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogasu skor ba byas nas mtshan mo'i lha mo dbyings dang ldan pa'i mdun du 'dug
250a5(phal chen): ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// lha mo bdag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ 'di ltar bdag gi dge
250a6(phal chen): ba'i gshes gnyen gyi byin gyi rlabs kyi sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad 'byung ba yang dag par mthong bas dge ba'i gshes gnyen gyi phyag tu bdag nyid
250a7(phal chen): bor ba lags na/ lha mo shul gang la bstan na byang chub sems dpa'i stobs bcu'i sar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i shul bdag
250a8(phal chen): la bshad du gsol/ de skad ces smra so// mtshan mo'i lha mo dbyings dang ldan pas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smra so// rigs kyi bu de
250b1(phal chen): ltar khyod dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi byin gyis non te/ dge ba'i gshes gnyen gyi tshig mnyan par 'dod pa dang / dge ba'i gshes gnyen gyi gdam
250b2(phal chen): ngag la nan tan du byed pa leg so leg so// rigs kyi bu khyod ni de ltar de ltar dge ba'i gshes gnyen gyi gdam ngag la nan tan du byed pas/ gdon mi
250b3(phal chen): za bar bla na med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i sems ca
250b4(phal chen): thams cad kyi mun pa rnam par sel ba'i chos kyi snang bas 'gro ba thams cad rnam par 'dul ba'i sgo thob pa ste/ bsam pa mi nyams pa dang ldan pa'i
250b5(phal chen): sems can rnams la byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o// mi dge ba'i las kyi lam la zhugs pa rnams la snying rje'i sems dang ldan pa'o// dge ba'i las
250b6(phal chen): kyi lam la zhugs pa rnams la dga' ba'i sems dang ldan pa'o// sems snyam pa dang mi mnyam par ldan pa'i sems can rnams la mi gnyis pa'i sems
250b7(phal chen): dang ldan pa'o// kun nas nyon mongs pa rnams la rnam par sbyang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'o// nyam nga bar gyur pa rnams la yang dag par zhugs pa'i
250b8(phal chen): sems dang ldan pa'o// dma' ba la mos pa rnams la yangs mos pa yongasu bskyed pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o// dbang po zhum pa rnams la brtson 'grus
251a1(phal chen): lachen po'i shugs rnam par 'phel ba'i sems dang ldan pa'o// 'khor ba la mngon par mos pa rnams la 'khor ba'i rgyud kyi 'khor
251a2(phal chen): le las rnam par zlog pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi pa la mngon par mos pa'i sems can rnams la thams cad mkhyen pa
251a3(phal chen): nyid kyi lam la 'god pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo de lta bu'i sems dang yid la bya bar ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam
251a4(phal chen): bar thar pa sems can thams cad kyi mun pa rnam par sel ba'i chos kyi snang bas 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba'i sgo 'di dang ldan pas sems can gang
251a5(phal chen): snyed cig mun nag skrag tu gyur pa'i rnam la mi nyal bar 'gyur/ 'byung po'i tshogs ni rgyu bar gyur/ kun rdzobs mang po ni rgyas par 'gyur// sems can
251a6(phal chen): mi bsrun pa'i tshul can ni phyogs rgyu bar 'gyur/ sprin stug pos ni kun tu khyebs par 'gyur/ dud pa dang rdul gyi tshogs kyi kun nas dkrigs par 'gyur
251a7(phal chen): rdzi char mi zad pas ni rab tu rtag par 'gyur/ zla dkar mo gri tshogs mi snang bar 'gyur/ mig gi bya ba'i mthu ni med par 'gyur ba'i mun pa la sems
251a8(phal chen): can gang ji snyed cig rgya mtsho la spyod dam/ thang la spyod dam/ ri la spyod ma nags tshal gzhan la spyod dam/ yul gzhan la spyod dam/ grong khyer gzhan na
251b1(phal chen): spyod dam/ phyogs gzhan na spyod dam/ phyogs mtshams gzhan du spyod dam/ lam gzhan du spyod kyang rung ste/ rgya mtsho la spyod kyang rung ste/ rgya mtsho la spyod pa las
251b2(phal chen): grub par gyur pa 'am/ zang las spyod spyod pa las nyams nyes pa 'am/ ri las spyod spyod pa las g.yangs chen por ltung bar 'gyur ba 'am// 'brog dgon par
251b3(phal chen): spyod spyod pa las kha zas kyi pogs par 'gyur ba 'am/ nag 'tshal thib bor ba'i zang zing la thogs sam/ tshul nyam nyes shig tu gyur tam/ yul gzham
251b4(phal chen): na spyod spyod pa las chom pos bcom pa 'am/ grong gzhan na spyod spyod pa las mi srun bi tshul can gyi rtses pa 'am/ phyogs gzhan na spyod spyod pa las 'grog mi
251b5(phal chen): 'am/ phyogs mtshams gzhan na spyod spyod pa las mgo rmongs pa las/ lam gzhan na spyod spyod pa las nye bar bzhol gyur kyang ste/ rigs kyi bu kho mo ni seMs
251b6(phal chen): can de lta bu dag la thabs sna tshogs kyi sgo nas smrab su gyur par byed pa ste/ 'di ltar brgya mtsho chen po las spyod pa rnams kyi rlung sprin nag po tor ba dang / chu na
251b7(phal chen): ba dang bab pa dang / rlung mi zad pa'i dkyil 'khor ldog pa dang / rlabs kyi shugs chen po zhi bar bya ba dang / klog gi 'jig pa las mthar bar bya ba dang /
251b8(phal chen): phyogs btan pa dang / chu'i lam legs par dmigs pa dang / 'gram btan pa dang / rin po che'i gling du phyin par bya ba'i phyir lam yongasu ston te/ yongs/
252a1(phal chen): phal@sdud pa'i gzugs dang / ded dpon gyi gzugs dang / rta'i rgyal po'i rngog chen gyi gzugs dang / glang po che'i gzugs dang /
252a2(phal chen): rus sbal gyi rgyal po'i gzugs dang / lha ma yin gyi rgyal po'i gzugs dang / na mkha' lding gi rgyal po'i gzugs dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i gzug
252a3(phal chen): dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs dang / rgya mtsho lnga'i gzugs dang / mnyan pa'i gzugs kyi skyabasu gyur par byed do// dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang 'di ltar
252a4(phal chen): sems can thams cad sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad las yongasu zlog pa'i phyir skyab su gyur par shog cig ces yongasu bsngo'o// thang la spyod pa'i
252a5(phal chen): sems can mun pa chen po shig tu gnag pa/ sa gzhi 'od ma tsher ma dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo gang ba sbrul gdug pa gtum po shin tu mang ba thag
252a6(phal chen): thug dang mi bde ba'i lam can/ rdul dang phyag dang shin tu thul ba/ ji ltar grag pos tab pa/ tsha ba dang grang ba'i sdug bsngal yod pa sbrul dang can
252a7(phal chen): zan gyi bab yod/ mthong mig dang chom rkun po rgyu bar 'gyur ba zhig la mgo 'khor bar gyur pa'i sems can rnams la/ nyi ma'i gzugs dang / zla ma
252a8(phal chen): gzugs dang / skya reng char ba'i gzugs dang / skar mda' chen po'i gzugs dang / glog gi phreng ba'i gzugs dang / rin po che'i kyi gzugs
252b1(phal chen): dang / gza'i 'khor gyi gzugs dang / rgyu skar dang skar ma'i tshogs kyi gzhal med khang gi 'od kyi gzugs dang / lha'i gzugs dang / byang/
252b2(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyi skyabasu gyur par byed de// sems kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis nyon mongs pa'i mun par pa thams cad rnam par gsal
252b3(phal chen): ba'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi skyabs su shog shig par bskyed do// ri'i g.yang sa la spyod cing 'chi bas 'jigs skrag pa rnams kyi srog dbyung ba
252b4(phal chen): dang / grags pa 'dod pa'i dbang du gyur pa dang / snyan pa dang sgra'i rgyal mtshan 'dod pa dang / longs spyod tshol ba dang / 'dod pa'i zil gyi mi non pa
252b5(phal chen): dang / ye byad yongs su btsal ba la brtson pa dang / 'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pa 'dod cing rtsen pa dang / bu dang chung ma stong mi phod pas/ thag
252b6(phal chen): par 'gyur ba dang / lta ba thib pas 'khyam pa dang / sdug bsngal dang 'jigs pa sna tshogs kyi rtses pa rnams la yangs thabs sna tshogs kyi sgo nas skyab
252b7(phal chen): su gyur par byed de/ 'di ltar ri phug dang / bya skyibs mngon par sgrub pa dang / shing thag dang rtsa ba bzang rung mngon par sgrub pa dang / chu'i lam dang /
252b8(phal chen): chu mig mngon par sgrub pa dang / tsha ba dang grangs pa'i gnyen pa'i mngon par sgrub pa dang / yang dag pa'i lam snyan pa 'am/ ka la bI ka'i sgra skad smras
253a1(phal chen): phal pa dang / rma bya'i rgyal po skad 'byin pa'i dbyangs dang sman 'bar bas snang ba'i gzugs dang / ri'i lha'i rgyal po 'od kyi
253a2(phal chen): gzugs dang / ri phug dang tshul dang stongasu rlag ste/ sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyi rtses pa'i sems can rnams kyi mun pa'i rab rib rnam par rtsal dang /
253a3(phal chen): sa gzhi snyam par mngon par sgrub pas skyabasu 'gyur bar byed de sems kyang ji ltar bdag gi sems can ri la spyod pa 'di dag yongs su skyabs pa de bzhin
253a4(phal chen): du/ 'khor ba'i ri lam rgyud yangs sa gnas shing / rga shi'i gdon gyi zin pa de dag skyab su'ang bdag gyur par shog shig bskyed do// nags tshal thig
253a5(phal chen): bai'i dra bas thogs pa'i sems can mtshan mo'i mun pa'i mun nag gi mtshang shing dang shing phrin 'dzin pa'i sems shin tu nyam nga ba dang / chu dang rtswa dang rdza
253a6(phal chen): nga / ga nga tshug [।]ma pa nang tsu ma pa 'a
253a7(phal chen): pa smra sa sa pa du 'phrul ba shAs
253a8(phal chen): de ma phyogs migs pa rnams la khyi ma ni 'di bar 'gro 'tshal mi yongs yin par byeng / sems kyang 'a sa dge ba'i ma pa 'das
253b1(phal chen): can rtsa ba thib par ma tshogs la gnas pa/ bzed pa'i rnabs khrig par gyur ba/ la'ang bu'i drug pardas sna chags kyi ces pa na
253b2(phal chen): thams cad las yongs su 'grol bar shog shig par sbed do// 'brog dgon pa la spyod pa'i sems can mun pa'i nang na thob pa rnams kyang / thabs
253b3(phal chen): kyi sgo sna tshogs kyi bde ba yongs su bskyed cing las bsan te/ de dag 'jig pa med pa dang / bde ba la rab tu bkod nas/ sems kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba
253b4(phal chen): 'di sems can 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa ni thoms pa ngan song thams cad kyi lam du zhugs pa rnams/ sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su bkrol
253b5(phal chen): te/ shin du phun sum tshogs pas bde ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam la rab tu bkod par bya bar shog shig par skyed do// rigs kyi bu yul dang ljongs
253b6(phal chen): la chags pa'i sems can mngon par chags pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i sdug bsngal nyam su myong bar gyur pa rnams la 'ang kho mo ni skye bar bya ba'i thabs
253b7(phal chen): sna tshogs kyi yul la rnam par chags pa de las gyen du smon pa byed de/ sems kyang 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba sems can thams cad phung po la mngon
253b8(phal chen): par chags pa la sbyin du skyed do// gnas pa med pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la mgod par shog shig par bskyed do// rigs kyi bu kho mo ni grong na
254a1(phal chen): laspyod pa'i sems can khyim dang gnas kyi cing bas klags pa rnams mtshan mo mun pa shin tu nag pas mchod pa'i nang na/ khyim
254a2(phal chen): kyi don sna tshogs nyam su gnod pa sdug bsngal bar gyur pa rnams kyang skyo bar 'gyur ba'i sgo sna tshogs kyi spyo bar byas te/ chags pa nyed pa'i sems
254a3(phal chen): yongasu skyed nas/ chos kyi spen pas yongasu bzung ste tshoms par byas nas bstan pa med pa'i chos la bkod de/ sems kyang 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba
254a4(phal chen): 'dis sems can skye mched drug gi grong la gnas pa 'khor ba'i las lam gyi rgyud kyi spyod yul las gyen du skyed de/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
254a5(phal chen): kyi spyod yul la bkod par bya bar shog shig par bskyed do// rigs kyi bu gang yang mtshan mo mun pa shin tu gnag pa'i nang na shar phyogs la sogs
254a6(phal chen): ba'i phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams re res phyogs smad pa'i 'gyur bas sa'i phyogs mnyam pa las mi snyam pa'i yangs par 'du shes pa dang /
254a7(phal chen): sbrang bu la shog tu 'du shes par 'gyur te/ phyogs kyi las dang sa tshod la mgo 'khor bar 'gyur ba de dag la'ang kho bo ni thabs sna tshogs kyi snang bar byas ste/
254a8(phal chen): phyir 'byung ba rnams la ni sgo yongasu ston to// rgal ba 'dod pa rnams la ni stegs yongasu ston to// rgal bar 'dod pa rnams la gru yongasu ston to// khyims
254b1(phal chen): du 'gro bar 'dod pa rnams la ni khyim yongasu ston to// rnam par lta bar 'dod pa rnams la ni phyogs yongasu ston to// sa gzhi tho ba dang dma' ba yang yongasu smra
254b2(phal chen): to// sa'i phyogs mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa gzugs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs kyang yongasu ston to// lam gyi du pa rnams lha grong khyer dang / ljongs dang khams dang /
254b3(phal chen): rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor kyang yongasu ston to// tsha ba dang skom pas mnang ba rnams la yang mtsho dang / mtshe'u dang / lu ma dang / rdzing dang / rdzing bu dang / chu klung
254b4(phal chen): dang / nags tshal dang / bza' shing gi ra ba dang / kun dga' ra ba yid du 'ong ba rnams yongasu ston to// sdug pa dang bral zhing bde ba phrad par 'dod pa rnams la
254b5(phal chen): ba dang ma dang bu dang / chung ma dang 'dza'o dang / blon po dang gnyen gshes dang yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs yongasu ston te/ sems kyang ji ltar bdas
254b6(phal chen): gi sems can mtshan mo mun pa mun nags kyi chod pa/ mig rab rib kyis nyams pa phyogs bzlas pa lam 'khor ba rnams la gzigs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs rnam
254b7(phal chen): par dmigs par bya ba'i phyir snang ba bskyed do// 'od byas pa de bzhin du bdag gi yun ring po nas/ 'khor ba'i mun pa gnas pa'i sems can dang / yang dag
254b8(phal chen): pa nyid kyi phyogs pa la bslad pa/ ma rig pa'i mun par 'thoms pa ye shes kyi mig mi shes pa'i ling thog gi mchod pa/ 'du shes dang sems dang lta bas phyin
255a1(phal chen): phalaci log tu gyur pa mi rtag par 'du shes pa la sdug bsngal la bde bar 'du shes pa/ bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes pa/ mi
255a2(phal chen): sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes pa/ bdag dang sems can dang / srog dang gso ba dang / gang zag tu 'dzin pa dang / blo la gnas pa/ phung po dang khams
255a3(phal chen): dang / skye mched la gnas pa/ rgyu dang 'bras bu la mgo 'khor ba mi dge ba'i las kyi lam gyi phyogasu zhugs pa srog gcod pa/ ma byin pa len pa/ 'dod pas
255a4(phal chen): log par g.yem la/ brdzun du smra ba bram zer/ ngag rtsub mo 'byin pa/ tshig khyal ba smra ba/ chags sems dang ldan pa/ gnod sems kyi sems dang
255a5(phal chen): ldan pa log par lta ba can/ phar mi shes pa/ mar mi shes pa/ dge sbyong dang bram zer mi shes pa/ dbang po mi shes pa/ skyes bu dam pa mi shes pa/ chos
255a6(phal chen): ma yin pa la chags zhing zhen pa/ ma tshul ba'i 'dod pas zil gyi non pa/ log pa'i chos kyi yongasu 'khris pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa la skur pa 'debs
255a7(phal chen): pa/ chos kyi 'khor lo nub par bya la zhugs pa/ bdud kyi rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa/ byang chub sems dpa' gnod pa byed pa/ theg pa chen po la zhe sdang
255a8(phal chen): byang chub sems la mos la spong bar byeng ba/ byang chub sems dpa' la mi snyan par brjod pa/ snod ma skams par ring ba/ gnod par ma byas par
255b1(phal chen): dgrar len pa/ 'phags pa la bskur pa 'debs pa/ skyes bu dam pa ma yin pas spyad pa'i chos kyi spyod yul can/ mchod rten dang dge 'dun gyi dngos po la/
255b2(phal chen): 'khu ba/ pha ma la log par sems pa/ mtshams med pa'i las byed pa/ g.yang sa chen po la mngon par ltas pa sems can rnams kyi ma rig mun pa/ shes rab
255b3(phal chen): kyi snang ba chen pos gsal te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par rab tu bskul nas/ theg pa chen po kun tu bzang pos stobs bcu'i
255b4(phal chen): ye shes kyi sa'i lam yongasu ston par gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshul
255b5(phal chen): rgya mtsho dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi spyod yul dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul dang / stobs bcu yongasu grub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi gzungs kyi stobs dang /
255b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku gcig tu gyur pa yongasu ston par shog shig/ yongasu bstan nas kyang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas la rab tu bkod
255b7(phal chen): par shog shig par spyod do// rigs kyi bu kho mo ni sems can yun ring po nas na zhing nad kyi yongasu skyo ba lus nyam chung ba dang / rgas pa rga ba'i zil gyi non pa dang /
255b8(phal chen): mgon med pa dang 'bongs shing dbul ba dang / log par ltung ba dang / yul gnas du phyin pa dang / phyogs log par zhugs pa dang / gtson ra na 'dug pa dang / chang
256a1(phal chen): de la/ s+ya/ pas gcad pa dang / nyes pa byung ste rgyal po gsad par rnams kyang srog dang bral ba'i 'jig pa las yongasu bskyab pa'i phyir gnas so//
256a2(phal chen): rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo sems can nad pa rnams kyi nad thams cad ni thabs thams cad kyi bso ba nan tan du byed// rgas pa dang / rga ba'i zil gyi non par rnams la
256a3(phal chen): ni/ snyen bskur dang rim gro dang / yo byad kyi 'phongs par yongasu sdud par byed do// mgon med pa'i sems can rnams la mgon byed do// 'phongs shing dbul ba
256a4(phal chen): rnams la nor dang gser gyi phung pos/ yongasu sdud do// log par ltung ba rnams la ni don thun pas yongasu sdud do// yul gzhan du phyin pa rnams la ni/ rang gi
256a5(phal chen): yul du phyin par byed do// phyogs logs par zhugs pa rnams ni phyogs ma nor bar 'dzud do// brtson ra na 'dug pa rnams ni brtson nas byin par byed do// chad
256a6(phal chen): pas gcad pa ni chad pa'i sdug bsngal las grol bar byed do// nyes par byung ste rgyal pos gsas par smra ba rnams ni/ srog gi dbugs byin pa thob par byed de/
256a7(phal chen): sems kyang bdag ji ltar sems can 'di dag 'jig pa dang / gnod pa sna tshogs las yongasu skyob cing mgon byed pa/ de bzhin du bdag gi 'di rnams bla na med pa
256a8(phal chen): chos kyi yongasu sdu bas yongasu bsdus te/ nyon mongs pa thams cad las yongasu grol bar bya'o// skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang 'chi ba dang mya ngan dang / sme
256b1(phal chen): sngags 'dod pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yang dag par bzlog par bya'o// ngan song log par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'i 'jig
256b2(phal chen): pa thams cad las grol bar bya'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi bzungs la rab kyi bgod par bya'o// chos rin po che sbyin pa'i yongs su bsdu bas yongs su bsdu
256b3(phal chen): bar bya'o// kha na ma tho ba med pa'i las la rab tu bgod par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnam par dag pa yang dag par bskul bar bya'o// rga shi yongs su
256b4(phal chen): med pa'i dbyings shin tu rtog pa la rab tu dgod par bya bar bskyed do// rigs kyi bu kho mo sems can log pa'i lam la zhugs pa lta ba'i rnam pa thibs po sna tshogs
256b5(phal chen): la mngon par zhen pa/ log par rtog pa'i spyod yul can/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las nyam nga bar gyur pa la yongasu spong ba/ brtul zhugs dang dka' thub sna tshogs
256b6(phal chen): la gnas pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin yang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'du shes pa/ lus gdung ba dang yongasu gdung ba la rab tu
256b7(phal chen): brtson pa/ mtsho dang / mtshe'u dang / lu ma dang / rdzing bu dang / chu klung dang / ri gzar dang / phyogs mtshams la 'dud cing phyag 'tshal ba la mos pa/ sdigs gre
256b8(phal chen): po'i dbang du gyur pa rnams la yang / thabs sna tshogs kyi mgon du gyur par byed de/ de dag sdig pa'i lta ba'i rnam pa dang ngan song thams cad kyi g.yang sar ltung ba'i
257a1(phal chen): phal/ lam las rnam par bzlog go// 'jig rten pa'i yang dag par lta ba la rab tu bkod cing / lnga dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa la yongasu bgod
257a2(phal chen): do// sems kyang ji ltar bdag gi sems can 'di dag nyam nga ba'i nan tan dang / sdug bsngal las yongs su bkrol ba de bzhin du bdag gi sems can thams cad
257a3(phal chen): kyang 'phangs pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam la bkod de/ sdug bsngal las yongasu bkrol ba de bzhin du bdag gi sems can thams cad kyang
257a4(phal chen): 'phangs po 'jig rten las 'das pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam la bkod de/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la phyir mi ldeg par byas la kun tu bzang po'i smon lam chen
257a5(phal chen): bos thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// sems can gyi khams thams cad ma dul ba'i bar du byang chub sems dpa'i sa las kyang mi g.yo bar bya bar
257a6(phal chen): bskyed do// de nas mtshan mo'i lha mo dbyings dang ldan pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i phyogs sems can thams cad kyi mun pa rnam par sel ba'i
257a7(phal chen): chos kyi snang bas 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba'i sgo 'di gnan te bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi phyogs bcur rnam par ltas te/ tshong
257a8(phal chen): dpon gyi bu nor bzangs tshig su gcad pa 'di dag smra so// gti mug ma rig mun nag gsal don du/ sems can phan phyir kho mo chos ston to// 'dus la sngar
257b1(phal chen): cing 'gro ba bde bar byas/ 'di ni rnam par tshul mchog zhi ba yin/ kho mos byas yangs shin du sbyang ba byas// bskal pa mtha' yas sngan cad shin tu bsgoms
257b2(phal chen): des ni 'jig rten rgyas kang snang bar byed// nor bzangs bstan pas tshul 'di shes par bgyi/ kho mo'i snying rje rgya mtsho tshad med de/ 'di las dus gsum rgyal
257b3(phal chen): ba 'jig rten 'byung // des ni 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byed/ nor bzangs brtan pas tshul 'di shes par bgyi// 'jig rten bde ba mngon par sgrub pa dang /
257b4(phal chen): ma byas 'phags pa'i bde bas mngon bsgrub shing // des ni kho mo dga' mgu rangs par byed// rgyal sras khyod kyi tshul 'di shes par bgyi// sangs rgyas
257b5(phal chen): stobs rnams yongasu sbyong byed cing // nyan thos ye shes rnam thar 'bras bu dang / 'dus byas skyon las rtag phyir phyogs kyi// rgyal sras khyod kyi tshul 'di shes
257b6(phal chen): bar bgyi/ kho mo'i mig ni rgya chen yongasu dag/ des ni phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams mang po mthong // zhing dbyings de dag kun gyi rang byung rnams// byang chub shing dang
257b7(phal chen): drung na bzhugs pa mthong // sangs rgyas sku ni mtshan gyi yongs brgyan cing // 'od bzang snang ba sna tshogs kun 'gyed cing // ba hU~M kun nas 'od zer mang 'gyed
257b8(phal chen): pa'i// sangs rgyas 'khor dang bcas pa kho mos mthong // zhing dbyings de dag kun gyi sems can rnam/ shi 'pho skye ba'i sgor yang kun mthong ste/ byis pa de da/
258a1(phal chen): ba la/ 'gro rgyud rgya mtsho na// 'khor zhing rang rang las kyi myong bar byed/ kho mo'i rna ba rgya mtsho rnam dag ste// der ni sgra khams ma lus
258a2(phal chen): yongasu 'du// 'gro ba kun gyi sgra skad rgya mtsho dag/ kun kyang thos nas dran pas yongasu 'dzin// dbyangs kyi yan lag sgras skad thams cad kyi// dpe zla
258a3(phal chen): med pa'i gsung ni rab rgyan te// des ni rgyal ba 'khor lo rab tu skor// de dag kho mos thos shing dran par 'dzin// kho mo'i sna li mthu yang rnam dag ste/
258a4(phal chen): tshul brgya mtsho dag la thogs pa med// rnam par gnas rnams kun tu rab 'jug pa'i// tshul 'di rgyal sras khyod kyi shes par bgyi// kho mo'i lce ni rgya che
258a5(phal chen): rab tu yangs// sras cing 'dog dmar ran chen 'od du dag/ sems can bsam pa ci bzhin des shes byed// rgyal sras khyod kyi tshul 'di shes par bgyi
258a6(phal chen): kho mo'i chos lus shin tu rnam dag ste/ dus gsum kun tu 'od gsal rab tu gnas// gzugs lus sems can bsam pa ji bzhin te// de dag kun gyi
258a7(phal chen): dad pa'i dbang du mthong // kho mo'i sems ni chags med zag pa med// sgra dbyangs sprin gyi nga ro ji bzhin te// de'i khongasu ma mchog kun chud kyang //
258a8(phal chen): de la kho mo rnam par rtog pa med// zhing gi dbyings kyi sems can bsam mi khyab// de dag sems kyi rgya mtsho kho mos shes// de dag dbang po bsam
258b1(phal chen): pa rab shes kyang / de la kho mos rnam par rtog pa med// kho mo'i rdzu 'phrul rab yang shin tu grub// des ni bsam yas zhing rab tu spyod// lus kyi
258b2(phal chen): 'od dang mthu yang de bzhin te// de ni sems can gdul bka' shin du 'dul/ kho mo'i bsod nams rnams yangs yongasu dag/ kun tu rgyan byed zad pa
258b3(phal chen): bde pa'i mdzod// des na rgyal ba rnams la mchod par byed// 'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar yin// kho mo'i shes rab rnams yangs shin tu dag
258b4(phal chen): des ni chos mang rgya mtsho rab tu shes// 'gro ba kun gyi the tsom yongasu gcod// rgyal sras khyod kyi tshul 'di shes par bgyi// dus gsum kun la kho ma
258b5(phal chen): zhugs gyur pas// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho kun kyang mthong zhing shes// de dag smon lam la yang rab tu zhugs// tshul 'di dpag yas rab tu rdzogs pa
258b6(phal chen): yin// rdul mang kun la zhing rnams rgya mtsho mthong // de dag dus gsum 'jug pa 'ang de bzhin te// de dag kun gyi sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mthong // 'di ni
258b7(phal chen): kun tu gnas pa'i chos tshul gyi// rnam par snang mdzad byang chub sems rgyas te// phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing rnams rab bkang zhing // rdul sbubs
258b8(phal chen): kun gyi byang chub shing drung na/ zhi ba'i chos rnams gsum du sgrog la ltos// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs gi mtshan mo'i lha mo dbyings dang ldan pa
259a1(phal chen): phal/ la/ 'di skad ces smras so// lha mo khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs nas ji srid cig lags// de ltar
259a2(phal chen): khyod tshul 'di lta bus sems can gyi don bgyi ba la rta dkon du zhugs pa'i rnam par thar pa de ni khyed kyi bsnyes nas ji srid cig lags/ de skad ces smras pa dang /
259a3(phal chen): mtshan mo'i lha mo dbying dang ldan pas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu sngon 'das pa'i dus ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi/
259a4(phal chen): bskal pa'i yang pha rol cig tu bskal pa rab tu zhi ba'i 'od zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag lnga brgya skyes pa byung ste/ de'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni rin chen dpal
259a5(phal chen): 'byung ba zhes bya bar gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams de'i gling bzhi pa 'bring po rin chen zla ba sgron ma'i 'od ces bya ba de na/ rgyal po'i gnas pad+mo'i 'od ces bya ba
259a6(phal chen): yod de/ rgyal po'i gnas der rgyal po chos rab mu stegs zhes bya ba/ chos dang mthun pa'i rgyal po 'khor los sgyur ba/ gling bzhi la dbang ba rin po che bdun
259a7(phal chen): dang ldan pa byung ste/ des sa chen po de yang ri dang rgya mtshor bcas pa'i mthas gtugs par chos kyi rgyal bar byas nas bde bar gnas par byaso// rgyal po chos rab
259a8(phal chen): mu stegs des btsun mo chos kyi blo gros zla ba zhes bya ba byung ste/ de srod 'dod pas myos shing dga' bar rtse rtse bas dung na/ nam gyi gung la brdzun mo'i 'khor gyi gnas
259b1(phal chen): su phyin te nyal lo// de nas rgyal po pad+mo'i 'od de'i shar phyogs kyi nags tshal chen po// zhi ba'i dpal 'byung ba zhes bya bar/ rin po che'i rgyal po rgyan thams cad kyi/
259b2(phal chen): 'od dang ldan pa'i lhan can/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pas 'byung ba'i byang chub kyi shing chen po'i drung du/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad
259b3(phal chen): rab tu sgrogs pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas de'i mthus 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen
259b4(phal chen): dpal 'byung ba thams cad 'od chen po kha dog du ma can gyi rgyas par gang bar gyur to// rgyal po'i gnas pad mo'i 'od ces bya ba de na/ mtshan mo'i lha mo zla ba
259b5(phal chen): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i 'od ces bya ba 'dug 'dug ste/ des rgyal po'i btsun mo chos kyi blo gros zla ba'i gan du song nas/ rgyan dkrol ba'i sgras sad par byas
259b6(phal chen): te/ 'di skad ces smra so// 'di ltar rgyal po'i btsun mo shes par bgyi shig/ nags tshul chen po'i zhi ba'i dpal 'byung bar de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams
259b7(phal chen): cad rab tu sgrog pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyaso// de nas des rgyal po'i btsun mo de'i mdun du
259b8(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi yon tan sngags pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam rgya cher bshad// /
260a1(phal chen): phal#rigs kyi bu rgyal po'i btsun mo de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi snang bar gyur te/ bsam pa thag pas tha na med pa yang dag pa
260a2(phal chen): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun du bcas pa la mchod pa dang /
260a3(phal chen): rim 'gror cher byaso// rigs kyi bu de la ci snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po'i btsun mo chos kyi blo gros bzla ba zhes bya ba gzhan zhig yin snyam du
260a4(phal chen): sems na ni/ de ltar mi lta ste/ kho mo ni 'di tshe de'i dus na rgyal po'i btsun mo chos blo gros zla bar gyur to// rigs kyi bu kho mo ni mos pa'i sems bskyed pa de dang
260a5(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa la bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des/ bskal pa ri rab tsam gyi rdul shin du phra ba snyed tshun tshad du/ nam yang ngan song log par ltung bar ma skyes
260a6(phal chen): te/ sems can dmyal bar ma yin no// byol song gi skye gan su ma yin no// yid gsum yin no// nam yang rigs dpa' bar ma skyes so// nam yang dbang po mi ldan
260a7(phal chen): par ma gyur to// nam yang sdug bsngal bar ma gyur te/ de ltar kho mos rtag par lha'i bdag nyid che ba thob mi'i nang du mi'i bdag nyid che ba thob ste/ de ltar sangs
260a8(phal chen): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i gshes gnyen dang yang ma bral lo// dus ngan par yang ma skyes so// rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo sangs rgyas gcig tu dge
260b1(phal chen): ba'i rtsa ba skyed de/ bskal pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig tu lam bde zhing mnyam pa nas/ nye zho med par byin kyang de tsam gyi kho mo'i byang chub sems
260b2(phal chen): dpa'i dbang po yongs su grub par ma gyur ste/ ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bskal pa de dag ni 'das/ bskal pa bzang po 'di'i sngon rol gyi ni/ bskal
260b3(phal chen): pa chen po stong phrag bcu'i theg ma la bab pa de'i tshe/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzi brjid rdul gyi dri ma med pa zhes bya bar bskal pa mya ngan med cing rdul dang bral
260b4(phal chen): ba zhes bya bar byung ste/ rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams gzi brjid rdul gyi dri ma med pa'i dpal de ni/ kun nas nyon mongs pa la rnam par dag par gyur te/
260b5(phal chen): der sangs rgyas lnga brgya byung ngo // sangs rgyas lnga brgya po de dag gi the kau ma la/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa dang zhabasu ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig
260b6(phal chen): rten mkhyen pa bla na med pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi'i ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ ri rab rgyal mtshan spyan yangs shing zhi ba'i
260b7(phal chen): dpal zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i tshe kho mo yang tshong dpon snyan pas rnam par grags pa'i bu mo shes rab snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba gzugs mdzes
260b8(phal chen): zhing bzang la lta na sdug pa/ kha dog shin tu mdzes shing rgyas pa dang ldan pa zhig tu gyur te/ mtshan mo'i lha mo zla ba shin tu rnam par dag pa'i 'od zhes bya ba de yang
261a1(phal chen): phal/ smon lam gyi dbang gyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdul dang bral ba'i rgyal po'i gnas rgyal mtshan sna tshogasu mtshan mo'i
261a2(phal chen): lha mo'i migo rnam par dag pa zhes bya bar gyur te/ des kho mo mtshan mo mi nyal tsam zhig na/ pha ma nyal bar gyur pa dang / khyim de yang yongasu bskyed de/ 'od
261a3(phal chen): chen po snang bar byas nas rang gi gzugs stan te/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan sngags pa brjod nas de bzhin gshegs pa thogs ma mngon par sangs rgyas nas zhag
261a4(phal chen): bdun lon te/ snying po byang chub la zhugs pa de ston to// de nas kho mo pa ma dang gnyen bshes kyi tshogs tshogs chen po dang 'grogs te/ mtshan mo'i lha mo
261a5(phal chen): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i zla ba'i 'od sngon du bdar nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i spyan sngar byin/ de nas kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod pa rgya chen
261a6(phal chen): po byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i zhal mthong ma thag tu/ ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba 'dul zhing sangs rgyas mthong bar byed pa zhes bya ba dang / ting nge 'dzin
261a7(phal chen): dus gsum gyi dbyings ye shes kyi snang ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'ang thob par gyur to// de thob pas kyang kho mos skal pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba
261a8(phal chen): snyed po de dag rjesu dran par gyur to// kho mo'i byang chub kyi sems de yang mngon du gyur te/ de ltar kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa de las chos bstan pa thos te/
261b1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sems can thams cad kyi mun pa rnam par sel ba'i chos kyi snang bas 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba'i sgo 'di yang thob par
261b2(phal chen): gyur to// de thob pas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed las kyi rgyan par 'gengs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag
261b3(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i rmi lam du snang zhing bdag nyid kyang de dag thams cad kyis zhabs kyi drung na 'dug
261b4(phal chen): par shes so// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu sems can ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i rmi lam du snang te/ de dag gi sgra skad rnam par
261b5(phal chen): tha dad pa'i brda yang rab tu shes so// sems dang bsam pa dang / dbang po dang / mos pa 'ang rab tu shes sngon gyi mtha'i dge ba'i gshes gnyen rnams kyi
261b6(phal chen): drung du yongasu smin par gyur pa'ang rab tu shes so// de dag la bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshims par gyur pa'i lus kyang yongasu ston to// kho mo'i rnam par thar
261b7(phal chen): pa'i de yang sems kyi skad cig re re la rnam par 'phel te/ rnam par thar pa'i sems de'i 'og ma'i sems kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams brgya'i
261b8(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed lus kyi rgyas par 'gengaso// de'i 'og ma'i sems kyi sangs rgyas kyis zhing 'jig rten gyi khams stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed lus
262a1(phal chen): phal/ kyi rgyas par 'gengaso/ de'i 'og ma'i sems kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rgya phrag stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed lus
262a2(phal chen): kyi rgyas par 'gengaso// de bzhin du sems kyi skad cig re re zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul
262a3(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bar dag kyang lus rgyas par 'gengaso// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad
262a4(phal chen): kyang kho mo'i mig lam du snang ste/ bdag nyid kyang de dag gi zhabs kyi drung na 'dug par shes so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi chos bstan pa
262a5(phal chen): de dag thams cad kyang len to// 'dzin to// yongs su 'dzin to// nye bar 'dzin to// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sngon gyi tshul rgya mtsho dang smon lam rgya
262a6(phal chen): mtsho la yang 'jug go// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi yong su dag pa de dag thams cad kyang / rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par
262a7(phal chen): ba'i phyir mngon pa sgrub bo// sems can ji snyed cig 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag tu skyes par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / kho mo'i mig lam du snang
262a8(phal chen): ste/ sems can de dag gi bsam pa dang / dbang po dang mos pa'i bye brag ji snyed kyi bye brag tu de dag yong su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i phyir lus byin
262b1(phal chen): gyi brlabs ste/ de ltar kho ba'i rnam par thar pa de ni/ sems kyi skad cig re re la'ang chos kyi dbyings 'jam klas pa rgyas par 'gengs pa'i tshul gyis rnam
262b2(phal chen): par 'phel lo// rigs kyi bu kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa/ sems can thams cad kyi mun pa rnam par sel ba'i chos kyi snang bas 'gro
262b3(phal chen): bas/ rnam par dul ba'i sgo 'di shes par zad na kho mos byang chub sems dpa' mtha' dang dbus med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod
262b4(phal chen): pa dang smon lam gyi byung ba/ chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho'i tshul 'jam klas par 'dal ba la 'jug par dbang sgyur ba/ byang chub sems dpas yang dag pa
262b5(phal chen): bsgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin ye shes rdo rje'i dpal gyi rnam par rtse ba 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigasu thams cad yang dag par
262b6(phal chen): gzung ba la smon lam chen pos byung ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad sems kyi skad cig gcig gi yongasu dag par bya ba'i bsod
262b7(phal chen): nams kyi rgya mtsho chen po yongasu sgrub pa/ sems kyi skad cig re re la sems can gyi khams thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i ye shes
262b8(phal chen): la dbang sgyur ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad tu sems cad kyi sgrib pa'i mun pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i ye shes kyi nyi ma'i mig dang ldan pa
263a1(phal chen): phal/ @sems can gyi khams thams cad la theg pa chen po rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i mthu dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi
263a2(phal chen): the tshom dang nem nur dang / yid gnyis kyi rab rib rnam par sel ba'i blo gros kyi zla ba dang ldan pa/ srid pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad la mngon par chags
263a3(phal chen): pa las gyen du bskyed pa'i sgra dpyad kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi rdul gyi cha shes la rnam par 'phrul pa yongasu ston
263a4(phal chen): pa la dbang sgyur ba/ dus gsum gyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la ye shes dbyer med pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod pa 'am/ spyod
263a5(phal chen): pa la 'jug pa 'am/ rnam par thar pas rnam par rtse ba yongasu bstan par nus re skan// // song rigs kyi bu yul ma gau ta 'di nyid kyi snying po bya
263a6(phal chen): chub la kho mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed pa/ yang dag par skul ba'i mtshan mo'i lha mo kun zab pa'i dpal gyi dri ma
263a7(phal chen): med pa'i 'od zhes bya bar 'dug gi de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nas
263a8(phal chen): du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tsheng dpon gyi bu nor bzangs gi mtshan mo'i lha me dbyings dang ldan pa la// tshig su bcad pa 'di dag mngon par stod do// khyod
263b1(phal chen): sku shin du rnam par dag pa mthong // mtshan gyi rnam rgyan ri bo ji bzhin du/ 'jig rten kun las mngon 'phags 'jig rten du/ phun sum tshogs sku 'jam dpa
263b2(phal chen): bzhin du mdzes// khyod chos sku shin tu rnam dag ste/ dus gsum kun tu mnyam zhing rnams mi rtog/ der ni 'jig rten ma lus kun 'du ste/ 'byung zhing rnam pa
263b3(phal chen): 'jig kyang chags mi mngal/ lam rgyud 'byam klas thams cad kun du yang / khyod kyi sku ni gzugs brnyan rnam par bye// skar chen zla skar rgyu skar
263b4(phal chen): tshogs shin du// spu rtse kun la'ang khyod ni bdag gi mthong // khyod kyi thugs yangs shin tu rnam dag ste// phyogs rnams kun gyi nam mkha' dbyingasu
263b5(phal chen): rgyas/ der ni mi mchog kun kyang yongasu 'dud// khyed la ye shes mi rtog dam pa mnga'// zhing gi rdul snyed rnam pa sna tshogs sprin// khyod kyi spu rtse kun
263b6(phal chen): nas mngon mthong ba// brgyan mang sna tshogs char pa mngon 'bebs shing // phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas drung rgyas par 'gengs// 'gro ba kun snyed lus
263b7(phal chen): rnams mtha' yas pa// khyod kyi spu rtse kun nas mngon mthong cing / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rgyas par yongs bkang nas// sna tshogs thabs kyi se
263b8(phal chen): can rnam par sbyongs// spu rtse kun la bsam yas zhing gi rnams// sna tshogs rgyan ldan rnam pa tha dad mthong // lam rgyud sems can khyod kyi rnam sbyangs pa/
264a1(phal chen): b.laji snyed de dag bsam bzhin kun kyang byung // gang zhig khyod kyi mtshan thos 'gar 'gyur ba// de dag thob bya legs thob legs
264a2(phal chen): par mtsho// sems can gang gi khyod kyi sku mthong ba// byang chub lam la mngon tu ltas par 'gyur// de ltar thos na rab tu sems dga' la// mthong ba tsam
264a3(phal chen): gyi nyon mongs zhi mdzad pas// bskal pa bsam yas ngan song gnas kyang rung // khyod kyi zhal lha'i don du mos par bgyi// zhing rnam stong gi rdul snyed
264a4(phal chen): ma lus te// de snyed bskal pa rgyud de khyod 'dra ba'i// sru cig yon tan legs brjod kyang // legs pa'i mthar phyin nam du'ang ma gyur to// de nas
264a5(phal chen): tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzad kyi mtshan mo'i lha mo dbyings dang ldan pa la tshig su bcad pa de dag gi mngon par bstod nas// mtshan mo'i lha mo dbyings dang ldan pa
264a6(phal chen): rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ mtshan mo'i lha mo dbyings dang ldan pa lnga brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang ltas te/
264a7(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gnyen bkur bya bas ma ngoms bzhin du mtshan me'i lha mo'i dbying dang ldan pa'i drung nas song ngo // shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas
264a8(phal chen): pha la tsho zhes bya ba las ldong pos brgyan pa// // bam po dgu bcu rtsa dgu pa'o//
264b1(phal chen): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs mtshan mo'i lha mo dbying dang ldan pa/ thog ma byang chub tu zhugs pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi dkyil 'khor yongasu dag pa ni
264b2(phal chen): khong du chud par byed byang chub sems dpa'i snying po yang dag par 'byung ba la ni rjes su spyod// byang chub sems dpa'i sngon lam rgya mtsho la ni yongasu 'jug
264b3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam ni yongasu spyod// byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor ni yongasu gnan/ byang chub sems dpa'i
264b4(phal chen): dkyil 'khor ni rgya cher byed/ byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba'i rgya mtsho ni rje su 'brang // thams cad mkhyen pa'i snang ba chen po rgya mtsho la rnam par
264b5(phal chen): lta/ 'gro ba thams cad yongasu skyabs pa la gzhol ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po'i sprin ni rgya cher byed// mtshan mo'i lha mo dbying dang
264b6(phal chen): ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor ni zhing thams cad du phyi ma'i mthar byin gyi brlabs pas
264b7(phal chen): mngon par bsgrub cing / mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od gang na ba der song ste/ mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i
264b8(phal chen): dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od la lan rgya stong
265a1(phal chen): pa ladu mar g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas nas/ mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i dpal dri med pa'i 'od kyi mdun du 'dug ste/ thal
265a2(phal chen): mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags ma bdag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub
265a3(phal chen): sems dpa'i sa la spyod pa dang / ji ltar byung ba dang ji ltar nan tan du bya ba ma tshal to// smras pa rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
265a4(phal chen): chub tu sems bskyed pa cig/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa la spyod pa dang / 'byung ba dang yongs su bsgrub pa dang / 'dri ba legaso leg so// rigs kyi bu chos
265a5(phal chen): dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la yongs su grub pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
265a6(phal chen): cad mngon du gyur par mthong ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku mtshan dang ldan pa rnam par blta ba'i mig rnam par dag
265a7(phal chen): pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha dog rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med par dmigs par bya ba la 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos sdang ba'i dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho tshang
265a8(phal chen): med pa la chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi tshad kyi 'jug pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo nas 'od zer rgya mtsho sems can thams
265b1(phal chen): cad mnyam par sems can sna tshogs kyi don du bkye ba la 'jug pa dang / ba sU bu ga re re nas 'od 'phro ba/ rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog tu 'dug pa rgya mtsho ston
265b2(phal chen): pa dang / sems kyi skad cig re re la sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa rgya mtsho chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par bkang zhing sems can 'dul ba'i byin gyi brlabs la 'ju
265b3(phal chen): pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sems can thams cad kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag dang ldan pas dus gsum du byung ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i sgra sgrog pas mdo
265b4(phal chen): sde thams cad kyi sprin gyi 'brug sgra sgrogs pas mdo sde thams cad kyi sprin gyis 'brug sgra 'byin pa'i dkyil 'khor la 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rgya mtsho mtha'
265b5(phal chen): dang dbus med pa la 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa yongasu bstan pas sems can 'dul ba la 'jug pa ste/ rigs kyi
265b6(phal chen): bu tshe sa bcu po 'di dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la yongasu grub pa yin no// rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems
265b7(phal chen): dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bde bas kun du rnam par gnon par thob pa ste/ rigs kyi bu kho mo ni de'i mthus dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin
265b8(phal chen): gshegs pa thams cad kyang mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa la 'jug go// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dang
266a1(phal chen): la@#ting nge 'dzin mtha' dbus med pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i mtsho dang / mngon gyi tshul rgya mtsho dang mtshan rgya mtsho la 'ang 'jug go// de bzhin
266a2(phal chen): gshegs pa de dag gi chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu 'khor ba rnam pa tha dad pa la'ang 'jug go// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad sna tshogs dang dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam patha dang
266a3(phal chen): pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi chos kyi dbyings mtha' dbus med pa'i sku la 'ang 'jug ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la dngos po mngon par gzhan
266a4(phal chen): pa'ang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad tu bzhud pa 'gags pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni bzhud du byed pa'o// rang bzhin gyi
266a5(phal chen): 'byung ba med pas na de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni byon pa med pa'o// mi skye ba'i chos nyid dang mnyam pa'i sku mnga' ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni ma skyes pa'i
266a6(phal chen): mi skye ba'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ma 'gags pa'o// sgyu ma rnam par lta bur mthong zhing rnam par dmigs pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs
266a7(phal chen): pa de dag ni bden pa ma yin pa'o// 'gro ba thams cad kyi don du 'byung ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni brdzun ma yin pa'o// shi 'pho dang skye ba las rnam par
266a8(phal chen): 'das pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni 'pho ba med pa'o// chos kyi rang bzhin gyi 'jig pa med pa chos nyid yin pa'i phyir// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni
266b1(phal chen): 'jig pa med pa'o// ngag gi las thams cad las yong su 'das pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad ni mtshan nyid gcig pa'o// chos kyi mtshan nyid/
266b2(phal chen): kyi rang bzhin gyi mthar thugs pas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni mtshan nyid mi mnga' ba'o// rigs kyi bu kho mo ni de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad khong du
266b3(phal chen): chud par byed cing byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bamam gtan bzhi pa'i bde bas kun tu rnam par gnon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan gyi dkyil
266b4(phal chen): 'khor snang ba shin tu rgya cher byed do// shin du yangs par byed do// khong du chud par byed do// rtogs par byed do// mnyam par byed do// mngon par bsgrub pa'o//
266b5(phal chen): bzhi snyoms par byed do// rab tu 'jug go/ rnam par 'phel bar byed do// nges par bsam so// nye bar rtog go/ dran par byed do// spyod yul du byed do// brtan
266b6(phal chen): bar byed do// snang bar byed do// rab tu brjod do// rnam par brjod do// tshogs su byed do// yid ched par byed do// yongasu rtogs pa thams cad rgyu ba med pa'i
266b7(phal chen): snying rje chen po de la gnas te/ sems can thams cad yongasu bskyabs pa la yang dag spyad par sems rtse gcig tu bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan dang po sgom mo//
266b8(phal chen): yid kyi las thams cad nye bar zhi bar bya ba dang ye shes kyi stobs dang mthus sems can thams cad yongasu bsdu ba la dga' ba'i bde ba la sems rtse gcig
267a1(phal chen): ngalatu bya ba'i bsam gtan gnyis pa sgom mo// 'khor bar ldog par zhugs pa la gtang snyom su byas so// sems can thams cad
267a2(phal chen): kyi rang bzhin nges par rtog par bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan gsum pa sgom mo// sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang / sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar bya
267a3(phal chen): ba'i phyir/ bsam gtan bzhi pa sgom mo// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor shin tu yangs par bya ba dang / ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho thams
267a4(phal chen): cad mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho thams cad kyi tshul la 'jug par bya ba dang / byang chub sems
267a5(phal chen): dpa'i rnam par rtse ba'i ye shes thams cad mngon par shes par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyed pas rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad dang / mngon par
267a6(phal chen): bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir ske kun nas chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi tshul yongasu sbyong zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gtan
267a7(phal chen): ngazhi pa'i bde bas kun tu rnam par gnon pa 'di bsgom mo// rigs kyi bu de ltar ngo mo rnam par thar ba 'di sgom zhing thabs sna tshogs kyi sems can yongs
267a8(phal chen): smin par byed do// 'di ltar nub mo zhi bar gyur pa'i tshe/ dga' ba la mos pa'i sems can rnams kyi mi sdug pa'i 'du shes bskyed do// mi dga' ba'i 'du
267b1(phal chen): shes dang / yongasu skyob pa'i 'du shes dang / brtsegasu gyur pa'i 'du shes dang / 'ching ba'i 'du shes dang / srin po'i 'du shes dang / mi rtag pa'i 'du
267b2(phal chen): shes dang / sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes dang / bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang / rje med pa'i 'du shes dang / gzhan la rag las pa'i 'du shes dang / dga'
267b3(phal chen): ba'i 'du shes dang / 'dod pa'i yul dang / longs spyod thams cad la dga' ba med pa'i 'du shes skyed de/ sems cad de dag kyang sems de la yongasu
267b4(phal chen): sgom pas/ 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pas/ chos la mos pa'i dga' ba la 'jug cing / khyim nas khyim med par tu
267b5(phal chen): byung ngo // de dag dgon pa la gnas pa'i tshe 'ang / chos thun pa'i dad pa yong su bskyed do// sgra chen po 'jig pa mi snyan pa'i sgra skad thams cad zhi bar byed
267b6(phal chen): mtshan mo'i zhi bar 'gyur ba las sa sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo yang dag par ston to// sdang ba dang mthun pa'i rkyen kyang nye bar ston to// khyim gyi sgo 'ang
267b7(phal chen): rnam par 'byed do// lam yang yang yongasu ston to// sdang bas kyang mngon par byed do// mun pas mchod pa'ang rnam par sel to// 'jig pa'ang med
267b8(phal chen): par byed do// rab tu byung bar yang dag par sngags par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi legs pa'ang brjod do// chos kyi legs pa dang / dge 'dun gyi
268a1(phal chen): lalegs pa dang // dge ba'i gshes gnyen gyi legs pa brjod do// dge ba'i gshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba la'ang sngags
268a2(phal chen): pa byed do// rigs kyi bu kho mo rnam par thar pa 'di la sgom zhing sems can rnams kyi chos yin pa'i 'dod chags kyi zhen pa rnams kyi chos ma yin pa'i
268a3(phal chen): 'dod chags kyi yongasu rtog pa rnams kyang med par byed do// tshul ma yin pa'i 'dod pas non pa rnams dang / logs par yong su rtog pa'i spyod yul
268a4(phal chen): can rnams kyi yongs su rtog pa de dag dang / yid la bya ba de dag kyang med par byed do// sdig to mi dge ba'i chos ma skyed pa dang / sdig ste yong su rton
268a5(phal chen): skyes par gyur pa rnams kyang med par gyur pa'i rkyen nye bar bsgrub bo// dge ba yongs su rtog pa pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa dang / spyod pa dang ldan pa dang /
268a6(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shesu byung ba'i smon lam mngon par sgrub pa dang ldan pa dang / byams pa'i tshul dang / sems can rnams la snying rje chen pos
268a7(phal chen): rgyas par 'gengs pa dang ldan pa dang / lha dang mi'i bde ba'i rnam pa sna tshogasu sbed pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes yongasu rtog pa bskyed pa dang / skyes nas kyang
268a8(phal chen): tshul sna tshogs kyi rkyen nye bar bsgrub par byed pa nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mthun pa'i rkyen kyang nye bar bsgrub par byed do// rigs kyi bu kho mos bya
268b1(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bde ba kun tu rnam par gnon pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa' kun
268b2(phal chen): du bzang po'i spyod pa dang smon lam gyi byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa mtha' yas pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes rab tu thob pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba tham
268b3(phal chen): cad kyi rnam par spel ba'i sems cad ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi mthus sems kyi snang ba rab tu thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa
268b4(phal chen): thams cad kyi yul la gnas pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ gnas thams cad tu sgrib pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi smon lam yongs
268b5(phal chen): rdzogs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ zhing rgya mtsho thams cad tu zhugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sems rgyas rgya mtsho thams cad mthong bar bya ba la zhugs pa'i seMs
268b6(phal chen): dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin gyi char yang dag par gzung ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i
268b7(phal chen): mun pa sel ba/ 'khor ba'i bde ba la dga' zhing srid pa zab cing mthar phyin par 'gyur ba'i lam gyi/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du snang ba'i skyed pa'i
268b8(phal chen): sems dang ldan pa/ de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu 'di nyid na nga dang yang rgyang mi ring ste/ rnam par snang
269a1(phal chen): @mdzad kyi snying po byang chub kyi g.yas rol na mtshan rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro ba rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba 'dug gi de'i gan du song
269a2(phal chen): la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i las la brtson par bya ba dris shig/ de nas mtshan mo'i lha mo kun du zad pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i
269a3(phal chen): 'od kyi/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i bsam gtan zhi ba'i bde bas kun tu rnam par gnon pa 'di nyid brten par bya ba'i phyir/ tshong dpon
269a4(phal chen): gyi bu nor bzang la tshig su gcad de smras pa/ dus rnams kun tu 'byung ba'i bde gshegs rnams/ mngon du bya ba mos pa'i sems ldan pa/ de dag mig yang
269a5(phal chen): rnam par dag par 'gyur// des ni sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mthong bar 'ong / rgyal ba'i sku gsal dri ma med la ltos// mtshan gyi yongasu brgyan pas shin du
269a6(phal chen): mdzes// rgyal ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa chos dbyings rnams/ skad cig re res rgyas 'gengs de la 'ang ltos// byang chub shing drung sangs rgyas gdan
269a7(phal chen): rab la// bde gshegs rnam par snang mdzad mngon sangs rgyas// chos dbyings yangs rgyas par khyab mdzad cing // 'gro ba'i bsam pa ji zhig 'khor
269a8(phal chen): lo bskor// rgyal bas chos nyid lus med rab zhi ba// gnyis med rang bzhin med par thugs chud nas/ gzugs sku bzangs po mtshan gyi brgyan pa yis/
269b1(phal chen): 'gro ba ma lus skang zhing ston pa mdzad// sangs rgyas sku ni che ba bsam mi khyab// chos kyi dbyings na yongasu rgyas bkang zhing // de ni kun du mnyam par
269b2(phal chen): snang ba ste// rgyal ba thams cad kun tu ston pa mdzad// zhing rnams kun gyi rdul rab phra ba ste// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor mnga' ba'i sangs rgyas sku/ kha dog
269b3(phal chen): bzang po gzhan dang gzhan snang bas// chos dbyings rgyas par skad cig re res 'gengs// rgyal ba'i spu'i sgo nas 'od zer sprin// rgya cher bsam yangs mi
269b4(phal chen): zad mngon byung ba// de dag 'gro ba ma lus 'gengs byed cing // srog chags rnams kyi nyon mongs gdungs pa sel// sangs rgyas sprul pa rgya mtsho mi zad
269b5(phal chen): pa// rgyal ba'i sku'i 'khor nas yongs ston cing // chos dbyings yangs pa rgyas par kun bkang ste// srog chags rnams kyi sdug bsngal ngan song sel//
269b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas gsung snyan rab tu grogs mdzad pa/ dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho'i sgra 'od can/ chos char chen po rab tu 'bebs mdzad pa// srog chags
269b7(phal chen): byang chub bsam pa yongs su skyed// bskal pa rgya mtshor spyod pa spyod pa'i tshe// 'di ni sngan chad yongasu bzung mdzad pa// de dag kun gyi rgyal ba snang
269b8(phal chen): mdzad pa/ zhing rnams kun du gzugs brnyan mtshan nyid mthong / de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten kun tu 'byung / sems can re re kun la mngon par
270a1(phal chen): phal/ zhugs// mos pa'i tshul bzhin spyod yul gzhan dang gzhan/ de dag kho mos kun du shes mi nus// rgyal sras dam pa thams
270a2(phal chen): cang ma lus par// bde gshegs pa spu gcig gi rtse las byung // rnam thar de las gang rnams bsam yas pa// de dag thams cad kho mos shes mi
270a3(phal chen): nus// kho mo'i mdab na gnas pa'i lha mo 'di/ 'jig rten mgon la mngon gyur rab tu dga'// ming du snang ba 'od 'phro mig ces bya// de la byang
270a4(phal chen): chub spyod pa ci 'dra dris/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang gi mtshan mo'i kun tu zab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal
270a5(phal chen): te// mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas nas yang dang bltas te/ mtshan
270a6(phal chen): mo'i lho mo kun du dri ma med pa'i drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs de dge ba'i gshes gnyen gyi gdam ngag gi byin gyis rlabs pa/ dge
270a7(phal chen): ba'i gshes gnyen gyi tshig la nan tan du bya ba'i sems yang dag par skyed pa/ dge ba'i gshes gnyen gyi sman pa la nad pa lta bu'i 'du shes kyi yongasu
270a8(phal chen): sbyang ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i gshes gnyen mthong ba yid la ma 'khrug pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i gshes gnyen lta ba lta ba la sgrib
270b1(phal chen): pa'i ri thams cad rnam par gtor ba'i glags rnyed pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong ba la sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs
270b2(phal chen): su skyabs pa'i snying rje chen po'i tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug pa thob pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong ba la chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya
270b3(phal chen): mtsho'i ye shes snang ba rab tu thob pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i 'gro ba rnam par glang na ba der song ngo // de nas
270b4(phal chen): mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang bas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs de bas kyang dge ba'i gshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro
270b5(phal chen): ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs las byung bas/ yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba/ tshogs chen po las byung bar byin
270b6(phal chen): gyi rlab so// dge ba'i gshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba rnam par gnon pa chen por byin gyi rlab so// dge ba'i gshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba brtson 'grus
270b7(phal chen): kyi las 'jug par dka' bar byin gyi rlab so// dge ba'i gshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba bsdad pa'i shin legs par byin gyis rlabaso// dge ba'i
270b8(phal chen): gshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba phyogs mtha' dang dbus med pa la 'jug par byin gyis rlab so// dge ba'i gshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba yun ring
271a1(phal chen): phalabor gnas pas 'byung bar byin gyi brlabaso// dge ba'i gshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba don mtha' yas pa yongasu rnam par dmigs
271a2(phal chen): bar byin gyis brlab so// dge ba'i gshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba lam gyi rgyan mtha' dang dbus med pa'i tshogs kyi semasu gnon pa'i byin gyis rlab so// dge
271a3(phal chen): ba'i gshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba g.yo ba med par 'ongs pas rnam par gnon par byin gyis rlab so// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang thams cad mkhyen
271a4(phal chen): ba'i tshogs kyi brtson 'grus la rab tu brtson pas/ dge ba'i gshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang / smon lam chen po mngon par bsgrub pa'o rnam par
271a5(phal chen): gnon pas dge ba'i gshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang / sems can gcig gi don du phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal ba'i mur thugs par sdug bsngal nyam su
271a6(phal chen): blangs pa'i zhe non pas dge ba'i gshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang / rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la chos kyi dbyings thams cad du sgra sgrogs cing
271a7(phal chen): yun ring por gnas pa'i rnam par gnon pa dang / brtson 'grus chen po'i sgo bgos pas dge ba'i gshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang / phyogs
271a8(phal chen): rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa thams cad du shugs kyi 'gro bas dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang / ba spu'i sbubs gcig tu phyi ma'i mtha'i skal bar byang chub
271b1(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pas dge ba'i gshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas kyang sems kyi skad cig re re la thams cad
271b2(phal chen): mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'gengs pa la gnas par bya bas/ dge ba'i gshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang / dus sum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par
271b3(phal chen): 'phrul pa'i rgyan dang / lam yongasu non pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul gyi rgyun du zhugs lam yongasu gnon pas dge
271b4(phal chen): ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul thams cad la dmigs pa las ma g.yos par chos kyi dbyings kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pas dge ba'i
271b5(phal chen): gshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro bas mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba ga la ba der byin nas/ des mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga'
271b6(phal chen): ba'i mig 'gro ba snang ba bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na seng ge'i khri me tog gi snying po can la 'dug cing / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin kun tu
271b7(phal chen): bzang po'i dga' ba yangs shing dri ma med pa'i shugs kyi rgyal mtshan la mnyam par bzhag pa mthong ngo // de'i ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol
271b8(phal chen): tu phyin pa'i spyod pa mngon par ston pa'i sprin sems can thams cad mngon par dga' ba/ sems can thams cad yid du 'ong ba/ sems can thams cad kyi lta na
272a1(phal chen): b.lanyam su bde ba/ sems can thams cad kyi lta na sdug pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ba'ang mthong ste/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad la phan
272a2(phal chen): gdags shing gcod pa med par bya ba dang / dngos po thams cad la 'phangs par rtsi ba med par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad la sbyor ba brtsubs pas yongs su
272a3(phal chen): gtang bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i semasu bya ba dang / sems can thams cad la skyes pa yongs su gtang ba dang / nang dang phyi'i dngos
272a4(phal chen): po thams cad yongasu gtang ba dang / dka' ba chen po yongs su gtang ba stan pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad du sems can gyi bsam pa ji bzhin gyi sbyin pa'i spyod pa
272a5(phal chen): yongasu bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ sems can thams can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs pa dang mthun sgras sbyin pa'i spyod pa yongasu ston po'i sprin dang /
272a6(phal chen): dus gsum du byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnams gtang bar dka' ba yongasu gtang ba'i sprul pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i sprin thon nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
272a7(phal chen): khams 'byam klas par gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi rnam par dmig par gyur pa mthong ngo // 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i khyu mchog gi mthu byung ba
272a8(phal chen): dang / rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa thob pas/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas sems can thams cad dang mnyam pa'i skye ba sna tshogasu sprul pa'i lus kyi sprin/
272b1(phal chen): sngon par 'thon te/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad la rgyas par khyab par byas nas/ mngon sum du rtul shugs thams cad
272b2(phal chen): kyi yi dam las mi g.yo bar yongasu ston pa dang / sems kyi khams dang mnyam pa'i dka' thub dang rdul shugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu ston pa dang / 'jig rten thams
272b3(phal chen): cad du gnas pa med pa dang / yul thams cad la ltos pa med pa dang / 'khor ba thams cad du gnas pa las phyir phyogs pa dang / lha dang mi phun sum tshogs pa
272b4(phal chen): dgud pa'i sgor gzhol ba'i yongasu ston pa dang / mi sdug pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu ston pa dang / 'jig rten gyi sdug pa'i 'du shes kyi phyin ci logs rnam par bzlog
272b5(phal chen): pa dang / mi rtag pa dang g.yo ba dang / 'jig rten pa dang 'gyur ba'i chos nyid yongasu ston pa dang / 'du byed thams cad kyi chos nyid sdug bsngal zhing bdag po yongs
272b6(phal chen): ston pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul gnas pa dang / mi 'bral bar mos par byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims shin tu dag par bya ba'i phyir sem
272b7(phal chen): can rnams la yang dag par skul ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin gyi sgras tshul khrims kyi spyod pa yongasu ston pa dang / sems can thams
272b8(phal chen): cad yongasu tshim par byed pa'i tshul khrims kyi dri zhim po yongasu ston pa byed cing sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // ba spu'i sgo thams cad
273a1(phal chen): phal// nas sems can thams cad dang mnyam pa'i lus kha dog sna tshogasu sprul pa'i sprin thon te/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad kyang nyam su
273a2(phal chen): bsod pa/ sems can thams cad la yongasu ston pa/ sems can thams cad kyi lus la gnod par thob brtsam kyang nyam su bzod par byed pa dang / sems can thams
273a3(phal chen): cad kyi tshul dang mi 'dra bar tshig gi spyod pa dang / brgyad pa dang sred pa dang / smyung ba dang / brtag pa dang / sdig pa nyam su mi bskul ba yongasu ston pa dang / rim gror
273a4(phal chen): ma byas thams cad kyi mthong ba dang / dma' bar mi 'gyur ba yongasu ston pa dang / sems can thams cad la nga rgyal med pa yongasu ston pa dang / chos thams cad kyi rang
273a5(phal chen): bzhin la bzod par mi zad pas ye shes mi zad pa yongasu ston pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad yongasu spang ba'i phyir// bzod pa'i spyod
273a6(phal chen): pa yongasu ston pa dang / sems can gyi lus dbyibs mi sdug cing kha dog mi mdzes pa'i gzugs rnam par bzlog pa med pa dang / sems can thams cad la de bzhin
273a7(phal chen): gshegs pa'i sku mdog rnam par dag pa bla na med pa yongasu ston cing / sems can yongasu smin par byed pa mthong ngo // ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas sems can thams
273a8(phal chen): cad mnyam pa'i skye ba sna tshogs kyi lus kha dog dang dbyibs dang chu zhengs sna tshogasu sprul pa'i srin 'thon te/ sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji bzhin du rgyas par khyab
273b1(phal chen): bar byas nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs chen po la brtson 'grus kyi mngon du 'dor ba yang dag par ston pa dang / bdud kyi dkrugs ma thams cad rnam par thon
273b2(phal chen): pa'i brtson 'grus dang / byang chub tu bsam pa'i mi 'khrug mi zlog pa'i brtson 'grus dang / sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las rab tu bsgral ba'i
273b3(phal chen): brtson 'grus dang / mi khom pa dang ngan song dang / ngan 'gro dang log par ltung ba'i lam thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i brtson 'grus dang / mi shes pa'i ri rnam
273b4(phal chen): par gtor ba'i brtson 'grus dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod cing bsnyen bkur bar yongasu mi skyo ba'i brtson 'grus dang / sangs rgyas thams
273b5(phal chen): cad chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag par blangs pa dang yongasu bzung ba'i brtson 'grus dang / sgrib pa thams cad kyi ri rab tu gzhim zhing rnam par gtor ba'i brtson
273b6(phal chen): 'grus dang / sems can thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba dang / gdul bas mi skye ba'i brtson 'grus dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongasu dag par
273b7(phal chen): bya ba'i brtson 'grus dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i brtson 'grus rnam par dag pa bla na med pa yongasu ston cing sems can yong su smin par byed pa mthong ngo //
273b8(phal chen): kha spu'i sgo thams cad nas lus sna tshogs kha dog dang dbyi ba rnam pa tha dad par sprul pa'i sprin mthon te/ thabs sna tshogs kyi sems can gyi dga' ba yongasu
274a1(phal chen): la/ skyed pa dang / yid mi 'de ba rnam par bzlog pa dang / 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad rnam par smon pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa'i chos nyid
274a2(phal chen): 'jig rten du sgom pa dang / dbang po bsdam pa la sems can rnams rab tu bgod pa dang / tshangs pa'i spyod pa bla na med pa yang dag par sngags pa byed pa dang /
274a3(phal chen): 'dod pa'i 'jig rten bdud kyi yul 'jig rten dang bcas par yongasu ston pa dang / 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang bral ba rnams la 'jig rten gyi 'dod pa dang / dga'
274a4(phal chen): ba'i yul thams cad yongasu ston pa dang / chos la mos shing dga' ba la sems can rab tu bgod pa dang / mthar gyi bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin dang snyom
274a5(phal chen): par 'jug pa'i sgo mngon par bsgrub pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par gsal ba la nges par rtag pa'i sems can
274a6(phal chen): yongs su brjod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi zhing nge 'dzin gyi rgya mtsho'i rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad yongasu ston pa dang / byang chub sems
274a7(phal chen): dpa'i mngon par shes pa dang rnam par 'phrul pa dang / khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba yongasu ston par byed do// sems can rnams kyi bka' ba yongasu bskyed pa dang //
274a8(phal chen): spro ba phel bar bya ba dang / nyams bde ba yongasu skyed pa dang / yid mi bde ba bzlog pa dang / sems skyon med pa yongasu bsgrub pa dang / sems la su rung bar
274b1(phal chen): bya ba dang / bsam pa rnam par sbyang ba dang / dbang po gsal bar bya ba dang / lus kyi bde ba bskyed pa dang / chos la dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar/
274b2(phal chen): bya ba byed cing sems can rnams yongasu smin par byed pa mthong ngo // ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas skyo ba thams cad dang 'dra ba'i lus kyi sprin sna tshogs 'don te/
274b3(phal chen): zhing thams cad kyi khongasu chud pa'i sems can thams cad kyi yid bzhin du ston pa'i phyir/ dge ba'i gshes gnyen gyi gan gnas su 'gro bas skyo ba med
274b4(phal chen): pa yongasu ston pa dang / slob dpon dang bla ma dang / dge ba'i gshes gnyen la rim gro bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bas skye ba med pa yongasu ston pa dang / de bzhin
274b5(phal chen): gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yang dag par blang zhing yongasu bzung bas skyo ba med pa'i brtson 'grus yongasu ston pa dang / sangs rgyas
274b6(phal chen): rgya mtsho thams cad khong du chud bu bar byas pa'i tshul yang dag par brjod pa dang / chos kyi sgo rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par 'byed pa dang / chos thams cad kyi
274b7(phal chen): mtshan nyid dang rang bzhin dang / tshul mngon par brjod pa dang / chos thams cad ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo yongasu ston pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dri ba dang //
274b8(phal chen): the tshom rgya mtsho rnam par sel bas shes rab kyi yongasu snyan pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi lta ba'i ri shin du 'joms pa'i shes rab rdo rje yongasu ston pa
275a1(phal chen): ngal/ dang / sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pas sems can thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa rnam par sel ba'i shes rab kyi
275a2(phal chen): nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba yongasu ston par byed cing / sems can thams cad kyi dka' ba yongs su skye bar bya bas sems can rnams yongasu smin par
275a3(phal chen): byed pa mthong ngo // ba spu thams cad nas kha dog dang / dbyibs bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i lus mang po 'gro ba thams cad dang / snyam pa'i sprul pa'i sprin
275a4(phal chen): mthon te/ bsam pa dang nyos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad dang mngon du gnas shing / sgra skad sna tshogs kyi yongasu sbyang ba'i bstan pas/ 'ji
275a5(phal chen): rten pa'i bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa mngon par ston pa dang / 'jig rten gyi bya ba thams cad rab tu rgyu ba dang / khams gsum 'byung ba thams ca
275a6(phal chen): yongasu ston pa dang / khams gsum pa thams cad la byung ba'i phyogs yang dag par brjod pa dang / lta ba'i mya ngan mi zad pa thams cad las byung ba'i phyogs
275a7(phal chen): yang dag par bstan pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam gyi khyad par yong su brjod pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i lam las yongasasu zla
275a8(phal chen): ba yang dag par ston pa dang / rim gro bya ba dang / rim gror ma byas pa la byas sngangs kyi ba yongasu ston pa dang / 'khor ba mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo la ma
275b1(phal chen): gnas pa yang dag par ston pa dang / dga' ldan gyi gnas la sogs pa gcig nas gcig tu mi chad pa yongasu ston pa dang / snying po byang chub tu rdzogs par/
275b2(phal chen): 'tshang rgya ba rgyun mi chad pa yongasu ston par byed cing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems can yongasu smin par mthong ngo // ba spu'i sgo thams cad kyi baspu'i
275b3(phal chen): sgo re res kyang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi zhing rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lus sprul pa'i sprin 'thon te/ sems can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams tham
275b4(phal chen): cad la mngon gsum du gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa smon lam dang brjod pa dang / spyod pa dang smon lam dang brjed pa
275b5(phal chen): dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad rnam par dag pa'i mthar thug pa'i smon lam gyi khyad par yongasu brjod pa dang / sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi
275b6(phal chen): tshul rgya mtsho thams cad yongasu dag par bya ba yongasu brjod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod cing rim gro bya ba rgyun mi chad pa yongasu
275b7(phal chen): brjod pa dang / sems can skad cig re re la chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug pa rgyun mi chad pa'i yongasu ston pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
275b8(phal chen): mtsho thams cad rdul shin du phra ba snyed kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug rgyun mi chad pa yongasu ston pa dang / zhing thams cad du phyi ma'i mtha'i
276a1(phal chen): 5bskal pa mur thug par gnas shing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam rnam par dag par bya bar yongs su 'arjod par rgyun mi chad pa yang
276a2(phal chen): dag par ston pa dang / sems kyi skad cig re re la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs la 'jug pa rgyun mi chad pa yang dag par brjod pa dang / dus gsum gyi tshul
276a3(phal chen): tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug pa rgyun mi chad pa yongasu ston pa dang / zhing thams cad rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su bstan pa rgyun mi chad par
276a4(phal chen): yang dag par ston par byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang spyod pa yongasu bstan pas/ sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu
276a5(phal chen): 'god pa mthong ngo // ba spu'i sgo thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems dang mnyam pa'i lus kyi sprul pa'i sprin mang po mthon te/
276a6(phal chen): sems can thams cad la mngon par gnas shing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs kyi stobs mu med pa yongasu ston pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems
276a7(phal chen): kyi stobs kyi mi zad pa dang mi 'jig pa dang / chud mi za ba'i chos can yong su ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yong su sgrub pa'i
276a8(phal chen): stobs kyi phyir mi ldog la thugs med pa dang / rgyun med pa dang / bla na med pa yong su ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs 'khor ba'i
276b1(phal chen): nyes pa thams cad kyi mi gos pa yongasu ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par mthong ba dang / byang chub
276b2(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi dri mas nye bar nyon mongs pa med pa yongasu ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stob
276b3(phal chen): las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyi ri rnam par thor ba yongasu ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje chen po'i stobs bskal pa thams cad gnas
276b4(phal chen): kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongasu ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongasu bskyed cing bskul
276b5(phal chen): bas/ sems can thams cad rab tu dga' bar byed pa yongasu ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs bdud dang pas kyi rgol ba'i tshogs tha~Md
276b6(phal chen): rab tu 'job pa yongasu ston pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba'i ye shes kyi stobs chen po 'jig rten du rab tu brjod pa med cing / sems can thams cad
276b7(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongasu smin par byed pa mthong ngo // baspu'i sgo thams cad kyi ba spu'i ske re res nas kyang / lus kyi sprul pa rgya mtsho kha dog mtha'
276b8(phal chen): yas pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems dang mnyam pa'i sprin phyogs bcur mtha' yas pa'i sems can gyi khams can gyi khamasu rgyas par 'gengs pa mthon
277a1(phal chen): phal/ sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / ye shes kyi rnam par gnon pa yongasu
