417a5(phal chen): ltar 'bab pa bzhin du sems can rnams rnam par dag par bya ba'i chos la zhugs pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos yongasu dris pa la spobs pa'i rgyun mi chad
417a6(phal chen): pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba drug pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rgyud du byung ba'i snying
417a7(phal chen): po zhes bya ba'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skyes pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs kyi 'od snang
417a8(phal chen): ba'i rgyun gyi snying po zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'/ sangs rgyas kyi stobs la 'jug pa'i snang bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du
417b1(phal chen): 'gro ba las phyir mi ldog pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rgya mtsho las phyir mi 'gyur ro// chos thams cad sgyu ma'i rnam pa ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
417b2(phal chen): du shes par bya ba la gnas pas yongasu yi chad par mi 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad rmi lam lta bur rab tu rtogs par byed do// gzugasu rnam par dmigs
417b3(phal chen): gnas thams cad gzugs bsnyen lta bur mngon par bsgrub po// mngon par shes pas rnam par 'phrul pa sprul pa lta bur rab tu thob par byed do// srid pa
417b4(phal chen): thams cad du skye ba sgrib ma lta bur gtong rab tu ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo sgra brnyan lta bur shes so// thabs kyi tshul de/
417b5(phal chen): sna tshogs dang ldan pa rab tu brtson pas chos kyi dbyings kyi chur du bstan pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dam pa thob pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems
417b6(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba bdun pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs kyi 'od snang ba'i brgyan gyi snying po zhes bya'o// rigs
417b7(phal chen): bu 'di byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba brgyad pa ye shes kyi sgo kun nas rnam par spyad pas yongasu grub pa/ 'byung ba'i snying po
417b8(phal chen): zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dgod pa la rnam par gnas pa yin te/ de la gnas nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i
418a1(phal chen): la@#ye shes kyi tshul la rnam par spyod de ye shes kyi tshul gyi sgo re re la yang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa tshad med par yongasu ston
418a2(phal chen): pas/ bskal pa tshad med pa zad par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad la'ang pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam pas dbang du gyur te/
418a3(phal chen): sems kyi skad cig re re zhing sems kyi skad cig thams cad la yang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa dag na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs
418a4(phal chen): pa rnas kyi zhabs drung du skyes te/ dmigs pa tha mi dad pas thA mi dad pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug go// tha mi dad pa'i chos rnams la tha mi dang pa'i
418a5(phal chen): ye shes kyi dbang yongasu ston to// dmigs pa brjod du med pa dag kyang sgrib pa med pa'i dbyingasu non par byed do// dmigs pa chung ngus kyang mtha' yas pas
418a6(phal chen): bstan pa'i sa yong su 'jug go/ chos nyid tshad med pa yang chung ba 'am che bar khong du chud par byed do// 'jig rten thams cad kyi rnam par dmigs pa dang
418a7(phal chen): snyam par rab tu rtog par byed/ chos kyi dmigs pa thams cad dang / rnam par shes pa'i rgyud thams cad kyang sgom pas khong du chud par byed de/ rigs
418a8(phal chen): kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba brgyad pa/ ye shes kyi sgo kun nas rnam par spyad pas yongasu 'grub par
418b1(phal chen): 'byung ba'i snying po zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba dgu pa/ chos kyi dbyings sprul pas brgyan
418b2(phal chen): pa byed pa'i snying po zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi skad cig thams cad la rgyan sna tshogs dang / rgyan du mar
418b3(phal chen): ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing byin gyi rlobs te/ sprul pa thams cad mi gnas 'jig pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam pa thob pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa
418b4(phal chen): thams cad la shin du mkhas par 'gyur ba yin no// chos kyi sprul pa la mi 'jig pa rnam par dag pa yin/ chos kyi dbyings dam pa chags pa med pa'i
418b5(phal chen): spyod yul dang ldan pa yin/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gyi lus rnam par smin par bya ba'i byin gyi rlabs la mkhas pa yin/ sems can
418b6(phal chen): 'dul ba la mkhas pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa dang ldan pa yin/ spyod pa sna tshogs kyi mngon par 'tshang brgya pa yongasu ston pa yin/ thams cad mkhyen pa
418b7(phal chen): nyid kyi lam sgrib pa med pa mngon par sgrub pa mkhas pa yin/ de'i rgyud kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la mkhas pa yongasu ston pa yin/ sems can
418b8(phal chen): mtha' dang dpung med pa gdul ba'i thabs mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas pa yin/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi ye shes dbyig tu bya ba'i mdzod dang ldan
419a1(phal chen): pas sems can 'dul ba'i dus la bab na rtag tu sta gon du gnas pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sem
419a2(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba dgu pa/ chos kyi dbyings sprul pas brgyan ces bya ba'i snying po zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub
419a3(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba bcu pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yongasu gnon pa'i shugs drag po'i snying po zhes bya ba gang zhe na/
419a4(phal chen): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang rang bzhin cig pa'i yul dbang skur pa yin te/ 'jig rten gyi khams
419a5(phal chen): thams cad 'dab chags pa'i yul la rab tu 'jug pa yin/ sems can thams cad kyi mngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha'i shi 'pho dang skye ba'i sems
419a6(phal chen): rgyud chags par 'byung yang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ye shes 'dab chags pa'i yul yang rab tu shes so// 'das pa dang ma
419a7(phal chen): byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyang 'dab chags pa yang rab tu shes so// chos thams cad kyi rgyud 'dab
419a8(phal chen): chags pa la mkhas par bya ba yang rab tu shes so// bskal pa 'jig pa dang 'du ba thams cad mngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha'i dang / da ltar byung ba rnams
419b1(phal chen): kyang ming dang bcas/ sa tshigs dang bcas par 'dab chags par rab tu shes so// sems can tshul ji lta bur yong su smin par byas pa dang dus la gang /
419b2(phal chen): du 'bab pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i rgyan dang / rnam par 'tshang rgya bas 'dul bar bya ba yongasu ston pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi ye shes kyang mngon
419b3(phal chen): par bsgrub po// sangs rgyas byung ba thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i drung du nye bar 'gro zhing / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la mkhas pa'i tshul 'dab
419b4(phal chen): chags dang / sems can gyi khams mtha' dang dpung med pa gdul ba'i thabs mngon par bsgrub pa mkhas pas yong su stan te/ rigs kyi bu de dag ni
419b5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' skye ba bcu pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa yongasu gnon pa'i shugs drag po'i snying po zhes bya
419b6(phal chen): ba'o// rigs kyi bu de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba bcu pa ste/ de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' skye bar 'gyur
419b7(phal chen): ba'o// 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o// yang dag par smra ba byed pa'o// yang dag par 'phel bar byed pa'o// rab tu rdzogs par byed pa'o// yongasu grub
419b8(phal chen): bar byed do// zhing ma lus pa thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir rgyan cig gi lhab lbub la rgyan dang / lhab sgrub kyi rgyud rnam pa sna tshogs kyi byin
420a1(phal chen): gyi rlobs pa'o// sems can gyi khams gdul ba rgyun mi chad pa'i phyir phyi ma'i mtha' zhal pa phur rmugs pa'i byin gyi rlabs
420a2(phal chen): rgyun rang pa med par byed pa'o// chos kyi rgya mtsho thams cad kyi dmigs pa sna tshogs dang / shin tu bstan pa cig nas gcig tu rgyud pa sna tshogs du ma nas/
420a3(phal chen): ba tha dad pa dang / chos mtha' yas pa gcig nas cig tu rgyud pa'i rgyun mngon par tshangs rgya bar byed pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu byung ba bsam
420a4(phal chen): kyi mi khyab pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi klas pa na mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' gtug pa yongasu ston pa'o// sems can tshad med pa spyod pa rgya mtsho sna tshogs
420a5(phal chen): dang ldan pa yongasu smin par bya ba dang / gdul bas yongasu 'dus pa rnams la/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yongasu ston pa'i sems can gyi khams thams
420a6(phal chen): cad sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang mi bral bar byin gyi rlob pa'o// chos thams cad kyi sprin dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho brjod du med pas rnam par dag pa/
420a7(phal chen): dmigs pa thams cad las rab tu 'byung ba rnam par dmigs par byed pa'o// tshad med pa rnam par spyad pa la bsgrib pa med par rtog pas khong du chud pa'i
420a8(phal chen): rnams/ chos yid du 'ong ba'i rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor bsam pa dang / mos pa gang dang ldan pa'i tshul bzhin du/
420b1(phal chen): sems can rnams la yong su ston pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi sa tshad med pa'i rjesu song ba rnams 'jig rten thams cad yongasu bsgrub pa'i don du/ chos kyi mdzad
420b2(phal chen): mtha' dang dpung med pa rab tu ston pa'o// de nas lum bi ni nags tshal gyi lha mo gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor bzang pos dga' ba'i dpal gyi/ de'i tshe byang
420b3(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i chos kyi don de nyid bsal bar brjod pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi sa bcur rnam par ltas te/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang la
420b4(phal chen): tshigasu bcad de smras pa/ lhag pa'i bsam pa dri med rlog pa med pa'o// gang rnas rgyal ba'i lta bas rnam yang mi ngom shing / rgyal ba kun gyi phyi ma'i mtha
420b5(phal chen): rgyan phrin las// smon pa'i mkhas pa de dag skye ba'i thog ma nas/ dus sum 'byung ba'i 'jig rten ma lus kun bkang te/ zhing dang sems can de
420b6(phal chen): bzhin chos dang sangs rgyas rnams/ sems can dkrol phyir smon lam 'debs/ rgyan pa'i sems de ni bsam gyi mi khyab kye ba gnyis// gang rnams
420b7(phal chen): chos kyi sprin 'thung nam yang mi ngoms shing / nges par rtogs pa'i yid kyi dus gsum chags med lus/ mkha' dbyings dri med mnyam med sems
420b8(phal chen): kyi lus ldan pa/ mtshungs pa med pa de dag skye ba gsum/ lhag pa'i bsam pa ri rab rdo rje 'tshungs bstan pas/ thams cad mkhyen tshul rgya mtsho
421a1(phal chen): @rnam par 'jug byed cing / gang rnams snying rje na tha' tshur 'jug pa/ deni skyes du khyu mchog rnams kyi skyelal/
421a2(phal chen): gang rnams byams pas phyogs bcu rgyas par yongs bkang zhing / pha rol phyin pa dri med rgya mtsho mngon bsgrubs te/ chos kyi 'od skyed 'gro ba yongasu
421a3(phal chen): smin byed pa/ de ni skyes bu chen po de dag kyang skye ba lnga/ chos kyi rang bzhin rab tu rtog pas chags med sems/ dus gsum dpe zla med pa'i sangs rgya
421a4(phal chen): rigs khrungs shing / gang rnams chos rgya mtsho'i tshul 'jug byed pa/ 'di ni mkhas pa de dag skye ba yangs pa drug/ gang rnams chos lus yongs dag
421a5(phal chen): chags pa med pa'i sems// zhing rnams ma lus rang gi lus kyi dgang byas shing / sangs rgyas stobs rnams ma lus khongasu chud rtogs pa/ de ni mkhas
421a6(phal chen): pa rnams kyi skye ba bsam yas bdun/ gang rnams ye shes rgya mtsho'i tshul la dbang ldan zhing // thams cad mkhyen pa'i sgo tshul rnam par spyod byed la
421a7(phal chen): ting 'dzin kun tshul gang chen mtsho la yongs 'jug pa/ de ni de nyid rten rnams kyi skye ba brgyad/ gang rnams zhing kun 'byam klas yongasu spyong byed
421a8(phal chen): cing / sems can thams cad yongasu smin byed 'dul rab brtson/ sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan rnams rnam ston pa/ de ni grags pa chen
421b1(phal chen): po rnams kyi skye ba dgu/ gang rnams rgyal ba'i stobs rnams ci bzhin rab bzhugs te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i shugs drag yang ba rnam spel cing /
421b2(phal chen): gang rnams chos dbyings bzhi tshul tha dad chags med pa// de ni rgyal sras rnams kyi skye ba bcu yin no// rigs kyi bu skye ba bcu po de dag gi/ byang
421b3(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ris su skyeso// de ltar na 'jig rten thams cad la snang bar byed pa yin no// rigs kyi bu kho mo
421b4(phal chen): ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bskal pa tshad med par dmigs pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i skye bas rnam par 'phrul pa yongasu
421b5(phal chen): ton pa thob po// smras pa 'phags ma byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bskal pa tshad med par dmigs pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i
421b6(phal chen): skye bas rnam par 'phrul pa yongasu ton pa 'di ni yul ji lta bu zhig mchis/ smras pa rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi skye ba yod/
421b7(phal chen): su lta zhing nye bar 'gro ba'i smon lam yongasu grub pa te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi skye ba rgya mtsho shin du yang
421b8(phal chen): pa la 'jug cing khong du chud pa te/ 'di ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba khong du chud
422a1(phal chen): labar byed cing / gling bzhi pa skal ba dang ldan pa'i 'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i lum bi ni'i nags tshal du byang chub sems
422a2(phal chen): dpa' 'byung yongasu lta ba'i don du/ sngon gyi smon lam gyi skyes te/ de ltar kho mo 'di na byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba'i rjesu dran pa sgom zhing rnam par
422a3(phal chen): spyod do// de ltar kho mo 'di na gnas te de phan pa can lo brgyan bcom ldan 'das dga' ldan gyi pho brang nas 'pho bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tshe// lum bi ni'i
422a4(phal chen): nags tshal 'di 'dir/ sngon gyi ltas bcu byung gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar lu ma bi ni'i nags tshal 'di thams cad mthon dman med pa ngam grogs
422a5(phal chen): dang g.yang sa med cing mnyam par 'gyur ba 'di ni sngon gyi ltas dang po byung ba'o// yang lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'di thams cad/ gseg ma dang gyo mo mod la/
422a6(phal chen): sdong dum dang tsher ma med pa dang bral te/ sa gzhi rdo rje las grub par gyur nas rin po che mang pos yongasu gang bar gnas par gyur pa 'di ni/ sngon gyi lhas gnyis
422a7(phal chen): ba 'byung ba'o// yang lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'di thams cad rin po che thams cad kyi shing dang tshal dang ta la'i phreng bas rnam par dkrigs pas yongasu rgyan par
422a8(phal chen): kun nas gnas par gyur pa 'di ni/ sngon gyi ltas gsum pa byung ba'o// yang lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'di thams cad lha rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i spos kyi sku
422b1(phal chen): gu nas 'thon pa dang / bye ma thams cad kyi mdzod sa kun nas thon pa dang / rgyal mtshan thams cad kyi sprin dang na bun yongasu byung ba dang / spos kyi rin po che'i/
422b2(phal chen): gzugs kyi shing drung kun nas 'khor te/ rgyan yongasu spangs par kun nas pUr gyur pa 'di ni sngon gyi lta sa bzhi pa byung ba'o// yang lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'di thams cad
422b3(phal chen): lha rdzas kyi me tog dang 'phreng ba dang / lhab lhu ba sna tshogs kyi mdzod rnam pa thams cad du yongasu rgyas pa dang ldan par kun nas gnas par gyur pa 'di ni sngon gyi lhas
422b4(phal chen): lnga pa byung ba'o// yang lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'di thams cad kyi shing thams cad la nor bu rin po che dam pa'i mdzod mngon par 'grub par gyur pa 'di sngon gyi lhas
422b5(phal chen): drug pa byung ba'o// yang lu ma bi ni'i nags tshal 'di thams cad kyi pad mo'i tshul thams cad du chu la skyes pa'i me tog thams cad kyang kha 'bus te/ sa bzhi
422b6(phal chen): las mngon par 'phags par gnas pa 'di ni mngon gyi ltas bdun pa byung ba'o// yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i 'dod pa la spyod pa dang / gzugs la
422b7(phal chen): spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang klung dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang na mkha' lding dang mi 'ab ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang 'jig rten gyi dab
422b8(phal chen): po 'am/ 'gro ba'i dbang po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'di na/ thal mo sbyar cing 'khod par gyur te/ 'di ni
423a1(phal chen): pal#sngon gyi lhas brgyad pa byung ba'o// yang 'dzam bu gling gi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i lha'i bu mo 'am/ klu'i bu mo 'am/ gnod sbyin/
423a2(phal chen): dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i bu mo ji snyed cig yod pa dang / de dag thams cad kyang rab tu dga'
423a3(phal chen): ba'i yid kyi mchod pa'i rnam pa thams cad lag na thogs shing / bla ga sha'i yal ga la mngon du ltas te/ bdud cing phyag 'tshal bar 'khod par gyur pa
423a4(phal chen): 'di ni sngon gyi lhas dgu pa byung ba'o// yang phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku lta ba'i dkyil 'khor dag nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i skye bas
423a5(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgron mo zhes bya ba'i 'od zer mang po 'thon te/ lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'di thams cad snang bar gyur te/ 'od zer gyi sgo'i dkyil
423a6(phal chen): 'khor de dag thams cad la'ang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi skye bas rnam par 'phrul pa gzugs brnyan du gyur par snang ba dang / thog mar
423a7(phal chen): lham pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas par byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan thams cad kyang / sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi dbyang dang ldan par 'od zer gyi sgo'i
423a8(phal chen): dkyil 'khor de dag las sgrar 'thon cing grags par gyur pa 'di ni sngon gyi ltas bcu pa 'byung ba'o// byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba'i dus la bab pa'i tshe
423b1(phal chen): sngon gyi ltas bcu po de dag byung bar gyur te/ de byung bas 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'byung bar 'gyur ro// zhes/
423b2(phal chen): bya bar shes so// rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo sngon gyi ltas bcu po de dag mthong bas kyang dga' ba'i shugs bsam gyi mi khyab pa rab tu thob po// rigs kyi
423b3(phal chen): bu gzhan yang lha mo sgyu ma grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas nas byung ba'i tshe/ lum bi ni'i nags 'dir sngon gyi ltas snang ba chen po bcu byung bar gyur te de
423b4(phal chen): dag byung bas sems can tshad med pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos kyi chos kyi snang bas dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar gyur to// bcu gang
423b5(phal chen): zhes na 'di lta ste/ sa'i steng na gnas pa'i rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad du snang ba rab tu byung ngo // rin po che'i pad mo kha ma bye bar gyur pa'i mdab
423b6(phal chen): ma thams cad snang ba rab tu byung te/ bltam pa legs par bltam mo// zhes bya ba'i sgra bstan pa yang de dag las byung bar gyur to// phyogs bcu'i byang chub
423b7(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams kyi thog ma sems bskyed pa'i snang ba ci snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang / lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'dir snang bar byas te/ mngon par shar
423b8(phal chen): to// phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad yongasu gnon pa'i snang ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa ci snyed cig yod pa de
424a1(phal chen): 2dag kyang / lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'dir byung ngo // phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams pha rol tu phyin pa thams
424a2(phal chen): cad yongasu bsgrub shing / ye shes khong du chud pa'i snang ba'i 'od ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'dir 'byung bar gyur to// phyogs
424a3(phal chen): bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams smon lam thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i ye shes snang ba'i 'od ji snyed cig yod pa/ yod pa de dag kyang / lum bi
424a4(phal chen): ni'i nags tshal 'dir byung bar gyur to// phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams smon lam rgya chen po mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes snang ba'i ye
424a5(phal chen): shes snang ba'i 'od ji snyed cig yongs pa de dag kyang lum bi ni'o nags tshal 'dir byung bar gyur to// phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams
424a6(phal chen): sems can yongasasu smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba med pa'i ye shes snang ba'i 'od ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'dir byung ba
424a7(phal chen): gyur to// phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul gyi ye shes khong du chud pa'i snang ba ji snyed cig yod pa de dag
424a8(phal chen): kyang lum bi ni'i nags tsal 'dir 'byung bar gyur to// phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul
424b1(phal chen): pa dang / skye ba dang mngon par 'byung ba dang byang chub tu rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang / ye shes thug su chud par mdzad pa'i snang ba'i 'od ji snyed yod/
424b2(phal chen): pa de dag kyang lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'dir byung bar gyur to// sngon gyi lta snang ba chen po bcu po de dag rab tu byung bar gyur te/ de dag gi sems
424b3(phal chen): can mtha' dang dpung med pa'i sems dang / bsam pa'i mun pa thib po thams cad kyang rab tu snang bar byaso// rigs kyi bu de la lha mo sgyu ma shing blag
424b4(phal chen): sha'i nag su phyin pa'i tshe/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po 'dus pa thams cad dang / 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha'i bu lha mo'i tshegs/ lha'i bu mo 'khor dang bcas
424b5(phal chen): te 'dus pa thams cad dang / gzugs la spyod pa'i lha'i bu dri nga ba med pa thams cad dang / klu dang gnon sbyin dang dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam
424b6(phal chen): mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po 'khor dang bcas te tshogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod par btson pa thams cad kyi lus dang
424b7(phal chen): mchod pa'i tshogs thams cad kyang / lha mo sgyu ma'i gzi brjid dang dpal dang kha dog dang / gzugs kyi rab tu snang bar byas so// stong gsu
424b8(phal chen): gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni 'od gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang zil du rlag par gyur te/ zil gyi gnan to// lha
425a1(phal chen): mo snu ma'i bcu khams cad nas byung ba'i 'di dang sdang ba dag ni/ 'od gzhan gyi nyams par 'gyur ba med 'grib par thu
425a2(phal chen): pa med/ mchod par gyur pa med/ thogs mar gyur pa med/ de phyogs thams cad rgyas par bkang nas/ sems can dmyal po'i sdug bsngam thams
425a3(phal chen): cad dang / byol song gi skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad dang / srid pa'i rgyud du rtogs pa
425a4(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byas te/ lha ge lha me lha nges gnas par gyur to//
425a5(phal chen): rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa lum bi ni'i nags tshal du byung ba dang po'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe//
425a6(phal chen): lha me sgyu ma'i lus su stong gsuM gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khams 'di chud cing gzugs brnyan 'byung bar gyur pa de'i/ stong gsum gyi
425a7(phal chen): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya'i 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad kyi rgyal po'i gnas ming sna tshogs
425a8(phal chen): dang ldan pa sha stag dang / nags tshal ming sna tshogs dang ldan pa sha stag dang / shing drung rnam par tha dad pa sha stag tu 'ang lha mo sgyu ma byin cing /
425b1(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi yongasu bskor/ byang chub sems dpa' skye ba la sta gon cing / byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi ye shes kyi
425b2(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyi mi khyab pas/ rnam pa 'di bzhin du snang bar gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' skye ba rnam par 'phrul
425b3(phal chen): pa/ lu ma bi ni'i nags tshal du byung ba gnyis pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang lha mo sgyu ma'i ba spu'i bu ga thams cad kyi ba bu'i sgo re re la yang //
425b4(phal chen): sngon byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa mdzad pa'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyi de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig bsnyen bkur te/ rim gror mdzad pa dang /
425b5(phal chen): sti stang dang / bkur ti mdzad de/ mchod pa de dag thams cad yong su snang bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi chos ji snyed cig snyan pa de dag
425b6(phal chen): thams cad kyang ba spu'i bu ga de dag nas sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi yan lag dang ldan par ma lus par grags par gyur te/ dper na chu'i phor bu chu ngu 'am/
425b7(phal chen): gser gyi rdul phra mo 'am/ me long gi dkyil 'khor shin du gsal ba 'am/ chu shin du dang ba dang / na mkha'i dkyil 'khor nyi zla dang bza' skar
425b8(phal chen): kyi tshogs kyi rab tu brgyan pa dang / sprin gyi tshogs 'brug sgra zab mo 'byin pa yang gzugs bsnyen du gyur par snang ngo // rigs kyi bu de bzhin du/
426a1(phal chen): phal/ @#lha mo sgyu ma'i baspu'i sgo'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la'ang / sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul
426a2(phal chen): ba rnams kyang yongs su snang / chos bstan pa'i sgra thams cad kyang grags par gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul
426a3(phal chen): pa/ lum bi ni'i nags tshal du byung ba gsum pa'o// rigs kyi bu gnas yang lha mo sgyu ma'i lus thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo'i dkyil 'khor thams
426a4(phal chen): cad las/ ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang zhing ji snyed cig dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho ji snyed cig dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa ji snyed
426a5(phal chen): cig dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud ji snyed cig/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ming du bya ba ji snyed cig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi sngon byang chub sems
426a6(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa mdzad de/ zhing gi gzhi ji lta bu zhig dang ldan par gyur pa dang / dbyibs ni ji 'dra ba dang / rgyan ni ji lta bu zhig dang ldan par gyur pa
426a7(phal chen): dang / lhun ni ji lta bu zhig dang ldan par gyur pa dang / ri'i rgyun ni ji lta bu dag cig yod par gyur pa dang / grong dang grong khyer dang / yul dang grong
426a8(phal chen): rdal gyi rgyan ni ji lta bu dag cig gnas pa dang / bza' shing gi ra ba dang / mtsho dang lu ma dang / rgya mtsho'i rgyan ni ji lta bu zhig dang ldan par gyur
426b1(phal chen): pa dang / na mkha' dang sprin gyi rgyan ji lta bu zhig dang ldan par gyur pa dang / sems can gi gnas ni ji lta bu zhig yod par gyur pa dang / theg pa
426b2(phal chen): bstan pa na gang dang ldan par gyur pa dang / bskal pa'i ming dang grangs ni ji snyed cig zhes bya bar gyur pa dang / sangs rgyas skye ba ni ji snyed cig 'byung
426b3(phal chen): bar gyur pa dang / rnam par dag na gang du 'du bar gyur pa dang / sems can gyi tshe'i tshad ni ji tsam zhig dang ldan par gyur pa dang / 'jig rten gyi
426b4(phal chen): skye gnas na gang du skyes par gyur pa dang / sems can ni ji lta bu zhig dang 'grog pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen ji lta bu zhig la brtan
426b5(phal chen): brtan pa dang / dge ba'i chos ni ji lta bu zhig la brtson par spyod spyod pa dang / chos kyi nan tan ni ji lta bu zhig la brtson par byas te/
426b6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyod spyod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyang yongasu snang bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir mi ldog
426b7(phal chen): pa'i gnas brnyen nas sngon sku ni ji snyed cig rnam par spyod pa ji lta ba zhig/ cha byad ni ji lta bu zhig longs spyod ni ci dang ldan/ bde ba dang sdug
426b8(phal chen): bsngal ba ni ji lta bu zhing sku nyams su bzhes/ sku tshe'i rgyun ni ji lta bu zhig dang ldan par gyur to// sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad
427a1(phal chen): 22par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas yong su sdang bar gyur to// sangs
427a2(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyi skye gnas de dag de dag tu lha mo sgru ba byang chub sems dpa'i yum du gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' su de dag
427a3(phal chen): thams cad kyang lha mo sgyu ba'i ba spu'i sgo thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzugs brnyan byung bar gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems
427a4(phal chen): dpa' skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa lum bi ni'i nags tshal du byung ba bzhi pa'o// // rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyi
427a5(phal chen): sngon sku ni ji snyed cig gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad pa dang / kha dog ni ji lta bu zhig dbyibs ni ji lta bu zhig/ cha byad ni ji
427a6(phal chen): lta bu zhig/ nga rod ni ji lta bu zhig/ longs spyod ni ji lta bu zhig/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal ni ci lta bu zhig/ sku nyams su bzhes/
427a7(phal chen): sku ro'i rgyu ni ji lta bu zhig dang ldan par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / lha mo rgyu ma'i lus kyi baspu'i sgo thams cad la gzugs brnyan du snang ba
427a8(phal chen): gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de ni byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba rnam par 'phrul pa lum bi ni'i nags tshal tu byung ba lnga pa'o//
427b1(phal chen): rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mdzad pa'i tshe/ btang bar dka' ba yongasu btang ste zhabs
427b2(phal chen): dang phyag yongs su btang ba 'am/ snyan dang shangs yongs su btang ba 'am/ ljags dang chos yongasu btang ba 'am/ spyan dang
427b3(phal chen): dbu yongasu gtang ba 'am/ sha dang khrag yongasu btang ba 'am/ rus pa dang rkang yongs su gtang ba 'am// khal ma dang
427b4(phal chen): thugs yongs su gtang ba 'am/ sku yongs su gtang ba 'am/ lpag pa dang pri yongs su gtang ba 'am/ phyi nang gi rjes po yongs
427b5(phal chen): su gtang ba 'am/ sras po dang sras mo dang btsun mo yongasu gtang ba 'am/ sku yongasu gtang ba 'am/ longs spyod rin po che yongasu gtang
427b6(phal chen): ba 'am/ grong dang grong khyer dang ljongs dang yul khams dang rgyal po'i gnas yongasu gtang ba 'am/ nor dang 'bru dang mdzod dang bang ba yod
427b7(phal chen): su gtang ba 'am/ nor bu dang mu tig dang bai DUr+ya dang / dung dang man shel dang / byi ru dang gser dang dngul dang yongasu gtang ba 'am/ rin
427b8(phal chen): po che'i rgyan sna tshogs yongasu gtang ba 'am/ mal cha yongasu gtang ba 'am/ khang pa dang gzhal med khang yongasu btang ba 'am/
428a1(phal chen): phal/ yo byad yongs su gtang ba dang / de ltar gtong ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i sku gzugs dang
428a2(phal chen): rnam pa ji lta bu yongasu btang bar gyur pa dang / len pa de dag kyang rnam pa ci lta bus len par gyur pa dang / sbyin pa'i sbos po rnam
428a3(phal chen): pa ji lta bu dag yongs su btang bar gyur pa dang / yul gyi phyogs gang dag tu yongasu btang bar gyur pa dang / de'i tshe byang chub sems
428a4(phal chen): dpa'i 'khor du gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / lha mo sgyu ma'i ba spu'i sgo thams cad las gzugs brnyen du snang bar gyur to// slong mo ba'i sgra
428a5(phal chen): dag kyang grags par gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa lum bi ni'i nags tshal du byung ba drug pa'o//
428a6(phal chen): rigs kyi bu gzhan yang sngon gyi mtha' rgyud du 'byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yum gyi sku nas bltam par gyur pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan dang
428a7(phal chen): ldan pa lhab lhub ji snyed cig byung bar gyur pa dang / sems can gyi rgyan rnam par bye ba dang / bza' shing gi rgyan rnam par phye ba dang / me tog dang 'dun
428a8(phal chen): pa dang / spos dang 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang na bza' dang / bdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dang gyi rnam par phye ba dang / rin po che'i rgyal po
428b1(phal chen): thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan pa'i phye ba dang / rol mo dang / glu dang bstod pa dang / sil snyan gyi sgra ji snyed cig byung 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang /
428b2(phal chen): lha mo sgyu ma lum bi ni'i nags tshal du phyin pa'i tshe/ lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'di yongasu byung bar gyur to// mngon par skyeso// 'gro bas rnam par dmigasu
428b3(phal chen): yod byung bar gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa lum bi ni'i nags tshal 'dir yongasu byung ba bdun pa'o//
428b4(phal chen): rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i longs spyod lha'i dbang po thams cad kyi gnas kyi longs spyod las yongasu 'das pa dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za
428b5(phal chen): lha ma yin dang / na mkhany+dza dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'bye chen po dang / mi'i dbang po thams cad kyi gnas kyi rgyan gyi longs spyod las 'das pa 'di lta ste/
428b6(phal chen): rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i longs spyod dang / rin po che'i rgyal po'i gzhal med khang gi longs spyod dam/ rin po che'i rgyal po'i
428b7(phal chen): 'bru'i longs spyod dam/ rin po che'i gzugs kyi longs spyod dam/ rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyi longs spyod dang// spos kyi rgyal po thams cad la longs
428b8(phal chen): skyed dang / dmigs pa thams cad bzang zhing mthun pa'i longs spyod kyang rung ste/ de dag thams cad lha mo sgyu ma'i rum nas ma 'dres par mthon te/ lum
429a1(phal chen): @bi ni'i nags tshal 'di yongasu can cing kun nas gnas par gyur to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i skye 'di
429a2(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa lum 'i ni'i nags tshal du byung ba brgyad pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang lha mo sgyu ma'i lus las byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi
429a3(phal chen): zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag stong gi rdul shin du phra ba snyed bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dang / sku gzugs dang / sku mdog
429a4(phal chen): dang dbyibs 'dra ba mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i rgyan gyi dra bar brgyan pa 'od dpag tu me 'dra ba dang / 'od zer 'dra ba rab tu 'gyed pa tshul dang 'gros blta
429a5(phal chen): bas 'dra ba rtsal dang mthu 'dra ba/ rnam par snang ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa mthun pa/ 'khor 'dra ba rgyan mtshung ba mang po yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snga
429a6(phal chen): mdzad kyi legs pa brgya mtsho yongasu brjod cing 'thon par gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa lum bi ni'i nags tshal
429a7(phal chen): du byung ba dgu pa'o// // rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i bltam par gyur dus la bab pa dang / lha mo sgyu ma 'dun du 'og gi rdo rje'i
429a8(phal chen): gzhi las sa chen po mngon par btol te/ rin po che'i rgyal po'i pad mo chen po thams cad kyi rgyan gyi dam pa zhes bya ba chu rin po che'i rgyal po// gzhan gyi mi thu
429b1(phal chen): pa'i rdo rje chen po las grub pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po 'gro ba rgya mtsho'i nang rim dang ldan pa/ ze ba'i rtse mo rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi brgyan/ 'dam
429b2(phal chen): ma'i 'phreng ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi brgyan cing / shin du rnam par phye ba lo mi dkyil 'khor rin po che'i rgyal po sna tshogs kyi byas pa snying
429b3(phal chen): po mdzes pa'i rin po che yid bzhin gyi rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa/ ze ba'i 'brel ba rnam par phye ba/ rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog tshad med pa dang
429b4(phal chen): ldan pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po grangs med pa 'dra ba'i brgyan dang ldan pas yongasu yog pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po rdo rje mthu bo ches mi shig pas lhun kun nas
429b5(phal chen): bkab pa/ lha'i rigs thams cad kyi kun nas bskor ba/ klu'i dbang po thams cad spos chu'i sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po thad
429b6(phal chen): kyi kun nas bskor cing / lha rdzas kyi me tog snyim pa nas gtor ba/ dri za'i dbang po tha~Md kyi sngon gyi sangs rgyas la rim gror byas pa'i glu'i dbyangs snyan bcing
429b7(phal chen): yid du 'ong ba'i nga ro dang sbyar te/ stod pa'i sprin gyi rngon par bstod pa/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po thams cad kyi nga rgyal dang / rlom pa dang / dregs pa thaMd btang
429b8(phal chen): zhing shin du btud phyag bya ba/ na mkha' lding gyi dbang po tha~Md kyi rin po che'i/ snam bu kun du sbyangs te/ na mkha' kun nas brgyan par bya ba/ mi 'am ci'i dbang po
430a1(phal chen): dzad kyi byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan yongasu brjod cing rol
430a2(phal chen): mo dang / gru'i dbyangs la brtson pa dang / nyams rab tu bde bas kun nas blta
430a3(phal chen): ba/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po thams cad shin du dga' ba dang / mos pa skyes pas
430a4(phal chen): yongasu lta zhing / kun nas sgra snyan pa phyung ste/ rgyan gyi sprin thams cad kyi char mngon par
430a5(phal chen): dbab pa byung bar gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rnam
430a6(phal chen): bar 'phrul pa/ lum bi ni'i nags tshal du byung ba bcu pa'o// // oM wa gi
430a7(phal chen): shA ri muM/ oM ma Ni pad me hUM/ oM badz+ra pa Ni hU~M/ sarba mang+ga laM/ dge'o//
